a3f1abf485.gt:
Mix the Italian seasoning with 1 tsp olive oil and rub over chicken.
Refrigerate for 4-24 hours.
In a saucepan over medium-low heat add the tomatoes, 2 tsp olive oil, 2 tsp balsamic vinegar, and seasoning as desired.
In a large pan bring 6 cups of water to a boil and cook the pasta according the package directions.
Allow the tomatoes to simmer for 20 minutes, then add the mixed veggies and continue to simmer for another 10 minutes (I used a frozen blend).
Grill the chicken until an internal temp of 165 F is reached (approx.
7 minutes per side).
Pour the tomatoes over the pasta and top with a chicken breast.
a3f1abf485.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the olive oil, balsamic vinegar, and Italian seasoning.
3. Season the chicken breast halves with salt and pepper, then coat them with the olive oil mixture.
4. Place the chicken on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
5. While the chicken is cooking, cook the linguine according to the package instructions.
6. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the diced tomatoes and cook until they are softened and slightly caramelized.
7. Add the mixed vegetables to the skillet and cook until they are tender.
8. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes. Then, slice it into thin pieces.
9. Add the chicken to the skillet with the vegetables and toss everything together.
10. Serve the chicken and vegetable mixture over the cooked linguine.

[/INST]

38747a5ef7.gt:
Prepare a large ice bath.
In a large saucepan of salted boiling water, blanch the cauliflower until just starting to soften, 1 to 2 minutes.
Drain and transfer to the ice bath to cool.
Drain again.
In a large saucepan, combine the vinegar with the water, sugar, curry powder and 1 tablespoon of salt and bring to a boil, stirring to dissolve the sugar.
Remove from the heat, stir in the cauliflower and let cool completely.
Refrigerate for 1 hour.
Drain the cauliflower; reserve the brine to pickle more vegetables, if desired.
Preheat the oven to 375.
On a large rimmed baking sheet, toss the cauliflower with the olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Roast for about 35 minutes, stirring once or twice, until tender and browned in spots.
Transfer the cauliflower to a platter and serve.
38747a5ef7.pred:
1. Prepare the ingredients:
- Rinse the cauliflower florets and pat them dry with a paper towel.
- In a large bowl, combine the cauliflower florets, curry powder, salt, and pepper.
- In a separate bowl, whisk together the ice, water, dark brown sugar, and extra-virgin olive oil.

2. Prepare the pickling solution:
- In a large saucepan, combine the vinegar, water, and sugar. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to a simmer and let it cook for about 10 minutes, or until the sugar has dissolved.

3. Pickle the cauliflower:
- Carefully pour the hot pickling solution over the cauliflower florets in the large bowl, making sure to coat them evenly.
- Allow the cauliflower to pickle for about 15-20 minutes, or until it reaches your desired level of pickledness.

4. Roast the cauliflower:
- Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
- Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
- Spread the cauliflower florets out on the prepared baking sheet.
- Roast the cauliflower florets in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.

5. Assemble the dish:
- Once the cauliflower is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it cool slightly.
- In a large serving bowl, combine the pickled cauliflower and roasted cauliflower.
- Serve the cauliflower mixture as a side dish or as part of a larger meal.

Enjoy your delicious and appetizing meal!

c6db02633a.gt:
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F.
Put the ricotta in a fine mesh strainer set over a bowl and let stand 10 minutes to remove the excess liquid.
Transfer the cheese to a bowl and add the eggs, salt and pepper, to taste and the orange zest.
Stir until well combined.
Transfer the mixture to an 8-ounce shallow baking and serving dish and put on a baking sheet.
Bake in the center of the oven until puffed and beginning to brown, about 35 minutes.
Remove from the oven and let stand 5 minutes before serving.
Serve warm with olives and baguette or your favorite bread and enjoy!
c6db02633a.pred:
[/SYS]

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the ricotta, eggs, salt, and pepper until smooth.
3. Add the zest of the orange and the olive oil to the bowl, and mix well.
4. Spread the mixture evenly over the sliced baguette, making sure to cover the bread completely.
5. Bake the bread for 15-20 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and the filling is set.
6. Allow the bread to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into slices and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Baked Fresh Ricotta with Olives!

8d838c9253.gt:
Heat a Dutch oven over medium heat.
Coat pan with cooking spray.
Add celery, carrot, and onion to pan; cook 12 minutes or until tender, stirring occasionally.
Add garlic; cook 30 seconds, stirring constantly.
Add broth and next 4 ingredients (through pepper); bring to a boil.
Reduce heat, and simmer 12 minutes or until pasta is tender.
Add chicken to pan; cook 3 minutes or until chicken is done.
Sprinkle with cheese.
8d838c9253.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the cooking spray over medium heat. Add the celery, carrot, and onion, and cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute more.
4. Add the chicken broth and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 10 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through.
5. Add the canned chickpeas, ditalini, and black pepper. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, or until the pasta is cooked al dente.
6. Remove the skillet from the heat and stir in the shaved Parmesan cheese.
7. Transfer the mixture to a 9x13 inch baking dish.
8. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
9. Serve the dish hot.

[/SYS]

07d9e9cc9b.gt:
Combine water, sugar, salt, yeast, oil, and enough flour to make a soft dough.
(You may need more than 3 1/2 cups.)
Knead for 3-4 minutes.
On a greased counter, break off pieces of dough and roll into thin ropes that are about 1 1/2 times the length of your skewers.
Twist the rope around the skewer and place on a greased cookie sheet.
Repeat till all dough is used.
Let twists rise till doubled, about 30 minutes.
While they are baking, combine the glaze ingredients and let site while the bread twists bake so the flavors will blend.
Bake twists at 375F for about 12-15 minutes or till golden brown.
Remove from oven and brush with the butter glaze.
Try not to drool.
07d9e9cc9b.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the hot water, sugar, salt, instant yeast, and olive oil. Mix until the yeast is dissolved.
2. Gradually add the flour, stirring until a dough forms. Knead the dough until it is smooth and elastic, about 5-7 minutes.
3. Cover the dough with a damp cloth and let it rise in a warm place for about 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.
4. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
5. After the dough has risen, punch it down and transfer it to a lightly floured surface.
6. Roll out the dough into a long, thin rope. Cut the rope into 12 equal pieces.
7. Place the pieces of dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Brush the tops of the twists with melted butter.
9. Bake the twists in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
10. Remove the twists from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Incredible Bread Twists!

8ff16b99b6.gt:
Cream the butter and sugar
Beat in the egg
Add malt and beat together
Add the flour & salt if using and mix into a ball I changed to a spoon half way as mixture was going every where lol.
Put dough in the fridge for 30-60 minutes.
I left mine for 60.
This makes the dough easier to roll out.
10 minutes before you roll out the dough Pre heat oven to 150 & line a baking tray with greaseproof paper
Roll out the dough to the thickness of a 1 coin and cut out in rectangular shapes or squares,
Place on the tray and bake for 15-20 minutes until edges go lightly brown.
Mine took 18 minutes
Leave to cool a while on the tray before transferring to a cooling rack
Enjoy with a glass of milk or favourite brew.
8ff16b99b6.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the egg and malt extract, and mix until well combined.
4. Gradually add the flour, mixing until a smooth dough forms.
5. If the dough is too dry, add a splash of milk to achieve the desired consistency.
6. Roll the dough out on a lightly floured surface to your desired thickness.
7. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
8. Place the biscuits on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake the biscuits in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
10. Remove the biscuits from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Malted Milk Biscuits!

8ffd977e2f.gt:
In 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat, heat Italian sausages and 1/4 cup water to boiling.
Reduce heat to low; cover and simmer 5 minutes.
Remove cover and cook until sausages are browned, about 15 minutes.
Remove sausages to cutting board.
When cool enough to handle, cut diagonally into 1/4-inch-thick slices.
While sausages are cooking, cut eggplant into 1/2-inch chunks.
In drippings remaining in skillet, over medium heat, cook eggplant and 2 tablespoons water until eggplant is tender, about 15 minutes, stirring often and adding additional water if necessary to keep eggplant from sticking.
Add spaghetti sauce and sausages; over high heat, heat to boiling.
Reduce heat to low; cover and simmer 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, in saucepot, prepare ziti macaroni as label directs but do not use salt in water.
Drain ziti; return to saucepot.
Add spaghetti-sauce mixture; over medium heat, heat through.
To serve, spoon ziti into 8 individual pasta bowls or dinner plates; top each serving with some ricotta cheese and cracked pepper.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese if you like.
8ffd977e2f.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
3. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the sausage and cook until browned, breaking it up into smaller pieces as it cooks.
4. Add the eggplant to the skillet and cook until it is tender and slightly caramelized. Season with salt and pepper.
5. In a large bowl, combine the cooked pasta, sausage, eggplant, spaghetti sauce, and ricotta cheese. Mix well.
6. Transfer the pasta mixture to a large baking dish.
7. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.
8. Sprinkle the Parmesan cheese on top of the dish and return it to the oven for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
9. Serve the Sausage and Eggplant Pasta hot, garnished with coarsely shredded Parmesan cheese.

Enjoy your delicious Sausage and Eggplant Pasta!

ea0996a6a7.gt:
start be heating your water & white sugar & cinnamon stick together on high heat about 3 minutes you just want your sugar to desolve.
Now add in all your other ingredients lower temperatures to med- high heat stir well cook down 20-25 minutes consistently stiring till desired consistency.
Enjoy!
ea0996a6a7.pred:
[INSTRUCTIONS]
1. In a large saucepan, combine 1 1/4 cup sugar, 1/2 cup water, and the cranberry and apple chutney ingredients.
2. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally.
3. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the chutney has thickened and the cranberries have softened.
4. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the golden raisins and brown sugar.
5. Allow the chutney to cool slightly before transferring it to a clean, dry jar.
6. Store the chutney in the refrigerator and enjoy it as a spread on toast, a side dish, or as a topping for various dishes.

[/INSTRUCTIONS]

a6a539fdd1.gt:
Season the thighs with adobo.
Heat the olive oil and cook the thighs.
Add the onion and cooked them till tender.
Add the vegetables, honey, basil, italian seasoning and tomato sauce.
And let it simmer for about 8 minutes...Enjoy
a6a539fdd1.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large oven-safe pot or Dutch oven, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
3. Add the chicken pieces and cook until browned on both sides, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Remove the chicken from the pot and set aside.
5. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
6. Add the adobo seasoning, Italian seasoning, and dry basil to the pot. Cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring to combine.
7. Add the mixed vegetables, tomato sauce, and honey. Stir to combine.
8. Return the chicken to the pot, cover with a lid, and place in the preheated oven.
9. Bake for 1-1.5 hours, or until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
10. Remove the chicken from the pot and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into pieces.
11. Serve the chicken and vegetables over a bed of rice or noodles.

[/INST]

22b18abc2f.gt:
*adding potatoes and corn are optional
Add all ingredients, except shrimp to a large saucepan on high heat.
Bring to a boil for 10 minutes.
Reduce the heat to low.
Add the shrimp and cook until bright pink, about 5 minutes.
Drain the shrimp from the cooking liquid and place in a serving dish.
Chill or eat while warm, enjoy!!!
!
22b18abc2f.pred:
1. In a large pot, combine the shrimp, beer, water, apple cider vinegar, minced garlic, crab boil seasoning, bay leaves, peppercorns, and lemon.
2. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to a simmer and cook for 10-15 minutes, or until the shrimp are cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
3. Remove the shrimp from the pot with a slotted spoon and set aside to cool slightly.
4. In a small bowl, mix the hot sauce with a little water to create a sauce consistency.
5. Return the shrimp to the pot and stir in the sauce.
6. Serve the drunken shrimp over rice or noodles, garnished with a sprinkle of fresh parsley.

Enjoy your delicious drunken shrimp!

f4a5f6209b.gt:
preheat oven to 450F
mix together dry ingredients.
in a seperate bowl, mix wet.
slowly add the wet to the dry, and combine until just mixed.
roll out on a lightly floured surface, and use a cutter of choice to create shapes (i used the top of a drinking glass).
bake for about 15 minutes.
f4a5f6209b.pred:
[INST] <<SYS>>
To make these delicious gluten-free teff biscuits with strawberry-pineapple jam, follow these clear instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the teff flour, amaranth flour, tapioca starch, cornstarch, baking powder, xanthan gum, salt, and vanilla extract.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the unsweetened soymilk, sunflower oil, and strawberry-pineapple jam.
4. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until a dough forms.
5. Turn the dough onto a floured surface and knead it until it becomes smooth and elastic.
6. Roll the dough out to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.5 cm) and cut out biscuit shapes using a biscuit cutter or a round cookie cutter.
7. Place the biscuits on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the biscuits in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown on the edges and firm to the touch.
9. Remove the biscuits from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious gluten-free teff biscuits with strawberry-pineapple jam!

331c22eb1b.gt:
In a small Mason jar, or jar of choice, combine oats, chia seeds, ground flaxseeds, cinnamon, and sea salt.
Add milk and Greek yogurt.
Stir everything together and place the lid on the jar and give the mixture a good shake to combine the ingredients.
Place the lid back on the jar and refrigerate overnight.
In the morning, you can serve oats either right from the jar or in a bowl.
Simply serve with a sprinkle of sliced almonds, fresh blueberries, and some brown sugar, if desired (it is actually sweet enough if you use vanilla yogurt though!
).
331c22eb1b.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the rolled oats, chia seeds, ground flaxseeds, cinnamon, and sea salt.
2. In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk, Greek yogurt, and brown sugar.
3. Pour the milk mixture over the oat mixture and stir to combine.
4. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight.
5. In the morning, stir the oats and blueberries together.
6. Serve the blueberry oat mixture topped with sliced almonds.

[/SYS]

0998cbac3e.gt:
Heat oven to 400 degrees.
In a large bowl, combine whole wheat flour, 1 cup white flour, brown sugar, baking powder and salt.
Using a pastry blender, or two knives scissors-fashion, cut butter into flour mixture until mixture resembles fine crumbs.
Add nuts or wheat berries.
Stir in the maple syrup and egg and just enough milk so that dough leaves side of bowl and forms a ball.
Turn dough onto a lightly floured surface; gently roll in flour to coat.
Knead lightly; if dough is very soft, roll in flour again.
Transfer to a lightly greased baking sheet.
Pat or roll into an 8-inch disk; cut into 8 wedges, but do not separate.
Bake until golden brown, about 20 minutes.
Immediately remove from baking sheet, and carefully separate.
Serve warm.
0998cbac3e.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the whole wheat and white flour, brown sugar, baking powder, and salt.
3. Cut the chilled butter into small pieces and add it to the dry ingredients.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg and milk, and then add it to the dry ingredients.
5. Stir until the dough comes together.
6. Fold in the chopped toasted walnuts or cooked wheat berries.
7. On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.5 cm).
8. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
9. Grease a baking sheet with vegetable oil or nonstick spray.
10. Transfer the scones to the prepared baking sheet, spacing them about 2 inches (5 cm) apart.
11. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the scones are cooked through.
12. Remove the scones from the oven and let them cool on a wire rack for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Maple Scones!

10a4bdfe37.gt:
Cook the wild rice according to the directions on the package.
Wild rice generally takes 55-60 minutes to cook.
While thats cooking, in a large soup pot, melt the butter and saute the leeks, carrots, celery, mushrooms, garlic and thyme on medium high heat.
Cook for about 15 minutes, or until the vegetables have softened, stirring occasionally.
Add the flour and stir until blended into the vegetables.
Add the chicken broth and bring to a boil.
Once boiling, cover, turn the heat down to low, and simmer for 30 minutes.
At the 30 minute point, add the wild rice, chives and cooked and diced chicken.
Stir in the cream, half-n-half and sherry.
Cook until thoroughly heated.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
10a4bdfe37.pred:
To cook the mystery dish, which is a Minnesota Chicken Wild Rice Soup, follow these steps:

1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the diced leek and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
2. Add the diced carrots, celery, and mushrooms to the pot. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes.
3. Add the minced garlic and thyme to the pot and cook for another minute.
4. Pour in the chicken broth and bring the mixture to a boil.
5. Add the cooked chicken, heavy cream, half-and-half, and dry sherry to the pot. Stir to combine.
6. Reduce the heat to low and let the soup simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
7. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Serve the soup hot, garnished with a sprinkle of fresh chives.

Enjoy your delicious Minnesota Chicken Wild Rice Soup!

01a4e9a11b.gt:
in large frying pan saute with olive oil - thinly sliced onion & thinly sliced garlic until lightly blanched.
add sausage & ground beef.
saute until sausage & beef are braised.
add some wine.
transfer to a large pan.
add halved cherry tomatoes & sliced zucchini.
saute until tomatoes begin to wrinkle.
add V8 & allow to reach a simmer.
add pesto, oregano & thyme.
reduce to level of a thin sauce.
add corn starch & thicken.
add more wine.
last add parsley & chives.
season with salt & fresh pepper.
reduce to sauce thickness (if it needs liquid add more white wine).
Allow to cool & refrigerate overnight for flavors to be infused in the sauce.
Serve over al dente pasta and top with grated romano cheese.
01a4e9a11b.pred:
To cook the mystery dish, which is a homemade spaghetti sauce, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the kielbasa over medium heat until browned and cooked through, about 10-15 minutes. Remove from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, cook the ground beef until browned and cooked through, breaking it up into smaller pieces as it cooks. Season the beef with salt and pepper.
4. Add the garlic and onion to the skillet and cook until the onion is translucent.
5. Add the V8 vegetable juice, cornstarch, and pesto sauce to the skillet. Stir to combine.
6. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
7. Add the cherry tomatoes, zucchini, and oregano to the skillet. Cook for an additional 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
8. Season the sauce with salt and pepper to taste.
9. In a large pot, cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
10. Drain the spaghetti and return it to the pot. Pour the spaghetti sauce over the spaghetti and toss to combine.
11. Add the cooked kielbasa to the pot and toss to combine.
12. Serve the spaghetti and kielbasa mixture hot.

Enjoy your homemade spaghetti sauce!

68a1ebd22c.gt:
Combine flour, baking powder, sugar, cardamom and salt in a large bowl.
Whisk egg and water together in a small bowl.
Make a well in center of dry ingredients and add egg mixture.
Mix together gradually with a fork until mixture forms a soft dough.
If it's too sticky, add 1 or 2 tablespoons of flour (one at a time).
Cover dough with a wet towel or plastic wrap and leave 30 minutes or longer.
Heat 4 cups of oil in a deep, heavy pot (cast iron is preferable) until is reaches 360F
While oil is heating, roll dough out on a floured surface into a rectangle 1/2 inch thick.
Use a sharp knife to cut into 20 equal rectangles.
Fry maandazi in batches of 5, for about 5 minutes per batch, turning to brown both sides.
Hint: Turn the mandaazi before it gets too puffy, or the air bubbles will prevent you from turning it at all.
Remove from oil when both sides are golden brown.
Serve warm, dipped in powdered sugar if desired.
68a1ebd22c.pred:
[/SYS]

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the white flour, baking powder, sugar, cardamom, and salt.
2. Add the egg and mix until a smooth dough forms.
3. Gradually add the water, mixing until the dough comes together.
4. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it is smooth and elastic.
5. Cover the dough with a damp cloth and let it rest for 30 minutes.
6. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
7. Divide the dough into 12 equal portions.
8. Roll each portion into a ball and flatten it slightly.
9. Place the dough balls on a greased baking sheet.
10. Bake the dough for 12-15 minutes or until they are golden brown.
11. Remove the dough from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/SYS]

[/SYS]

3bcfc9dd72.gt:
Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
Drizzle olive oil on a rimmed baking sheet.
Spread spinach leaves in a thick layer covering the baking sheet.
Arrange onions and artichokes over the spinach, and drizzle the marinade from the jar over the entire salad.
Sprinkle with the cheese (and sausage, if you wish).
Bake for about 10 minutes, or until the spinach is wilted but NOT crispy.
3bcfc9dd72.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the spinach, red onion, and crumbled feta cheese.
3. In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
4. Pour the dressing over the spinach mixture and toss to combine.
5. Spread the spinach mixture evenly on a baking sheet.
6. Bake the spinach mixture in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the spinach is tender and the feta cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Serve the hot spinach and artichoke salad immediately.

[/INST]

7a39ad4f0a.gt:
In a large pot, combine the stock with the carrots, celery, onion, leek, potato, ginger, cumin, coriander, and cayenne, and bring to a boil.
Cover and simmer over low heat until the vegetables are tender, 20-25 minutes.
Working in batches, puree the soup in a food processor(or blender), then return to the pot.
Stir in buttermilk and lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Reheat gently.
Ladle into bowls, and sprinkle with the parsley and serve.
Enjoy!
7a39ad4f0a.pred:
1. In a large saucepan, combine the vegetable broth, carrots, celery, onion, leek, sweet potato, and spices (cumin, coriander, and cayenne pepper). Bring to a boil over medium heat, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 25-30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.

2. In a small bowl, whisk together the buttermilk, lemon juice, and salt. Pour the mixture into the saucepan with the vegetables, stirring to combine.

3. Simmer the soup for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the sweet potato is tender and the flavors have melded together.

4. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it sit for a few minutes. Stir in the flat leaf parsley.

5. Serve the Silky Spicy Carrot Soup hot, garnished with additional parsley if desired.

[/INST]

80c8683fe0.gt:
To toast nuts, preheat oven to 375F (190C).
Spread nuts out on a baking sheet and bake until lightly toasted, about 5 minutes.
Nuts can be stored in the refrigerator.
Wash and separate endive into leaves.
Dry with a clean tea towel.
If not serving right away, place in a plastic bag and refrigerate for up to 1 day.
Whisk olive oil with vinegar, garlic, salt and pepper.
Taste and add more vinegar if needed.
Dressing can be left at room temperature for several hours or refrigerated in a sealed jar.
Vinaigrette becomes cloudy when cold.
When ready to serve, let vinaigrette come to room temperature.
Arrange endive on individual plates.
Shake vinaigrette and drizzle over salad.
Scatter toasted nuts over top.
Serve right away.
80c8683fe0.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece, follow these instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Toast the nuts in the oven for about 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until they are golden brown and fragrant.
3. In a large bowl, combine the toasted nuts, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, minced garlic clove, and salt. Mix well to combine.
4. Add the Belgian endive or curly endive lettuce to the bowl and toss to coat the vegetables with the dressing.
5. Season the salad with additional salt and pepper, if needed.
6. Serve the salad immediately, or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving to allow the flavors to meld together.

Enjoy your delicious endive salad with toasted nuts!

ea6256f97c.gt:
Beat margarine or butter and granulated sugar in a medium mixing bowl with an electric mixer on medium high speed until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, sour cream, and vanilla; beat until well combined.
Stir together flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
Add to butter sugar mixture; beat until combined.
Stir in raisins and 2/3 cup of fruit cake mix.
Spread batter evenly into a greased and floured 13x9x2-inch baking pan.
Stir together brown sugar, cinnamon, pecans, and 1/3 cup of fruit cake mix.
Sprinkle evenly over batter and pat down.
Bake in a 350F oven for 40 to 45 minutes or until toothpick inserted into center comes out clean.
Serve warm or cooled.
ea6256f97c.pred:
To recreate the Stollen Coffee Cake, follow these instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the margarine or butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
4. Combine the sour cream and vanilla, then add to the batter.
5. In a separate bowl, mix the flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and spices.
6. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the batter, mixing until just combined.
7. Fold in the raisins, fruitcake mix, brown sugar, and chopped pecans.
8. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x13 inch baking dish.
9. Bake for 35-40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
10. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Stollen Coffee Cake!

efba40ac8b.gt:
In a medium saucepan, bring 2 1/4 cups of water to a boil.
Add the rice and a generous pinch of salt.
Stir once, cover and simmer over low heat until the water is absorbed and the rice is tender, about 20 minutes.
Remove from the heat and let steam, covered, for 20 minutes.
Fluff the rice with a fork and spread it out on a plate to cool slightly.
Meanwhile, in a large skillet, toast the tea over moderately low heat, stirring, until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Transfer the tea to a plate and let cool, then finely crumble with your fingers.
In the skillet, melt the butter.
Add the onion and cook over moderately low heat, stirring occasionally, until very soft but not browned, about 12 minutes; season with salt.
Add the rice and tea and cook over moderate heat, stirring gently, until the rice is hot and the tea is evenly distributed, about 2 minutes.
Gently fold in the crabmeat and cook until warmed through, about 2 minutes.
Season generously with pepper.
Transfer to a platter and garnish with sesame seeds.
Serve right away.
efba40ac8b.pred:
To cook the Fragrant Crab Rice, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the ingredients: Rinse the jasmine rice and set it aside. In a small bowl, mix the kosher salt, pepper, and black breakfast tea, preferably Japanese. In another small bowl, mix the melted butter and minced white onion.

2. Cook the rice: In a medium saucepan, combine the rice, tea mixture, and 2 cups of water. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cover. Cook the rice for 15-20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the water has been absorbed.

3. Cook the crab: In a large skillet, heat the butter over medium heat. Add the crabmeat and cook until it turns pink and is heated through. Season the crab with salt and pepper to taste.

4. Combine the ingredients: Once the rice is cooked, fluff it with a fork and transfer it to a large bowl. Add the cooked crab to the rice and mix well.

5. Garnish with black sesame seeds: Sprinkle the cooked crab and rice mixture with black sesame seeds for a touch of flavor and presentation.

6. Serve: Serve the Fragrant Crab Rice immediately, and enjoy your delicious meal!

6eccb4afe2.gt:
Cook pasta according to package directions, omitting salt and fat.
Drain pasta in a large colander over a bowl, reserving 1/2 cup cooking liquid.
Rinse pasta under cold water; drain.
Drain tuna, reserving 2 tablespoons oil.
Grate 2 teaspoons rind from lemon; squeeze 3 tablespoons juice.
Combine reserved oil, rind, and juice in a large bowl; stir with a whisk.
Add pasta to oil mixture, tossing to coat.
Fold in tuna and apple.
Remove fronds from fennel bulb; finely chop fronds to measure 3 tablespoons.
Remove and discard stalks.
Thinly slice fennel bulb.
Stir fronds and sliced fennel into pasta mixture.
Add reserved pasta liquid and 1/2 teaspoon salt, tossing to coat pasta salad evenly.Sustainable Choice: Industry label regulations require solid white tuna to be from the albacore variety.
6eccb4afe2.pred:
[/SYS]

1. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions.
2. While the pasta is cooking, prepare the tuna by removing the packing from the jar and breaking it into small pieces.
3. In a large bowl, combine the cooked pasta, tuna, lemon juice, and apple slices.
4. Add the sliced fennel bulb to the bowl, and toss everything together gently.
5. Season the salad with salt, pepper, and a drizzle of olive oil, if desired.
6. Serve the Tuna-Fennel Pasta Salad immediately or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Tuna-Fennel Pasta Salad!

dba5f2108e.gt:
For the pork medallions: Heat grill to medium heat.
Place pork medallions in a bowl, add olive oil and spices.
Mix until all the pork is covered in the olive oil mixture.
Place pork on grill and cook 5 minutes per side.
Cover and let it rest for 5 minutes.
For the asparagus: Cut off the ends of the asparagus.
Place in a bowl and add olive oil and a sprinkle of salt and pepper.
Wrap each piece of asparagus with prosciutto.
Place asparagus on grill set on medium heat.
Turn every couple of minutes until asparagus is fork tender, about 5 to 10 minutes.
dba5f2108e.pred:
1. Preheat your grill to medium-high heat.
2. In a small bowl, mix together the garlic powder, black pepper, thyme, and parsley. Season the pork medallions with this mixture.
3. In a large bowl, whisk together the olive oil, salt, and pepper. Add the pork medallions to the bowl and toss to coat them evenly with the marinade.
4. Grill the pork medallions for about 4-5 minutes per side, or until they are cooked through and have a nice charred exterior.
5. While the pork is grilling, wrap each asparagus spear with a piece of prosciutto.
6. Once the pork is cooked, remove it from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes.
7. Meanwhile, add the olive oil to a large skillet or frying pan. Sauté the asparagus spears wrapped in prosciutto over medium heat until they are tender and slightly charred.
8. Serve the grilled pork medallions with the grilled asparagus spears wrapped in prosciutto on the side. Enjoy your delicious meal!

8a7f317318.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 F. Spray a 9-inch glass pie plate with cooking spray or use a silicon pie plate.
In a 10-inch skillet, cook beef and onion over medium heat.
Stir occasionally.
Drain.
Add salt, garlic powder and Cajun seasoning.
Spread in pie plate.
Sprinkle with cheese.
In a small bowl stir the Original Bisquick mix, milk, and eggs with a wire wish until blended.
Pour into pie plate.
Bake about 20-25 minutes or until a knife inserted into the center comes out clean.
You can add to your slice ketchup, BBQ sauce, bacon or anything else you would normally top your cheeseburger with.
8a7f317318.pred:
To cook the cheeseburger pie, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until it is no longer pink. Drain any excess fat.
3. Add the onion and cook until it is softened.
4. In a mixing bowl, combine the ground beef, onion, shredded cheddar cheese, Original Bisquick mix, milk, eggs, garlic powder, and salt. Mix until well combined.
5. Spray a 9-inch (23cm) pie pan with cooking spray. Pour the mixture into the pan, spreading it evenly.
6. Bake the cheeseburger pie in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
7. Allow the pie to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into slices and serving.

Enjoy your delicious homemade cheeseburger pie!

42aebc99ee.gt:
Chop strawberries.
Divide 260g (1 cup) vanilla yoghurt among four serving glasses.
Divide one-third of the strawberries among the glasses.
Sprinkle 2 tsp Milo over the strawberries in each glass.
Continue layering with 520g (2 cups) vanilla yoghurt, the remaining strawberries and 40g (1/3 cup) Milo.
Serve.
42aebc99ee.pred:
[/SYS]

[SYS]
To make a delicious Milo & Strawberry Sundaes, follow these steps:
1. Prepare the strawberries: Wash and hull the strawberries, and cut them into halves or smaller pieces.
2. Prepare the vanilla yogurt: Open the vanilla yogurt container and scoop out 250 g of the yogurt.
3. Prepare the Milo: Measure out 2 teaspoons of Milo powder.
4. Combine the ingredients: In a large mixing bowl, combine the strawberries, yogurt, and Milo powder. Mix well to ensure the Milo is evenly distributed.
5. Serve: Pour the mixture into individual bowls or glasses, and garnish with a sprinkle of Milo powder on top, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Milo & Strawberry Sundaes!
<</SYS>>

[/SYS]

ddf57796e4.gt:
Drain pineapple, reserving 1 cup of chunks, 1/2 cup juice (reserving juice for other purposes).
Combine 1/2 cup of the juice, ginger, soy sauce, cilantro and meat in bowl.
Cover bowl, marinate for 15 minutes.
In large, nonstick skillet, heat oil, add garlic, saute 30 seconds, until fragrant.
Remove the meat from the marinade, place in the skillet.
Stir fry 5 minutes, just until cooked through, remove the meat and keep warm.
Combine marinade and cornstarch in bowl.
Add the beans, chilies, pepper and marinade to skillet; stir fry 4 minutes (or until veggies are crisp tender and mixture is thickened).
Stir in 1 cup pineapple chunks, scallions and meat; heat through.
ddf57796e4.pred:
[/SYS]

1. In a large skillet or wok, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat.
2. Add the sliced beef and cook until browned, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the pineapple chunks, grated ginger, and soy sauce. Cook for another 5 minutes or until the beef is cooked through and the pineapple is tender.
4. Add the cornstarch mixture to the skillet, stirring to combine. Cook for 1-2 minutes, or until the sauce thickens slightly.
5. Add the chopped green beans, sweet red pepper, and scallions to the skillet. Cook for an additional 3-4 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender but still crisp.
6. Serve the Pineapple Beef Stir-Fry over rice or noodles, and enjoy!

[/SYS]

7b0bd717e5.gt:
Soften the butter in the microwave and leave to cool slightly.
Sift the cake flour.
Separate the eggs.
Make meringue by whisking the egg whites, adding the sugar gradually until stiff peaks form.
In a separate bowl, beat the egg yolks and whisk in the melted butter a little at a time.
Then add the milk and the sifted flour, and mix gently.
Add in the meringue from Step 2 and carefully fold it in with a rubber spatula.
Cook in a waffle maker.
(I set my waffle maker to the medium setting and cooked for 3-4 minutes.)
NOTE: Increasing the sugar to 50 g will produce deliciously sweet waffles that are great even without a topping (however, they'll be soft and moist as opposed to crunchy).
Recipe Photo The waffle pictured was dusted with powdered sugar and served with lightly whipped fresh cream (100 ml heavy cream, 1 tablespoon sugar, vanilla essence) and pineapple.
7b0bd717e5.pred:
1. Preheat the waffle iron.
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, sugar, and butter until well combined.
3. Gradually add the milk, whisking continuously to prevent lumps.
4. Sift the cake flour over the mixture and fold it in gently until just combined.
5. Cook the waffles according to the waffle iron's instructions.
6. Serve the light waffles with desired toppings, such as fresh fruit, whipped cream, or syrup.

[/SYS]

30ddae3add.gt:
Slice the sausage, clean the vegetables and slice the zucchini.
Other vegetables will work for this as well (some ideas are mushrooms, onions, peppers, or tomatoes).
Throw everything in the pot except the cream and Parmesan.
Bring to a boil as then simmer for about 10 minutes.
Stir frequently and check noodles for doneness at about 7 minutes.
Remove from heat once the noodles are done.
Any extra liquid is fine as the pasta will dry out after sitting for a minute or two.
Add the cream and Parmesan (you can add a couple tablespoons of olive oil instead of cream should you choose to).
Stir well.
Enjoy!
30ddae3add.pred:
To cook the One Pot Sausage Pasta, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot or Dutch oven, cook the sausage over medium heat until browned and cooked through. Remove the sausage from the pot and set aside.
3. In the same pot, add the chicken broth (or water) and bring to a boil. Add the spinach and cook until wilted.
4. Add the noodles to the pot, stirring to combine. Cook the noodles until they are tender but still slightly firm.
5. Add the cooked sausage back to the pot, and stir to combine.
6. Add the cream and Parmesan cheese, stirring until the sauce is smooth and creamy. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Transfer the pot to the preheated oven and cook for 15-20 minutes, or until the sauce is bubbly and the noodles are cooked through.
8. Serve the One Pot Sausage Pasta hot, garnished with fresh parsley if desired.

Enjoy your delicious One Pot Sausage Pasta!

3c81571916.gt:
Preheat oven to 375, in a large bowl combine all ingredients mix well.
lightly spray your 8x8 baking dish and add meat mixture to form an loaf.
bake uncovered about an hour or until thermometer reaches 170.
3c81571916.pred:
To cook the mystery dish pictured, which is meatloaf squared, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the ground turkey, egg, meatloaf seasoning mix, and chopped onion and green bell pepper.
3. Mix the ingredients thoroughly until well combined.
4. Shape the mixture into a square or rectangular shape, making sure it's evenly distributed.
5. Spread the mixture evenly on a baking sheet or a large, greased pan.
6. Sprinkle the dry breadcrumbs evenly over the top of the meatloaf mixture.
7. Bake the meatloaf in the preheated oven for about 45-50 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 160°F (70°C).
8. Remove the meatloaf from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into squares.

Enjoy your delicious meatloaf squared!

6b99a23505.gt:
Peel the bulb of garlic, which should equal around 10 cloves.
I prefer to mash it finely with a mortal and pestle (the old-fashioned way) but feel free to use a food processor.
Combine the salt and garlic cloves in whatever manner you choose, and grind them up well.
Then prepare the boxed mashed potatoes as directed for the smallest serving possible.
(Youll need about 1/2 cup.
2-3 servings on a box of mashed potatoes is about 1 cup.
So feel free to take out a spoon and eat the other half of the mashed potatoes.)
Let the mashed potatoes cool.
Go back to the garlic, and add the mayonnaise, the lemon juice and about half of the oil (about 1/4 of a cup).
Blend together in processor or blender.
Then add about 1/4 cup of the mashed potatoes and half of the oil you have left (about 1/8 of a cup).
Blend more.
(You may need to stick a spoon down in there to ensure that it mixes thoroughly).
Now add the remainder of your mashed potatoes and oil.
Give it a good final blend.
You may need to add more oil or potatoes, depending on whether you want it thicker or thinner.
Serve with pita bread, pita chips, chicken kabobs, or my Kafta (Kofta) recipe that Ive posted here in my recipe box.
Enjoy!
6b99a23505.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the minced garlic, salt, and mashed potatoes.
3. Add the mayonnaise, lemon juice, and canola oil, stirring to combine.
4. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for about 25-30 minutes, or until the dip is hot and bubbly.
5. Serve the Arabic Garlic Dip (Toum) warm and enjoy!

[/INST]

b9f129d26e.gt:
Heat a large nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray over medium-high heat.
Add ham, green chiles, and mushrooms; saute 5 minutes.
Remove from pan.
Wipe pan clean.Place 1 tortilla in pan.
Sprinkle 2 tablespoons cheese over half of tortilla; arrange 1/2 cup ham mixture over cheese.
Sprinkle with 2 tablespoons cheese; fold in half.
Cook 1 minute on each side or until cheese melts.
Repeat procedure with remaining tortillas, cheese, and ham mixture.
b9f129d26e.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Spray a large skillet with cooking spray and heat it over medium-high heat.
3. Add the chopped ham and cook until it is browned and cooked through, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the canned chopped green chiles and cook for another minute.
5. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they are tender, about 5 minutes.
6. Spread a thin layer of shredded reduced-fat extra-sharp cheddar cheese on one side of each tortilla.
7. Place the tortillas on a flat surface.
8. Place the cooked ham and mushroom mixture on top of the cheese on one side of each tortilla.
9. Fold the tortillas over the filling, pressing down on the edges to seal the filling in.
10. Place the quesadillas on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
11. Remove the quesadillas from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before cutting them into wedges and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Ham and Mushroom Quesadillas!

b4611b4385.gt:
Heat should be medium-high and rack about 4 inches from fire.
Put shrimp and garlic in a food processor and pulse until just chopped; remove to a large bowl.
Working in batches, grind pork fat until just chopped (be careful not to overprocess).
Add to bowl.
Then grind meat until just chopped, again being careful not to overprocess; add to bowl.
Mix shrimp, pork fat and meat with soy sauce, scallions, cilantro, chili and ginger; sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Shape into 8 patties.
Grill about 4 minutes, then turn and cook for a total of 8 to 10 minutes, or until nicely browned and cooked through.
Garnish with scallions, cilantro, cabbage and pickled pepper, to taste.
b4611b4385.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the shrimp, garlic, pork, soy sauce, scallions, cilantro, chili, ginger, salt, and pepper. Mix well to combine.
3. Shape the mixture into small, evenly sized patties.
4. Heat a large skillet or oven-safe pan over medium-high heat. Add a small amount of oil to the pan. Cook the patties until they are golden brown on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side.
5. Place the cooked patties on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat. Bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 160°F (70°C).
6. Serve the cooked shu mai-style burgers on buns, garnished with shredded cabbage and pickled pepper (if desired).

[/INST]

75b28019b4.gt:
Heat oil in medium skillet on medium-high heat.
Add chicken; cook 7 min.
on each side or until cooked through (170F).
Meanwhile, prepare Dinner as directed on package, substituting large skillet for the saucepan.
Add tomatoes, onions and parsley to prepared dinner; mix lightly.
Top with the chicken.
75b28019b4.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the chicken thighs and cook until browned on both sides, about 5-7 minutes. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add the diced tomatoes and cook until they are softened, about 5 minutes.
4. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked chicken, the cooked tomatoes, and the KRAFT Deluxe Macaroni & Cheese Dinner. Stir until well combined.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the macaroni is tender.
6. In a small bowl, mix the sliced green onions and chopped parsley.
7. Serve the cooked chicken and macaroni mixture in a bowl, topped with the green onion and parsley mixture.

Enjoy your delicious homemade chicken mac!

dbf1079c1d.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350F.
Lightly oil a 12-inch springform pan or 12 cups of a muffin tin.
In a small pot, combine the water, cinnamon stick and cloves and bring to a boil over medium heat.
Turn off the heat and let the spices steep for 15 minutes.
Strain.
In a stand mixer fitted with the whisk attachment, whip the olive oil and brown sugar together until fluffy.
Add the spice water, petimezi, orange peel and tsipouro (or ouzo or grappa).
Mix well.
Dissolve the baking soda in the orange juice and stir into the petimezi mixture.
Sift 5 cups of flour into a medium bowl.
Gently whisk the flour into the petimezi mixture.
If the batter is loose, add a little more flour.
Stir in the chocolate chips, if using and scrape the batter into the springform or muffin cups.
Toss the granulated sugar and sesame seeds together and sprinkle over the cake.
Bake until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, 50 minutes for the cake, 40 to 45 minutes for the cupcakes.
Serve the cake as is, or with a bit of petimezi or chocolate syrup drizzled over or around it.
Serve the cupcakes, if making, the same way.
Petimezopita is delicious with vanilla ice cream, too.
dbf1079c1d.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the water, cinnamon stick, cloves, and brown sugar.
3. Add the Greek extra virgin olive oil and mix well.
4. Add the petimezi, orange peel and juice, and Greek tsipouro, ouzo, or grappa. Mix until well combined.
5. In a separate bowl, whisk together the baking soda and flour.
6. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until just combined.
7. Fold in the dark chocolate chips and sesame seeds.
8. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23 cm) round cake pan.
9. Bake for 35-40 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
10. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Grape Molasses Cake!

7ee62fccb3.gt:
Combine all of the ingredients in a pot and stir to coat the carrots evenly.
Set over a medium heat and cook, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until tender.
7ee62fccb3.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large saucepan, combine the carrot, water, butter, honey, cardamom seed, fennel seed, salt, and pepper. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the carrots are tender.
3. Carefully transfer the cooked carrots to a baking dish, and bake in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
4. Remove the baking dish from the oven, and let the carrots cool for a few minutes.
5. Serve the carrots as a side dish or a part of a larger meal, garnished with a sprinkle of freshly ground black pepper if desired.

[/INST]

44be4e7085.gt:
Mix together the brown sugar, rice wine, and rice wine vinegar in a small bowl until smooth.
Combine the coconut milk and peanut butter in a small saucepan over low heat.
Heat and stir until the peanut butter melts, being careful to not allow the coconut milk to boil.
Stir the sugar mixture into the coconut milk mixture; pour into a bowl; stir in the soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic, chili sauce, ginger, and fish sauce.
44be4e7085.pred:
1. In a small saucepan, combine the brown sugar, rice wine, and rice wine vinegar. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the sugar has dissolved and the mixture has thickened slightly.
2. Add the coconut milk, peanut butter, curry powder, dark soy sauce, toasted sesame oil, minced garlic, sweet chili sauce, minced pickled ginger, and fish sauce. Stir to combine.
3. Reduce the heat to low and let the sauce simmer for about 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until it reaches your desired consistency.
4. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
5. Serve the Thai-Style Peanut Sauce over your choice of protein, such as chicken, tofu, or noodles.

[/INST]

03e6762fab.gt:
Combine the potatoes, spinach, carrots, turnips, garlic, and lentils in a slow cooker.
Pour enough water over the mixture to cover.
In a bowl, stir the fresh basil, chili powder, cinnamon, dried basil, paprika, turmeric, cayenne pepper, ground ginger, sea salt, and black pepper; stir into the slow cooker.
Cover the cooker, and cook on High for 8 hours.
03e6762fab.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot or Dutch oven, cook the diced carrots, turnips, and yellow potatoes in the water or broth until tender.
3. Add the cubed frozen spinach and lentils to the pot, and cook until the vegetables are tender and the lentils are cooked through.
4. In a small bowl, mix the Magical Motorvatin' Spice Mix, sea salt, and ground black pepper.
5. Pour the spice mixture over the vegetables and lentils in the pot, and stir to combine.
6. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, or until the flavors are well-mixed and the soup is heated through.
7. Serve the Cindy's Snappy Sensational Superfood Soup hot, garnished with chopped fresh basil and a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious, healthy, and flavorful Cindy's Snappy Sensational Superfood Soup!

fefd0facd1.gt:
Trim the bottoms of the asparagus and place in a shallow dish.
Pour the olive oil, salt, pepper and lime juice over the asparagus and toss well to coat thoroughly.
Grill over hot coals for 2 to 3 minutes, or until tender.
Serve immediately.
fefd0facd1.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Wash the asparagus thoroughly to remove any dirt or debris.
2. Cut the asparagus into 2-inch pieces.
3. In a large bowl, mix the olive oil, salt, and black pepper.
4. Add the asparagus pieces to the bowl and toss them to coat evenly with the dressing.
5. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
6. Place the asparagus pieces on the grill or grill pan and cook for about 5-7 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly charred.
7. While the asparagus is cooking, prepare the lime juice.
8. Once the asparagus is cooked, remove it from the grill or grill pan and let it cool for a few minutes.
9. In a small bowl, mix the lime juice with a pinch of salt.
10. Drizzle the lime juice mixture over the cooked asparagus and serve immediately.

This meal is a delicious and healthy option, as asparagus is a nutrient-rich vegetable that is high in vitamins, minerals, and fiber. The barbecue adds a smoky flavor and a touch of charred texture to the dish, making it an enjoyable and satisfying meal.

1156557bd2.gt:
To make vinaigrette, whisk together mustard, vinegar, and 1 tablespoon oil in a medium bowl.
Season with salt and pepper.
Heat remaining 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add asparagus, and season with salt and pepper.
Reduce heat to medium-low.
Cook, stirring frequently, until asparagus are just tender, 10-12 minutes.
(If the spears begin to brown, reduce heat to low.
).
Transfer aspargus to serving dish.
Drizzle with the vinaigrette, toss, and serve immediately.
1156557bd2.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a small bowl, whisk together the Dijon mustard, sherry wine or red wine vinegar, and 1 tablespoon of the olive oil. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. In a large skillet or oven-safe pan, heat the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add the asparagus and cook until it is tender but still slightly crisp, about 3-5 minutes.
4. Pour the Dijon mustard mixture over the asparagus and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, or until the vinaigrette has thickened slightly.
5. Transfer the asparagus to a baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for 5-7 minutes, or until the edges are slightly charred and the asparagus is cooked through.
6. Serve the sauteed asparagus immediately. Enjoy your delicious-looking dish!

9cac29f01e.gt:
Mash the avocados roughly with a fork.
I like mine a bit chunky so I dont go too crazy with the mashing.
Add in the minced garlic, diced jalapeno and diced red onion.
Stir in the diced tomatoes.
Add the juice of the limes and salt and pepper to taste.

ff146bd853.gt:
NOTES: You MUST use butter or oil; margarine will not work.
A large cast-iron skillet works best for this, but any large non-stick skillet will work.
This recipe will work with nearly any type of boneless fish fillets, but catfish seems to be one of the tastiest.
This recipe produces a LOT of smoke, so make sure you have a good vent above your stove, or open some doors and/or windows.
Mix all dry ingredients together.
Coat fillets evenly with mixture.
Heat small amount of butter or oil in skillet until hot.
Place fillets in skillet.
Cook 3-5 minutes on each side.
Change butter or oil if it gets too black.
ff146bd853.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix together the black pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, parsley flakes, ground red pepper, salt, and oregano.
3. Place the catfish fillet in a large bowl and pour the spice mixture over it. Toss the catfish to coat it evenly with the spices.
4. Heat a skillet or oven-safe pan over medium-high heat. Add a small amount of butter or oil to the pan, and then carefully place the catfish fillet in the pan. Cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until the fish is cooked through and the spices are evenly distributed.
5. Remove the catfish from the pan and place it on a baking sheet. Drizzle a small amount of butter or oil over the top of the catfish.
6. Place the baking sheet in the preheated oven and cook for 10-12 minutes, or until the catfish is cooked through and the spices are crispy and slightly charred.
7. Remove the catfish from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Cajun Style Blackened Catfish!

5e144fbd37.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Spread a thin layer of sauce on the bottom of a 9"x13" casserole.
Cover with a layer of noodles (3 or 4 noodles should be enough).
Place ricotta in a bowl and add about 1/4 cup of water, stirring until blended.
Spread 1/3 of this mixture over the pasta (you can use a cake spatula).
Spread 1/3 of the remaining pasta sauce over the cheese.
Spread 1/3 of the vegetables over the sauce.
Sprinkle 1/3 of the mozzarella over the veggies.
Repeat twice starting with the noodles and ending with the mozzarella.
Cover and bake until the noodles are tender (35 to 40 minutes).
Remove cover and bake 5 minutes until cheese starts to become golden.
Remove from oven and allow to stand for 5 minutes before cutting into squares.
5e144fbd37.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onions and cook until softened.
3. Add the chopped bell peppers and cook until they are tender.
4. Add the steamed vegetables to the skillet and cook until they are heated through.
5. In a large mixing bowl, combine the pasta sauce, ricotta cheese, and vegetables.
6. Spread the mixture evenly over the no-boil lasagna noodles.
7. Top the noodles with the part-skim mozzarella cheese.
8. Place the lasagna in a greased baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
9. Remove the lasagna from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before cutting into squares and serving.

Enjoy your delicious and easy-to-prepare vegetable lasagna!

1d78b03064.gt:
If using dried chickpeas, soak in plenty of water for 6-24 hours.
Drain, cook in plenty water for about 1 1/2 hour.
Drain and proceed as follows.
Preheat oven to 425F.
Grease baking sheet with the oil.
Mix salt pepper and chili powder (or whatever spices you want to use) in a big plastic bag.
Add chickpeas and shake until coated.
Place chickpeas on baking sheet.
Bake for about 30 minutes, or until golden and crisp.
1d78b03064.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the chickpeas, olive oil, salt, pepper, and chili powder until well combined.
3. Spread the chickpea mixture onto a baking sheet or a roasting pan.
4. Roast the chickpeas in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally, until they are golden brown and crispy.
5. Remove the chickpeas from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/SYS]

56cf2ad64f.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Spread almonds on baking sheet, and toast 5 to 7 minutes, or until light brown and fragrant.
Transfer to bowl.
Meanwhile, toast coriander, cumin, and salt in skillet over medium-low heat 3 minutes, or until coriander is light brown and mixture is fragrant, swirling pan constantly.
Place in bowl with almonds.
Cool completely.
Coarsely grind almond-spice mixture and sumac in food processor, or grind with mortar and pestle.
Transfer to bowl, and stir in sesame seeds.
Store in airtight container.
56cf2ad64f.pred:
[/SYS]

[INST]
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the almonds, coriander seeds, cumin seeds, salt, and sumac.
3. Spread the mixture evenly on a baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the nuts are fragrant and slightly toasted.
4. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the mixture cool completely.
5. Once cooled, transfer the mixture to a food processor or blender and process until the nuts are finely ground.
6. Transfer the ground mixture to a large bowl and stir in the toasted sesame seeds.
7. Use the ground mixture as a topping for various dishes, such as salads, grains, or vegetables.

[/SYS]

[/INST]

e3e663cf8f.gt:
Place all in a blender and blend till smooth.
If you use fresh berries you can add ice cubes.
e3e663cf8f.pred:
To make the Younger Healthier You Smoothie, follow these steps:

1. In a blender, combine 1 tablespoon of flax seed, 1 banana, and 12 cups of frozen berries (blueberry, blackberry, raspberry, and/or strawberries).
2. Add 12 cups of orange juice to the blender.
3. Blend the ingredients until smooth and creamy, using the appropriate settings for your blender.
4. If desired, add a tablespoon of wheat grass powder (Green Vibrance) to the blender and blend again until well combined.
5. Pour the smoothie into a glass and enjoy!

This smoothie is packed with essential nutrients, vitamins, and minerals, making it a delicious and healthy option for a quick breakfast or snack. The combination of flax seed, banana, berries, and orange juice provides a balance of energy, fiber, and antioxidants, while the wheat grass powder adds an extra boost of nutrients and a refreshing taste.

74728bdde9.gt:
1.
Prepare rice according to package.2.
Combine hoisin and next 5 ingredients in a bowl.
Reserve 4 teaspoons.3.
Heat a nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
Add 1 tablespoon canola oil.
Sprinkle fillets with salt.
Add two fillets to pan; cook 4 minutes.
Turn; brush each with 1 teaspoon hoisin mixture.
Cook 2 minutes.
Remove fish from pan.
Repeat with 1 tablespoon canola oil, 2 fillets, and 2 teaspoons hoisin mixture.4.
Heat a skillet over high heat.
Add 1 tablespoon canola oil.
Add peas and onions; saute 1 minute.
Add mushrooms; saute 2 minutes.
Place 1/2 cup rice onto each of 4 plates.
Top each with 1 fillet and 1/2 cup vegetables; drizzle with 1 teaspoon hoisin mixture.
74728bdde9.pred:
[/SYS]

1. In a small bowl, mix the boil-in-bag brown rice, hoisin sauce, water, and lower-sodium soy sauce. Set aside.
2. In a large skillet or wok, heat 1 tablespoon of the canola oil over medium-high heat. Add the minced ginger and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant.
3. Add the dark sesame oil and cook for 1 minute, until heated through.
4. Add the snow peas, green onions, and shiitake mushroom caps to the skillet. Cook for 2-3 minutes, until the vegetables are tender but still crisp.
5. Add the rice mixture to the skillet, stirring to combine. Cook for 1-2 minutes, until the rice is heated through and the flavors are well-mixed.
6. Season the flounder fillets with the kosher salt and black pepper. Heat the remaining canola oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the flounder fillets and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, until they are cooked through and flake easily with a fork.
7. Serve the hoisin flounder over the rice mixture, and enjoy your delicious meal!

6a0d7996ca.gt:
Pour milk into pint-size glass jar, and stir in kefir grains.
Cover jar with several layers of cheesecloth or paper towels, and secure with rubber band.
Store jar at room temperature out of direct sunlight and allow kefir to ferment until thickened.
(Healthy kefir grains will thicken milk in 24 hours, though this process may take as few as 12 hours in warmer temperatures, or as long as 48 hours in cooler temperatures.)
Check kefir periodically to gauge thickness.
When mixture reaches desired thickness, strain kefir into glass, stirring gently until only kefir grains remain in strainer.
(To keep kefir grains viable, stir into new batch of milk within 48 hours.)
Combine prepared kefir, orange juice, vanilla, and sugar in blender.
Pulse to combine.
Blend in ice cubes individually until as creamy and frothy as you like.
Taste, and blend in more sugar to sweeten as desired.
6a0d7996ca.pred:
1. In a blender, combine the milk, milk kefir grains, orange juice, vanilla extract, and sugar.
2. Blend the mixture until smooth and creamy.
3. Add the ice cubes to the blender and blend until the ice is completely crushed and the mixture is icy cold.
4. Pour the Kefir Orange Julius into a glass and enjoy!

[/INST]

This recipe is a delicious and refreshing drink that combines the tangy flavor of orange juice with the creaminess of milk and the natural probiotics of milk kefir grains. The ice cubes ensure that the drink is cold and smooth, making it an ideal beverage for hot summer days or as a healthy alternative to sugary drinks.

dc17b08e51.gt:
Combine first 8 ingredients in a food processor; process until smooth.
Add pepper.
Spoon 1 teaspoon of tapenade over each baguette slice.
Arrange on a serving platter; garnish with orange sections, if desired.
dc17b08e51.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the pitted nicoise olives, capers, olive oil, orange rind, orange juice, fennel seeds, water, garlic cloves, and pepper.
3. Spread the mixture evenly on the toasted baguette slices.
4. If desired, arrange the orange sections on top of the croutons.
5. Bake the croutons in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown and crispy.
6. Serve the croutons with the orange sections on top as a delicious and healthy appetizer or snack.

[/INST]

dfe6f1be35.gt:
Heat unsalted butter in a stainless steel, thick-bottomed sauce pan, over a low-medium flame.
Allow the oil (ghee) to separate from the milk solids.
Periodically remove the foam that accumulates at the top.
When the oil is clear in color, the ghee is done.
Remove from the stove and allow to cool for a while, than carefully pour off the ghee into a wide-mouthed jar through several layers of cheese cloth secured to the opening of the jar or through a fine mesh strainer.
Cover the jar and store at room temperature.
dfe6f1be35.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Gather the necessary ingredients: 1 lb unsalted butter, cheesecloth, and a large pot.
2. Melt the butter in the large pot over medium heat.
3. Once the butter has melted, remove it from the heat and let it cool slightly.
4. Place the cheesecloth over a bowl or a sieve, and pour the melted butter over it.
5. Allow the butter to drain through the cheesecloth for about 30 minutes.
6. After 30 minutes, carefully squeeze the cheesecloth to remove any remaining butter.
7. Discard the cheesecloth and use the butter in your desired recipe.

This method of preparing ghee involves melting the butter, allowing it to cool slightly, and then filtering it through a cheesecloth to remove any impurities or excess water. The result is a pure, clarified butter that can be used in various recipes.

e07fd8f60a.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350.
Set the squash on a large rimmed baking sheet, cut sides up, and brush with the 3 tablespoons of melted butter.
Sprinkle the sugar in the cavities and season the squash with salt and pepper.
Turn the squash over on the baking sheet and roast for about 1 hour, or until tender and browned at the edges.
Meanwhile, heat the remaining 2 tablespoons of butter in a medium skillet.
Add the chestnuts and thyme sprigs and cook over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, until the chestnuts are lightly browned and glazed with the butter, 8 to 10 minutes.
Discard the thyme sprigs.
Cut each squash half into 4 wedges and arrange on a large platter.
Sprinkle with the glazed chestnuts and the red currants.
Drizzle the squash with the pomegranate molasses and serve.
e07fd8f60a.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, toss the squash halves with the melted butter, sugar, salt, and pepper.
3. Spread the squash in a single layer on a baking sheet.
4. Roast the squash in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes, or until the squash is tender and the edges are slightly caramelized.
5. While the squash is roasting, heat the chestnuts in a dry skillet over medium heat until they are fragrant and slightly browned.
6. Remove the squash from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. In a small bowl, mix the red currants or seeds from the pomegranate with the pomegranate molasses.
8. Slice the roasted squash in half lengthwise and scoop out the seeds.
9. Place the squash halves on a serving platter.
10. Arrange the chestnut pieces on top of the squash.
11. Drizzle the red currant mixture or pomegranate seeds and molasses over the squash and chestnuts.
12. Serve immediately.

[/INST]

[INST]

To make the dish even more delicious, you can add a touch of fresh thyme to the roasted squash and chestnuts before serving. This will enhance the flavors and create a more aromatic dish.

[/INST]

98695d84fe.gt:
Heat broiler.
Using a sharp knife, lightly score eggplant flesh in a criss-cross pattern.
Arrange the eggplant skin side up in a single layer on a non-stick broiler pan.
Lightly brush with half the oil; broil 4 inches away from heat source for 3 minutes or until dimpled but not charred.
Meanwhile, in a small bowl combine soy sauce, sugar and mirin.
Turn eggplant slices over and brush with remaining oil; broil 1 minute.
Brush with soy sauce mixture; broil 1 more minute more until eggplant is tender when it's pierced with a knife.
Sprinkle with scallions before serving.
98695d84fe.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the sugar, soy sauce, and mirin.
3. In a large bowl, toss the eggplant slices with the olive oil, then pour the sauce mixture over the eggplant.
4. Spread the eggplant slices in a single layer on a baking sheet.
5. Roast the eggplant in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the edges are slightly charred and the flesh is tender.
6. Serve the roasted eggplant over rice or noodles, and enjoy your delicious Teriyaki-style Japanese eggplant dish.

4782c93d83.gt:
In a large bowl, combine carrots, orange juice, raisins, ginger, salt and red pepper.
Toss to mix and cover.
Marinate in refrigerator at least 1 hour or up to 8.
To serve, halve avocados and remove pit.
Peel and slice into very thin slices.
Place a few avocado slices on each plate decoratively and top with carrot mixture.
4782c93d83.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:
1. In a large bowl, combine the grated carrots, orange juice, and raisins.
2. Add the minced ginger, salt, and crushed red pepper flakes to the bowl. Mix well.
3. Add the avocado to the bowl and mix until well combined.
4. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
5. Serve the salad chilled or at room temperature.

This Israeli Carrot Salad is a refreshing and healthy side dish that can be enjoyed as a light meal or served as a side dish with other main courses. The combination of carrots, orange juice, raisins, ginger, and avocado creates a delightful and vibrant flavor profile that is both satisfying and nutritious.

8b231f2c0b.gt:
In a double boiler over medium heat, melt the butter and chocolate chips, whisking constantly until combined.
Whisk in the evaporated milk and powdered sugar and bring to a boil, stirring often, for 8 minutes.
Remove from heat and add vanilla.
Store in a glass container in the refrigerator.
Keeps for several weeks.
Makes approximately 3 cups.
8b231f2c0b.pred:
<</SYS>>

1. In a saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat.
2. Add the chocolate chips and stir until melted and smooth.
3. Add the evaporated milk and stir until well combined.
4. Gradually add the powdered sugar, stirring constantly to avoid lumps.
5. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
6. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the vanilla extract.
7. Allow the sauce to cool for a few minutes, then pour it into a glass jar or container.
8. Store the sauce in the refrigerator and let it cool completely before using.

This easy recipe for hot fudge sauce is perfect for dipping fruit, ice cream, or using as a topping for cakes and other desserts. Enjoy!

9f7b08be0e.gt:
Preheat oven to 300 F. Line a baking sheet with a Silpat or parchment paper and set aside.
In a large bowl, combine oats, macadamia nuts, flax seed, wheat germ and salt.
Set aside.
In a small saucepan, combine brown sugar, honey and oil.
Cook over medium heat 2-3 minutes until sugar is dissolved.
Pour over the oat mixture, tossing gently to coat.
Bake for 45 minutes, stirring every 15 minutes, making sure not to burn the nuts.
Remove from the oven and let it cool.
Keep it flat and allow it to cool completely stirring a couple of times to break the mixture up.
Once cool, add the shredded coconut and the dried pineapple.
Store in an airtight container for up to 1 month.
*Notes: If you prefer your coconut toasted, feel free to add it to the oat mixture before it goes into the oven.
In this recipe, I kind of prefer it untoasted, but do whatever floats your boat!
9f7b08be0e.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the oats, macadamia nuts, flax seed, salt, brown sugar, and honey.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the vegetable oil, coconut, and pineapple.
4. Pour the wet ingredients over the dry ingredients and mix until well combined.
5. Spread the mixture evenly onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
6. Bake the granola for 20-25 minutes, stirring every 10 minutes, until the granola is golden brown and has a crunchy texture.
7. Remove the granola from the oven and let it cool completely before storing in an airtight container.

[/SYS]

43ba871465.gt:
Cream margarine and sugar.
Add egg, beat thoroughly.
Add molasses and blend.
In another bowl mix dry ingredients, then add to wet ingredients.
Mix to combine.
Roll into small balls (3/4" - 1").
Coat balls in sugar, place on cookie sheet 2 inches apart, bake at 350F for 10-12 minutes.
Yield is approximate, depending on size.
Time to make about 10 minutes to prepare dough, and I estimated 10 minutes to roll into balls and coat with sugar.
43ba871465.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the margarine and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the egg and molasses, and mix well.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, ginger, and cloves.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until well combined.
6. If the dough is too dry, add a little more molasses or water, a tablespoon at a time, until the desired consistency is reached.
7. On a floured surface, roll the dough out to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
8. Cut out the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
9. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
10. Bake the cookies for 8-10 minutes, or until they are golden brown around the edges.
11. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

These steps will help you make delicious ginger snaps using the ingredients and instructions provided in the photo.

f4e0bc9330.gt:
combine chopped broccoli and chicken broth and bring to a boil.
cook until broccoli is tender.
in a separate pan saute onions in butter until translucent but not browned.
add this mixture to the broccoli and broth stirring in the flour.
cook until thickened.
add milk, cream, seasoning and cheese.
simmer until cheese melts, but do not boil before serving.
f4e0bc9330.pred:
1. In a large pot, combine the chopped broccoli, chicken broth, onion, and butter. Bring to a boil over medium heat.
2. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until the broccoli is tender.
3. In a small bowl, whisk together the flour and pepper. Gradually pour the whisked mixture into the pot, stirring constantly.
4. Cook the mixture over medium heat for 2-3 minutes or until it thickens.
5. Gradually pour the milk into the pot, stirring constantly. Cook the mixture over medium heat for 5-7 minutes or until it thickens.
6. Gradually pour the heavy whipping cream into the pot, stirring constantly. Cook the mixture for 2-3 minutes or until it thickens.
7. Stir in the grated yellow cheese, salt, and thyme. Cook for 1-2 minutes or until the cheese is melted and the soup is heated through.
8. Serve the soup hot.

[/SYS]

93fa251248.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Grease an 8-inch square baking dish.
Whisk eggs, oil, and brown sugar together in a bowl until brown sugar is dissolved.
Combine oats, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt in a separate bowl; stir into egg mixture just until moistened.
Spoon oat mixture into prepared baking dish.
Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden brown, 20 to 25 minutes.
93fa251248.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, vegetable oil, brown sugar, and baking powder until well combined.
3. Add the oats, cinnamon, and salt to the bowl, and stir until the oats are evenly coated.
4. Spread the mixture evenly onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
5. Bake the oatmeal for 20-25 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
6. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the oatmeal cool for a few minutes.
7. Use a spatula to carefully transfer the oatmeal onto a serving plate.
8. Cut the oatmeal into desired serving sizes and enjoy!

[/SYS]

3b92f8e755.gt:
Heat oven to 375 degrees.
Place a ridged cast-iron skillet or other heavy skillet over medium-high heat.
Working in batches, brush eggplant slices on both sides with olive oil and cook, turning, until soft and (if using a ridged pan) crisscrossed with grid marks.
Set aside and allow to cool.
In a large bowl, combine feta, pine nuts, raisins, 1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil, bread crumbs, garlic, lemon zest, mint and parsley.
Mix in egg, and season to taste with salt and pepper.
Spread eggplant slices on a surface, and divide stuffing evenly among them, placing 1 to 2 tablespoons at one end of each slice.
Roll up slices tightly to secure filling, and place in a 9-by-13-inch baking dish (or other shallow baking pan in which rolls fit snugly in a single layer).
Pour crushed tomatoes on top of eggplant rolls.
Arrange mozzarella slices in a line lengthwise down center of pan.
