Drizzle olive oil evenly over pan, and season to taste with salt and pepper.
Bake until cheese has melted and eggplant is bubbling and fragrant, 25 to 30 minutes.
Remove from heat and allow to stand 5 to 10 minutes.
Serve hot.
3b92f8e755.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the egg, beaten, with the crumbled feta cheese, pine nuts, raisins, minced garlic, lemon zest, and dried mint. Season with salt and pepper.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the bread crumbs with a drizzle of olive oil.
4. Dip each eggplant slice into the egg mixture, then coat it with the bread crumb mixture.
5. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the eggplant slices and cook until golden brown on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side.
6. Transfer the cooked eggplant slices to a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the bread crumbs are golden brown and the eggplant is tender.
7. Serve the involtini hot, drizzled with extra virgin olive oil and garnished with chopped Italian parsley leaves.

Enjoy your delicious involtini!

263a0fdd20.gt:
Heat oven to 350F.
Prepare cake batter as directed on package; pour into parchment-lined 15x10x1-inch pan.
Bake 18 to 20 min.
or until toothpick inserted in centre comes out clean.
Cool completely.
Beat cream cheese and butter in large bowl with mixer until creamy.
Blend in vanilla.
Gradually add sugar, beating well after each addition.
Cut cake lengthwise, then crosswise in half.
Stack cake layers on plate, spreading cream cheese frosting between layers and on top of cake.
263a0fdd20.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. Grease and flour a 9x13 inch (23x33 cm) baking dish.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the carrot cake mix, softened Philadelphia Brick Cream Cheese, and softened butter. Mix until well combined.
4. Add the vanilla extract and icing sugar, and mix until well combined.
5. Pour the batter into the prepared baking dish.
6. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.
8. Once the cake is completely cooled, use a sharp knife to slice it into equal portions.

Enjoy your delicious Quick Layered Carrot Cake!

fe5d11c597.gt:
Heat oven to 350F.
Combine 1 cup sugar and 1/2 cup margarine in large mixer bowl.
Beat at medium speed until creamy.
Add egg and vanilla, and continue beating until well mixed.
Reduce speed to low,and add all remaining cookie ingredients except marshmallows.
Beat until well mixed.
Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets.
Bake for 6-7 minutes or until edges are just set.
Remove from oven.
Press 1 marshmallow half onto center of each cookie.
Continue baking for 2 minutes or until marshmallow is softened.
Cool 1 minute; remove from cookie sheets.
Cool completely.
Combine all frosting ingredients except milk in small mixer bowl.
Beat at low speed, adding enough milk for desired spreading consistency.
Frost cooled cookies, covering entire marshmallow.
Variations: Before putting frosting over cooled cookies, spread a thin layer of peanut butter, caramel, or seedless raspberry jelly over marshmallow, and then add your frosting.
fe5d11c597.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the sugar and margarine until smooth.
3. Add the egg and vanilla, and mix well.
4. Gradually add the flour, cocoa, milk, baking soda, and salt, mixing until well combined.
5. Fold in the marshmallows and mix until they are evenly distributed.
6. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
7. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are set and the centers are still slightly soft.
8. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
9. Once the cookies are completely cooled, frost them with the chocolate frosting.
10. Decorate the cookies with the remaining marshmallows, if desired.

[/INST]

904095d715.gt:
In a 10-inch heavy saute pan, heat 1 ounce of clarified butter over high heat.
Add sliced mushrooms one handful at a time to saute pan.
As mushrooms begin to develop rich, brown color, push them to the outside of the saute pan.
Turn the mushrooms over as they begin to color.
When pan becomes dry, add remaining clarified butter to the pan.
Add another handful of mushrooms to the pan and continue until all mushrooms have been added.
Season with salt and pepper after the last addition to the pan has been made.
Make a hole in the middle of the pan and add the shallots.
Deglaze pan with cognac, scraping up any browned mushroom bits.
Add the chives.
Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper.
904095d715.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the clarified butter over medium heat. Add the sliced cremini mushrooms and cook until they are tender and slightly browned, about 5-7 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
3. Add the minced shallots and cook for another 2-3 minutes, until they are softened.
4. Pour in the cognac and cook until it has almost evaporated, about 1-2 minutes.
5. Add the chives and cook for another 1-2 minutes, until they are fragrant.
6. Transfer the mushroom mixture to a large mixing bowl and set aside.
7. In a separate skillet, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat. Add the bread crumbs and cook until they are golden brown, about 2-3 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
8. Carefully pour the bread crumb mixture over the mushroom mixture and toss to combine.
9. Transfer the mushroom mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the bread crumbs are golden brown and the mushrooms are cooked through.
10. Serve the Fungal Saute immediately, and enjoy your delicious-looking dish!

a562032555.gt:
Mix the flour and salt in a large mixing bowl with a wooden spoon.
In another large bowl, empty the yeast package, then slowly add the warm water, mixing with a fork to fully dissolve the yeast.
When the yeast mixture forms some bubbles, add the mixture to the flour/salt, then add the three eggs.
Mix the batter, then set the bowl on top of your refrigerator (or other warm place), cover with damp dish towel.
After 20 minutes, check the dough for rising, mix again and let rise for another 20 minutes.
In a saucepan, heat the oil to medium heat.
Add the dough by the spoonful (about the size of 2 golf balls) Experiment with the first batch to make sure the oil is not too hot.
Remove when golden brown and place on paper bags to absorb the oil.
Place warm Zeppoles in a paper bag with powdered sugar and SHAKE.
Cover with powdered sugar.
a562032555.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the corn oil, flour, yeast, warm water, eggs, salt, and powdered sugar. Mix well.
2. Gradually add the remaining ingredients, such as the warm water and the yeast mixture, to the bowl. Mix until the dough comes together.
3. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic.
4. Place the dough in a lightly oiled bowl, cover it with a damp cloth, and let it rise in a warm place for about 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.
5. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
6. Punch down the dough and transfer it to a lightly floured surface.
7. Roll out the dough into small balls, about the size of a walnut.
8. Place the balls of dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake the zeppoles for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
10. Remove the zeppoles from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

6ad5b0a9bb.gt:
Pour 4 oz A&W Rootbeer in a glass
Add vodka and syrup to the root beer, stir well and add ice
6ad5b0a9bb.pred:
1. First, pour 4 oz of Diet A&W Rootbeer into a glass.
2. Add 1 oz of sugar-free vanilla syrup to the glass.

45b311a5c9.gt:
Heat oven to 450*.
Grease 6 6oz custard cups.
Beat eggs slightly; beat in flour, milk, and salt.
Beat just until smooth, do not overbeat.
Fill custard cups 1/2 full.
Bake 20 minutes.
Reduce oven temp to 350*.
Bake 20 minutes longer.
Remove from cups.
Serve warm.
45b311a5c9.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece, follow these instructions:
1. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, flour, milk, and salt until well combined.
2. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
3. Grease a muffin tin with cooking spray or butter.
4. Pour the batter evenly into the prepared muffin tin, filling each cup about 3/4 full.
5. Bake the popovers in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and fully cooked through.
6. Remove the popovers from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before carefully removing them from the muffin tin.
7. Serve the popovers warm, and enjoy your culinary masterpiece!

8b7c0b0b5a.gt:
PLACE frozen yogurt in bowl.
Top with remaining ingredients.
Serve a cookie with the sundae.

292b683c3f.gt:
Blend ice first just a tad.
Then add your milk, hot coffee(don't worry it won't melt anything that much at all.
), oreos and everything else.
Blend for about 1 minute and a half and pour it in a glass.
Enjoy guys.

If u don't like it though just make whatever changes or additions you feel and tell me what u did and post ur pics.
Thank u all.

292b683c3f.pred:

59d1e62c4c.gt:
Heat a saucepan over medium heat.
Melt the butter and stir in the garlic and ginger.
Cook for 1 to 2 minutes, or until the garlic is lightly browned.
Add the soy sauce, sake, pineapple juice, rice vinegar and brown sugar.
Bring up to a gentle boil and simmer for 3 minutes.
Whisk the water and the cornstarch together and then whisk mixture into the teriyaki sauce and simmer until thickened, 8 to 10 minutes.
Set aside.
Rinse the chicken wings and pat them dry.
Generously season the chicken with salt and black pepper.
Dredge the wings in flour, shaking off any excess flour, and set aside.
In a large saucepan or deep fryer, heat the oil to about 375.
Fry the chicken wings in small batches until golden brown, 8 to 10 minutes.
Shake off any excess oil and place on paper towels to drain.
Continue frying the chicken in batches until all of the wings are cooked.
Toss the wings in the teriyaki sauce and sprinkle with green onions.
Serve warm.
59d1e62c4c.pred:
To recreate the Pineapple-Teriyaki Chicken Wings, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the butter, garlic, ginger, and minced onion.
3. In a large bowl, combine the soy sauce, sake, pineapple juice, rice vinegar, brown sugar, water, cornstarch, and salt.
4. Add the chicken wings to the marinade and toss to coat evenly.
5. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 1 hour or up to 4 hours.
6. In a small bowl, mix the flour with a pinch of salt and pepper.
7. Remove the chicken wings from the marinade and dredge them in the flour mixture.
8. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
9. Cook the chicken wings in batches, until they are golden brown and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes per side.
10. Remove the chicken wings from the skillet and place them on a wire rack or a baking sheet.
11. Return the skillet to the heat and add the green onions. Cook for a few minutes until they are slightly wilted.
12. Serve the Pineapple-Teriyaki Chicken Wings with the teriyaki sauce and green onions on the side. Enjoy your culinary masterpiece!

b61f1917f7.gt:
For the salad: First place lettuce in a bowl, then top with chicken, onion, nectarine, raspberries, celery and almonds.
Pour vinaigrette over top and serve!
For the dressing: Put all ingredients in a container that has a good sealing lid and shake the snot out of it.
b61f1917f7.pred:
To cook the Nectarine, Raspberry, and Chicken Salad with Citrus Vinaigrette, follow these steps:

1. In a large bowl, combine the torn romaine lettuce, diced chicken, red onion, and nectarine slices.
2. In a separate bowl, whisk together the olive oil, red wine vinegar, herbs, salt, garlic, and honey.
3. Pour the vinaigrette over the salad and toss to coat evenly.
4. Add the sliced or chopped almonds and oranges to the salad.
5. Toss the salad again to combine all ingredients.
6. Serve the salad immediately or refrigerate for a few hours before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Nectarine, Raspberry, and Chicken Salad with Citrus Vinaigrette!

43d8c95718.gt:
Brew coffee using a ratio of about 1 1/2 tablespoons coffee per cup of water.
(We used a single brew coffee maker and used the espresso strength setting that uses less water and brews a stronger coffee.)
Set the coffee aside to reach room temperature or place it in the refrigerator for 10-15 minutes to cool quickly.
Add the room temperature coffee, creamer, raspberry and hazelnut syrups, and the ice into a blender and blend until smooth.
Pour the drink into a tall glass and enjoy!
Optional garnishes: top with whipped cream, shaved chocolate, mint leaves and a raspberry.
43d8c95718.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:
1. In a blender, combine the 4 ounces of strong brewed coffee, 2 tablespoons of hazelnut flavored creamer (or half-and-half), 2 teaspoons of raspberry syrup, and 2 teaspoons of hazelnut syrup. Blend until smooth and creamy.
2. Pour the mixture into a tall glass, leaving enough room for the crushed ice.
3. Add the crushed ice to the glass, filling it to the top.
4. Stir the mixture gently to combine the ice and the syrups.
5. Enjoy your Raspberry Hazelnut Frappe!

[/INST]

54bc08b13e.gt:
Combine cream, milk, water, cocoa powder, corn syrup, and salt in a medium saucepan.
Bring to a simmer over medium heat, whisking until cocoa powder is completely dissolved.
Remove from heat and add chocolate, butter, and vanilla, stirring until chocolate is melted and sauce is smooth.
Serve warm.
54bc08b13e.pred:
1. In a small saucepan, combine the heavy cream, whole milk, water, and corn syrup over medium heat.
2. Bring the mixture to a gentle simmer, stirring occasionally.
3. Reduce the heat to low and let the sauce simmer for about 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until it thickens slightly.
4. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the unsweetened cocoa powder and fine salt.
5. Gradually stir in the coarsely chopped bittersweet chocolate, and let it melt and incorporate into the sauce.
6. Stir in the unsalted butter and vanilla extract.
7. Taste and adjust the seasoning if needed.
8. Serve the bittersweet chocolate sauce warm over your favorite dessert or use it as a topping for ice cream.

[/SYS]

0935eaa489.gt:
Microwave chocolate in microwaveable bowl on MEDIUM 2 min.
or until chocolate is almost melted, stirring after 1 min.
Stir until chocolate is completely melted.
Stir in 3/4 cup each of the grahams and marshmallows.
Spread onto waxed paper-covered baking sheet.
Decorate with remaining grahams and marshmallows.
Refrigerate 1 hour or until firm.
Break into 60 pieces.

2. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
3. Cut the Baker's Semi-Sweet Chocolate into small pieces and place them on the prepared baking sheet.
4. Spread the chocolate pieces evenly across the baking sheet.
5. Bake the chocolate in the preheated oven for 5-7 minutes, or until it is melted and smooth.

12. Use a spatula to transfer the S'more Bark onto a serving plate.
13. Enjoy your homemade S'more Bark!

[/INST]

d3047450d6.gt:
Boil the water and pour a small amount in the teapot, swishing it around to warm the pot.
Combine the mint and green tea and sugar in the teapot, then fill it with the rest of the hot water.
Let the tea brew for three minutes.
Set out glasses for the tea.
A shot-glass is close to the slender glasses used in Morocco.
Fill just one glass with the tea, then pour it back in the pot.
Repeat.
This helps to dissolve and distribute the sugar.
Pour the tea.
You want a nice foam on the tea so always pour with the teapot a high distance above the glasses.
If you do not have at least a little foam on the top of the first glass, then pour it back into the teapot and try again until the tea starts to foam up nicely.
Garnish with the remaining sprigs of mint.
d3047450d6.pred:
To prepare the Moroccan Mint Tea, follow these steps:
1. Gather the necessary ingredients: 10 sprigs of fresh mint, 3 teaspoons green tea, 3 tablespoons sugar (or more to taste), and 4 cups of water.
2. Bring the water to a boil in a kettle or a saucepan.
3. While the water is heating, prepare the tea by combining the green tea leaves and the sugar in a separate container.
4. Once the water is boiling, remove it from the heat and carefully pour it over the tea leaves and sugar mixture.
5. Allow the tea to steep for a few minutes, then strain the tea through a sieve or a tea infuser.
6. Discard the tea leaves and add the fresh mint sprigs to the tea.
7. Stir the tea gently to ensure that the mint is fully infused.
8. Serve the Moroccan Mint Tea in a teapot or a teacup, garnishing the top with a sprig of fresh mint for added flavor and aroma.

Enjoy your delicious Moroccan Mint Tea!

eef728c6b8.gt:
Lightly coat a nonstick skillet with cooking spray.
Cook the onion and chiles in the skillet over medium heat for 3 minutes, stirring constantly.
In a small bowl, whisk together egg substitute, cheese, pepper, and Tabasco (if using).
Pour into skillet and scramble for 3 to 4 minutes, until the eggs are done to taste, but not dry.
Place the egg mixture along one-third of the tortilla, about 2 inches away from the bottom.
Fold up the lower edge, then roll from the side to form a burrito.

4. Add the drained canned green chili and cook until it is heated through.

6. Place the tortillas on a flat surface.
7. Place a spoonful of the egg mixture in the center of each tortilla.
8. Fold the tortilla over the egg mixture, enclosing it completely.

This recipe card provides clear and concise instructions for preparing a Light Breakfast Burrito using the available ingredients. The step-by-step process ensures that the user can follow the recipe easily and enjoy a delicious and satisfying meal.

5fff64fad0.gt:
Preheat oven to 375
Melt butter and place in the pan you are using for the cobbler
In a medium Mixing bowl mix together flour, baking powder, 1 cup of sugar and milk ( do not mix while in pan)
On high heat in a medium pot, mix all other ingredients peaches, Lennon juice, Brown sugar, and 2 teaspoons of cinnamon
Poor heated ingredients into pan ( do not mix while in pan)
Sprinkle 2 teaspoons of cinnamon over top
Place in oven
Cook for 30 minutes or until top is golden brown
Serve hot or cool over vanilla ice cream
5fff64fad0.pred:

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, and cinnamon.
3. Add the butter and mix until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, and lemon juice.

6. Press the dough evenly into the bottom of a 9-inch (23cm) square baking dish.

e946c009a6.gt:
In a large nonstick skillet, combine mushrooms, chopped onions and 1/2 cup water.
Cook over medium-high heat, stirring often, until liquid has evaporated and vegetables are beginning to brown.
To deglaze, add 1/3 cup of the vegetable broth and stir to scrape any browned bits free from pan bottom.
Continue to cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables begin to brown again.
Repeat deglazing and browning steps 2 more times, using 1/3 cup broth each time.
Onion should be golden brown.
This should take about 15 to 20 minutes total.
Remove pan from heat.
In a large bowl, beat eggs to blend.
Stir in shredded zucchini, mushroom mixture, bread crumbs, cheese, pepper and oregano.
Turn into greased 9x13" baking dish, spreading out evenly.
Bake uncovered at 350 until casserole appears set in center when dish is gently shaken -- about 35 minutes.
Let stand 5 minutes, then serve.
e946c009a6.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the mushrooms, onion, and vegetable broth. Season with salt, pepper, and dried oregano.
3. In another bowl, whisk the eggs and set aside.
4. In a third bowl, mix the breadcrumbs and grated parmesan cheese.
5. Dip the shredded zucchini in the beaten eggs, then coat it with the breadcrumb mixture.
6. Place the zucchini breading on a baking sheet and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until golden brown and cooked through.
7. Serve the baked zucchini with mushrooms over a bed of pasta or as a side dish. Enjoy!

[/INST]

df541b69a3.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Coat baking sheet once with cooking spray.
Set aside.
Coat large skillet with cooking spray and place over low heat.
Add onion; cook, stirring often, until just softened, about 3 minutes.
Add garlic and stir 30 seconds.
Add soy meat, breaking it up with a wooden spoon.
Stir in tomatoes, roasted jalapeno, chili powder and cumin.
Mix well.
Cover and cook, stirring occasionally, 8 minutes.
Meanwhile, stack tortillas, wrap in foil and bake until warm and pliable, 8 to 10 minutes.
(Alternatively, using tongs, heat each tortilla over an open flame.)
Place tortillas on work surface and spoon about 3/4 cup meat filling in center of each.
Fold in sides and roll up, jelly-roll style.
Place on prepared baking sheet, seam side down.
Bake until chimichangas are lightly browned, about 30 minutes.
Serve hot with salsa.
df541b69a3.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece, follow these instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and minced garlic, and cook until the onion is softened, about 3 minutes.
3. Add the ground soy "meat" to the skillet, breaking it up with a spoon or your hands. Cook until the meat is browned and no longer pink, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the diced tomatoes, roasted jalapeno pepper, chili powder, and cumin to the skillet. Cook for 2 minutes.
5. Add the cooked meat mixture to a large mixing bowl.
6. In a separate bowl, mix the flour, baking powder, and salt. Add the mixture to the meat mixture, stirring until well combined.
7. Roll the tortillas in a flat, circular shape, and place them on a baking sheet.
8. Fill each tortilla with the meat mixture, dividing it evenly.
9. Bake the filled tortillas in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the tortillas are golden brown and the filling is hot and bubbly.
10. Serve the chimichangas with Fresh Tomato Salsa on the side.

Enjoy your delicious Chimichangas with Fresh Tomato Salsa!

f5564fb5c4.gt:
Heat oven to 350 degrees F.
Cut cheese slices into quarters, then cut each piece diagonally in half.
Place crackers in single layer on baking sheet; top with ham and cheese.
Bake 4 to 5 min.
or until cheese is melted.
Top with preserves and onions.
f5564fb5c4.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Place the 3 KRAFT Slim Cut Swiss Cheese Slices on a baking sheet.
3. Place the 24 woven wheat crackers on another baking sheet.
4. Place the 6 slices OSCAR MAYER Deli Fresh Smoked Ham on a baking sheet.
5. In a small bowl, mix the peach preserves and green onion.
6. Place the prepared meats and crackers on the baking sheet.
7. Bake the meats and crackers in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and carefully spread the peach preserves mixture over the meats and crackers.
9. Return the baking sheet to the oven and bake for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the preserves are bubbly.
10. Carefully remove the baking sheet from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Ham & Swiss Melts!

05096fc3ad.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F Coat a standard (12 cup) muffin tin with cooking spray.
In a large bowl, whisk egg whites, sugar, cocoa and salt until combined.
Add coconut; mix until well coated.
***I would add the sliced almonds in at this point with the coconut.
They didn't want to stick to the tops of the cookies!
***.
Dividing evenly, spoon mixture into muffin tin and pat in gently with moistened fingers.
Sprinkle with almonds and pat on gently.
***See note above***.
Bake until almonds are golden, 20-25 minutes.
Remove from oven and cool in tin for 5-10 minutes.
Run a thin metal spatula around the edges to loosen from pan.
Turn out onto rack to cool completely.
Cookies keep in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 3 days.
05096fc3ad.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 300°F (150°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, beat the egg whites until stiff peaks form.
3. Gradually add the sugar, beating until the mixture is smooth and glossy.
4. Fold in the unsweetened cocoa powder and coconut flakes.
5. Fold in the sliced almonds.
6. Line a muffin tin with cupcake liners.
7. Using a spoon, fill each cup with the batter.
8. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a cupcake comes out clean.
9. Allow the cupcakes to cool completely before frosting.

To frost the cupcakes, use the following ingredients:
1. 1 cup (8 ounces) unsalted butter, softened
2. 1 cup (8 ounces) powdered sugar
3. 1/2 cup (4 ounces) milk
4. 1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract
5. 1/4 teaspoon almond extract

In a large mixing bowl, beat the butter until creamy. Add the powdered sugar and beat until smooth. Add the milk, vanilla extract, and almond extract, and beat until well combined.

Once the cupcakes are cooled, frost them with the chocolate coconut frosting.

Enjoy your delicious chocolate coconut macaroon cupcakes!

37568c51b9.gt:
Toast the sesame seeds in a frying pan over medium heat until brown, let them cool.
Cut the beef in thin slices.
Mix all marinade ingredients together, add also the sesame seeds, and to this add the beef.
Leave to marinate at least 30 minutes, a few hours is preferred.
Thread the meat on wooden skewers, grill or barbecue a few minutes on each side, using the remaining marinade for basting.
37568c51b9.pred:
1. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
2. Cut the beef into bite-sized pieces and marinate them in a mixture of soy sauce, dry sherry, sesame oil, sugar, and crushed red pepper flakes. Allow the marinade to sit for at least 30 minutes.
3. While the beef is marinating, toast the sesame seeds in a dry skillet over medium heat until they are fragrant and lightly browned.
4. In a small bowl, mix the minced garlic, green onions, and grated ginger.
5. Remove the beef from the marinade and thread it onto skewers.
6. Brush the grill or grill pan with a little oil to prevent sticking.
7. Grill the beef skewers over medium-high heat for 4-5 minutes per side, or until they are cooked through and have a nice charred exterior.
8. Remove the beef from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
9. Serve the Korean Grilled Meat on Skewers (Bulgogi) with the toasted sesame seeds on top, and enjoy your delicious meal!

97117994fc.gt:
Heat oven to 350 degrees F.
Beat first 6 ingredients in large bowl with mixer until blended.
Stir in apples.
Pour into greased and floured 12-cup fluted tube pan or 10-inch tube pan.
Bake 50 min.
to 1 hour or until toothpick inserted near center comes out clean.
Cool cake in pan 15 min.
Loosen cake from sides of pan; invert onto wire rack.
Gently remove pan.
Cool cake completely.
Transfer to plate.
Microwave caramels and milk in microwaveable bowl on HIGH 1-1/2 min.
or until caramels are completely melted and sauce is smooth, stirring every 30 sec.
Cool 10 min.
or until slightly thickened.
Drizzle over cake just before serving.

5. Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
6. Remove the cake from the oven and let it cool in the pan for 10 minutes.
7. Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, melt the caramels over low heat.
8. Once the cake is cooled, carefully invert the cake onto a serving plate.
9. Pour the melted caramel sauce over the cake, allowing it to drip down the sides.
10. Cut the apples into thin slices and arrange them on top of the cake.
11. Refrigerate the cake for at least 2 hours before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Moist Caramel Apple Cake!

3d413a0413.gt:
1.
Preheat oven to 425 degrees F. 2.
Wash potatoes well.
3.
Lay each potato on a cutting board.
4.
With a sharp knife, thinly slice each potato, being careful to NOT CUT all the way through.
(TIP: I lay a chopstick on each side of the potato so I dont accidentally cut too far.)
5.
Season each potato.
This is where you can get creative slide a sliver of garlic between the layers, or experiment with different herbs, butter, whatever sounds good to you!.
6.
Place potatoes in a baking dish that has been drizzled with olive oil.
7.
Drizzle potatoes with olive oil.
8.
Bake at 425 degrees for 40 minutes, or until the inside is tender.
9.
Enjoy!

2. Wash and peel the potatoes, then cut them into medium-sized pieces.
3. In a large bowl, toss the potatoes with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
4. Spread the potatoes out on a baking sheet, making sure they are not overcrowded.
5. Add a sprinkle of any desired spices on top of the potatoes.
6. Bake the potatoes in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and crispy on the outside.
7. While the potatoes are baking, heat some butter in a small saucepan over medium heat.
8. Add minced garlic and onion slivers to the butter, stirring to combine. Cook for a few minutes, until the onion is softened.
9. Once the potatoes are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.

11. Serve the Hasselback potatoes with the garlic and onion mixture on top. Enjoy!

d255a02fb6.gt:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Grease 24 muffin cups or line with paper muffin liners.
Whisk 3 cups flour, cinnamon, baking soda, and salt together in a large bowl.
Stir white sugar, applesauce, and eggs together in another bowl.
Add sugar mixture to flour mixture and stir until batter is just combined.
Fold peaches and cranberries into batter.
Spoon batter into prepared muffin cups.
Stir brown sugar and 2 tablespoons flour together in a small bowl.
Sprinkle brown sugar mixture over the tops of the muffins.
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean, about 25 minutes.
Cool for 10 minutes before transferring muffins to a wire rack to cool completely.

2. In a large bowl, combine the flour, cinnamon, baking soda, and salt.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the applesauce, eggs, sugar, and peaches.
4. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, stirring until just combined.
5. Fold in the chopped cranberries.
6. Pour the batter into a greased muffin tin, filling each cup about 3/4 full.
7. Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
8. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

6e11affa2e.gt:
In a small bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, and salt.
In a 1 quart glass container (a mason jar works great!
), layer the flour mixture, sugar, brown sugar, oats, walnuts, cereal and cranberries.
Cover and store in a cool dry place for up to 6 months.
Write this note to go with your gift mix: To Prepare Cookies ~ In a large bowl, beat the softened butter, egg, water and vanilla until blended.
Add cookie mix and mix well.
Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake at 350F for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown.
Cool 1 minute before removing to wire racks to cool completely.
6e11affa2e.pred:
To cook the dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, salt, and sugar.
3. Add the softened butter and mix until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
4. Stir in the old fashioned oats, walnuts, shredded wheat, and dried cranberries.
5. Gradually add the water and vanilla extract, mixing until the dough comes together.
6. Turn the dough onto a floured surface and knead it a few times.
7. Roll the dough out to a thickness of about 1 inch (2.5 cm).
8. Cut the dough into desired shapes using cookie cutters or a knife.
9. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
10. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are lightly golden brown around the edges.
11. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Oatmeal Cranberry Cookies!

af6f74da4c.gt:
Cut the enoki mushrooms into 3 even lengths, and shred apart.
Cut the tofu into 2 cm cubes.
Bring the dashi stock to a boil and add the ingredients.
Add the enoki mushrooms and tofu and bring to a gentle simmer again.
Serve in bowls scattered with some chopped green onion.
af6f74da4c.pred:
[/SYS]

1. In a large pot, combine the tofu, enoki mushrooms, and dashi stock. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the tofu is tender.

2. While the soup is cooking, prepare the garnish by chopping the green onion into thin strips.

3. After the soup has cooked for the desired amount of time, add the sake and mirin to the pot. Stir to combine, and let the mixture simmer for another 5-10 minutes.

4. Season the soup with salt and usukuchi soy sauce, adjusting the amount to taste.

5. Serve the cooked soup in bowls, garnished with the green onion strips. Enjoy your delicious clear soup with tofu and enoki mushrooms!

91d53e8b2a.gt:
I would use my own brownie recipe but you can use a box mix.
Prepare the brownie mix as directed on package.
Pour into greased 13x9 baking pan.
Beat cream cheese with electric mixer on med.
speed until smooth.
Add sugar, mixing until blended.
Add egg and vanilla; mix just until blended.
Pour cream cheese mixture over brownie mixture; cut through batter with knife several times for marble effect.
Bake at 350F for 35 to 40 minutes or until cream cheese mixture is lightly browned.
Cool; cut into squares.
Note: Do not use brownie mixes that include syrup pouch.
91d53e8b2a.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease a 9x9 inch baking dish and set aside.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the fudge brownie mix, softened Philadelphia Cream Cheese, sugar, and egg. Mix until well combined.
4. Add the vanilla extract and mix until incorporated.
5. Pour the batter into the prepared baking dish.
6. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the brownies comes out clean.
7. Allow the brownies to cool completely in the pan before cutting into squares.

Enjoy your delicious Philly Cheesecake Brownies!

d46848fda2.gt:
In a medium bowl, add rice flour, all-purpose flour, bread crumbs, turmeric, cumin powder, red chili, mango powder, salt, water and make a thick paste.
Set aside.
Cut 1/2 inch thick round pieces of the eggplant.
This will give total of 10 pieces.
Heat the large nonstick pan on high, dab oil and reduce heat to medium.
Take 1 round piece of eggplant, dip it into the batter, making sure its evenly coated on both sides, and put it on the heated pan.
After 2 minutes, turn to the other side and cook for another 2 minutes.
Check both the sides to make sure they are evenly golden brown.
Continue until all eggplant pieces are cooked.
Serve hot.
d46848fda2.pred:
To recreate the Crispy Eggplant Fritters, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Cut the eggplant into bite-sized pieces and season them with salt, pepper, and a pinch of cumin powder.
3. In a large bowl, mix the rice flour, all-purpose flour, bread crumb mixture, turmeric, cumin powder, red chili powder, dry mango powder (or substitute with lemon juice), and salt.
4. Dip the eggplant pieces in the water, then coat them in the seasoned flour mixture.
5. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Carefully place the eggplant pieces in the skillet and cook until they are golden brown on both sides, flipping them occasionally.
6. Transfer the cooked eggplant pieces to a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until they are crispy and cooked through.
7. Serve the Crispy Eggplant Fritters as a delicious appetizer or snack.

[/INST]

18612275da.gt:
Preheat oven to 350
Lightly butter both sides of bread and place on baking sheet
Add all seasonings to taste.
(I like to put them in my hand first and sprinkle them on them on so they don't get overpowered).
Add the cheese and bake for about 5-7 minutes.
18612275da.pred:
To recreate the garlic bread in the image, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Spread butter on the sliced bread.
3. Sprinkle the garlic powder, garlic salt, onion powder, and Italian 5 cheese blend on the bread.
4. Cut the basil and oregano leaves into small pieces.
5. Place the bread slices on a baking sheet or a pizza stone.
6. Bake the bread in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Remove the bread from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing it into individual servings.

Enjoy your homemade garlic bread!

59d1144ae9.gt:
Pour 1 quart of hot water into a large saucepan, and dissolve the gelatin.
Allow to cool.
Pour the cooled gelatin into a large punch bowl.
Stir in: pineapple juice, orange juice concentrate, sugar, and 4 1/2 cups of cold water.
Just before serving, pour in the Ginger Ale.
59d1144ae9.pred:
1. In a large bowl, mix the lime gelatin according to the package instructions.
2. In a separate large bowl, combine the hot water and pineapple juice.
3. Add the frozen orange juice concentrate to the pineapple mixture and stir well.
4. Add the sugar to the pineapple mixture, if desired, and stir to combine.
5. Add the lime gelatin mixture to the pineapple mixture and stir until well combined.
6. Pour the mixture into a large pitcher or a large container.
7. Add the cold water to the mixture, stirring to combine.
8. If desired, add ginger ale to the mixture, stirring to combine.
9. Refrigerate the mixture for at least 4 hours or overnight before serving.
10. Serve the Green Punch in glasses and enjoy the refreshing and delicious St. Patrick's Day Party drink.

[/INST]

ed226be03e.gt:
Heat oil in a small frying pan over low heat until hot, about 1 minute.
Add chile flakes and remove from heat.
Let cool to room temperature.
Strain through a fine mesh strainer if desired, then transfer to a container and cover until ready to use.
Heat half of a gas or charcoal grill to high (about 400 degrees F) and the other half to low (about 300 degrees F).
Divide dough in 1/2 and roll into 2 rounds about 1/4 inch thick and 10 inches in diameter.
Brush the top of 1 round with olive oil and sprinkle with salt.
Lay dough oiled side down on the hotter half of the grill and brush the top with oil and sprinkle with salt.
Grill without moving until grill marks form on the bottom of the dough, about 2 minutes.
Flip dough with a spatula or tongs to the cooler half of grill.
Spread 1/2 of the sauce evenly over the dough, sprinkle 1 tablespoon of the Parmesan cheese over the sauce, then top with 1/2 of the peppers, 1/2 of the sausage, and 1/2 of the mozzarella.
Cover and grill, rotating if necessary to avoid any hot spots, until dough is lightly charred and cheese is melted, about 8 to 10 minutes.
Transfer pizza to a cutting board, sprinkle 1 tablespoon more of the Parmesan over top, drizzle with desired amount of chile oil, slice, and serve.
Repeat with second round of dough and remaining toppings.
ed226be03e.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the red chile flakes, olive oil, and salt. Set aside.
3. On a lightly floured surface, roll out the pizza dough to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
4. Transfer the dough to a pizza stone or a baking sheet.
5. Brush the dough with olive oil, and then sprinkle it with salt.
6. Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Remove the pizza from the oven, and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. While the pizza is cooling, prepare the toppings.
9. In a small bowl, mix the Basic Pizza Sauce and Parmesan cheese.
10. In a medium bowl, mix the diced roasted bell peppers and spicy Italian sausage.
11. Once the pizza is cool enough to handle, slice it into 8 equal pieces.
12. Place a spoonful of the pizza sauce mixture on each slice of pizza.
13. Add a spoonful of the sausage mixture on top of the sauce.
14. Serve the pizza immediately.

[/INST]

42ab84ef73.gt:
Preheat oven to 450 degrees F. Thaw pastry according to directions on box (about 40 minutes).
Cut pastry into 3 sections along perforated lines.
Lay one section of pastry on a baking sheet to assemble.
Spread 2 tablespoons of pesto onto the pastry.
Next, space 5 shrimp evenly on top of the pesto.
Sprinkle with slivers of sundried tomatoes and pine nuts.
Using your fingers, fold over the sides of the pastry so they meet in the middle, and pinch to form a seal (although it will open while baking).
Bake one roll at a time, at 450 degrees F for 5 minutes, then lower oven heat to 375 degrees F and cook an additional 5-8 minutes until pastry is brown and puffed.
Repeat assembly and baking process with remaining two pastry sheets.
Slice each roll into five pieces (one shrimp in each piece) and serve warm.
Makes 15 appetizers.
42ab84ef73.pred:
To recreate the Puff Pastry Prawns, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Roll out the puff pastry on a lightly floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
3. Cut the pastry into 6 equal squares.
4. Place a small amount of pesto on the center of each square of pastry.
5. Top each square with a few shrimp or prawns, leaving a small border around the edges.
6. Fold the pastry over the shrimp or prawns, creating a half-moon shape.
7. Brush the edges of the pastry with water to seal the filling in.
8. Place the pastries on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the pastry is golden brown.
10. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Puff Pastry Prawns!

3cb86cf2f4.gt:
Wash 5 potatoes.
Cut into square pieces.
Preheat oil in skillet on stove top.
I use my iron skillet
Chop up 1/4 white onion on cutting board along with potatoes.
Chop up two green peppers on board.
Dust garlic powder over potato, onion, pepper mix
Place potatoes, onion and peppers in skillet.
Dust with salt and pepper for additional flavor.
Cook until golden brown or potatoes are tender.
Serves about 5, can serve more just cut up more potatoes.
One potato per person want to feed.
3cb86cf2f4.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Wash the potatoes and peel them if desired. Cut the potatoes into evenly sized pieces.
3. In a large bowl, mix the potatoes, onion, and green peppers.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
5. Pour the vegetable oil into a large skillet or oven-safe pan. Heat the oil over medium heat.
6. Add the mixed potatoes, onion, and green peppers to the skillet or pan. Cook for about 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender and slightly browned.
7. Transfer the cooked vegetables to a baking sheet or oven-safe dish.
8. Drizzle the cooked vegetables with the garlic powder mixture, and toss to coat evenly.
9. Place the baking sheet or dish in the preheated oven, and bake for about 20-25 minutes, or until the potatoes are golden brown and crispy.
10. Serve the sauteed potatoes as a side dish or main course.

[/INST]

71c5c68d5d.gt:
Preheat your oven to 425 F. Line a rimmed baking sheet with a Silpat or parchment paper and set aside.
Place all the ingredients for the meatballs in a large bowl.
Using your clean hands, mix all of the ingredients until well combined.
(Kind of gross, but kind of fun.)
Cover and refrigerate the pork mixture for 20 minutes to allow the chia seeds to work their gelling magic.
Use your hands to mold the pork mixture into 1-inch meatballs, and arrange them on the prepared baking sheet, making sure they arent touching.
You should have approximately 20 meatballs.
Transfer the tray of meatballs to the oven and bake for 20 minutes or until lightly browned and cooked through.
In a small bowl, whisk together all of the ingredients for the glaze.
Pour the glaze into a large non-stick pan over medium heat and keep it warm until meatballs are done.
When hot, add the meatballs and toss to coat.
Serve meatballs warm over your stir-fried vegetables or noodles of your choice.
71c5c68d5d.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the ground pork, garlic, ginger, onion, cilantro, and chia seeds.
3. Add the tamari, rice vinegar, honey, and Sriracha sauce to the bowl, and mix well to combine.
4. Form the mixture into small meatballs, and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
5. Bake the meatballs in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until they are cooked through and slightly browned.
6. While the meatballs are baking, prepare the glaze by mixing the low-sodium tamari, ginger, and honey in a small bowl.
7. Once the meatballs are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
8. Drizzle the glaze over the meatballs, and serve them immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Chia Seed Pork Meatballs with Spicy Ginger-Soy Glaze!

77ec10e4ac.gt:
1.
Preheat oven to 350F.
Brush a mini cupcake pan with melted, unsalted butter.
Set aside 2.
In a medium bowl, whisk flour, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, and ginger.
3.
In another bowl, whisk oil, sugar, eggs, and vanilla; mix to blend.
(I used an electric mixer out of ease.)
4.
Add flour mixture to the creamed mixture a little at a time, mixing as you add.
5.
Fold in the zucchini and pecans.
6.
Fill the mini cupcake pan, filling each hole a little more than 1/2 way full.
Bake 10-15 minutes.
7.
Cool completely on wire racks.
Enjoy them plain or add a little cream cheese frosting to the tops!
77ec10e4ac.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, and ginger.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the canola oil, light brown sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract.
4. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
5. Fold in the grated zucchini and chopped pecans.
6. Line a muffin tin with cupcake liners or spray with non-stick cooking spray.
7. Fill each muffin cup with the batter, about 3/4 full.
8. Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
9. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Mini Zucchini Pecan Muffins!

75465ac6f9.gt:
Heat grill to medium-high heat.
Toss meat with 2 Tbsp.
A.1.
; let stand 10 min.
Meanwhile, mix remaining A.1., barbecue sauce and mustard until blended.
Thread meat onto 8 skewers.
Grill 6 min.
or until meat is done, turning after 3 min.
and brushing occasionally with barbecue sauce mixture.
75465ac6f9.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the beef slices with the A.1. Sauce, ensuring that the beef is evenly coated.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the KRAFT Original Barbecue Sauce and Dijon Mustard.
4. Dip the beef slices into the barbecue sauce mixture, ensuring that they are evenly coated.
5. Thread the beef slices onto the skewers, alternating between the A.1. Sauce-coated and barbecue sauce-coated pieces.
6. Place the skewers on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the beef is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and caramelized.
7. Remove the skewers from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious caramelized-beef skewers!

d3a8a169dd.gt:
For crust, preheat oven to 275F; crumble ingredients together until well mixed; Press into a greased 9x13 pan and bake in a slow oven (275F) for 8 minutes; increase temp to 375F and top with second mixture and continue baking.
For topping: Mix all ingredients well; spread mixture over the partially baked crust and continue baking in a moderate oven (375F) until well set and slightly browned, about 30 minutes; cool and cut into squares.
d3a8a169dd.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter or margarine and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the flour, brown sugar, coconut, and walnuts, and mix until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, beat the eggs and add the flour and baking powder. Mix until smooth.
5. Gradually add the wet mixture to the dry mixture, stirring until well combined.
6. Spread the mixture evenly into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.
7. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
8. Allow the squares to cool for a few minutes before cutting them into squares.
9. Serve the walnut squares warm or at room temperature.

[/SYS]

952ff059c4.gt:
In medium bowl, mix cocoa, sugar and oil.
Beat in the egg replacer; stir in vanilla.
Combine flour, baking powder and salt.
Stir into cocoa mixture.
Cover and chill 4 hours (or put in the freezer for about 30 minutes).
Preheat oven to 350.
Lightly grease cookie sheet.
Roll dough into 1-inch balls.
Using your finger, poke a hole into the ball and place 2 marshmallow pieces inside.
Form dough back into a ball, making sure marshmallow is completely covered; coat with powdered sugar.
Bake in preheated oven for 10-12 minutes.
Leave on cookie sheet for 1 minute and then transfer to a wire rack or brown paper.
EGG REPLACER 1 egg = 2 TBSP water + 1 TBSP oil + 2 tsp baking powder
Make sure you mix these together before adding to the recipe (dont just throw them all into the batter they must be mixed together first).
952ff059c4.pred:
To cook the mystery dish, which are egg-less and milk-less hidden treasure cookies, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cocoa powder, sugar, vegetable oil, and vanilla extract.
3. Add the egg replacers, flour, baking powder, salt, and powdered sugar. Mix until well combined.
4. Fold in the marshmallows.
5. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a greased baking sheet or parchment paper.
6. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are set and the centers are still slightly soft.
7. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious egg-less and milk-less hidden treasure cookies!

259241dc1b.gt:
Drain the tuna, reserving 1 tablespoon of the liquid.
Put the tuna in a serving bowl and mash with a fork until it's as mushy as you can get it.
Stir the reserved liquid, the salad dressing, honey mustard, relish, celery, carrot, sugar, and salt into the tuna.
Adjust seasoning to taste.
259241dc1b.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the tuna, creamy salad dressing, honey mustard, sweet pickle relish, minced celery, minced carrot, white sugar, and salt. Mix well.
2. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
3. Serve the sweet sweet tuna salad on a bed of lettuce or a plate, garnished with a dollop of sour cream if desired.

[/SYS]

a4c28c7c57.gt:
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the olive oil and after the oil is hot, stir in the eggplant.
Cook for 3-5 minutes, turning occasionally, until the eggplant is seared.
Stir in the onions, ginger and garlic, and then cook for about 1 minute, or until soft.
(If the pan is too dry from the eggplant absorbing all the oil, add a touch more olive oil when stirring in the onions.)
Reduce heat to low and stir in the coconut milk, fish sauce, curry powder, brown sugar, black pepper and optional chilies.
Simmer for about 2 minutes or until heated through and eggplant has absorbed some of the sauce.
a4c28c7c57.pred:
1. Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the olive oil and let it heat for a few seconds.
2. Add the diced onion and sauté until it becomes translucent.
3. Add the grated ginger and minced garlic, and cook for another minute.
4. Add the sliced Japanese eggplant and cook until it becomes tender and slightly browned.
5. Pour in the coconut milk and stir to combine.
6. Add the fish sauce, curry powder, brown sugar, and fresh cracked black pepper. Stir to combine.
7. If desired, add the sliced Thai chili for a spicy kick.
8. Cook for about 10-15 minutes or until the sauce thickens and the eggplant is cooked through.
9. Serve the seared eggplant and coconut milk curry over rice or with your choice of side dish.
10. Garnish with chopped cilantro for added flavor and presentation.

[/SYS]

8c7a346bad.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Lightly grease a cookie sheet.
Unroll dough on lightly floured surface and press seams together.
Sprinkle one side of block of cream cheese with enough dill to cover.
Place cream cheese, dill side down, in center of dough.
Sprinkle with more dill to cover.
Bring sides of dough up around cheese block and seal to completely enclose.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for approximately 15 minutes.
Serve warm.
8c7a346bad.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Roll out the crescent roll dough on a lightly floured surface to the desired thickness.
3. Spread the cream cheese evenly over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
4. Sprinkle the dried dill weed evenly over the cream cheese.
5. Roll the dough up, starting from the long side, and press the edges to seal.
6. Cut the roll into 1-inch (2.5 cm) slices.
7. Place the slices on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a non-stick mat.
8. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown.
9. Remove from the oven and let cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Dill Wrapped Cream Cheese!

af9fb785aa.gt:
Preheat oven to 275F/135C.
In a large bowl toss oatmeal, coconut, nuts, and sunflower seeds together.
In a separate bowl whisk together oil, honey, cinnamon, and vanilla.
Pour liquid mixture over oats and stir until everything is coated.
Pour mixture into a large rimmed baking sheet.
I also cover the baking sheet with baking paper but it's not necessary if you have a non-stick pan.
Bake for approximately 20-25 minutes, stirring once or twice.
Keep an eye on it so it doesn't burn.
Let it cool completely.
Blend in cornflakes if using.
Store in an airtight container.
af9fb785aa.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 300°F (150°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the oats, coconut, almonds, walnuts, pecans, sunflower seeds, and corn flakes (if using).
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the vegetable oil, honey, and cinnamon.
4. Pour the wet ingredients over the dry ingredients, and mix well to combine.
5. Spread the mixture evenly on a baking sheet or a lined baking sheet, and bake for 30-40 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the granola is golden brown and crispy.
6. Remove the granola from the oven, and let it cool completely on the baking sheet.
7. Once the granola is cool, transfer it to an airtight container or a jar, and store it in a cool, dry place.

[/INST]

The steps for making the nutty fruit free granola are as follows:
1. Preheat your oven to 300°F (150°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the oats, coconut, almonds, walnuts, pecans, sunflower seeds, and corn flakes (if using).
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the vegetable oil, honey, and cinnamon.
4. Pour the wet ingredients over the dry ingredients, and mix well to combine.
5. Spread the mixture evenly on a baking sheet or a lined baking sheet, and bake for 30-40 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the granola is golden brown and crispy.
6. Remove the granola from the oven, and let it cool completely on the baking sheet.
7. Once the granola is cool, transfer it to an airtight container or a jar, and store it in a cool, dry place.

Enjoy your homemade nutty fruit free granola!

6f1343402a.gt:
Heat cumin seeds and mustard seed in hot dry skillet over high heat, swirling pan, until seeds start to pop.
Reduce heat to medium; add onions, chilies, and add a small amount of water; cook until onion is tender, adding more water as necessary to prevent sticking.
Add potatoes, ground cumin, coriander, turmeric, salt (to taste), and cayenne pepper, stirring to mix well.
Add 2/3 cup water, cover, reduce heat and cook for 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally, until spices are absorbed and potatoes are tender.
Add a small amount of water at a time if all liquid evaporates.
Fold in cilantro just before serving.
6f1343402a.pred:
1. Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over medium heat.
2. Add the cumin seeds and brown mustard seeds, and let them sizzle for a few seconds.
3. Add the onion and serrano chilies, and sauté until the onion is translucent.
4. Add the potatoes and sauté for a few minutes until they start to become tender.
5. Add the ground cumin, coriander, turmeric, salt, cayenne pepper, and cilantro. Stir to combine.
6. Cook for a few more minutes until the potatoes are tender and the flavors are well-mixed.
7. Serve the Sookhi Bhaji hot, garnished with fresh cilantro if desired.

[/INST]

By following these instructions, you can prepare a delicious and appetizing Indian Potatoes with Mustard Seeds dish, using the ingredients provided in the photo.

193bc22f43.gt:
Microwave broccoli and CHEEZ WHIZ in microwaveable bowl on HIGH 1 min.
or until heated through, stirring after 30 sec.
Lightly smash each potato half with fork or spoon; place on crackers.
Top with broccoli mixture and bacon bits.
Serve warm.
193bc22f43.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the cooked broccoli, Cheez Whiz Cheese Dip, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
3. Cut the cooked potatoes into 1/2-inch thick slices.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the cooked potatoes with the RITZ Crackers.
5. Spread the potato toppers mixture onto a baking sheet.
6. Bake the potato toppers in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until golden brown and crispy.
7. Spread the potato toppers mixture evenly over the potato slices.
8. Bake the potato toppers in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until the toppings are golden brown and crispy.
9. Serve the smashed potato toppers immediately.

This meal is a simple yet delicious dish that can be enjoyed by people of all ages. The combination of the crispy potato toppers, the creamy cheese dip, and the crunchy crackers creates a satisfying and enjoyable meal.

f3d6579000.gt:
Combine milk and mustard in bowl; add cheese.
Microwave, stirring every minute, 2-4 minutes or until cheese is melted.
Serve with desired dippers.
f3d6579000.pred:
1. In a small bowl, mix the milk and Dijon mustard until smooth.
2. In a larger bowl, combine the Land O Lakes Deli White American cheese slices, and mix until well combined.
3. Add the Dijon mustard mixture to the cheese mixture, and stir until well combined.
4. If desired, add a pinch of salt and pepper to taste.
5. Serve the dip with the pretzel rods, bagel chips, breadsticks, soft pretzels, or vegetable sticks, and enjoy!

[/INST]

f537025690.gt:
Mix chili sauce, lime juice, fish sauce, and cilantro; set aside.
Divide shrimp into 4 equal portions.
Lay each portion of shrimp in a neat row with tails pointed in the same direction.
Thread 2 thin wood or metal skewers (8 to 10 inches long) about 1 1/2 inches apart through center of each row of shrimp, pushing the shellfish close together.
Place shrimp on an oiled grill above a solid bed of hot coals or high heat on a gas barbecue (you can hold your hand at grill level only 2 to 3 seconds); close lid on gas grill.
Cook, turning once, until shrimp are pink, 2 to 3 minutes a side.
Brush tops of shrimp with the chili sauce mixture, turn over, and cook just until glaze bubbles and browns slightly, about 30 seconds (watch closely; glaze burns easily).
Brush tops with more chili mixture, then turn glaze down and cook just until it darkens slightly, about 30 seconds more.
Transfer shrimp to plates or a platter.
Season to taste with remaining chili mixture and juice from lime wedges.
f537025690.pred:
1. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
2. In a small bowl, whisk together the Thai sweet chili sauce, lime juice, and fish sauce until smooth.
3. In a large bowl, toss the shrimp with the cilantro and a pinch of salt and pepper.
4. Dip the shrimp skewers into the sauce mixture, coating them evenly.
5. Place the skewers on the grill or grill pan and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until the shrimp are cooked through and the sauce is slightly caramelized.
6. Serve the chili glazed shrimp skewers immediately.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Chili Glazed Shrimp Skewers!

7a6c6f2959.gt:
Dressing:.
Place the almonds and water into a blender or food proccesor and turn on high speed to puree.
Add remaining ingredients, except for oil, and run to blend and whip thoroughly.
With the motor running, slowly pour in oil and run until the dressing is thick and creamy.
(dressing can be prepared and refrigerated for up to 1 week.
).
As stated in the description, you may use 3/4 cup oil and 1/4 cup water or apple juice(or liquid of choice) and get a little thinner dressing.
Let sit for a few minutes to thicken up.
Salad:.
Put 1/2 cup of the dressing in the bottom of your salad bowl.
Add all ingredients, except lettuce, and toss to coat.
Serve:.
Put several lettuce leaves on each plate and add dressed salad.
Serve extra dressing on the side.
Enjoy!
7a6c6f2959.pred:
To cook the Super Veggie Salad With Creamy Almond Dressing, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the chopped almonds, water, lemon juice, fresh juice plus, honey, salt, basil, dill, pepper, lemon zest, and canola oil. Mix well.
3. Spread the mixture evenly on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the almonds are golden brown and fragrant.
4. In a large bowl, combine the broccoli florets, mushroom, red onions, avocado, grape tomatoes, and romaine lettuce or butter lettuce.
5. In a small bowl, whisk together the dressing ingredients: lemon juice, honey, salt, pepper, and lemon zest.
6. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
7. Serve the salad immediately, or refrigerate for a few hours before serving to allow the flavors to meld.

Enjoy your delicious Super Veggie Salad With Creamy Almond Dressing!

c6b05c501b.gt:
Spread 1 bread slice with peanut butter, then spread other bread slice with jam; close to make sandwich.
Cook in skillet sprayed with cooking spray on medium heat 3 min.
on each side or until sandwich is golden brown on both sides.
Let stand 1 min.
; cut into quarters.
c6b05c501b.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Spread a thin layer of seedless raspberry jam on one side of each slice of bread.
3. Place the two slices of Hawaiian bread, with the jam-side down, on a baking sheet.
4. Spread a thin layer of PLANTERS Cherry Chocolate Peanut Butter with Semi-Sweet Chocolate, Cherries & Cranberries on one side of each slice of bread.
5. Place the two slices of bread with the peanut butter-side down on the baking sheet.
6. Bake the sandwiches for 10-12 minutes or until the bread is golden brown and the filling is melted and bubbly.
7. Remove the sandwiches from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before cutting them into halves or quarters.
8. Serve the toasted cherry chocolate sandwiches warm.

Enjoy your delicious toasted cherry chocolate sandwiches!

1b81060720.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Partially bake the pie crust for 5 minutes according to package (or your recipe) instructions.
Whisk together the sugar, flour, salt and cocoa powder in medium mixing bowl.
Blend in melted butter.
Add the eggs and vanilla and stir until well blended.
Pour into the pie crust and bake 45 minutes.
The filling will be soft in the center but not runny; do not overbake, as it will set up some as it cools.
If crust gets too brown, cover with a pie shield or aluminum foil.
Allow to cool to room temperature (this allows the fudge to set up.)
I think it is best served warmed.
I micowave a slice for about 20 seconds on high.
Top with your choice of ice cream, fudge sauce, whipped cream, nuts and cherries.
1b81060720.pred:
To cook the Legendary Fudge Pie, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, salt, and cocoa powder.
3. Add the melted butter and mix until the dough comes together.
4. Press the dough evenly into the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch pie dish.
5. Bake the crust for 10-12 minutes, or until it is set and lightly golden.
6. Remove the crust from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. In a large mixing bowl, beat the eggs and vanilla extract until well combined.
8. Gradually add the sugar to the egg mixture, beating until smooth.
9. Pour the egg mixture over the cooled crust and smooth the top with a spatula.
10. Bake the pie for 35-40 minutes, or until the filling is set and the edges are slightly golden.
11. Remove the pie from the oven and let it cool completely before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Legendary Fudge Pie!

83d2a64e21.gt:
Heat greased barbecue to medium heat.
Grill wings 7 to 8 min.
on each side or until done.
Meanwhile, mix Miracle Whip and Sriracha sauce in large bowl until blended.
Add wings to Miracle Whip mixture; toss to evenly coat.
Transfer to platter.
Sprinkle with onions.

4. Roast the chicken wings in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until they are cooked through and the skin is crispy.
5. Remove the chicken wings from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
6. Serve the chicken wings with the green onion slices on top for garnish.

05ef07d575.gt:
In small bowl, toss cheese and flour.
In small saucepan, heat buttermilk and cider.
Add cheese and caraway seeds.
Stir til melted.
Keep warm while serving.
Serve with chunks of rye bread for dipping.

[/SYS]

2. In a large bowl, combine the grated or sliced swiss cheese, flour, and caraway seeds.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the buttermilk, apple cider, and a pinch of salt.
4. Pour the buttermilk mixture over the cheese mixture, and stir until well combined.

This cooking guide provides a simple and delicious recipe for a warm and creamy Swiss cheese dip with caraway. The ingredients are easy to find, and the process is straightforward, making it a perfect option for a casual gathering or a cozy night in.

1bf5668c79.gt:
Brown ground beef and onion powder in a large skillet over medium heat, drain off fat.
Mix together eggs, cream, mayonnaise, garlic powder, pepper and shredded cheddar cheese.
Put browned beef into a 9 inch pie plate, pour remaining ingredients over the beef.
Place in a preheated 350 degree oven and bake for 40-45 minutes.
1bf5668c79.pred:
To cook the Crustless Cheeseburger Quiche, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the ground beef, onion powder, heavy cream, mayonnaise, eggs, garlic powder, and pepper. Mix well.
3. Pour the mixture into a pie crust, which has been prepared with a layer of cooked, shredded cheddar cheese.
4. Bake the quiche in the preheated oven for about 35-40 minutes, or until the filling is set and the crust is golden brown.
5. Allow the quiche to cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Crustless Cheeseburger Quiche!

f51e8fb184.gt:
Cook dry beans according to instructions on packet.
(No need with canned beans).
Saute onions until they are soft and clear.
Add tomato paste, coconutcream and seasonings, stirring over a gentle heat until they form a smooth and creamy sauce.
Drain beans and add to sauce.
Allow to simmer gently for 15 minutes or so, stirring from time to time.
Serve on brown or white rice accompanied by a salad.
f51e8fb184.pred:
1. Rinse the beans and pick out any stones or debris.
2. In a large pot, combine the beans, onions, and water. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for about 1-2 hours, or until the beans are tender but still have some bite.
3. In a small bowl, mix the tomato paste, coconut cream, paprika, chili powder, cumin, brown sugar, salt, and black pepper.
4. Add the tomato paste mixture to the beans, stirring to combine. Simmer for an additional 15-20 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly.
5. Serve the dish over rice or with your favorite side dish. Enjoy!

08d0d4295c.gt:
Wash the sweet potato well and use a paper towel to dry.
Heat the oil.
Cut the parts of the potato that you are going to fry into long strips.
If you aren't going to be washing in water, you should fry it quickly or it'll change color.
Fry slowly at about 170C for a nice color.
Sandwich between paper towels to remove the oil, shake some salt over all of them.
Repeat steps 2 - 4.
08d0d4295c.pred:
[INST] <<SYS>>
To cook the Deep-Fried Salty Sweet Potato Sticks, follow these steps:
1. Preheat the oil in a large frying pan or deep fryer to a temperature of 350°F (175°C).
2. Cut the sweet potato into sticks, about 1-inch (2.5 cm) in length.
3. In a large bowl, mix together the sweet potato sticks, salt, and any additional seasonings or spices you prefer.
4. Carefully place the sweet potato sticks into the hot oil, ensuring they are evenly distributed.
5. Fry the sticks for about 5-7 minutes, or until they are golden brown and crispy on all sides.
6. Remove the fried sticks from the oil using a slotted spoon or tongs, and place them on a paper towel-lined plate to drain any excess oil.
7. Serve the Deep-Fried Salty Sweet Potato Sticks immediately, as they are best when hot and crispy.

Enjoy your delicious Deep-Fried Salty Sweet Potato Sticks!

874ce55813.gt:
Put all marinade ingrediantsin a large ziplock bag.
Mix well.
Add chicken breasts.
For a mild flavour, leave for 30 minutes.
For more intensity, leave up to 4 hours but no longer.
Heat up grill to medium high.
Cook breasts, with lid closed for about 7 (7 1/2) minutes per side.
874ce55813.pred:
To cook the Greek Marinade for Chicken, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the chopped dill, olive oil, onion, garlic, lemon zest, lemon juice, ouzo, fennel seed, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
3. Add the chicken breasts to the marinade and toss to coat evenly. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
4. Remove the chicken from the marinade and pat it dry with paper towels.
5. Place the chicken on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
6. Bake the chicken in the preheated oven for about 30-40 minutes, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 165°F (74°C).
7. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into thin pieces.
8. Serve the Greek Marinade for Chicken hot, over rice or with your favorite side dish.

Enjoy your delicious Greek Marinade for Chicken!

163b52a061.gt:
Cut broccoli and cauliflower into smaller pieces.
Heat water in a large wok to boiling and add broccoli and cauliflower.
Let sit for 2-3 minutes, then remove from wok, drain and rinse with cold water.
In same wok, heat 1-2 T oil on high.
Add ginger, garlic, carrot, and green onion.
Cook until garlic starts to turn brown.
Be careful not to overcook!
Add broccoli and cauliflower and stir.
Add sauce, stir, and let simmer for several minutes.
Serve immediately!

1. Prepare the ingredients:

- Peel and slice the carrot.
- Mince the garlic and gingerroot.
- Slice the green onion.
- Combine the oyster sauce, hoisin sauce, soy sauce, and red pepper flakes in a small bowl.
- Season the vegetables with salt.

2. Heat the oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
- Add the minced garlic and gingerroot to the skillet and cook for about 1 minute, stirring constantly.
- Add the sliced carrot and cook for an additional 2 minutes, stirring occasionally.

- Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauce has thickened and the vegetables are coated evenly.
- Season with salt and pepper to taste.

3. Serve the dish immediately over rice or noodles, and enjoy!

283c2400cb.gt:
Transfer cream to bowl of 5-quart electric stand mixer fitted with whisk attachment.
Tightly cover top of bowl and mixer with plastic wrap.
Beat cream at moderately high speed until it holds soft peaks, 10 to 12 minutes.
Increase speed to high and beat until mixture separates into thick, pale-yellow butter and thin, liquid buttermilk, about 5 minutes more.
Strain mixture through colander into large bowl.
Using hands, vigorously knead butter in colander, squeezing out remaining buttermilk, until dense and creamy, about 5 minutes.
Transfer butter to large bowl, reserving buttermilk.
Using hands, knead salt into butter.
Roll into logs and wrap in plastic wrap or transfer to airtight container and refrigerate.
(Butter will keep up to 1 week refrigerated or 1 month frozen.)
Strain buttermilk through fine-mesh sieve, then cover and refrigerate up to 1 week.
283c2400cb.pred:
1. In a large bowl, whisk together the heavy cream and fine sea salt.
2. Place the bowl in the stand mixer fitted with a whisk attachment.
3. Whisk the cream mixture on medium speed until it reaches the desired consistency, which is usually around 140°F (60°C) or slightly warmer.
4. If the butter is not fully incorporated, continue whisking until it is fully combined and reaches the desired temperature.
5. Remove the bowl from the mixer and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. Once the butter has cooled slightly, carefully pour it into a buttermilk container or a clean glass jar.
7. Store the butter in the refrigerator until it reaches the desired consistency, which is usually around 40°F (4°C) or slightly warmer.
8. Once the butter has reached the desired consistency, it is ready to use.

This homemade butter and buttermilk recipe is a simple and delicious way to enjoy the flavors of butter and buttermilk. The stand mixer makes it easy to whisk the ingredients together, and the buttermilk container or glass jar allows for easy storage and transportation.

217d8f645b.gt:
Preheat oven to 375F degrees.
Put a sheet of tinfoil on a cookie sheet.
Spray cookie sheet with lite olive oil or other veggie oil.
In a small bowl combine; onion flakes,oregano, garlic, paprika, salt& pepper, mix well.
Brush cut sides of the potato wedges with olive oil and sprinkle with the spice mixture.
Place potato pieces cut side down on the prepared cookie sheet.
Bake until underside are golden brown, about 30 minutes.
Gently turn the wedges so the other side is on the cookie sheet.
Bake for another 15-20 minutes or until the potatoes are tender and golden.
Serve while they ar piping hot.

3. Drizzle the olive oil over the potatoes and toss to coat evenly.

This meal is a delicious and nutritious option for those who want to enjoy the flavors of fried potatoes without the added fat and calories.

093fcaf5a6.gt:
Start by heating a medium-sized pot (you will cook everything in this pot) on medium heat, then add the oil.
Once oil comes to temperature, add cubed pork belly.
Cook pork belly, turning as it cooks, until all sides are browned.
Once pork is browned, add onions, garlic, and ginger.
Give a good stir, and continue to cook for about 3 minutes or so.
Add the shrimp paste.
Turn on your vent on high as this stuff has some funk (good funk), and continue to stir.
Toss in chilies, stir again, then add coconut milk.
Bring to a simmer and cook for about 1 hour, on low, stirring along the way.
Before serving, taste and season with salt or pepper.
Now you are ready to dig in.
I like to serve with a small bowl of rice to the side, along with a soup bowl of the Bicol Express.
This dish is rich, creamy, spicy, funky, and overall totally comforting and right up my alley.
093fcaf5a6.pred:
[/SYS]

1. Heat the oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the pork and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Remove the pork from the skillet and set aside.

2. Add the onion and garlic to the skillet and cook until the onion is softened, about 3 minutes.

3. Add the ginger and cook for another minute.

4. Add the pork back to the skillet and cook until the pork is fully cooked through, about 5 minutes.

5. Add the shrimp paste and cook for an additional 2 minutes, stirring constantly.

6. Add the coconut milk, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine.

7. Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook for about 10 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened.

8. Serve the Bicol Express over cooked rice.

[/SYS]

This cooking guide provides a step-by-step process for preparing a delicious Filipino Bicol Express dish using the ingredients provided. The dish combines flavors of pork, onions, garlic, ginger, shrimp paste, coconut milk, and rice, resulting in a rich and satisfying meal.

5765949efb.gt:
Combine sugar, pecans and orange peel in small bowl.
Melt butter in small bowl in microwave.
Cut cream cheese into 20 pieces the size of butter pat.
Seperate each biscuit in half part way and place cream cheese piece in and pinch edges back together.
Do all 20 biscuits.
Then dip in melted butter and dredge in sugar, pecan mixture.
Stand upright in lightly greased 12 cup bundt pan, space evenly.
Drizzle any remaining butter over and sprinkle with any remaining sugar,pecan mixture.
Bake at 350-375F for 45 minutes or until golden brown.
Immediately invert onto plate.
Combine powdered sugar, cinnamon and water, stir well.
Drizzle over hot bread.
Serve warm.

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sugar, chopped pecans, and orange peel.
3. Add the melted butter to the mixture and stir until well combined.

5bcb6c7ba1.gt:
Heat oven to 350F (325F for dark or nonstick pans).
Place paper baking cup in each of 24 regular-size muffin cups.
In small bowl, mix 1 1/2 cups pretzel, 2 T sugar and 1/4 cup melted butter or margarine until blended.
Spoon about 1 tablespoon mixture in each cup.
3In large bowl, beat cake mix, margarita mix, water, oil, egg whites and 3 tsp zest with electric mixer on low speed 30 seconds, then on medium speed 2 minutes, scraping bowl occasionally.

Bake 18 to 23 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.

Store loosely covered in refrigerator.

To cook the Cinco De Mayo Margarita Cupcakes, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the melted butter or margarine, sugar, and lime zest.
3. Add the cake mix, nonalcoholic margarita mix, and water to the bowl, mixing until well combined.
4. Fill cupcake liners with the batter, filling them about 2/3 full.
5. Bake the cupcakes in the preheated oven for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cupcake comes out clean.

10. Frost the cooled cupcakes with the frosting mixture.

9c5602c4ae.gt:
In large bowl, combine first 6 ingredients.
Mix next 3 ingredients; mix well.
Pour over salad and toss well.
Chill.

11. Serve the salad immediately or refrigerate it for later use.

0ddb710349.gt:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
In a small bowl, beat egg with milk.
In a shallow plate or bowl, mix bread crumbs with Italian seasonings.
Dip each piece of chicken into the egg/milk mixture, then into the bread crumb mixture to coat thoroughly.

Remove from oven and serve!

6. Bake the chicken in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until it is cooked through and the bread crumbs are golden brown.
