1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, orange juice concentrate, salt, and pepper.
3. Add the arugula, pomegranate seeds, and goat cheese to the bowl, and toss to combine.
4. Spread the salad mixture evenly on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
5. Roast the salad in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the arugula is tender and slightly wilted, and the goat cheese is melted and bubbly.
6. Remove the salad from the oven and let it cool slightly.
7. Serve the salad immediately, or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Arugula Salad With Oranges, Pomegranate Seeds, and Goat Cheese!

e621c384f2.gt:
1.
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Line a large baking sheet with parchment.
Unfold pastry and cut into 4 equal squares.
2.
Spread 1 teaspoon mustard on each pastry square, leaving 1/4 inch border.
Layer 1 slice turkey, 1 slice Swiss, and 1 slice ham in the center of each square.
Whisk egg with 1 tablespoon water; brush onto edges of the square.
Fold squares to form triangles and crimp edges to seal.
Place on a baking sheet and brush with remaining egg mixture.
3.
Bake pastries for 25 minutes or until golden.
Dust with sugar and serve with preserves on the side.
e621c384f2.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Roll out the thawed puff pastry on a lightly floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
3. Cut the pastry into 4 equal squares.
4. Place a spoonful of raspberry preserves in the center of each pastry square.
5. Fold the pastry over the filling, pressing the edges to seal.
6. Brush the edges of the pastry with beaten egg, then press the edges together to seal.
7. Place the pastries on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the pastries for 15-20 minutes or until golden brown.
9. While the pastries are baking, prepare the filling. In a small bowl, mix the honey mustard, egg, and confectioners sugar until smooth.
10. Once the pastries are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
11. Carefully slice the pastries in half, creating a sandwich with the filling inside.
12. Serve the Monte Cristo sandwiches warm or at room temperature.

Enjoy your delicious Puff Pastry Monte Cristo!

2a96229516.gt:
Brown sausage in a skillet over med.
heat.
Drain fat and transfer to crockpot.
Combine remaining ingredients in crockpot.
Cover and cook on low 8 hrs.
or on high 4 hrs.
Remove bay leaves.
Serve over cooked rice.
2a96229516.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot or Dutch oven, cook the sausage over medium heat until browned, breaking it into smaller pieces as it cooks.
3. Add the onions, green peppers, and celery to the pot, and cook until the vegetables are tender.
4. Add the minced garlic, thyme, oregano, white pepper, black pepper, cayenne pepper, and chicken bouillon cube to the pot. Cook for a few minutes, stirring to combine.
5. Pour in the canned black beans, tomato sauce, and water. Stir to combine.
6. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the liquid has been absorbed.
7. Season the dish with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Serve the Creole Black Beans and Rice over rice.

[/INST]

aaf069b0ba.gt:
Prepare coffee T DISC in mug or large heatproof glass.
Add brown sugar and light cream; stir.
Top with thawed whipped topping and a light sprinkling of ground cinnamon.
Add cinnamon stick.
aaf069b0ba.pred:
1. First, prepare the coffee by using the Tassimo Nabob French Vanilla Coffee disc.
2. In a small saucepan, heat the brown sugar and light cream over low heat until the sugar is dissolved.
3. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the thawed Cool Whip Whipped Topping.
4. Add the ground cinnamon and cinnamon stick to the mixture and stir well.
5. Allow the mixture to cool for a few minutes.
6. Pour the coffee mixture over the Cool Whip mixture, stirring gently to combine.
7. Serve the coffee-flavored dessert immediately.

[/SYS]

24b368b73d.gt:
To make Salad: Toast pine nuts in skillet over medium heat 5 minutes, or until golden brown.
Transfer to plate to cool.
Combine radicchio, radishes, fennel, and cucumber in large bowl.
To make Lemon-Mint Dressing: Puree mint, lemon juice, oil, maple syrup, and mustard in blender until smooth.
Season with salt and pepper.
Add dressing to salad; toss to coat, and garnish with toasted pine nuts.
24b368b73d.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, toss the radicchio, radishes, and fennel with lemon juice to prevent them from turning brown.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the olive oil, maple syrup, and mustard.
4. Add the pine nuts to the bowl with the dressing and toss to coat the vegetables evenly.
5. Spread the vegetables out on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and slightly caramelized.
6. Remove the vegetables from the oven and let them cool slightly.
7. In a large bowl, combine the cooled vegetables with the cucumber matchsticks and mint leaves.
8. Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
9. Serve the Radicchio, Radish, and Fennel Salad immediately.

[/INST]

6002037e6e.gt:
Add Angostura bitters to a chilled old-fashioned glass and swirl to coat glass; pour off excess.
Add gin and, if you like, ice and a splash of soda water.
6002037e6e.pred:
1. Gather the necessary ingredients: Angostura bitters, London Dry-style gin, and soda water (if desired).
2. In a mixing glass, combine the gin, bitters, and soda water (if using).
3. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
4. Shake the ingredients in the mixing glass vigorously for about 10-15 seconds.
5. Strain the mixture into a cocktail glass filled with ice.
6. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel, if desired.
7. Enjoy your Pink Gin cocktail!

[/INST]

b1cd30f000.gt:
Brown the chorizo and ground meat.
Add cumin, salt, ketchup, and garlic.
Beat the eggs add 2 tablespoonfuls of water as you beat them
In another pan add your beaten eggs fry, and roll the pan a bit.
add water and steam with lid on this is to toughen the egg a bit and to get eggs done.
Remove from heat add meat to it and roll it up shred the cheese on top.
Serve hope you enjoy!
b1cd30f000.pred:
To recreate the Spanish style eggs, follow these instructions:
1. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped chorizo and ground meat, cooking until browned and crumbled.
3. Add the ground cumin, granulated garlic powder, salt, and cook for an additional minute.
4. Add the finely shredded sharp cheddar cheese and stir until melted and combined.
5. Add the Heinz ketchup or tomato paste, stirring until well combined.
6. Add the 3 large eggs, stirring gently to break them up.
7. Add the water, stirring to combine.
8. Cook the mixture over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the eggs are cooked to your desired level of doneness.
9. If desired, use a steamer to cook the eggs until they are fully cooked and the whites are set.
10. Serve the Spanish style eggs hot, garnished with chopped parsley if desired.

[/INST]

c382163c5c.gt:
Preheat the oven to 275 degrees F. Set a rack on each of 2 baking sheets.
In a bowl, toss the sweet potato slices with the oil and season with salt and pepper; make sure each slice is coated with oil.
Arrange the slices in a single layer on the racks.
Bake for 45 to 50 minutes, rotating the sheets halfway through baking, until the chips are deeply golden.
The chips will crisp as they cool.
Looking for more quick and easy recipes?
Check out our quick family-favorites, fast dinners for weeknights, and healthy recipes for less than $3 a serving.
c382163c5c.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Wash and peel the sweet potato, then cut it into thin slices.
3. In a large bowl, toss the sweet potato slices with the extra-virgin olive oil, kosher salt, and freshly ground pepper.
4. Spread the potato slices out on a baking sheet, making sure they are not overcrowded.
5. Bake the sweet potato chips in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and crispy.
6. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the chips cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Baked Sweet Potato Chips!

f4794c8922.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Smooth all filling ingredients together in a large bowl.
Place filling in a 9-inch glass pie plate and bake for 35-40 minutes, until golden.
Let cool for 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, stir together topping ingredients and spread on top of cheesecake.
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving.
f4794c8922.pred:
To cook the Grandma's Crustless Baked Cheesecake Pie, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the softened cream cheese, sugar, and eggs. Mix until smooth and creamy.
3. Add the low-fat sour cream and vanilla extract, and mix until well combined.
4. Pour the mixture into a greased 9-inch (23 cm) springform pan.
5. Bake the pie in the preheated oven for about 45-50 minutes, or until the center is set and the edges are slightly golden.
6. Remove the pie from the oven and let it cool completely on a wire rack.
7. Refrigerate the pie for at least 4 hours or overnight before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Grandma's Crustless Baked Cheesecake Pie!

0bb9567cbe.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Separate each biscuit into 3 pieces.
Place on baking sheet.
Combine the cheese, mayo, onion, bacon, sugar, garlic salt and hot pepper sauce in a medium bowl; mix well.
Place a spoonful of the mixture, spreading evenly, on each biscuit round.
Bake 10 minutes or until golden.
0bb9567cbe.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the refrigerated biscuits, grated cheese, mayonnaise, chopped onion, and sugar. Mix well.
3. Add the cooked crumbled bacon and garlic salt. Mix until well combined.
4. If the mixture is too dry, add more mayonnaise or water as needed.
5. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Using a spoon, scoop out small balls of the mixture and place them on the prepared baking sheet.
7. Bake the puffs in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until golden brown.
8. Remove the puffs from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Bacon Biscuit Puffs!

b150cd3f5e.gt:
Grease and flour a standard loaf pan.
Preheat oven to 350F.
Combine first 7 ingredients in bowl of food processor and pulse a few times to mix.
Add butter and one egg.
Process until mixture is moistened.
With machine running, add remaining ingredients, scraping bowl as necessary.
Bake for 1 hour and 10 minutes, or until tester comes out clean.
Cool in pan 10 minutes.
Remove from pan and cool on rack.
b150cd3f5e.pred:
[INST] <<SYS>>
To make a delicious Pumpkin Spice Pound Cake, follow these clear instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease and flour a 9-inch round cake pan.
2. In a large bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, and ginger.
3. In a separate bowl, beat the eggs and then add the pumpkin puree, vanilla, and melted butter.
4. Gradually mix the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients until just combined.
5. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan and bake for about 35-40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
6. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
7. Once cooled, dust the cake with powdered sugar and enjoy!

<</SYS>>

[/INST]

524529d38b.gt:
Add ingredients (except for cornmeal) to machine bread pan in order as per manufacturer's instructions.
Set to "Dough" cycle.
Lightly grease one 9 x 13-inch pan and sprinkle with cornmeal.
When the dough cycle is complete, roll out dough and place in pan.
Let rest in pans for 10-15 minutes.
Add toppings of your choice.
Bake at 350F until done (approximately 20 minutes, depending on the thickness of toppings).
I make the pizza in 9x13 rectangular pans rather than the round pizza pans, because the squares pieces are easier to reheat and pack in school lunches.
524529d38b.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine 13 cups of water, 2 teaspoons sugar, 14 teaspoons salt, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 tablespoons cornmeal, 3 cups unbleached all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 14 teaspoons garlic powder, 14 teaspoons onion powder, and 12 teaspoons msg (Accent*).
2. Add 1 12 teaspoons bread machine yeast to the mixture and stir until well combined.
3. Cover the bowl with a clean cloth and let the dough rise in a warm place for about 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.
4. Preheat your bread machine according to the manufacturer's instructions.
5. Add the dough to the bread machine and set the dough setting to the pizza dough setting.
6. Press the start button and let the bread machine do its magic.
7. After the dough has finished kneading, remove it from the bread machine and shape it into a ball.
8. Place the shaped dough on a lightly floured surface and let it rest for about 10-15 minutes.
9. Meanwhile, preheat your oven to 475°F (245°C).
10. After the dough has rested, punch it down and then roll it out on a lightly floured surface to your desired thickness.
11. Transfer the rolled-out dough to a lightly greased baking sheet.
12. Spread a thin layer of tomato sauce over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
13. Add your desired toppings, such as cheese, pepperoni, and any other desired ingredients.
14. Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for about 10-12 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
15. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your hom

9c6c383e4a.gt:
Boil the spaghetti for 15 minutes.
Boil the soy granules for 10 minutes.
Heat the oil in a heavy skillet.
Add the diced onions.
Saute for 2-3 minutes.
Add the tomatoes, soy granules, ground pepper, sea salt, paprika, red wine and dry basil.
Cook for 3 minutes then add the yeast flakes and stir.
Remove from heat.
Last but not least, add the minced garlic cloves (we dont want to heat the garlic too much).
Pour the Bolognese sauce over the spaghetti, garnish with fresh basil, and serve!
9c6c383e4a.pred:
1. Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
2. In a large pan, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the diced onions and cook until they are soft and translucent.
3. Add the soy granules and cook for a few minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. Add the minced garlic and cook for a minute or until fragrant.
5. Add the diced tomatoes, breaking them up with a spoon. Season with salt, pepper, and sweet paprika.
6. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then cover and cook for about 15-20 minutes or until the sauce has thickened.
7. Add the ground pepper and red wine (if using) to taste.
8. If the sauce is too thick, you can add a bit of water or broth to achieve the desired consistency.
9. Once the sauce is cooked and seasoned to your liking, remove it from the heat.
10. Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
11. Serve the spaghetti topped with the vegan Bolognese sauce.

Enjoy your delicious vegan Bolognese spaghetti!

96d86ade02.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Spray baking dish with cooking spray.
Add chicken pieces and season with garlic powder and onion powder.
Cover with foil and bake for 45 minutes.
In a bowl, mix barbecue sauce, honey, ginger, and Worcestershire sauce.
Pour evenly over chicken and bake uncovered for 20-25 additional minutes or until sauce thickens and internal temperature is 180F.
96d86ade02.pred:
To recreate the honey barbecue baked chicken, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the chicken pieces with the garlic powder, onion powder, ginger, and Worcestershire sauce.
3. In a large bowl, mix the honey, barbecue sauce, and ginger until well combined.
4. Place the chicken pieces in a baking dish, and pour the honey mixture over them.
5. Bake the chicken in the preheated oven for about 1 hour, or until it is cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
6. Remove the chicken from the oven, and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious honey barbecue baked chicken!

97692d5fc3.gt:
Spread tortilla with dressing and mustard; top with remaining ingredients.
Fold in opposite sides of tortilla, then roll up from one end, leaving top end open.
Place on microwaveable plate.
Microwave on HIGH 1 min.
or until heated through.
97692d5fc3.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the MIRACLE WHIP Dressing, GREY POUPON Dijon Mustard, and leftover cooked ham.
3. Spread the MIRACLE WHIP Dressing mixture on one side of the flour tortilla.
4. Place the sliced ham on the other side of the tortilla.
5. Spread the prepared STOVE TOP Stuffing Mix on top of the ham.
6. Add the chopped tomatoes on top of the stuffing.
7. Roll the tortilla over the filling, enclosing it.
8. Place the rolled tortilla in a baking dish and bake for 10-12 minutes or until the tortilla is golden brown and the filling is hot and bubbly.
9. Serve the Ham 'n Stuff Wrap warm.

[/INST]

0c55421a39.gt:
Combine the ingredients in the order listed in a spill proof shaker and shake until thoroughly mixed.
Top wtih whipped cream and grated chocolate, if using.
Serve immediately.
0c55421a39.pred:
1. In a blender, combine 4 ounces of fluid Hazelnut Or Raspberry Syrup, 12 ounces of fluid Sparkling Water, and 1/4 cup of Crushed Ice. Blend until smooth and creamy.
2. Pour the mixture into a glass, and garnish with a dollop of whipped cream and a sprinkle of grated chocolate, if desired.
3. Serve immediately and enjoy your delicious Creamy, Bubbly Italian Soda.

This guide provides a simple and easy-to-follow recipe for creating a delightful Creamy, Bubbly Italian Soda. The combination of the creamy syrup, sparkling water, and crushed ice results in a refreshing and indulgent beverage that can be enjoyed on its own or paired with a variety of desserts. The optional toppings of whipped cream and grated chocolate add an extra touch of luxury and flavor, making the drink even more enjoyable.

276686850b.gt:
Add 3 quarts water and olive oil to 6 quart pot.
Bring water to a boil.
Add noodles and boil 6 minutes.
No salt!
While noodles cook, pour cans of soup and Albacore into large mixing bowl and stir with a fork adding one soup can of water until it is smooth like gravy.
When noodles are done, drain them and rinse them with hot water.
Return cooked noodles to pan and add soup and tuna while stirring.
Pour tuna and noodle mixture into 9"x13" baking pan.
Sprinkle with pepper, garlic powder and spread both cheeses.
Add french fried onions evenly over the top of noodle mixture.
Cover with aluminum foil and bake in pre-heated 350 oven for 30 minutes.
Remove foil after baking for 30 minutes and increase oven temperature to 400 for 10 more minutes to brown onions and seal cheeses.
Cut into large squares and serve while hot.
276686850b.pred:
To cook the mystery dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the egg noodles, canned tuna, cream of mushroom soup, and both grated cheeses. Mix well.
3. Add the French fried onions, black pepper, garlic powder, and olive oil. Mix until well combined.
4. Transfer the mixture to a 9x13 inch baking dish.
5. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the noodles are cooked through and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
6. Serve the dish hot and enjoy!

Remember to use proper cooking utensils and techniques to ensure the dish is prepared safely and deliciously.

8582739828.gt:
Whisk together 2/3 cup broth, soy sauce, brown sugar, ketchup, ginger, garlic, and vinegar and pour into a large sealable plastic bag.
Add tenderloin and seal bag, then marinate, chilled, turning bag over occasionally, 2 hours.
Bring tenderloin to room temperature, about 1 hour.
Put oven rack in middle position and preheat oven to 425F.
Pat tenderloin dry and reserve marinade.
Heat oil in a 12-inch ovenproof skillet over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking, then brown tenderloin on all sides, turning with tongs, about 3 minutes total.
Transfer skillet to oven and roast pork until thermometer inserted diagonally into center of meat registers 155F, 12 to 15 minutes.
Transfer to a cutting board and let stand, loosely covered with foil, 10 minutes.
While meat is roasting, pour marinade through a fine-mesh sieve into a small saucepan and boil until reduced to about 1/3 cup, 10 to 15 minutes.
Stir in remaining cup broth and bring sauce to a simmer.
Serve slices of tenderloin with sauce.
8582739828.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the chicken broth, soy sauce, brown sugar, ketchup, ginger, garlic, and cider vinegar.
3. Season the pork tenderloin with salt and pepper.
4. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the pork tenderloin and cook until browned on all sides, about 4-5 minutes.
5. Remove the pork from the skillet and place it in a baking dish. Pour the marinade mixture over the pork and bake for 1 1/2 to 2 hours, or until the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C) for medium-rare.
6. Remove the pork from the oven and let it rest for 10 minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your delicious ginger-marinated pork tenderloin!

12fdd3534c.gt:
Preheat oven to 180 degrees.
Place in a saucepan the sugar, mashed banana, bi-carb soda, milk and margarine/butter.
Stir until it is a caramel colour.
Cool mixture.
When mixture is cool, add the eggs and flour.
Mix until combined.
Place into a greased cake/loaf tin.
Bake in the oven for approx 25-30 mins or until a skewer comes out clean when inserted.
Top with your favourite Cream Cheese Icing when cooled.
12fdd3534c.pred:
To cook the mystery dish, Lynnie's Super Moist Banana Cake, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sugar, mashed banana, bicarbonate of soda, and milk. Mix well.
3. Add the margarine or butter and mix until smooth.
4. Gradually add the self-raising flour, mixing until well combined.
5. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and add them to the flour mixture, stirring until just combined.
6. Pour the mixture into a greased and floured cake pan.
7. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
8. Remove the cake from the oven and let it cool in the pan for 10 minutes. Then, transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Lynnie's Super Moist Banana Cake!

b7bd1b9a99.gt:
Combine 1 cup broth and butter in small saucepan.
Bring to boil over high heat.
Continue to boil until liquid is reduced to 1/4 cup and has a syrupy consistency, about 15-20 minutes.
Stir in cream.
Set aside.
Bring remaining 12 cups broth to a boil in Dutch oven.
Add egg noodles and celery; cook until noodles are tender.
Stir in reserved cream mixture; add chicken.
Season to taste with salt and pepper, add parsley.
Heat just to serving temperature.
Do not boil.
b7bd1b9a99.pred:
1. In a large pot, combine 13 cups of chicken broth and 4 tablespoons of butter. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat.
2. Add the whipping cream to the pot, stirring to combine. Reduce the heat to low and let the soup simmer for about 15 minutes.
3. Meanwhile, in a small bowl, mix the egg noodles with a little bit of water to make a slurry.
4. Add the noodle slurry to the soup, stirring to combine.
5. Add the celery and carrots to the pot, stirring to combine.
6. Cook the soup for about 10 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.
7. Add the diced cooked chicken to the pot, stirring to combine.
8. Stir in the poultry seasoning, parsley, salt, and pepper to taste.
9. Cook the soup for an additional 5 minutes or until the chicken is fully cooked through.
10. Serve the comforting chicken noodle soup hot, garnished with a sprinkle of parsley if desired.

[/INST]

bc714d6f9c.gt:
Heat oil in medium saucepan over medium-high heat.
Add onion; cook 2 to 3 minutes or until tender, stirring occasionally.
Add rice; cook 1 to 2 minutes more or until rice is browned lightly, stirring frequently.
Add broth, drained tomatoes, chili powder and cumin to saucepan; stir to combine.
Bring to a boil.
Cover, reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes or until liquid is absorbed.
bc714d6f9c.pred:
1. Heat the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the rice and cook, stirring constantly, until the rice is heated through and the liquid is absorbed, about 10 minutes.
4. Stir in the chicken broth, Ro*Tel, chili powder, and cumin. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let simmer for 20 minutes, or until the rice is tender and the liquid is absorbed.
5. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Serve the Spanish rice hot.

[/SYS]

02b1542927.gt:
Preheat oven to 180C/160C fan forced.
line a baking tray with baking paper.
Place thighs on a work surface, open out and generously spread tapenade inside each.
Fold fillets back into shape.
Cut pastry sheets in half.
Place chicken at one end of the sheet fold edges in, fold pastry over chicken and roll to make a neat parcel.
Pinch sides to seal.
Place, seam-side down, on a prepared tray.
Brush with egg to glaze.
Sprinkle with basil.
Bake for 25-30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and pastry is golden brown.
Serve with vegetables.
02b1542927.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the chicken thigh fillets with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
3. In a small bowl, mix the basil and parmesan tapenade.
4. Roll out the frozen butter puff pastry on a lightly floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
5. Cut out circles of pastry using a cookie cutter or a round object, such as a glass or a bowl.
6. Place a chicken thigh fillet in the center of each pastry circle.
7. Brush the edges of the pastry with the beaten egg, then fold the pastry over the chicken to form a half-moon shape.
8. Press the edges of the pastry together to seal the filling, and use a fork to crimp the edges.
9. Place the Wellingtons on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
10. Bake the Wellingtons in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the pastry is golden brown and the chicken is cooked through.
11. Remove the Wellingtons from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before serving.
12. Garnish the Wellingtons with a sprinkle of dried basil leaves.
13. Serve the Wellingtons alongside steamed green and yellow vegetables.

Enjoy your delicious and appetizing Chicken Wellingtons!

3c3d0872d0.gt:
FOR THE STEAK: In a large bowl, marinate sirloin steak in minced garlic, minced shallots, soy sauce, ginger, and the juice from the limes& lemons.
This should marinate for at least 2 hours in the refrigerator.
Over a high using a saute pan or cast iron pan, sear the sirloin on all sides until charred but not overcooked.
Place pan in a 400 degree oven until cooked.
Steak should be rare to medium rare.
Steak can be grilled also FOR THE GARNISH: In a small bowl, marinate red onions in rice vinegar, soy sauce, and the juice from the limes& lemons, then set aside.
Remove steak from refrigerator, slice very thin using a very sharp knife.
TO SERVE: On a flat plate or platter, spread out the marinated red onions evenly.
Layer sliced sirloin over the red onions.
Garnish with chopped green onions This should be served slightly chilled.
3c3d0872d0.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Season the steaks with salt and pepper on both sides.
3. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and shallots to the skillet and cook until softened, about 2 minutes.
4. Add the sirloin steaks to the skillet and cook for 4-5 minutes on each side, or until the steaks are cooked to your desired level of doneness.
5. Remove the steaks from the skillet and let them rest for a few minutes.
6. In a small bowl, whisk together the tamari soy sauce, ginger, lime juice, and rice vinegar.
7. Slice the steaks into thin pieces and serve them with the citrus ponzu sauce.

Enjoy your delicious steak tataki with citrus ponzu!

0fa7e0e5ac.gt:
In a large bowl, whip heavy whipping cream until firm peaks form.
Spoon into a separate bowl and set aside.
In the same bowl you just whipped the cream in, stir pumpkin, ricotta, sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg and vanilla together.
Scrape sides and whip 1 minute.
Carefully fold in whipped cream.
Spoon or pipe into sugar cones and top with chocolate chips and walnuts.
Serve.
0fa7e0e5ac.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the pumpkin, ricotta cheese, granulated sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, and vanilla extract. Mix until well combined.
3. Fill the sugar cones with the pumpkin mixture, dividing it evenly among the cones.
4. Bake the cones for 15-20 minutes, or until the filling is set and the edges are slightly golden.
5. Allow the cones to cool for a few minutes, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.
6. Once the cones are cooled, use a small spoon to scoop out a small amount of filling from each cone, leaving a small shell.
7. Dip the scooped-out shells into the melted chocolate chips and walnuts, coating them evenly.
8. Place the coated shells on a wire rack to set.

Enjoy your delicious Pumpkin Filled Cannoli Cones!

e81515ca45.gt:
Slice the chicken tenders diagonally into thin strips and season lightly with salt and pepper.
It's easiest to slice partially defrosted tenders.
Cut off both ends of the cucumbers and chop roughly into thin long pieces.
After 3 minutes, when the sauce thickens from the katakuriko coated on the chicken like the photo, it's done.
Heat 1 tablespoon of sesame oil in a pan over medium heat, and add the chicken tenders.
Spread out the pieces and fry.
Lightly fry both sides, add the cucumbers and stir fry for about 1 minute.
Turn up the heat to high, and add the ingredients listed under [A] (water or soup stock, vinegar, sugar, ketchup, tonkatsu sauce and salt).
Stir fry for 3 minutes while shaking the pan, being careful not to let the sauce burn.
After 3 minutes, when the sauce thickens from the katakuriko coated on the chicken like the photo above, it's done.
Doesn't it look delicious?
e81515ca45.pred:
1. In a small bowl, mix the Katakuriko with a pinch of salt and pepper.
2. In a large skillet or wok, heat some oil over medium-high heat.
3. Add the chicken tenders and cook until browned, then remove them from the pan and set aside.
4. Add the cucumbers to the pan and cook until they are slightly tender.
5. Add the Katakuriko mixture to the pan and stir to combine.
6. Pour in the water or Chinese soup, vinegar, sugar, ketchup, and Tonkatsu sauce. Stir to combine.
7. Add the cooked chicken tenders back to the pan and cook for a few minutes until the sauce is heated through.
8. Serve the Cucumber and Chicken Sweet and Sour Stir-fry over rice or noodles.

[/SYS]

2f161399c5.gt:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook and stir sausage in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease.
Stir in cream cheese.
Unroll crescent dough and separate into individual pieces; spoon 2 to 3 teaspoons sausage mixture onto each piece of dough.
Roll dough around filling.
Brush each crescent roll with egg white.
Arrange crescent rolls on a baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven until rolls are lightly browned, about 15 minutes.
2f161399c5.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the sausage, cream cheese, and egg white until well combined.
3. Unroll the crescent rolls and press them into a flat, even layer.
4. Spread the sausage mixture evenly over the crescent rolls, leaving a small border around the edges.
5. Roll the crescent rolls up, starting from the long side, and press the edges to seal.
6. Place the sausage rolls on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
7. Bake the sausage rolls for 12-15 minutes, or until golden brown.
8. Remove from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before cutting them into slices.

Enjoy your delicious Easy Sausage Rolls!

0787add592.gt:
Fry the egg and season with salt and pepper.
Add all other ingredients to a bowl and top with warm egg.
Drizzle with balsamic syrup.
0787add592.pred:
1. Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
2. In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, sliced avocado, chopped basil, and fried egg.
3. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
4. Drizzle with balsamic glaze.
5. Serve the Quinoa Breakfast Bowl with Egg, Tomatoes, and Avocado on a plate.

[/SYS]

84afda0ee0.gt:
Boil egg noodles with a pinch of salt until cooked.
Add half of the soy sauce and allow to sit
(While noodles are boiling) Cut Chicken Breast into strips
Cut all vegetables to your liking.
Heat Vegetable Oil in a deep pan and add chicken, garlic, salt and pepper.
Fry until cooked
Add vegetables and cook until cooked
Add Cooked Egg Noodles and the rest of the soy sauce plus lemon.
(I like to add a table spoon of sweet chilli sauce aswell)
Serve and Enjoy :)))
84afda0ee0.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet or wok, heat some oil over medium-high heat.
3. Add the chicken breasts and cook until browned on both sides and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add the onion, bell peppers, and spring onions. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes.
6. Add the mushrooms, garlic, and ginger to the skillet. Cook for another 3-4 minutes.
7. Add the soy sauce, lemon juice, salt, and pepper to the skillet. Stir to combine.
8. Add the cooked chicken back to the skillet and toss everything together.
9. Cook for another 2-3 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and coated the chicken and vegetables evenly.
10. Serve the chicken noodle stir fry over a bed of cooked egg noodles.

Enjoy your delicious Nessa's Chicken Noodle Stir Fry!

9001c0cfc6.gt:
FRIED POUNDED PASTE FOR BASE
in pan with oil saute pounded paste till fragrant and lightly but not burn then drain excess oil
MAKE THAI CURRY NOODLE
in pan with 1 tbsp of oil saute thai red curry paste for half minute then add fried pounded paste with water and bring to a boil
put flat udon noodle and simmer for 13 minutes and add dash of fish sauce or light soy sauce then stir often to prevent burn bottom and sauce start thickening
add tomato and off heat
serve thai curry udon noodle with eggs
9001c0cfc6.pred:
1. Bring the water to a boil in a large pot or saucepan.
2. Add the egg and cook until the egg whites are set and the yolks are still runny.
3. Add the flat udon noodle to the boiling water and cook until the noodles are soft and tender.
4. In a small bowl, mix the brown sugar and fish sauce or light soy sauce.
5. In a large skillet or wok, heat the oil over medium heat.
6. Add the pounded garlic and shallot, stirring for a few seconds.
7. Add the thai red curry paste and cook for a few minutes, stirring constantly, until fragrant.
8. Add the cooked egg and udon noodle to the skillet, stirring to combine.
9. Pour the mixture into a large bowl or a serving dish.
10. Serve the Thai Curry Udon Noodle immediately, garnished with chopped green onions and a drizzle of the brown sugar and fish sauce mixture.

[/INST]

ce8b9b020c.gt:
Preheat oven to Grill/Broil.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium high heat.
Add chicken and garlic and saute until chicken juices run clear, about 7 to 10 minutes.
Drain fat from skillet and stir in sauce.
Place chicken mixture on a cookie sheet and broil in the preheated oven for about 10 minutes, or until browned.
Let sit about 5 minutes to allow sauce to thicken.
ce8b9b020c.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the cubed chicken, minced garlic, and stir-fry sauce. Mix well to ensure the chicken is evenly coated with the sauce.
3. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil. Spread the chicken mixture evenly on the prepared baking sheet.
4. Bake the chicken in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until it is cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
5. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. Serve the cooked chicken with your choice of side dishes, such as rice, noodles, or a salad.

Enjoy your delicious Crazy Chicken meal!

df0f792c26.gt:
Open amount of cans as needed.
Usually, one 15 oz can Enchilada Sauce per two two 4 oz Cans Green Chili.
Drain green chilies, Hatch Chilies always being best but do as you can, [we save the juices for later use here] mix both and heat in microwave or on stove.
Double or triple recipe as needed.
Feel free to add fresh Cilantro or even shredded pork or chicken if you have it.
Pour this sauce over most any Mexican dish!
These are a few great Enchilada Sauce brands we enjoy here in Albuquerque that are redily available.
A tip?
Don't tell anybody how easy this sauce is.
They really won't believe you.
Enjoy!
df0f792c26.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the canned Hatch Enchilada Sauce over medium heat.
3. Add the drained green chiles and cook for about 1 minute, stirring occasionally.
4. If desired, add the ground cumin and stir to combine.
5. Pour the sauce into a baking dish or a casserole dish.
6. Place the cooked enchilada sauce in the oven and bake for about 15-20 minutes, or until the sauce is bubbly and hot.
7. Serve the sauce over tortillas or as a topping for your favorite dish.

Enjoy your delicious 1 Minute Green Chile Enchilada Sauce!

bcb4dcacc0.gt:
Place all ingredients into your slowcooker.
Stir lightly.
Place lid on and cook on low for 6-8 hours or high for about 3 1/2 hours or until your potatoes and carrots are tender.
If using stovetop, just bring everything to a boil, reduce heat, cover and simmer for about 45 minutes or until veggies are tender.
bcb4dcacc0.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot or Dutch oven, cook the onion, carrot, and green bell pepper over medium heat until the vegetables are tender.
3. Add the chopped sweet and sour sauerkraut, and cook for a few minutes until it starts to release its juices.
4. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute.
5. Add the turkey kielbasa (or ham) and cook until it is browned and cooked through.
6. Add the diced tart apple and cook for a few minutes until it starts to soften.
7. Add the crushed pineapple and chicken broth, and bring the mixture to a boil.
8. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for about 30 minutes or until the sauerkraut is tender and the sauce has thickened.
9. Season the stew with salt, pepper, and caraway seed, if needed, to taste.
10. Serve the Sweet and Sour Sauerkraut Kielbasa Stew hot, garnished with a dollop of sour cream if desired.

[/INST]

8a8c406a8c.gt:
Cook pasta as directed, adding vegetables to the boiling water for the last 2 minutes of the pasta cooking time.
Meanwhile, Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet.
Add meat; cook 4 minutes or until browned on all sides, stirring occasionally.
Stir in dressing and teriyaki sauce; cook 2 minutes or until sauce is thickened, stirring occasionally.
Drain pasta mixture; Place in a large serving bowl.
Add meat mixture; toss to coat.
8a8c406a8c.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cook the linguine according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
3. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium-high heat. Add the beef strips and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes. Remove the beef from the skillet and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, add the broccoli florets and carrots. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5-7 minutes.
5. In a small bowl, whisk together the asian toasted sesame dressing and teriyaki sauce.
6. Add the cooked beef to the skillet with the vegetables, and toss everything together.
7. Combine the cooked linguine and the beef and vegetable mixture in a large bowl.
8. Serve the Asian Beef Noodle Bowl immediately, and enjoy!

[/INST]

f7b38ff708.gt:
Place all ingredients except melted butter in the pan of your bread machine according to manufacturer's directions.
Select dough cycle.
Check dough after 5 minutes mixing and add 1 to 2 tablespoons of water (or more) if needed.
When cycle is complete, remove dough to a lightly floured board and punch down.
Divide dough in half and roll each half to 3/4" thickness.
Cut with a 2 1/2" round biscuit cutter and place on greased baking sheet.
Brush tops with melted butter, cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled (about 1 hour).
Bake at 350 for 10 to 15 minutes or until lightly browned.
f7b38ff708.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece, follow these instructions:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the warm milk, egg, and melted butter.
2. Add the sugar, salt, and bread flour to the mixture, stirring until smooth.
3. Add the active dry yeast to the mixture, stirring until it is fully incorporated.
4. Knead the dough until it becomes smooth and elastic, then cover the bowl with a clean cloth and let it rise in a warm place for about 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.
5. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
6. Punch down the dough, then transfer it to a lightly floured surface.
7. Roll out the dough into a large rectangle, then cut it into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
8. Place the shaped dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Allow the buns to rise for about 20-30 minutes, or until they have doubled in size.
10. Bake the buns in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
11. Remove the buns from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

By following these instructions, you can recreate the delicious soft sandwich buns seen in the image.

3d6a127178.gt:
Combine the ingredients and mix well.
Add the chikuwa sticks and coat.
Pour about 1 cm of oil in a pan, then evenly fry the chikuwa until crisp.
Sprinkle with black pepper while hot.
I recommend wrapping them halfway in parchment paper and munching on them as finger food.
3d6a127178.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the Katakuriko, curry powder, and parsley.
3. Cut the chikuwa into bite-sized pieces.
4. In a large bowl, mix the chicken, curry powder mixture, water, and black pepper.
5. Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat.
6. Add the chicken mixture to the skillet and cook until the chicken is fully cooked through.
7. Transfer the cooked chicken to a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the breading is crispy.
8. Serve the chicken with the seasoned chikuwa sticks on the side.

Enjoy your delicious and appetizing meal!

064e7af1db.gt:
Preheat an indoor grill, and coat with cooking spray.
Place the chicken strips on the grill, and cook for about 7 minutes.
Allow them to cool slightly, then cut into cubes.
While the chicken is cooking, heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Place the onion rings in the skillet, and cook for a few minutes.
Add the red and yellow pepper, baby corn, and the stir-fry vegetables.
Increase the heat to medium-high; cook and stir for about 15 minutes.
Sprinkle in the sugar and salt.
Stir in the chicken.
Dissolve the cornstarch in water, and pour into the skillet along with the soy sauce.
Cook and stir until the sauce thickens.
064e7af1db.pred:
To cook the Chinese Happy Family dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large skillet or wok, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the sliced onion and cook until softened, about 2-3 minutes.
2. Add the chicken strips and cook until browned, about 5-7 minutes.
3. Add the red and yellow bell peppers and cook until they are tender, about 3-5 minutes.
4. Add the baby corn and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.
5. In a small bowl, mix the white sugar, cornstarch, and soy sauce. Pour the mixture into the skillet with the chicken and vegetables. Stir to combine.
6. Cook the mixture over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the sauce thickens and coats the chicken and vegetables evenly. This should take about 2-3 minutes.
7. Serve the Chinese Happy Family dish over rice or noodles, and enjoy!

[/INST]

5351aea004.gt:
Bring 1/2 cup sugar, the mint leaves, and 1/2 cup water to a boil in a medium saucepan.
Remove from the heat and steep for 20 minutes.
Strain the liquid through a fine sieve into a small bowl.
Press the leaves to extract all juices.
Cool to room temperature.
Pour the Pimm's No.
1, lime juice, and the reserved mint syrup into a medium pitcher; stir to combine and chill for at least 1 hour.
Mix the remaining 2 tablespoons of sugar and the lime zest together and spread out a 1/4-inch-thick layer on a small plate.
Rub the rims of six 8-ounce glasses with a lime wedge and dip the rims in the sugar mixture.
Fill each glass about halfway with ice cubes and one of the lime wedges.
Divide the Pimm's mixture among the prepared glasses.
Top off each glass with 1/3 cup ginger beer and a splash of seltzer.
Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint and serve immediately.
5351aea004.pred:
To cook the Minty Pimm's Cup, follow these steps:

1. In a saucepan, combine the sugar, sugar, and mint leaves. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the sugar has dissolved.
2. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
3. Add the Pimm's No. 1, lime juice, lime zest, and lime to the saucepan. Stir to combine.
4. Pour the mixture into a tall glass filled with ice.
5. Top the glass with ginger beer.
6. Stir the mixture well and enjoy your Minty Pimm's Cup.

This recipe is simple and easy to follow, allowing you to enjoy a refreshing and delicious Minty Pimm's Cup.

4378df82b0.gt:
Heat the oil in a skillet, then coat the steak with flour and brown in the oil.
Remove the steak from the skillet and drain.
Place the potatoes, carrots and onion in the bottom of the Crock-Pot.
Place the steak on top of the vegetables and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Pour the tomatoes and tomato sauce over the meat.
Cover; cook on Low for 10 hours or on High for 6 hours.
4378df82b0.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 300°F (150°C).
2. In a large skillet or Dutch oven, heat the oil over medium-high heat.
3. Add the beef and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Remove the beef from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add the flour and cook, stirring constantly, until the mixture is smooth and bubbly.
6. Gradually add the beef broth, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens.
7. Return the beef to the skillet and stir to combine.
8. Cover the skillet and place it in the preheated oven.
9. Bake for 1 1/2 to 2 hours, or until the beef is tender and the sauce is bubbly and thickened.
10. Remove the skillet from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
11. Carefully transfer the beef and sauce to a large, oven-safe casserole dish.
12. Add the potatoes, onions, and carrots around the beef.
13. Pour the canned tomatoes and tomato sauce over the top of the casserole.
14. Cover the casserole with aluminum foil and bake for 1 1/2 to 2 hours, or until the vegetables are tender and the meat is cooked through.
15. Remove the casserole from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

[/SYS]

e8c76f1472.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Combine macaroni, 1-1/2 cups of the cheddar cheese, the spinach, tomatoes and Parmesan cheese in large bowl; set aside.
Heat oil in medium saucepan on low heat 1 min.
Add onions; cook 2 to 3 min.
or until crisp-tender.
Add flour; mix well.
Cook 2 min., stirring constantly.
Gradually add milk, stirring until well blended after each addition.
Increase heat to medium.
Bring to boil; cook 2 to 3 min.
or until thickened, stirring constantly.
Add to macaroni mixture; toss to coat.
Spoon into 1-1/2-qt.-casserole dish sprayed with cooking spray; sprinkle with remaining Cheddar cheese.
Bake 20 min.
or until heated through.
e8c76f1472.pred:
[/SYS]

[INST]
1. Cook the pasta according to package directions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
2. In a large saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the onions and cook until softened, about 3 minutes.
3. Add the flour and cook, stirring constantly, for 1 minute. Gradually add the milk, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens.
4. Add the cooked pasta, spinach, and tomato to the saucepan. Stir to combine.
5. Reduce the heat to low and simmer the mixture for 5 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the sauce is smooth and creamy.
6. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Serve the macaroni and cheese immediately.

[/SYS]

[/INST]

660f4fdb1a.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degree F. Grease a 13x9x2-inch baking pan; set aside.
In a medium mixing bowl beat cream cheese with an electric mixer until fluffy.
Beat in 1/4 cup sugar; fold in lemon yogurt and lemon peel.
Set aside.
In a large mixing bowl stir together 3 cups flour, 1 cup sugar, baking powder, salt and nutmeg or mace.
Cut in the 1 cup butter until mixture resembles fine crumbs.
Combine eggs, milk and almond extract.
Add to flour mixture, mixing until blended.
Spread half of the batter in the prepared pan.
Spoon the cream cheese mixture over the batter.
Spoon the remaining batter in small mounds over the cream cheese mixture, spreading out as much as possible.
Combine the 1/2 cup sugar and 1/2 cup flour; cut in the 1/4 cup butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Stir in pecans or almonds.
Sprinkle nut mixture over batter in pan.
Bake for 45 to 55 minutes or until cake is golden andtoothpick inserted in dough mounds comes out clean (do not test in filling).
Cool on wire rack at least 45 minutes before serving.
Chill to store.
660f4fdb1a.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour a 9-inch round cake pan.
2. In a large bowl, cream the softened cream cheese and sugar until smooth. Add the lemon yogurt and mix well.
3. Add the lemon peel, flour, baking powder, salt, and nutmeg or mace. Mix until well combined.
4. Add the eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition. Stir in the milk and almond extract.
5. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan.
6. Bake for 35-40 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
7. Cool the cake in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
8. While the cake is cooling, prepare the glaze. In a small bowl, mix the powdered sugar and lemon juice until smooth.
9. Once the cake is completely cooled, drizzle the glaze over the top.
10. Sprinkle the chopped pecans or sliced almonds on top of the glaze.

Enjoy your delicious Lemon Cream Coffee Cake!

de0bb5ab55.gt:
Preheat the oven to 200 degrees Celsius or 375 degrees Fahrenheit.
Soak the bread in the milk for 1 minute; squeeze dry.
Combine the bread, sausage meat, raw egg, parsley, nutmeg, salt and pepper.
Mix well.
Lightly oil a 12 cup muffin tray; line each cup with a slice of bacon.
Cover with a layer of sausage mixture; add a hard boiled egg, pointy end up.
Enclose the egg completely with more sausage meat mixture.
Bake uncovered for 20 minutes or until cooked through.
de0bb5ab55.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the ground sausage, egg, and parsley. Mix well.
3. Shape the mixture into small balls, about the size of a walnut.
4. Roll the balls in the ground nutmeg and a pinch of salt and pepper.
5. Dip each ball in the milk and then roll it in the bread crumbs.
6. Place the breaded balls on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
7. Bake the balls in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until golden brown.
8. While the balls are baking, prepare the bacon. Cook the bacon in a pan until crispy.
9. Once the balls are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
10. Carefully crack the hard-boiled eggs and place them on top of the cooled balls.
11. Return the dish to the oven and bake for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the egg whites are set and the yolks are cooked to your desired level of doneness.
12. Serve the Scotch Eggs, Baked Not Fried! hot.

[/INST]

723ad517a6.gt:
Preheat oven to 350.
Mix sugar, margarine and eggs until blended.
Add water and bananas.
Beat 30 seconds.
Stir in the rest of the ingredients until just moistened.
Pour into greased 9 inch loaf pan.
Bake for 55-60 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
Remove from oven and let stand for 5 minutes.
Use a knife to loosen the loaf from the pan and remove loaf.
Finish cooling on a cooling rack.
723ad517a6.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sugar, margarine, eggs, and mashed bananas.
3. Add the water, flour, baking soda, salt, and baking powder to the bowl. Mix until well combined.
4. Pour the batter into a greased and floured loaf pan.
5. Bake the bread for 1 hour and 15 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean.
6. Allow the bread to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then remove it from the pan and let it cool completely on a wire rack.
7. Enjoy your homemade Mom's Banana Bread!

5c278f764a.gt: Stir mayonnaise, salad dressing, relish, vinegar, sugar, lemon juice, and paprika together in a small bowl until smooth.
5c278f764a.pred:
To make the burger sauce, first, combine the mayonnaise, French salad dressing, relish, vinegar, white sugar, lemon juice, and paprika in a small bowl. Mix well to ensure that all ingredients are evenly distributed. If the sauce is too thick, you can add a bit more mayonnaise or French salad dressing to achieve the desired consistency.

Once the sauce is well-blended, you can use it to enhance the flavor of your burger. Simply spread a small amount of the sauce on the top half of the burger bun, then place the cooked burger on top. This will add a delicious and tangy touch to your burger, making it even more enjoyable to eat.

Feel free to experiment with different ingredients or seasonings to create your own unique burger sauce. The key is to find the perfect balance of flavors to suit your taste preferences.

2fe8920d7b.gt:
Mix the one cup plus the two tablespoons of wheat gluten, oat flour, salt and soy protein powder in a large bowl.
You want to sift and combine the ingredients well.
I put mine in the bowl of my stand mixer and used the whisk to sift them together.
Heat the silk creamer to slightly warm and then add the warm water and egg, mixing well as you add the egg so it doesn't cook.
Add the oil to the bottom of the bread machine.
Then add into that your cream, water and egg mixture.
Carefully add the flour mixture to it floats on the top of the liquid.
I sprinkled some of it on top so it wouldn't go into the liquid, then I slowly spooned the rest on top.
Sprinkle the yeast packet evenly on top of the flour mixture.
Set according to your bread machine instructions.
I have a Breadman and I used setting 7 which is a 59 minute cycle.
It has only one rising and is perfect for this bread.
Cool completely on a metal rack.
Bon Appetit.
2fe8920d7b.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the warm water and soy coffee creamer.
2. Add the vegetable oil and stir to combine.
3. Gradually add the liquid egg substitute, stirring constantly to prevent lumps.
4. Add the sea salt and vital wheat gluten, stirring to combine.
5. Gradually add the oat flour, stirring to combine.
6. Add the powdered soy protein concentrate and stir to combine.
7. Add the fast rising yeast, stirring to combine.
8. Mix the dough until it reaches the desired consistency.
9. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
10. Grease a loaf pan with cooking spray or oil.
11. Pour the dough into the prepared loaf pan.
12. Bake the bread for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean.
13. Remove the bread from the oven and let it cool in the pan for 10 minutes.
14. Remove the bread from the pan and let it cool completely on a wire rack.

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
Please let me know if you have any questions or need further assistance.

c53f241c68.gt:
In a large bowl, dissolve yeast in water.
Add the flours, and salt.
Stir until well blended.
The dough should be shaggy and sticky.
Let rise overnight, at least 12-18 hours, for best results.
Flour a work surface.
Fold dough over itself once or twice.
Place the dough, seam side down, on a floured kitchen towel.
Cover with another floured kitchen towel.Let the dough rise at room temperature for 1-2 hours.
Preheat the oven 20 minutes before the dough is ready to 475 degrees.
Put the dutch oven into the oven.
When dough is ready, take out the dutch oven, and then using the kitchen towels, flip the dough into the pot, seam side up.
Shake the pot if the dough loses it's shape.
Cover and bake for 30 minutes.
Uncover and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the dough is turned golden brown.
Cool on a wire rack, and enjoy!
c53f241c68.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the dry active yeast, warm water, and sugar. Allow the mixture to sit for about 10 minutes, or until the yeast is foamy.
2. Add the whole wheat flour, white flour, and salt to the bowl. Mix the ingredients together until they form a shaggy dough.
3. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic, about 5-10 minutes.
4. Place the dough in a lightly oiled bowl, cover it with a clean cloth, and let it rise in a warm place until it has doubled in size, about 1-2 hours.
5. Preheat your oven to 450°F (232°C).
6. Punch down the dough, and transfer it to a lightly oiled baking sheet or Dutch oven.
7. Shape the dough into a round or oblong shape, and let it rise again for about 30 minutes.

b372aab674.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Bring 3/4 cup of water to boil and add the raisins.
When the water returns to a boil turn off the heat.
Let the raisins plump for at least 10 minutes.
Drain the raisins well, then chop them coarsely.
Toast the sesame seeds by stirring them with a wooden spoon in a heavy saute pan over medium heat.
Saute until the seeds begin to crackle, pop and smell toasted; about 10 minutes.
Combine rice flour, oats, salt and toasted sesame seeds.
Stir apple juice, oil and vanilla into the flour mixture.
Form the dough into 8 large balls.
Place each ball on greased cookie sheets or parchment paper.
Moisten your fingers and flatten each ball until it is 1/2 inch thick.
Bake 25 minutes or until golden brown.
Let cool on pans before removing.

4. If the dough is too dry, add a little more water. If it's too sticky, add a little more flour.
5. On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
6. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a knife.
7. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown around the edges.
9. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

85a7242daa.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. If making cupcakes, line about 30 muffin tins with paper liners (for cake, grease and line with parchment paper three 9-inch round cake pans).
In a medium-sized bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt.
In the bowl of your electric mixer, beat eggs and sugar until thick and creamy (about 2 minutes).
Blend in vanilla, oil and sour cream.
Add flour mixture and milk, alternating adding a little of each at a time, starting and finishing with flour.
Pour into your muffin tins filling each about 2/3 full.
Bake cupcakes 18-19 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center of a cupcake comes out clean.
For cakes, divide batter evenly among the three cake pans and bake for 25-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
Frost with your frosting of choice.
I have made this with vanilla buttercream (classic combo), with lemon cream cheese frosting, with strawberry buttercream, with chocolate buttercream, with magical frosting, with Swiss meringue buttercreamthey are delicious no matter what you top them with!
Much thanks for this recipe to my neighbor and friend, Lauren McIntyre!

9. Once the cupcakes are cooled, frost them with the prepared frosting.
10. Enjoy your delicious vanilla cupcake!

Take the thawed roast, and cut several slits into (2-3 inches long) into it with a knife.
Put the thawed roast in a large crockpot.
Put the sliced onion, the coriander and the garlic cloves in the pot with the roast.
Fill the crockpot with water as close to the top of the roast as you can.
Add the four bouillion cubes to the water.
Cook at low (10 hours).
After 10 hours, turn the crockpot to warm, and remove the roast.
Strain out the onions, garlic, and coriander, and put them back in the crockpot.
Discard the water/broth.
Shred (or cut up in small pieces)the roast and put it back in the crockpot.
Stir in the cayenne, paprika, and black pepper, along with the lime juice.
Allow it to sit for ten minutes.
Put the barbecue sauce in with the roast, stirring to coat.
Allow it to sit for at least 20 minutes (the longer it sits, the better it is) and then eat!

11. Spread the barbecue sauce on the top half of the buns or rolls, and place the pork on the bottom half.
12. Serve the Spicy Chili Lime Barbecue Sandwiches immediately.
