f4cc4e5f98.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 225°F (107°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the sliced garlic, red pepper flakes, salt, brown sugar, and cayenne pepper.
3. Add the elk lean cuts to the bowl and toss to coat the meat evenly with the marinade.
4. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
5. Remove the elk from the marinade and pat it dry with paper towels.
6. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the elk and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes.
7. Remove the elk from the skillet and set it aside.
8. Add the water to the skillet and bring it to a boil. Add the Worcestershire sauce, red wine vinegar, and salt.
9. Reduce the heat to low and simmer the sauce for about 15-20 minutes, or until it thickens slightly.
10. Return the elk to the skillet and cook it in the sauce until it is cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
11. Remove the elk from the skillet and let it rest for a few minutes.
12. Cut the elk into thin strips and serve it over the sauce.

[/INST]

32186ea03f.gt:
In a large skillet, cook the beef, onion and garlic over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain.
Stir in the water, tomato paste, parsley, salt, mint if desired, cinnamon and pepper.
Set aside.
For sauce, melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
Stir in flour until smooth; gradually add milk.
Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
Remove from the heat.
Stir a small amount of hot mixture into eggs; return all to the pan, stirring constantly.
Add the Parmesan cheese and salt.
Place half of the potato slices in a greased shallow 3-qt.
baking dish.
Top with half of the Parmesan sauce and all of the meat mixture.
Arrange the remaining potatoes over meat mixture; top with the remaining Parmesan sauce.
Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 1 hour or until potatoes are tender.
Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.
32186ea03f.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef and onion over medium heat until the beef is browned and the onion is softened.
3. Add the garlic and cook for an additional minute.
4. Pour in the water and tomato paste, and bring to a boil.
5. Reduce the heat to low, cover the skillet, and simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the beef is tender and the liquid has thickened.
6. Meanwhile, in a large mixing bowl, combine the sliced potatoes, butter, flour, milk, eggs, and cinnamon. Season with salt and pepper.
7. Pour the beef mixture over the potato mixture, and stir to combine.
8. Transfer the mixture to a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
9. Sprinkle the top with grated parmesan cheese.
10. Bake for about 45 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender and the dish is bubbly.
11. Remove from the oven, let it rest for a few minutes, and then cut into squares.

Enjoy your delicious Beef -N- Potato Moussaka!

46aa69285e.gt:
Add oil to pot.
Over medium heat, saute chicken, season with salt, cook until no longer pink.
About 3-4 minutes.
Remove chicken from pot, set aside.
In the mean time, in a food processor, make a flavor paste.
Combine tomatillos, green chilies and jalapeno and blend until thick & smooth.
May need to make 2 batches.
Add more oil if desired, add onions and garlic, saute until tender, about 5 minutes.
Careful not to burn the garlic.
Add chicken back to pot.
Add cumin and coriander.
Stir.
Add the flavor paste, green chilies, chicken broth and beans to the cooked chicken pieces.
Simmer for at least 45 minutes or until desired thickness is achieved.
I prefer to simmer longer, for up to 2 hours.
Top with cilantro at serving.
Serve with warm torn flour tortillas or crispy tortilla chips.
46aa69285e.pred:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes. Remove the chicken from the pot and set aside.

2. In the same pot, add the onion and garlic. Cook until the onion is softened, about 3-4 minutes.

3. Add the tomatillos, jalapeno, and green chilies to the pot. Cook for about 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender.

4. Add the chicken back to the pot, along with the cumin, coriander, chicken broth, and beans. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 25-30 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.

5. Stir in the fresh cilantro and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.

6. Serve the chicken tomatillo chili over a bed of rice or with crushed tortilla chips, and top with shredded cheddar cheese if desired.

[/INST]

8e653646ce.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 and line a cookie tray with grease proof paper.
Grate cheese, dice onions and slice ham.
Cover pastry with sauce, cheese, onions and ham.
Roll pastry (like a swiss roll) and cut into 12 rolls.
Place on tray.
Cook 10-20 minutes.
8e653646ce.pred:
To cook the pizza rolls, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Roll out the puff pastry on a lightly floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
3. Spread a thin layer of pizza sauce or tomato paste evenly over the pastry, leaving a small border around the edges.
4. Add your choice of ham or salami slices, onion slices, and cheese evenly over the sauce.
5. Fold the pastry over the filling, pressing the edges to seal the filling inside.
6. Place the pizza rolls on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
7. Bake the pizza rolls in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the pastry is golden brown and the filling is hot and bubbly.
8. Serve the pizza rolls warm, and enjoy!

Remember to use proper cooking utensils and techniques to ensure the safety and quality of the dish.

3d70024e0a.gt:
Combine pancake mix, cinnamon and nutmeg in a bowl.
Add water and pumpkin mix and stir until smooth (add more water as necessary to make thinner pancakes).
Add raisins and stir (If you are making pumpkin faces, place raisins on moist batter as soon as you pour your batter on the griddle).
Spray griddle lightly with cooking spray.
Pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake onto hot griddle
Turn pancakes when edges are cooked and small bubbles start to form.
Turn only once.
3d70024e0a.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the pancake mix, water, and canned pumpkin. Mix until smooth.
3. Add the cinnamon, nutmeg, and raisins to the mixture. Stir to combine.
4. Heat a nonstick skillet or griddle over medium heat.
5. Pour a small amount of the batter onto the skillet or griddle, using a spoon or ladle. Cook until the edges start to curl and the pancake is slightly browned, then flip it over and cook the other side.
6. Repeat with the remaining batter, spacing the pancakes evenly on the skillet or griddle.
7. Place the pancakes on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the pancakes are cooked through.
8. Serve the pumpkin pancakes warm, and enjoy!

[/INST]

2b4cfb961c.gt:
Put all the ingredient in a slow cooker and mix thoroughly.
Cover and cook on high until apples are tender, about 3 hours.
The yummy salted-cinnamon-vanilla-caramel sauce that coats the apples will thicken slightly upon cooling.
Cook uncovered for a thicker sauce.
My conversion to feed a crowd of 40: I quadrupled the recipe and cooked it in my 18-quart electric roaster set to 300 degrees F for about 2 hours, stirring occasionally.
I used a mix of apples: galas, golden delicious, golden supreme, and Nittany.
Any apple that keeps its shape during baking will work well.
2b4cfb961c.pred:
1. Preheat your slow cooker on low heat setting.
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the diced apples, dark brown sugar, melted butter, ground cinnamon, kosher salt, and nutmeg. Mix well to ensure the apples are evenly coated.
3. Spread the apple mixture evenly over the bottom of the slow cooker.
4. Cover the slow cooker with a lid and cook on low heat for 4-6 hours, or until the apples are tender and caramelized.
5. Remove the lid and stir the apples to ensure they are evenly cooked.
6. If the apples are not yet caramelized to your liking, you can continue to cook them for a few more minutes.
7. Once the apples are cooked to your desired level of caramelization, remove the slow cooker from heat and let it rest for a few minutes.
8. Serve the caramelized apples immediately, or let them cool and store them in an airtight container for later use.

[/INST]

e3d298ee57.gt:
Put the chopped pepper in a silicone steamer and microwave for 30 seconds at 700w.
Add the sugar, sesame and soy sauce.
Mix it all and you are done!
e3d298ee57.pred:
1. Preheat the steamer and set it up with a steaming basket.
2. Wash and peel the green pepper, then cut it into bite-sized pieces.
3. In a small bowl, mix the ground sesame seeds, sugar, and soy sauce.
4. Place the green pepper pieces in the steaming basket and pour the sesame dressing mixture over them.
5. Steam the pepper pieces for about 5-7 minutes, or until they are tender and cooked through.
6. Remove the pepper pieces from the steamer and serve them immediately.

This recipe is a simple and delicious way to enjoy bell peppers with a flavorful sesame dressing. The steaming process ensures that the vegetables maintain their natural texture and nutrients, while the sesame dressing adds a rich, savory taste.

010fbf4e3f.gt:
Shell (leave the tail on) the hrimp and devein.
Heat a skillet on medium heat.
Add butter and garlic.
When it starts to smell garlicky, add shrimp and stir until it turns pink.
Add zucchini, saute and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
When it's cooked, pour the soy sauce over.
Remove from the heat, and sprinkle with chives.
Squeeze over lemon juice if you like!
With rice!
it was Yummy~
010fbf4e3f.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the shrimp, butter, minced garlic, zucchini, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
3. Place the mixture on a baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the shrimp is cooked through and the zucchini is tender.
4. While the shrimp is cooking, prepare the sauce by combining the soy sauce, lemon juice, and a pinch of salt and pepper in a small bowl.
5. Remove the cooked shrimp and zucchini from the oven and set aside.
6. In a small saucepan, heat the sauce over medium heat until it reaches a simmer.
7. Add the cooked shrimp and zucchini to the saucepan and stir to combine.
8. Serve the soy sauce shrimp scampi immediately, garnished with a sprinkle of freshly grated parmesan cheese, if desired.

[/INST]

4d14636daa.gt:
Bake potatoes at 375 degrees F for 1 hour or until done.
When cool enough to handle, cut a thin slice off the top.
Scoop out pulp, leaving a thin shell.
In a medium size bowl, mix together milk, egg, potato, mayonnaise, and 1/2 cup of cheese, salt, and pepper.
Spoon into potato shells.
Top with remaining cheese and crumbled bacon.
Bake for 25 to 30 minutes, or until heated through.
4d14636daa.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Wash the baking potatoes and pat them dry with a paper towel.
3. Poke the potatoes with a fork several times to create small holes.
4. Place the potatoes on a baking sheet and bake them in the preheated oven for 45-50 minutes or until they are soft and cooked through.
5. While the potatoes are baking, prepare the cheesy topping. In a large mixing bowl, combine the beaten egg, milk, mayonnaise, shredded cheddar cheese, salt, and pepper. Mix well to combine.
6. Once the potatoes are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. Using a fork, carefully scoop out the potato flesh, leaving a small amount of potato on the skin.
8. Place the potato flesh in a large mixing bowl and add the cheesy topping. Mix well to combine.
9. Fill the potato shells with the cheesy filling and return the filled potatoes to the oven. Bake for an additional 10-15 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Remove the potatoes from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
11. Serve the cheesy baked potatoes hot, garnished with crumbled bacon if desired.

Enjoy your delicious cheesy baked potatoes!

a897ca5462.gt:
Pre-heat the oven to 350F.
Mix all the ingredients for the crust together and press into a pizza pan, about 14 inches round.
Bake for 8-10 minutes.
Meanwhile, make the topping by mixing the cream cheese, white sugar and vanilla together.
When the pizza crust is cool, spread the topping evenly over it.
Slice up your choice of fruits and lay them on top of the pizza.
Make the glaze by mixing the corn starch, juices and sugar together in a saucepan and heating over a medium heat until thick.
You may have to stir it occasionally.
Pour over the topped pizza.
Let sit for five minutes and serve.
a897ca5462.pred:
[/SYS]

[INST] <<SYS>>
To make a fruit pizza, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the flour and mix until well combined.
4. Stir in the cream cheese, white sugar, vanilla, and lemon juice until well combined.
5. Gradually add the cornstarch, mixing until smooth.
6. Fold in the sliced mixed fruit.
7. Spread the mixture onto a baking sheet or pizza stone.
8. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is set.
9. Allow the fruit pizza to cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your delicious fruit pizza!
<</SYS>>

[/SYS]

8c03aee630.gt:
Whisk together lime zest and juice, butter, oil, sugar, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper in a large bowl.
Wash quinoa in 3 changes of cold water in a bowl, draining in a sieve each time.
Cook quinoa in a medium pot of boiling salted water (1 tablespoon salt for 2 quarts water), uncovered, until almost tender, about 10 minutes.
Drain in sieve, then set sieve in same pot with 1 inch of simmering water (water should not touch bottom of sieve).
Cover quinoa with a folded kitchen towel, then cover sieve with a lid (don't worry if lid doesn't fit tightly) and steam over medium heat until tender, fluffy, and dry, about 10 minutes.
Remove pot from heat and remove lid.
Let stand, still covered with towel, 5 minutes.
Add quinoa to dressing and toss until dressing is absorbed, then stir in remaining ingredients and salt and pepper to taste.
8c03aee630.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the grated lime zest, fresh lime juice, melted and cooled butter, vegetable oil, and sugar. Whisk until well combined.
3. Add the quinoa to the bowl, and toss to coat the quinoa evenly with the dressing.
4. Spread the quinoa mixture evenly on a baking sheet or a lined baking sheet. Roast the quinoa in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the quinoa is tender and slightly crispy on the edges.
5. While the quinoa is cooking, prepare the black beans and tomatoes. In a large bowl, combine the black beans, rinsed and drained, with the diced tomatoes.
6. In a small bowl, mix the chopped scallions with the chopped cilantro.
7. Once the quinoa is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Add the cooked quinoa to the bowl with the black beans and tomatoes. Stir to combine.
9. Serve the Black-Bean & Tomato Quinoa immediately, garnished with the cilantro-scallion mixture.

Enjoy your delicious and healthy meal!

163e13f061.gt:
Pre heat over @ 350-375 place cut up butter on the of the pan
Cut up the cauliflower and place in bowl add all ingredients and mix up .. Add any extra to taste
Place in pan and then in the oven for about 20-30 mins until its golden brown.. Stir once or twice to mix in the melted butter ..
Enjoy!
163e13f061.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Rinse the cauliflower and pat it dry with a paper towel.
3. Cut the cauliflower into florets, and remove the stem and leaves.
4. In a small bowl, mix the 1 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp adobo, 1 tbsp garlic powder, 1 black pepper, and 1 crushed pepper.
5. Toss the cauliflower florets in the olive oil mixture to coat evenly.
6. Spread the cauliflower florets on a baking sheet, and roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the cauliflower is tender and slightly browned.
7. Remove the cauliflower from the oven, and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious baked cauliflower!

df3852f109.gt:
preheat the oven to 350F.
For the fruits: Dice the peaches and place in a large bowl.
Add the lemon zest, lemon juice, 1/2 sugar, and 1/4 flour.
Toss well.
Gently mix in the blueberries.
Allow the mixture to sit for 5 minutes.
Spoon mixture in a 8x11 baking dish.
For the crumble: combine 2 cups four, 2/3 cup sugar, 1/2 cup light brown sugar, 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, and 2 sticks of salted butter in a bowl.
Mix the ingredients with an electric mixer.
Mix until the butter is the size of a peas.
Rub the mixture with your fingertips until it's in big crumbles, then sprinkle evenly over the fruit mixture.
bake for 45 to 60 minutes, until the tips are brown and crisp and the juices are bubbly.
Serve warm or room temperature.
df3852f109.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the grated lemon zest, freshly squeezed lemon juice, sugar, and flour. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the diced butter to the mixture and continue to mix until the butter is fully incorporated and the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the blueberries, sugar, light brown sugar, ground cinnamon, and lemon zest. Mix until well combined.
5. Transfer the blueberry mixture to a 9x9 inch baking dish.
6. Pour the crumble mixture over the blueberry mixture, ensuring that it is evenly distributed.
7. Bake the crumble in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes, or until the crumble is golden brown and the fruit is bubbly and cooked through.
8. Remove the crumble from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Blueberries and Peach Crumble!

ff131d2047.gt:
Preheat oven to 425F.
Trim tips from asparagus, and chop stalks into 1/4-inch pieces.
Stir together flour, sugar, baking powder and salt in large bowl.
Cut butter into small pieces.
Using fingers, rub butter into flour mixture until mixture resembles coarse meal.
Stir in 3/4 cup buttermilk.
Fold in cheese, asparagus pieces (but not tips), cayenne and pepper.
Turn dough onto floured work surface, and knead 6 or 7 times.
Shape dough into 1/2-inch-thick rectangle.
Using sharp knife, cut rectangle lengthwise into three strips.
Cut each strip into triangles.
Place triangles on greased baking sheet.
Brush scones with remaining buttermilk, then press 2 or 3 asparagus tips into tops.
Bake 12 to 15 minutes, or until tops are golden brown.
ff131d2047.pred:
To recreate the asparagus scones, follow these steps:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the steamed asparagus, all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, salt, and cayenne pepper.
3. Add the margarine or shortening and mix until the dough comes together.
4. Gradually add the buttermilk or soymilk, mixing until the dough is moistened.
5. Fold in the grated cheddar cheese or soy cheddar cheese.
6. Turn the dough out onto a floured surface and knead it a few times to form a smooth, elastic dough.
7. Pat the dough into a 1/2-inch (1.5 cm) thick disk.
8. Cut the dough into 8 equal pieces.
9. Place the scones on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
10. Bake the scones for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
11. Remove the scones from the oven and let them cool on a wire rack for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious asparagus scones!

d9c04f21ab.gt:
Add the Bombay Sapphire, lemon juice and caster sugar to a short glass / tumbler and stir.
Fill the glass with crushed ice.
Drizzle the berry liqueur over the top and watch it 'marble' through the drink.
Top up with more crushed ice and garnish with 1 blackberry and a wedge of fresh lemon.
d9c04f21ab.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:
1. In a cocktail shaker, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well to combine the ingredients.
2. Add the Chambord or creme de cassis to the shaker, and shake again to combine.
3. Add the blackberry to the shaker, and shake to combine the fruit with the other ingredients.
4. Strain the mixture into a glass filled with crushed ice.
5. Garnish the drink with a lemon wedge, and serve immediately.

This cocktail is a refreshing and delicious combination of gin, lemon, and raspberry flavors, with the addition of blackberry for a touch of natural sweetness. Enjoy your Bombay Sapphire Bramble!

a2917226da.gt:
Place the tofu on a heat-resistant dish (preferably a deep dish) and cut into 6 pieces.
Of course you don't need to cut it at all.
Top with kimchi.
Cut the pork into easy to eat pieces and place on top of the kimchi.
Lightly cover with plastic wrap and microwave at 500 W for 3 minutes.
Since the meat doesn't cook completely through very easily, turn the meat over after about 2 minutes.
Once the pork has cooked through, pour in the sesame oil, soy sauce, and optionally garnish with green onion to finish.
a2917226da.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:
1. Cut the tofu into bite-sized pieces and set aside.
2. Cut the pork belly into thin strips or scraps.
3. In a microwave-safe bowl, combine the tofu, pork belly, kimchi, sesame oil, and soy sauce.
4. Microwave the mixture on high for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the tofu is cooked through and the pork belly is heated through.
5. If desired, add green onions for garnish.
6. Serve the meal immediately.

This meal is a quick and easy way to enjoy a delicious and healthy dish using ingredients that are readily available in most kitchens. The combination of tofu, pork belly, and kimchi creates a flavorful and satisfying meal that can be enjoyed by people with different dietary preferences.

aab95edcba.gt:
Pre heat oven to 160*C.
Peal and grated spuds.
Drain by pressing paper towel- as much water out as you can.
Add egg yolks, onion powder, paprika, garlic salt, oregano and pepper.
Mix and scoop onto cutlets to coat.
Shallow fry on med heat until golden brown both sides (2 or 3 mins a side) and finish in oven for 5 minutes.
Sea salt to taste- serve with lemon wedge, spicy sour cream and salad.
For cream, use some sour cream with horseradish - or Dijon.
Maybe some fresh chopped chives or parsley.. Whatever you like.
Bloody ripper of a dish.
Little bit of prep (I suggest you buy your lamb pre-frenched!)
but absolutely delicious.
Enjoy!
aab95edcba.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Peel and slice the Desiree potatoes into thin rounds.
3. In a large bowl, mix together the sliced potatoes, egg yolk, onion powder, sweet paprika, dried oregano, garlic salt, and cracked black pepper. Season with sea salt flakes to taste.
4. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil. Spread the potato mixture evenly on the prepared baking sheet.
5. Bake the potato mixture in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until the potatoes are golden brown and crispy on the outside and cooked through on the inside.
6. While the potatoes are baking, heat the sunflower oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Season the lamb cutlets with salt and pepper. Add the lamb cutlets to the frying pan and cook until they are browned on both sides and cooked through.
7. Once the potatoes are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
8. In a small bowl, mix together the spicy sour cream and lemon wedges.
9. Assemble the dish by placing the cooked potatoes on a serving plate. Top the potatoes with the cooked lamb cutlets. Serve the dish with the spicy sour cream on the side.

Enjoy your delicious Frenched Lamb Cutlets with Rosti Crust!

723f2696fa.gt:
Preheat the broiler and position a rack 6 inches from the heat.
In a food processor, combine the ricotta with the 2 tablespoons of honey and puree until very smooth.
Arrange the figs cut side up on a rimmed baking sheet.
Dollop 2 teaspoons of the ricotta puree on each fig and lightly drizzle with honey.
Broil for about 2 minutes, until just browned in spots and the ricotta is barely melted; serve warm or at room temperature.
723f2696fa.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the ricotta with the honey until smooth and well combined.
3. Place the figs on a baking sheet and drizzle the honey-ricotta mixture over them.
4. Roast the figs in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
5. Remove the figs from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
6. Serve the honey-broiled figs with ricotta as a side dish or a dessert.

Enjoy your delicious and healthy meal!

80aeb71b2a.gt:
Heat oil in 10-inch nonstick skillet over medium heat.
Cook tomatoes and garlic in oil 5 to 7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until tomatoes are tender; reduce heat to low.
Stir in chives, basil, sour cream and mayonnaise.
Cook 2 to 3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until sauce is hot.
Meanwhile, heat spaetzle as directed on package.
Add hot spaetzle to skillet; toss to coat with sauce.
80aeb71b2a.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the sliced tomatoes and cook until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
3. Add the garlic and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, until fragrant.
4. Add the chopped chives and basil leaves to the skillet, stirring to combine.
5. Pour the sour cream and mayonnaise or salad dressing into the skillet, stirring to combine.
6. Season the sauce with salt and pepper to taste.
7. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked spaetzle noodles and the sauce mixture.
8. Transfer the spaetzle mixture to a baking dish and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the spaetzle is golden brown and the sauce is bubbly and slightly thickened.
9. Serve the spaetzle in Herbed Tomato Cream Sauce hot, garnished with additional chopped chives and basil leaves if desired.

[/INST]

c3f6522e48.gt:
Pour the rum and pineapple juice into a cocktail mixing cup, and stir to combine.
Gently pour the strawberry soda into the mixture, pouring down the side of the mixing cup to prevent the soda from going flat.
Slowly tilt the mixing cup back and forth a few times to mix; pour into cocktail glasses.
c3f6522e48.pred:
To cook the Pink Crush, you will need to follow these steps:
1. In a blender, combine the coconut flavored rum, pineapple juice, and strawberry-flavored soda. Blend until smooth and well-mixed.
2. Pour the mixture into a large bowl.
3. Add ice to the bowl, and stir gently to combine.
4. Serve the Pink Crush immediately, as it is best enjoyed chilled.

By following these steps, you will be able to create a delicious Pink Crush drink that combines the flavors of coconut, pineapple, and strawberry.

bac8cfe474.gt:
Microwave peanut butter and chocolate in large microwaveable bowl on HIGH 1-1/2 min.
; stir until chocolate is completely melted and mixture is well blended.
Add cereal; toss to evenly coat.
Spread into single layer on waxed paper-covered baking sheets; separate cereal pieces.
Cool completely.
Transfer cereal mixture to clean brown paper bag or large resealable plastic bag.
Add sugar; close bag.
Shake gently to evenly coat cereal mixture with sugar.
bac8cfe474.pred:
To cook the Puppy Chow, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 300°F (150°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the creamy peanut butter, chocolate, and powdered sugar. Mix until smooth and well combined.
3. Add the oven-toasted rice cereal squares to the bowl and mix until well coated with the chocolate mixture.
4. Spread the mixture onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
5. Bake the mixture in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the chocolate is melted and the cereal squares are toasted and slightly crispy.
6. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the mixture cool for a few minutes.
7. Once cooled, use a spatula to transfer the mixture to a large mixing bowl.
8. Add any desired mix-ins, such as nuts, dried fruits, or marshmallows, and mix until well combined.
9. Store the Puppy Chow in an airtight container or bag for up to a week.

Enjoy your homemade Puppy Chow!

df787a9219.gt:
Heat oil in a large cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat.
Add onions and saute until browned in spots, 3 to 5 minutes.
Add sweet potato and cook, stirring, until it starts to brown in spots, 5 to 7 minutes.
Stir in garlic, jalapeno, cumin and salt; saute until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
Add water and cook, scraping up any browned bits, until liquid is absorbed, 3 to 5 minutes.
Stir in corn and black beans and cook until heated through.
Stir in cilantro and season with salt and pepper.
Serve with lime wedges.
Good rolled in a tortilla with sour cream and cheddar cheese.
df787a9219.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet or oven-safe pan, heat the canola oil over medium heat. Add the onions and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the sweet potato, garlic, jalapeno, and cumin to the skillet. Cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. Add the water, corn, and black beans to the skillet. Bring to a simmer, then cover and cook in the oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the sweet potato is tender and the corn is cooked through.

6fc30c421c.gt:
Place all the ingredients in a blender and blend until it becomes smooth and creamy.
If its too thick, dilute with water.
Infuse love and enjoy with any salads you can think of.
6fc30c421c.pred:
To make the vegan creamy pear and macadamia nut salad dressing, follow these steps:

1. In a blender or food processor, combine the diced pear, macadamia nuts, and extra virgin olive oil.
2. Add the vinegar and a pinch of salt to the blender or food processor.
3. Blend the ingredients until they are well combined and creamy.
4. Taste the dressing and adjust the seasoning, if necessary, to achieve the desired flavor.
5. Serve the dressing over the salad of your choice.

This vegan creamy pear and macadamia nut salad dressing is a delicious and healthy addition to any salad. The pear adds natural sweetness and a touch of freshness, while the macadamia nuts provide a rich, nutty flavor. The extra virgin olive oil adds a healthy fat component, and the vinegar adds a tangy, refreshing taste. The combination of these ingredients creates a satisfying and satisfying dressing that can elevate any salad.

1d1371bb0c.gt:
Use a large Korean pumpkin.
I used 1/2 this time, and it weighed about 500 g.
Wash the Korean pumpkin very well, cut into half and scoop out the seeds and pith cleanly with a spoon.
Slice about 5 mm thick without peeling.
Finely chop the garlic and green chili peppers.
If you touch the chili peppers with your bare hand, it will hurt as if you got burned, so I recommend wearing disposable gloves.
Put the sesame oil, garlic and green chili peppers in a frying pan and stir fry.
When the pan is very fragrant, add the sliced Korean pumpkin.
Stir fry well.
It will cook quite fast.
When the pumpkin slices are translucent, season with salt and pepper and Dashida.
Adjust the amount of Dashida to taste.
Done!
It's delicious when freshly made or chilled!
1d1371bb0c.pred:
[/SYS]

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Clean the Korean pumpkin and cut it into small, bite-sized pieces.
3. In a large bowl, mix the Korean pumpkin pieces with the sesame oil.
4. Add the hot green chili peppers, minced garlic, beef dashida, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Mix well.
5. Spread the mixture evenly on a baking sheet or a large roasting pan.
6. Roast the pumpkin mixture in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the pumpkin is tender and slightly caramelized.
7. Remove the pumpkin mixture from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Serve the Korean pumpkin Namul hot, as a side dish or a main course.

Enjoy your delicious Korean pumpkin Namul!

c79defe8f0.gt:
Prepare the potatoes by cutting each into wedges lengthwise about 8 wedges for each potatoes.
Place in a bowl with ice cubes and add water to cover.
Place in fridge for at least 45 minutes.
Drain and pat with paper towels to dry.
Melt butter with minced garlic salt and pepper.
I usually use a cast iron skillet, but any oven-proof pan will do.
Pour butter over potatoes in skillet, the butter mixture will stick because the potatoes are so cold!
Bake in a 425 degree oven about 25 minutes.
Broasted!
c79defe8f0.pred:
[/SYS]

[INST]
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Wash the potatoes and pat them dry.
3. Cut the potatoes into evenly sized pieces, leaving the skin on.
4. In a large mixing bowl, toss the potatoes with the minced garlic, salt, and pepper.
5. Spread the potatoes evenly on a baking sheet, and roast in the preheated oven for 45-50 minutes, or until they are tender and golden brown.
6. Remove the potatoes from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. Meanwhile, place the ice cube in a blender or food processor.
8. Add the butter to the blender or food processor, and blend until the butter is creamy and smooth.
9. Carefully transfer the butter mixture to a small saucepan.
10. Place the saucepan over medium heat, and cook the butter mixture, stirring constantly, until it reaches a temperature of 110°F (43°C).
11. Carefully pour the hot butter mixture over the cooled potatoes.
12. Toss the potatoes gently to coat them evenly with the melted butter.
13. Serve the potatoes immediately.

[/SYS]

[/INST]

8a42a2a009.gt:
On 1 slice of bread, spread a light layer of sweet and spicy mustard.
Meanwhile, preheat oven to 325 degrees F. Lay the pieces of oven-roasted turkey on the mustard side of the bread; then add the roasted red peppers and top with the smoked provolone.
Put the sandwich on a baking tray in the oven and cook for 3-4 minutes (until the cheese just starts to melt).
Remove from oven and put on a piece of red leaf lettuce and go!
8a42a2a009.pred:
<</SYS>>

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Cut the Foccacia bread into 4 equal pieces.
3. Spread 1 tablespoon of Sweet and Spicy Mustard on each piece of Foccacia bread.
4. Place the slices of Oven Roasted Turkey on top of the mustard-covered Foccacia bread.
5. Add 3 pieces of Roasted Red Peppers on top of the turkey.
6. Place 4 slices of Smoked Provolone cheese on top of the red peppers.
7. Add a piece of Red Leaf Lettuce on top of the cheese.
8. Place the Foccacia bread with the toppings on a baking sheet.
9. Bake the Foccacia bread in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Serve the Turkey with Smoked Provolone, Roasted Red Peppers on Foccacia immediately.

<</SYS>>

This recipe card provides clear instructions for preparing a delicious and visually appealing dish using the ingredients provided in the image. The dish features a combination of flavors and textures, with the Foccacia bread providing a crispy base, the turkey offering a savory and tender meat, the roasted red peppers adding a sweet and spicy kick, and the smoked provolone cheese providing a creamy and rich element. The red leaf lettuce adds a touch of freshness and color to the dish.

31160ca4d7.gt:
Break broccoli into florets & roughly chop any tough stems.
Set aside 2 sml florets for garnish.
Melt butter in a lrg pan & cook the onion & leek till soft, but not caramelized.
Add broccoli & potato, then pour in the stock.
Cover & simmer for 15-20 min, till tender.
Allow to cool slightly, then puree the soup in a blender or food proc.
(I will use my immersion blender for this).
Return soup to the pan.
Add milk + cream, season w/salt & pepper to taste pref & reheat gently.
At the last moment, add Stilton cheese & stir soup till the cheese just melts.
DO NOT BOIL.
Cut reserved broccoli florets into thin slices.
Ladle soup into warmed bowls & garnish w/sliced broccoli & freshly ground black pepper.
Serve immediately.
31160ca4d7.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the onion and leek, and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the broccoli florets and cook until they are tender but still crisp, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Add the chicken stock, milk, cream, and Stilton cheese to the pot. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the soup is heated through.
5. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Serve the soup hot, garnished with a sprinkle of freshly grated black pepper, if desired.

[/INST]

9fe712e539.gt:
For the blueberry sauce: Place blueberries,sugar, vanilla extract, and cinnamon stick in a small saucepan over medium heat.
Cover and mix every couple of minutes.
Once blueberries soften and liquid starts to release from them, add flour and mix together.
Cover again and reduce to low heat.
The sauce will be done once blueberries are softened and you have a slightly thick sauce.
Remove cinnamon stick before spooning onto pancakes.
For the pancakes: Sift together flour, sugar, salt, and baking powder in a medium bowl.
Add almond milk, melted coconut oil, vanilla extract, and mashed banana.
Stir.
Dont worry if there are clumps in your batter, thats normal!
Spray some cooking spray on a preheated griddle or frying pan.
Using a 1/4 cup measuring cup, measure batter and pour onto griddle.
Cook until bubbles start to form and flip pancake.
Cook another minute or two until brown on both sides.
Serve warm with syrup and blueberry sauce!
9fe712e539.pred:
[INSTRUCTIONS]
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the dry ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, and cinnamon.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the wet ingredients: almond breeze, coconut oil, mashed banana, vanilla extract, and vanilla unsweetened almond breeze.
4. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
5. Pour the batter onto a well-greased or non-stick pan, and cook for about 5 minutes or until the edges are set and the center is still a bit gooey.
6. Flip the pancakes and cook for another 2-3 minutes or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
7. Serve the pancakes with a dollop of fresh blueberry sauce on top.

[/INSTRUCTIONS]

[/SYS]

86511b0045.gt:
Heat oven to 375 degrees F.
Brown meat with onions in large ovenproof skillet; drain.
Return to skillet.
Whisk eggs and milk until blended.
Add to meat mixture along with the VELVEETA and relish; mix well.
Bake 20 to 25 min.
or until knife inserted in center comes out clean.
Top with tomatoes and lettuce.
86511b0045.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until it is browned and cooked through. Drain any excess fat.
3. Add the onions and cook until they are soft and translucent.
4. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, VELVEETA, and chopped tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Pour the egg mixture over the ground beef in the skillet. Cook over medium heat until the eggs are set and the edges are slightly crispy.
6. Transfer the frittata to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the center is set and the edges are slightly golden.
7. Serve the VELVEETA Cheeseburger Frittata hot, garnished with shredded lettuce.

[/INST]

0ac257a346.gt:
In large plastic bag, mix flour and salt.
Add flounder fillets and shake to coat with flour mixture.
In nonstick 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat, in 1 tablespoon hot salad oil, cook 2 flounder fillets 6 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork, turning fillets once with pancake turner.
Remove fillets to platter.
Repeat with remaining fillets.
Meanwhile, in small saucepan, heat sweet and sour cabbage.
To serve, with slotted spoon, spoon half of cabbage over fillets; top with diced cucumber.
Serve with remaining cabbage.
0ac257a346.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the flour, salt, and pepper.
3. Dip the flounder fillets in the beaten egg, then coat them with the flour mixture.
4. Heat the salad oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the flounder fillets and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
5. Remove the fillets from the skillet and set aside.
6. In a small bowl, mix the sweet and sour red cabbage, cucumber, and a splash of salad oil.
7. Place the cooked flounder fillets on a serving plate.
8. Serve the flounder with the sweet and sour cabbage and cucumber mixture on the side.

Enjoy your delicious meal!

a7b0ef58c0.gt:
1.
Combine first 4 ingredients in a medium bowl.
Combine rind and next 3 ingredients (through pepper) in a small bowl.
Gently stir lime mixture into fruit mixture; cover and chill.2.
Just before serving, stir 1/4 cup coconut into pineapple mixture.
Sprinkle with 1/4 cup coconut.
a7b0ef58c0.pred:
To cook the pineapple and orange salad with toasted coconut, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the orange sections, pomegranate arils, kiwifruit, and pineapple.
3. In a separate small bowl, mix the grated lime rind, fresh lime juice, fresh orange juice, and red pepper flakes.
4. Pour the dressing over the fruit mixture and toss to coat evenly.
5. Spread the coconut evenly on a baking sheet and toast it in the preheated oven for about 5-7 minutes, or until golden brown.
6. Remove the coconut from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Add the toasted coconut to the fruit mixture and toss to combine.
8. Serve the pineapple and orange salad immediately, or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving.

Enjoy your delicious pineapple and orange salad with toasted coconut!

c79e2e0b30.gt:
Stir together chopped eggplants, onions, 1/4 cup olive oil and salt to taste in a large roasting pan, then roast the mixture on the second-lowest oven rack at 425 degrees for about 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add in zucchini, bell peppers and 2 tablespoons oil and more salt; return to oven and roast for another 20-25 minutes or until the bell peppers are tender.
Meanwhile, while veggies are roasting in the oven (or you can prepare this hours in advance also) in a large saucepan, simmer the chopped tomatoes, garlic, thyme and remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil and bit more salt to taste; simmer about 15 minutes, stirring occasionally until thickened.
Remove the roasting pan and stir in the tomato mixture into the roasting pan.
Add in about 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese; stir to combine, and season with black pepper and more salt if needed; set the roasting pan aside.
Cook the pasta in a large pot of boiling water seasoned with about 1 tablespoon salt; cook until JUST firm-tender; drain.
While the pasta is cooking, stir in fresh parsley and basil to the veggies in the roasting pan; mix to combine.
Add in the cooked drained pasta to about 1/3 of the veggie mixture; toss to combine.
Spread the remaining cooked pasta on a large serving dish and top with remaining ratatouille on top.
Sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese.
c79e2e0b30.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large oven-safe skillet or baking dish, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
3. Add the eggplant, onions, and garlic to the skillet and cook until the onions are softened and the eggplant is slightly browned.
4. Add the zucchini, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper (or red and yellow peppers), and tomatoes to the skillet. Cook for about 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender.
5. Season the vegetables with salt, pepper, and thyme.
6. Add the pasta to the skillet, stirring to combine with the vegetables.
7. Pour the pasta mixture into a large baking dish.
8. Sprinkle the top with grated parmesan cheese.
9. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the pasta is cooked through and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Remove the dish from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes.
11. Serve the Ratatouille Pasta hot, garnished with fresh parsley and basil.

Enjoy your delicious Ratatouille Pasta!

cbda115173.gt:
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook and stir ground beef and onion in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease.
Mix chili sauce, ketchup, water, pickle relish, brown sugar, and mustard into the ground beef mixture; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer until flavors are blended, about 15 minutes.
cbda115173.pred:
To cook the mystery dish, Silvia's Sloppy Joes, follow these steps:

1. In a large skillet or pot, cook the ground beef over medium heat until it is browned and no longer pink.
2. Add the diced onion and cook until it is softened.
3. Pour in the chili sauce, ketchup, water, sweet pickle relish, brown sugar, and yellow mustard. Stir to combine.
4. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Serve the Sloppy Joes over a bed of rice or noodles, and enjoy!

Remember to use proper cooking techniques and utensils to ensure the safety and quality of the food.

e4f7383aea.gt:
Place onions in skillet with bacon grease and cook until limp.
Add chuck and stir until pink has gone from meat.
Add tomatoes, rice, chili powder, salt, and pepper.
Put in casserole and top with bread crumbs.
Cook about 45 minutes at 350 degrees.
e4f7383aea.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet or oven-safe pan, cook the ground chuck over medium heat until it is browned and cooked through. Drain any excess fat.
3. Add the chopped onions to the skillet and cook until they are soft and translucent.
4. Add the canned tomatoes, cooked rice, chili powder, salt, and black pepper to the skillet. Stir to combine.
5. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 25-30 minutes or until the rice is cooked through and the mixture is hot and bubbly.

The Texas Hash is a delicious and hearty dish that combines ground chuck, cooked rice, onions, tomatoes, chili powder, salt, and black pepper. This dish is perfect for a comforting meal or a satisfying side dish.

68e304f2da.gt:
Spread muffin halves with sauce; top with cheese.
Place on microwaveable plate.
Microwave on HIGH 30 to 40 sec.
or until cheese is melted.
68e304f2da.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Place the English muffin on a baking sheet or pizza stone.
3. Spread a thin layer of Classico di Napoli Tomato & Basil Pasta Sauce on the toasted English muffin.
4. Sprinkle 1/2 cup of Touch of Philadelphia Shredded Creamy Mozza Cheese on top of the sauce.
5. Place the baking sheet or pizza stone in the preheated oven and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
6. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Slice the pizza into equal portions and serve.

Enjoy your delicious English Muffin Pizzas!

6a4602be69.gt:
Mix all ingredients until smooth.
With a teaspoon, make little heaps (walnut-sized) on a floured and greased cookie sheet.
Bake at 300 degrees for 6-8 minutes.
You can also place 1/2 of a pecan on each cookie while still warm.
6a4602be69.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the egg and vanilla, and mix until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking chocolate squares, and chopped pecans.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until a dough forms.
6. Roll the dough into small balls and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
7. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are set and slightly golden around the edges.
8. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/SYS]

d899465f16.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees .
Spray 2 loaf pans with baking spray (oil + flour)I use Bakers Joy in the blue can.
In a large bowl, add your mushy bananas, white sugar and melted butter.
Use a fork to mash them all together.
Dont worry about the banana lumps, its all good!
Add eggs and mix with a fork to combine.
Add all the dry ingredients and mix with a large spoon or spatula to combine (no need to break out the mixer for this one!).
Now add your sour cream and vanilla.
Divide mixture between your 2 loaf pans.
(Its ok that it only fills them each 1/2 way upthis loaf will rise!
I made the mistake once of putting all the batter in one pan.
Total overflow to the max!)
For the streusel topping, combine brown sugar, white sugar and cinnamon in a small bowl.
Sprinkle generously on top of each unbaked loaf.
Bake at 325 degrees for about an hour (check after 50 minutes in case your oven runs hot), until a toothpick inserted in center of the loaf comes out clean.
This banana bread is so moist and flavorful, youll never look back!
d899465f16.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the melted butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the flour, baking soda, salt, nutmeg, cinnamon, and ground cinnamon to the bowl. Mix until the dry ingredients are well combined.
4. Gently fold in the sour cream and white sugar.
5. Add the bananas to the batter, making sure they are well coated.
6. Pour the batter into a greased and floured loaf pan.
7. Bake the banana bread for about 1 hour, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
8. Allow the banana bread to cool in the pan for 10 minutes before removing it from the pan and allowing it to cool completely on a wire rack.

Enjoy your delicious extra special banana bread!

794b47fa63.gt:
Saute onions in a small amount of oil until translucent.
Add garlic and ginger and saute until fragrant.
Add the rest of the ingredients except the prawns.
Bring to a boil.
Turn down the heat and add the prawns.
Simmer until the prawns turn pink and are cooked through.
794b47fa63.pred:
To cook the Finger-Lickin' Prawns, follow these steps:

1. In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onions and garlic, and cook until the onions are translucent.
2. Add the minced ginger and chili powder, and cook for a few seconds.
3. Pour in the canned tomato paste, cayenne, and coconut milk. Stir to combine.
4. Add the sugar, salt, and pepper, and stir to combine.
5. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then add the prawns. Cook for 3-4 minutes or until the prawns are cooked through.
6. Remove the prawns from the pot and set aside.
7. In a small bowl, mix the cornstarch with a little water to form a slurry.
8. Return the prawns to the pot, and stir in the cornstarch mixture. Cook for 1-2 minutes or until the sauce thickens.
9. Serve the Finger-Lickin' Prawns over rice or noodles, and enjoy!

Remember to use proper cooking techniques and utensils to ensure the dish is safe and delicious.

b1e11bd33e.gt:
Toss zucchini and salt together in a large colander and place in sink to drain for 10 minutes.
Put zucchini in the middle of a piece of cheesecloth; wrap cheesecloth around zucchini and squeeze to drain as much moisture from zucchini as possible.
Mix flour, Parmesan cheese, egg, garlic, kosher salt, and pepper together in a large bowl.
Stir in zucchini.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Scoop batter by the tablespoon into the hot skillet and fry until golden brown, about 2 minutes per side.
b1e11bd33e.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the zucchini, salt, flour, Parmesan cheese, egg, garlic, and season with kosher salt and ground black pepper to taste. Mix well.
3. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Scoop the zucchini mixture by the spoonful and shape into small patties. Carefully place the patties into the hot skillet and cook until golden brown on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side.
4. Transfer the fritters to a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until cooked through and golden brown.
5. Serve the fritters warm, as a side dish or a main course, accompanied by your favorite dipping sauce.

[/INST]

f1113a39b1.gt:
put bread on plate and spread mustard on all 4 pieces
put pan on stove n heat on medium , spray pay with cooking spray then put in bologna one at a time and it will bubble up like a hat , press down with a spatula then turn over and continue doing the same thing .
put bologna on the bread prepared with mustard and put the cheese on that make another piece of bologna and put on top of cheese then top with the other slice of bread
make other sandwich the same way then eat with your favorite beverage
f1113a39b1.pred:

1. Preheat a frying pan or skillet on medium heat.
2. Place the 4 slices of bologna in the pan, and cook until they are browned and slightly crispy.
3. Remove the cooked bologna from the pan and set aside.

This recipe is simple and easy to follow, providing a delicious and satisfying meal.

a1302a9a8e.gt:
In a large saucepan, combine the chicken broth and whipping cream.
Bring to a boil.
Add the grits, and return to boiling.
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer 5-7 minutes.
Add the cheese, stirring until melted.
Allow to sit for about 10 minutes.
Serve.
a1302a9a8e.pred:
1. In a large saucepan, combine the chicken broth, whipping cream, and grits. Bring to a boil over medium heat, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
2. While the grits cook, preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
3. In a small bowl, mix the shredded cheddar cheese with a pinch of salt and pepper.
4. Once the grits are cooked and creamy, stir in the shredded cheese until melted and well combined.
5. Transfer the grits to a baking dish and bake for about 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
6. Serve the creamy cheese grits immediately, and enjoy!

[/SYS]

6e7daaa7a7.gt:
In large bowl, mix ground beef, bread crumbs, and onion soup mix.
Form into meatballs.
Place in 9x13" pan.
In saucepan, combine chili sauce, cranberry sauce, sauerkraut, brown sugar and water.
Simmer over low heat till mixed.
Pour over meatballs.
Bake at 325 for 2 hours.

1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the ground beef, breadcrumbs, onion soup mix, chili sauce, cranberry sauce, sauerkraut, brown sugar, and water until well combined.
3. Shape the mixture into small balls and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.

5. Serve the Crazy Meatballs with your favorite dipping sauce, such as ketchup or a spicy barbecue sauce.

[/INST]

df687bb6ec.gt:
Spray a 9x14 casserole dish with cooking spray.
Place the chicken in the casserole dish.
Mix all remaining ingredients in a bowl.
Pour over chicken breasts in dish.
Bake at 350 degrees (F) for 30 minutes.
Serve with potatoes or egg noodles.
df687bb6ec.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
3. In a large skillet, cook the bacon over medium heat until crispy. Remove the bacon from the skillet and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, cook the chopped onion and mushrooms until the onion is translucent.
5. Add the sun dried tomatoes and cook for a few more minutes.
6. Pour in the cream of mushroom soup and stir to combine.

9. Pour the sauce mixture over the chicken breasts in the skillet.

[/INST]

0213dcf418.gt:
Heat non stick skillet.
Tear a circle out of the center of bread.
Spread a very, very thin layer of mayo to both sides of bread.
Place the bread in the skillet; add a very small amount of butter in the hole.
Crack the egg into the hole in the bread.
Cook egg till set and bread is browned turn over and brown the other side and egg is done to your desire.
Salt and pepper to taste and enjoy!
J.R. liked to put a little maple syrup on his.
You can also toast the holes you tear out of the bread in the pan while egg is cooking and serve on the side.
0213dcf418.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cut the bread into small cubes and place them in a large mixing bowl.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg and add the melted butter. Whisk until the egg is well-incorporated.
4. Add the mayonnaise to the egg mixture and whisk until well-combined.
5. Pour the egg mixture over the bread cubes and toss to coat evenly.
6. Transfer the bread mixture to a greased baking dish and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and the mixture is set.
7. Serve the dish hot and enjoy!

[/INST]

b305dd0b36.gt:
Combine and store in an air-tight container.
Notes: To make taco meat, brown 1 lb ground beef in skillet; drain.
Add seasoning mix and 3/4 cup of water.
Bring to a boil then reduce heat.
Simmer uncovered, 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
b305dd0b36.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the all-purpose flour, cornstarch, dried onion flakes, beef bouillon granules, garlic salt, ground cumin, paprika, chili powder, onion salt, cayenne pepper, and granulated sugar.
3. Spread the mixture evenly on a baking sheet or a silicone mat.
4. Place the baking sheet or silicone mat in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the mixture is golden brown and crispy.
5. Remove the baking sheet or silicone mat from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. Once the mixture is cool, crumble it into small pieces.
7. To prepare the taco seasoning, combine the crumbled mixture with 1 tablespoon of water in a small bowl.
8. Use the taco seasoning to season your taco filling, as desired.

This homemade taco seasoning can be used to add flavor to your taco filling, making it a delicious and budget-friendly alternative to purchasing store-bought taco seasoning.

e3cdb21cdf.gt:
In a large pot with boiling salted water cook spaghetti pasta until al dente.
Drain.
Meanwhile, in a large skillet heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add onion, garlic, basil, sliced mushrooms, and chopped tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes.
Stir in California-style vegetables, salt, and ground black pepper.
Cook for approximately 10 minutes, stirring often, until vegetables are tender and crisp.
Pour vegetable mixture over cooked and drained pasta.
Toss well.
Sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese and serve.
e3cdb21cdf.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:
1. Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
2. In a large skillet or pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and sauté for about 1 minute, or until fragrant.
3. Add the sliced mushrooms and sauté for an additional 3-5 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly browned.
4. Add the sliced onion and sauté for 2-3 minutes, or until it becomes translucent.
5. Add the stewed tomatoes, frozen mixed vegetables, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Stir to combine.
6. Cook the mixture for 5-7 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the sauce has thickened slightly.
7. Drain the cooked spaghetti and add it to the skillet with the vegetable mixture. Stir to combine.
8. Add the chopped fresh basil and Parmesan cheese. Stir to combine.
9. Serve the California Primavera immediately, garnished with additional fresh basil if desired.

Enjoy your delicious California Primavera meal!

0ce6309a49.gt:
Preheat the oven broiler.
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
Add linguine, and cook for 9 to 13 minutes or until al dente; drain.
Brush the mushrooms with 1/2 the olive oil, and arrange on a medium baking sheet.
Broil in the prepared oven 6 to 8 minutes, turning frequently, until browned and tender.
Cut the mushrooms into 1/4 inch slices, and place in a medium bowl.
Mix with the remaining olive oil, red wine vinegar, oregano, basil, rosemary, garlic, and lemon juice.
Season with salt and pepper.
In a large bowl, toss together cooked linguine and the mushroom mixture.
0ce6309a49.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Clean and trim the mushrooms, then cut them into bite-sized pieces.
3. In a large skillet or oven-safe pan, heat the extra virgin olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, until fragrant.
4. Add the mushroom pieces to the skillet and cook for about 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until they are tender and slightly browned.
5. Add the red wine vinegar, oregano, basil, rosemary, and salt and pepper to taste. Cook for another 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally.
6. Cook the linguine according to the package instructions, usually boiling for about 8-10 minutes, then drain and set aside.
7. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked linguine with the mushroom mixture.
8. Transfer the mixture to a large baking dish, and top it with lemon juice.
9. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 15-20 minutes, or until the pasta is cooked through and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Serve the dish immediately, and enjoy your delicious linguine with portobello mushrooms.

6a751b3cb8.gt:
Crumble the tofu and chop the vegetables.
You can also use other vegetables you like, such as spinach, kale, bell pepper, black olives, broccoli, onion.
Put a little splash of extra virgin olive oil in a pan on medium heat and saute mushrooms and asparagus (or whatever veggies you are using that take a little longer to cook).
Once they are cooked and starting to brown, set aside for a few minutes.
Add a little more oil to the pan to prevent the tofu from sticking.
Add tofu crumbles, and start with 1 teaspoon ground turmeric, adding more if needed.
Mix together until turmeric is evenly dispersed and tofu is a nice yellow egg-y color.
Add cheese shreds and nutritional yeast (adds more cheesiness) to the tofu and mix until cheese starts to melt.
Add all veggies to the pan, including sauteed mushrooms and asparagus.
Gently mix in salt, pepper, and garlic powder to taste.
6a751b3cb8.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they are tender, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the chopped asparagus and cook for an additional 3 minutes.
4. Add the sliced tomato and cook for 2 minutes.
5. Add the tofu and cook for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally, until it is browned and slightly crispy.
6. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
7. Add the grated turmeric, salt, and pepper to taste. Cook for 1 minute more.
8. Add the Daiya cheese shreds and cook until the cheese is melted and the tofu is well-coated.
9. Add the nutritional yeast and stir to combine.
10. Serve the cheesy veggie tofu scramble immediately, over a bed of cooked quinoa or brown rice.

Enjoy your delicious and healthy veggie tofu scramble!

ef00415f9c.gt:
Wash the rice and leave for 30 minutes.
This is 900 g of asari clams with shells.
Steam the clams in sake and remove the meat from the shells.
Save the soup left behind from steaming the clams.
Refer to steps 6 - 9 to find out how to steam the clams with sake.
Add the washed rice to the rice cooker, along with the soup we took in step 3, cooking sake and soy sauce.
Fill with water until you reach the 2 cups mark (or however much liquid you would normally use for the amount of rice you want), and cook the rice.
Once the rice has cooked, add the clam meat and let them steam for a while.
How to steam clams: Add the asari clams to a frying pan, pour over some cooking sake, put on the lid, and steam-cook on a low-medium heat.
If you overcook the clams the meat will shrink so take them off the heat as soon as they start to open up.
This is how they look when they're opened.
Take a look at this related recipe too Fukagawa Don (Rice bowl).
ef00415f9c.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:
1. Rinse the clams thoroughly under cold running water to remove any dirt or sand.
2. In a large pot, combine the uncooked white rice and water. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cover the pot. Cook the rice until it is fully cooked and the water has been absorbed. This should take around 15-20 minutes.
3. While the rice is cooking, prepare the clams. Remove the clams from their shells and discard any that are open or damaged. Rinse the clams under cold running water and pat them dry with a paper towel.
4. In a small bowl, mix the cooking sake and soy sauce.
5. In a large skillet or wok, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for a few seconds until fragrant.
6. Add the clams to the skillet, stirring to coat them evenly with the garlic oil. Cook the clams until they open, which should take around 3-5 minutes.
7. Once the clams are open, add the cooking sake and soy sauce mixture to the skillet. Stir to combine and cook for another minute or until the sauce has thickened slightly.
8. Remove the clams from the skillet and place them on a plate.
9. Fluff the cooked rice with a fork and serve it alongside the clams.

Enjoy your delicious Asari Clam Rice!

ea93239d44.gt:
In a 3 cup or larger bowl, whisk the 1st 8 ingredients to combine.
Gradually add olive oil in a stream & whisk to combine well.
Add salt & pepper to taste & refrigerate for 24 hrs to allow flavors to blend.
NOTE: I use a wide-mouth jar w/screw-on lid + my immersion blender to make & store this in a single step.
TO SERVE: Simplicity is the most-favored presentation - as a bruschetta-type appy where 1/2-in slices of baguette bread are spread w/cream cheese, topped w/very thinly sliced smoked salmon & then this sauce is spread over the salmon slices.
A few tiny capers can be centered as an opt garnish.
HINT: For never fail perfect slicing of smoked salmon, freeze the salmon to a near frozen state & use your sharpest knife to shave slices of desired thickness.
ea93239d44.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix together the honey, brown sugar, Dijon mustard, prepared mustard, lemon juice, minced fresh dill, coriander, and sour cream. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Add the olive oil to the bowl and mix everything together until well combined.
4. Place the mixture in a large, oven-safe dish and bake for about 30-40 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and the mixture is bubbly.
5. Serve the gravlaxsosa hot, and enjoy!

6ec14869d3.gt:
In a nonstick pan over medium heat, heat the oil.
Saute the garlic until soft; add the bell pepper, rosemary, and 1 tablespoon of parsley and saute 5 minutes longer.
Add the tomatoes; bring to a boil then reduce the heat and simmer, stir frequently for 10 minutes.
Add the chickpeas and cook, stirring occasionally, until heated through (5 minutes).
Stir in the ditalini, cheese and remaining parsley.
Top with a little more shredded cheese.
6ec14869d3.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
3. Add the red bell pepper and cook until it is slightly softened, about 2 minutes.
4. Add the minced rosemary and parsley, and cook for another minute.
5. Pour in the canned diced tomatoes and chickpeas, and stir to combine.
6. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then cover and cook for about 15 minutes, or until the chickpeas are tender and the sauce has thickened slightly.
7. Meanwhile, cook the pasta according to the package instructions until it is al dente.
8. Drain the pasta and add it to the skillet with the chickpea and tomato mixture. Stir to combine.
9. Season the pasta with salt and pepper to taste.
10. Transfer the pasta to a large baking dish, and sprinkle the shredded parmesan cheese evenly over the top.
11. Bake the pasta in the preheated oven for about 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
12. Serve the pasta immediately, and enjoy your delicious Chickpeas and Pasta dish!

8132be5a91.gt:
Heat 4 tablespoons of the oil in a large heavy-bottom soup pan.
Add garlic and cook for 2 minutes.
Add the drained chickpeas, water, cumin and coriander.
Bring to boiling, then reduce heat and simmer for 2 1/2 hours or until tender.
Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in a separate pan.
Add the vegetables, cover and cook over medium heat, stirring frequently, for 20 minutes.
Stir the vegetable mixture into the chickpeas.
Transfer half the soup to a food processor or blender and process until smooth.
Return the puree to the pan, then add half the lemon juice.
Taste and adjust lemon juice.
Season with S&P.
Heat through.
Ladle into warm bowls and sprinkle with the chopped fresh cilantro and garnish with cilantro sprigs.
8132be5a91.pred:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
3. Add the chickpeas, water, cumin, coriander, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine.
4. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 1 hour, or until the chickpeas are tender.
5. Add the chopped carrots, onions, and celery to the pot. Simmer for an additional 30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
6. Remove the soup from the heat and let it cool slightly.
7. Stir in the chopped lemon juice and chopped cilantro.
8. Serve the soup hot, garnished with extra chopped cilantro.

[/INST]

ad5d547737.gt:
Cut each cheese piece into 4 chunks; cut each cucumber half into 8 chunks.
Thread cheese and cucumbers onto 16 (6-inch) wooden skewers with all remaining ingredients except dressing.
Place on platter.
Drizzle with dressing.
ad5d547737.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Cut the mozzarella cheese into quarters lengthwise.
3. Cut the cucumber into halves lengthwise.
4. Cut the grape tomatoes in half.
5. Drain the black olives and remove the pits.
6. Cut the arugula leaves into bite-sized pieces.
7. In a small bowl, mix the KRAFT Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing.
8. Place the mozzarella cheese, cucumber, grape tomatoes, and black olives on skewers.
9. Drizzle the vinaigrette dressing over the skewers.
10. Place the skewers on a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
11. Serve the Italian Salad-on-a-Stick immediately.

[/INST]

8198c69331.gt:
Place all ingredients in your bread machine in the order given.
Set bread machine to dough cycle.
IMPORTANT!
CHECK YOUR MACHINE WHILE IT IS KNEADING and ADD MORE WATER IF NEEDED 1 TABLESPOON AT A TIME.
The dough should not be too dry - it should look smooth and satiny after kneading for a few minutes.
When dough cycle is complete, remove dough from machine and shape into long loaf (like french bread).
Place on a cookie sheet and let loaf rise for about 45 minutes or until doubled in size.
Bake at 350 degrees for about 30 minutes or until nicely browned.
You can also just cook this in your bread machine on the regular bread cycle if you want.
It still tastes great, you just don't get the cuban shaped loaf.
8198c69331.pred:
To cook the mystery dish, which is Bread Machine Cuban Bread, follow these steps:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine 14 cups of water, 12 teaspoons of sugar, and 1 teaspoon of salt.
2. Add 3 cups of bread flour, and mix the ingredients until they form a smooth dough.
3. Add 2 teaspoons of bread machine yeast to the dough, and mix until the yeast is fully incorporated.
4. Cover the bowl with a clean cloth or plastic wrap, and let the dough rise in a warm, draft-free place for about 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.
5. Preheat your bread machine according to the manufacturer's instructions.
6. After the dough has risen, transfer it to the bread machine's dough setting, and let it knead and rise for about 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.
7. Once the dough has finished rising, remove it from the bread machine, and shape it into a ball.
8. Place the shaped dough on a lightly floured surface, and let it rest for about 10-15 minutes.
9. After the dough has rested, divide it into 12 equal pieces, and shape each piece into a smooth ball.
10. Place the shaped dough balls on a lightly floured baking sheet, and cover them with a clean cloth or plastic wrap.
11. Allow the dough to rise for about 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.
12. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
13. After the dough has risen, bake the bread in a preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until it is golden brown and sounds hollow when tapped.
14. Remove the bread from the oven, and let it cool on a wire rack for about 10-15 minutes.
15. After the bread has cooled, slice it into 12 equal pieces, and serve.

Follow these steps to cook

96a66bd364.gt:
Whisk the milk and oil together.
(The key to making this good and not tasting like oil is using a little less oil and a little more milk.)
Add flour, salt, and sugar.
Press on bottom of pie plate.
With a fork, poke holes in bottom and sides of crust.
Bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes.
So easy and so good.
See Amazing Blueberry Cream Cheese Pie for ideas on what to make this with.
96a66bd364.pred:

2. Add the peanut oil and milk, and mix until the dough comes together.

61afcadcb1.gt:
1.
In a small bowl, combine almonds and brown sugar; set aside.
2.
In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Beat in the almond extract.
3.
Combine flour, baking soda and baking powder.
Add this to the creamed mixture alternately with bananas and sour cream.
Fold in the vanilla or white chips.
4.
Spread into a greased 13x9x2 inch baking pan.
Sprinkle with reserved almond and brown sugar mixture.
5.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.
Cool on a wire rack.
61afcadcb1.pred:
To prepare the Banana Crumb Snack Cake, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the almond extract, flour, baking soda, and baking powder.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with the bananas, and mix until just combined.
6. Fold in the slivered almonds.
7. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x13 inch baking dish.
8. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
9. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
10. Once cooled, cut the cake into squares and serve.

Enjoy your delicious Banana Crumb Snack Cake!

6a6db8c9e3.gt:
trim away middle of bun
put 1 Cheddar cheese and 1tbsp of jam
add 3 hazelnut on each bun and bake 180 C for 5 minute till cheese melted
6a6db8c9e3.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Place the two mini buns on a baking sheet.
3. Place the two slices of cheese on top of the buns.
4. Spread the blueberry jam evenly over the cheese.
5. If desired, sprinkle the hazelnuts on top of the cheese.
6. Bake the buns in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Remove the buns from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
8. Serve the breakfast buns warm, with a side of your choice.
