Arrange balls onto a platter, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until hardened, at least 1 hour.
7b189a7aea.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the vanilla wafer cookies, pecans, and confectioners' sugar.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the bourbon whiskey, light corn syrup, and cocoa powder until smooth.
4. Add the wet mixture to the dry mixture and mix until well combined.
5. Fold in the coconut, if using.
6. Roll the mixture into small balls, about the size of a walnut.
7. Place the balls on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until the balls are set and slightly golden.
9. Remove from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Meemaw's Bourbon Balls!

b379bad205.gt:
Place potato and 3 tbs water in a small bowl.
Cover with plastic wrap, vent and microwave 4 minutes or until tender, stirring once.
Set aside.
Heat a 10" skillet over med-high heat.
Coat pan with cooking spray and add onion.
Cover and cook 10 minutes or until lightly browned, stirring occasionally.
Uncover and cook 10 minutes or until golden brown, stirring frequently.
While onions cook, add 1/3 cup water, 1 Tbs at a time to prevent sticking.
Stir in potato, sage, salt and pepper.
Spoon into bowl and cool.
Combine 1/4 cup cheese, milk, egg whites and eggs in a bowl.
Add egg mixture to potato mixture and stir well.
Preheat broiler.
Pour mixture into skillet coated with cooking spray.
Cook over medium heat for 7 minutes or until bottom of frittata is browned and top is almost set.
Sprinkle remaining cheese on top and broil for 5 minutes or until cheese melts and top is set.
b379bad205.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the sliced onion and cook until it is softened and caramelized, stirring occasionally.
3. Add the diced baking potato to the skillet and cook for a few minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. Pour the water into the skillet and bring to a boil. Add the grated parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender.
5. Meanwhile, in a separate bowl, whisk the egg whites and egg until well combined.
6. Pour the egg mixture over the potato mixture in the skillet. Cook for about 10-15 minutes, or until the egg is set and the frittata is cooked through.
7. Divide the frittata into 4 portions and serve immediately.

[/INST]

625c3e8493.gt:
Add coarsely chopped or halved cherries to a large pot.
Add lemon juice, cherry Kirsch, and vanilla extract and bring the mixture to a slow boil over medium-high heat.
In a bowl, whisk together cocoa powder and 2 cups of sugar until it is evenly distributed and there are no clumps.
Add the cocoa/sugar mixture to the cherries.
Add the remaining sugar.
Bring the mixture back up to a boil.
Stir in the butter and reduce the heat to medium.
Simmer for 1215 minutes, stirring often, until the sugar has completely dissolved and the mixture has thickened slightly.
The sauce will thicken further once it cools.
To can and store the Black Forest Sundae Sauce: Ladle hot sundae sauce into sterilized half pint jars, leaving 1/4 headspace.
Wipe jar rims and add lids.
Process jars in a boiling water bath for 10 minutes.
Remove the jars and cool on wire racks.
Store in a cool, dark place.
Store any opened jars in the refrigerator.
625c3e8493.pred:
To cook the Black Forest Sundae Sauce, follow these steps:

1. In a saucepan, combine the sweet cherries, lemon juice, and cherry kirsch. Cook over medium heat until the cherries are soft and the liquid has thickened slightly.

2. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the vanilla extract.

3. Gradually add the unsweetened cocoa powder, stirring constantly to ensure the cocoa does not clump.

4. Add the granulated sugar, stirring until it has dissolved.

5. Add the butter, stirring until it has melted and the sauce is smooth and creamy.

6. Allow the sauce to cool slightly before serving.

7. Pour the sauce over the ice cream or other desired dessert, and enjoy your delicious Black Forest Sundae Sauce.

[/SYS]

3c3a00487b.gt:
combine first 5 ingredients in large bowl -- make well in center.
combine egg, milk and oil, stir well.
add to dry ingredients, just till moistened --
combine blueberries, 1 tbls flour and 1 tbls sugar, toss gently to coat.
fold into batter.
spoon batter into 6 greased jumbo muffin cups, 2/3 rds full --
combine 1/4 cup sugar, 2 1/2 tbls flour and cinnamon, cut in butter -- till crumbly --
sprinkle over batter.
bake at 400* for 20 minutes or golden.
remove from pan to wire rack immediately.
3c3a00487b.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, salt, baking powder, and lemon rind.
3. In a separate bowl, cream the sugar and vegetable oil. Add the egg and milk, and mix until smooth.
4. Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, alternating between the flour mixture and the milk mixture. Mix until just combined.
5. Fold in the fresh blueberries.
6. Grease a muffin tin with cooking spray or butter.
7. Fill each muffin cup with the batter, filling them about 2/3 full.
8. Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
9. Allow the muffins to cool for a few minutes in the pan, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Blueberry Streusel Muffins!

e77203d622.gt:
Throw the ingredients in a blender and whizz until smooth.
Easy!
Great for a fast breakfast and packed full of fruit for a healthy start or snack
Using frozen fruit means there's no need to chill.
If you have leftovers, stir in some lemon juice to keep the colour nice.
It gives an added yogurty tang too
Makes 500mls/2 cups.
I classed it as 4 kid sized portions as I make it for Jack
e77203d622.pred:
1. First, peel the two slightly over ripe bananas and chop them into small pieces.
2. In a blender or food processor, combine the chopped bananas, frozen fruit, and rice or coconut milk or fruit juice. Blend until smooth and creamy.
3. Add the slightly over ripe avocado to the blender and blend until smooth.
4. Stir in the vanilla extract and agave nectar or liquid sweetener to taste.
5. Pour the mixture into a bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
6. Serve the Vickys 'Other' Avocado Yogurt in a bowl and enjoy!

[/INST]

c3b113f071.gt:
Cook bacon and set aside.
Fry beef with mushrooms and salt and pepper (or seasoning of your choice).
Unroll crescent triangles on baking sheet.
Add a thick slice of cheese, bacon, beef mixture and green onions to each triangle and roll up.
Place a thin piece of cheese on top of roll.
Cook stuffed crescent rolls as per the package instructions and ENJOY!
!
c3b113f071.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until it is browned and cooked through. Season the beef with salt and pepper, or use your preferred seasoning.
3. Drain the beef and set aside.
4. In a separate pan, cook the bacon until it is crispy. Drain the bacon on paper towels and let it cool.
5. Cut the crescent rolls into quarters.
6. In a bowl, mix the beef, cooked bacon, cheese, green onion, and mushrooms.
7. Place a slice of cooked bacon on each crescent roll quarter.
8. Fill the bacon rolls with the beef and cheese mixture.
9. Roll the bacon-filled crescent rolls up and place them on a baking sheet.
10. Bake the bacon rolls in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the crescent rolls are golden brown and the filling is hot and bubbly.
11. Serve the delicious Beefy Bacon Rolls warm.

Enjoy your homemade Beefy Bacon Rolls!

337c3e4209.gt:
Heat oven to 350 degrees.
Wash potatoes and leave the skins on.
Cut into large, equal-sized chunks, and place them in a large mixing bowl.
Slice the onion thickly, separate and place them in the bowl as well.
Add all of your dry ingredients, along with the olive oil, and give it a good mix to evenly distribute everything together.
Cut each sausage link into thirds and place in the bowl with the potatoes and onions.
From here, I mix this all together with my hands.
Gently mix the sausage into the potato and onion mixture, trying not to break apart the sausage as you do this.
Dump this all into a 13 x 9 baking dish and cover with aluminum foil.
Place in the oven and allow this to cook for a minimum of one hour.
After an hour, turn the oven up to 400 degrees, remove the foil and place back in the oven until the sausage is nicely brown.
Stir every few minutes so all the sausage gets some equal browning space.
This can take anywhere from 15 to 30 minutes to achieve.
Make sure you watch this closely after returning to the oven so your potatoes and sausage dont burn.
Notes: I used light tasting olive oil, which is my preference.
If you prefer a stronger tasting oil, like extra virgin olive oil, feel free to use it.
While I normally cook with fresh, chopped garlic, I dont use it in this recipe, and substitute the garlic powder.
Fresh garlic tends to pool in the bottom of the dish, or on the top, and burns when browning the sausage.
337c3e4209.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, toss the potatoes with the olive oil, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper. Spread the potatoes out on a baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly crispy on the outside.
3. In a large skillet or frying pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until it is soft and translucent, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Add the sausage to the skillet and cook until it is browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
5. Carefully drain the potatoes from the oven and add them to the skillet with the sausage. Stir to combine and cook for an additional 5-7 minutes, or until the potatoes are heated through.
6. Serve the sausage and potatoes over a bed of rice or pasta, and enjoy your delicious meal!

11e9299476.gt:
Preheat the oven according the directions for the biscuits.
Have the biscuits ready to put in oven
Start cooking the Sausage.
Once cook drain out the oil that's in the pan
Leave sausage in pan.
Add the flour and the milk.
Put heat to high and continue to mix.
Don't stop mixing until the gravy starts to boil.
Once its boiling, lower down heat to simmer for 5min.
Don't touch for those 5min.
Now put in the biscuits in the oven
Once the 5min is up give the gravy a little mix and set aside to cool down.
The longer it sits outside the thicker it would get.
When the biscuits are ready open them up and pour the sausage gravy on top.
Enjoy.
11e9299476.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the sausage over medium heat until browned, breaking it into smaller pieces as it cooks.
3. Add the flour to the skillet and stir to coat the sausage evenly. Cook for a few more minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sausage is cooked through and the flour is golden brown.
4. Pour the milk into the skillet and stir until the mixture thickens and bubbles. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
5. In a separate bowl, mix the biscuits according to the package instructions.
6. Pour the gravy mixture over the biscuits and stir to combine.
7. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil. Place the sausage mixture evenly over the prepared baking sheet.
8. Bake the sausage biscuit in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the biscuits are golden brown and the filling is hot and bubbly.
9. Serve the sausage biscuit with gravy on the side. Enjoy!

ea0c63b401.gt:
In a medium saute pan, bring the stock to a boil.
Add the orzo and cook for 7 to 8 minutes until liquid is almost absorbed and orzo is tender.
Turn off heat.
Stir in the remaining ingredients.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and serve.
Enjoy!
ea0c63b401.pred:
1. In a large saucepan, combine the vegetable stock (or chicken stock) and the orzo pasta. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the pasta is cooked through and the liquid has been absorbed.

2. While the pasta is cooking, prepare the lemon pepper sauce by mixing the lemon juice, cream, grated parmesan cheese, cream cheese (or mascarpone), butter, chives, cracked black pepper, and lemon zest in a small bowl.

3. Once the pasta is cooked, add the lemon pepper sauce to the pan and stir to combine. Cook for another 2-3 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly.

4. Serve the Big Daddy's Lemon Pepper Orzo immediately, garnished with additional chives if desired. Enjoy!

c3ac924e63.gt:
Light a grill.
Shape the meat into 4 patties and season on both sides with salt and pepper.
Wrap each hamburger with 2 slices of pancetta.
Grill the burgers over a medium-hot fire for about 4 minutes, or until nicely browned on the bottom.
Flip the burgers and top them with the Gorgonzola.
Grill for about 4 minutes longer, or until nicely browned and cooked through.
Meanwhile, brush the cut sides of the buns with the butter and grill them, cut side down, until lightly toasted.
Set the burgers on the bun bottoms and top with the lettuce, tomato and onion.
Serve at once.
c3ac924e63.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the ground sirloin or chuck with salt and freshly ground pepper. Form the mixture into four equal-sized patties.
3. Heat the melted butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the pancetta and cook until it is crispy, about 2-3 minutes. Remove the pancetta from the skillet and set aside.
4. Add the Gorgonzola cheese to the skillet and cook until it is melted and slightly bubbly. Remove the cheese from the skillet and set aside.
5. Place the patties on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 8-10 minutes or until the internal temperature reaches 160°F (71°C).
6. While the burgers are cooking, place the hamburger buns or kaiser rolls on a baking sheet and toast them in the oven for 2-3 minutes or until they are golden brown.
7. Once the burgers are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes.
8. Assemble the burgers by placing a cooked burger patty on each bun, topping with the melted Gorgonzola cheese, and adding any desired condiments such as lettuce, tomato, and onion slices.
9. Serve the Gorgonzola Cheeseburgers immediately.

[/INST]

ffcb21a60b.gt:
In a pot combine vegetable broth and milk and bring to a boil.
turn off heat, stir in polenta and cook until thickened (abut 3-5 minutes).
Set aside to thicken further.
Clean, wash and peel the carrots.
Slice lenghtwise.
Heat butter in a skillet and add carrots.
Saute for some minutes, then add 5 tbs of water and cook covered on medium heat for another ten minutes until soft.
Season with sugar, salt and pepper.
Add sour cream or yoghurt, sage and half of the cheese to the polenta and stir to combine.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Pour into a casserole dish (about 20X12 cm) and top with the carrots (I used their liquid too since it was full of flavour, but that way the casserole may get a bit soggy).
Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake in the preheated oven at 200C (~400F) for 20 minutes.
Let stand for about 5 minutes until polenta has set and can be sliced.
ffcb21a60b.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the vegetable broth, milk, polenta, and butter. Mix well until smooth.
3. Add the carrots and sage leaves to the mixture. Stir gently to combine.
4. Pour the mixture into a baking dish, and smooth the top with a spatula.
5. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 30-40 minutes, or until the polenta is cooked through and the edges are slightly crispy.
6. Remove the dish from the oven, and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Add the grated cheese to the top of the dish, and return it to the oven for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Remove the dish from the oven, and let it cool for a few more minutes.
9. Serve the dish warm, and enjoy!

[/INST]

167bcf0a2a.gt:
FRIED SCRUMBLE EGGS
fried scrumble egg set aside
BAKE BACON
bake bacon on parchment paper at 200 C for 15 minute then set aside
SAUTE SPINACH
with oiled pan quick saute spinach for 1 minute with a dash of salt then set aside
FRIED GARLIC AND SHALLOT
fry garlic and shallot till fragrant then add light soy sauce and off heat then add fried eggs and bacon mix well
top on cooked spinach and serve immediately
167bcf0a2a.pred:
1. In a small bowl, mix the light soy sauce, garlic, shallot, and salt. Set aside.
2. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the spinach and cook until it is wilted, about 2-3 minutes.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and set aside.
4. Add the bacon to the skillet and cook until it is crispy, about 4-5 minutes.
5. Pour the egg mixture over the spinach in the skillet, stirring gently to combine. Cook until the eggs are set, about 2-3 minutes.
6. Add the soy sauce mixture to the skillet and stir gently to combine. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes or until the sauce is heated through.
7. Serve the crispy bacon and egg dish immediately.

[/SYS]

73a84e1f5e.gt:
Wash and peel the zucchini and cut into long strips.
Season with salt and pepper.
Mix the eggs, milk and salt, dip the zucchini strips into the mixture and then roll in the breadcrumbs.
Saute until crisp on the outside but not overcooked, about 2-3 minutes.
Serve.
73a84e1f5e.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Wash the zucchini and pat dry.
3. Cut the zucchini into small, even pieces.
4. In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, salt, and pepper.
5. In another bowl, mix the breadcrumbs and a pinch of salt.
6. Dip each piece of zucchini into the egg mixture, then coat it with the breadcrumb mixture.
7. Place the breaded zucchini pieces on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
8. Bake the zucchini pieces in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
9. Serve the gilded zucchini as a side dish or a main course.

[/SYS]

6bf369490a.gt:
Stir boiling water into dry gelatin mix in large bowl at least 2 min.
until completely dissolved.
Drain pineapple, reserving juice.
Add enough ice to juice to measure 1-1/2 cups.
Add to gelatin; stir until ice is completely melted.
Refrigerate 45 min.
or until slightly thickened.
Remove 1-1/2 cups of the gelatin; place in medium bowl.
Stir in pineapple; set aside.
Add 1-1/2 cups of the whipped topping to remaining gelatin; stir with wire whisk until well blended.
Pour into 9-inch square dish.
Refrigerate 15 min.
or until set but not firm.
Carefully spoon fruited gelatin over creamy layer in dish.
Refrigerate at least 3 hours or until firm.
Cut into 9 squares.
Serve topped evenly with the remaining whipped topping.
6bf369490a.pred:
To cook the Low-Fat Fruit 'n Juice Squares, follow these steps:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the boiling water and JELL-O Strawberry Flavor Sugar Free Gelatin. Stir until the gelatin is completely dissolved.
2. Add the pineapple chunks and ice cubes to the bowl, and stir to combine.
3. Cover the bowl and refrigerate the mixture for at least 4 hours or overnight.
4. Once the mixture has set, divide it into 8 equal portions.
5. In a small mixing bowl, beat the COOL WHIP FREE Whipped Topping until soft peaks form.
6. Spread a thin layer of the softened whipped topping on each square of the set mixture.
7. Refrigerate the Low-Fat Fruit 'n Juice Squares for at least 1 hour before serving.

These Low-Fat Fruit 'n Juice Squares are a delicious and healthy dessert option, perfect for those looking to enjoy a sweet treat without the added fat and calories.

5c462ab39b.gt:
Mix all ingredients well and refrigerate for a few hours to let the flavors blend!
Its that simple!
My mom got this recipe from a friend of hers more than 20 years ago.
Her friend got the recipe while staying at an Inn/B&B named The Magnolia in Napa Valley.
5c462ab39b.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the grated onion, sugar, ketchup, and red wine vinegar.
3. Stir the mixture until the sugar is fully incorporated.
4. Add the canola oil to the bowl, and continue to stir until the dressing is smooth and well-combined.
5. Transfer the dressing to a large, oven-safe container or casserole dish.
6. Bake the dressing in the preheated oven for about 30-40 minutes, or until it reaches the desired thickness and consistency.
7. Remove the dressing from the oven, and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

This recipe for Magnolia Dressing involves combining grated onion, sugar, ketchup, and red wine vinegar in a large bowl. The mixture is then stirred until the sugar is fully incorporated. Next, canola oil is added, and the dressing is stirred until it reaches the desired consistency. The dressing is then transferred to an oven-safe container or casserole dish and baked in the oven for about 30-40 minutes, or until it reaches the desired thickness and consistency. Finally, the dressing is removed from the oven, allowed to cool for a few minutes, and then served.

51e70cd927.gt:
Heat oven to 425 degrees F.
Cut potatoes lengthwise in half; place, cut sides down, on foil-covered rimmed baking sheet.
Bake 30 to 35 min.
or until tender.
Scoop out centers of potatoes into bowl, leaving 1/4-inch-thick shells.
Add Neufchatel, milk, sugar and cinnamon to potatoes; mash until blended.
Fill shells with potato mixture; top with nuts.
Bake 8 min.
or until potatoes are heated through and nuts are toasted.
51e70cd927.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Wash the sweet potatoes thoroughly and pat them dry with a paper towel.
3. Cut the sweet potatoes in half lengthwise, then cut each half into 4 wedges.
4. In a small bowl, mix the Neufchatel cheese, fat-free milk, brown sugar, and ground cinnamon.
5. Place the sweet potato wedges in a single layer on a baking sheet.
6. Drizzle the melted fat-free milk mixture over the sweet potato wedges.
7. Bake the sweet potatoes for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and golden brown.
8. Remove the sweet potatoes from the oven and sprinkle them with chopped PLANTERS Pecans.
9. Serve the twice-baked sweet potatoes immediately.

[/SYS]

5bcccb4e9b.gt:
Heat 1 Tbsp.
oil in medium nonstick skillet on medium-high heat.
Add potatoes and red pepper, cook 8 to 10 min.
or until tender; transfer to bowl; set aside.
Meanwhile in small bowl, whisk eggs and pepper.
Heat remaining oil in skillet.
Add egg mixture; cook 2 to 3 min.
or until eggs are almost set, lifting edge with spatula and tilting skillet to allow uncooked portion to flow underneath.
When egg mixture is set but top is still slightly moist, top with potato mixture and cheese.
Slip spatula underneath omelette, tip skillet to loosen and gently fold omelette in half.
Cook 1 to 2 min.
Slide or flip onto serving plate; cut in half.
5bcccb4e9b.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat 1 Tbsp. of the oil over medium heat. Add the diced potatoes and cook until they are tender and slightly browned, about 5-7 minutes.
3. Add the red pepper and cook for another 2-3 minutes, until it is slightly softened.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and black pepper together.
5. Pour the egg mixture over the potatoes and red pepper in the skillet, stirring gently to combine. Cook until the eggs are set and the omelette is cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
6. Transfer the omelette to a baking dish and top it with the remaining 1 Tbsp. of oil and the Cracker Barrel Shredded Double Cheddar Cheese.
7. Bake the omelette in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Serve the omelette hot, garnished with chopped green onions if desired.

[/SYS]

26e693a67f.gt:
Heat oven to 425F.
Spray pie pan with cooking spray.
Place crust in pan and crimp edges.
Toss apples with lemon juice.
Stir in sugars and flour.
Pour into prepared crust.
Mix sugar into oatmeal.
Cut margarine into oatmeal, I do this with my fingers, you can use two forks or pastry blender.
Sprinkle oatmeal mixture on apples.
Place in oven for about 25 minutes Then take out and place foil around edges and put back in oven for about 20 minutes more.
Allow to cool before serving at least 15 minutes.
26e693a67f.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the pie crust, oatmeal, sugar (spiced and white), flour, and lemon juice. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the sliced apples to the mixture and stir gently to combine.
4. Roll out the pie crust on a lightly floured surface to fit the pie dish.
5. Pour the apple mixture into the pie crust and smooth the top with a spatula.
6. Bake the pie in the preheated oven for 45-50 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.
7. Remove the pie from the oven and let it cool for about 10-15 minutes before serving.

[/INST]

This cooking guide provides step-by-step instructions for preparing a delicious Spiced Sugar Apple Pie Light. The dish features a crust made from a pie crust, apples, oatmeal, sugar, flour, and lemon juice, which are combined to create a filling. The pie is then baked in an oven until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbly. After baking, the pie is allowed to cool for a short period before being served. The use of spiced sugar and light margarine adds a unique flavor to the dish, making it a delightful treat for those who enjoy apple pies.

78bbc2284a.gt:
1.
Place the grapes on a parchment-lined plate in the freezer.
2.
Pour the boiling water over the hibiscus flowers, cover and allow to steep 15-20 minutes.
Whisk in the sugar until it dissolves.
3.
Pour the red wine and sliced peaches into a small pitcher.
Strain the hibiscus tea over the top, discarding the flowers.
4.
Chill this mixture until ready to serve.
5.
Stir in the frozen grapes, and enjoy while watching the sunset.
78bbc2284a.pred:
To cook the Hibiscus Sangria, follow these steps:

1. In a large pot, combine the grapes, boiling water, and dried hibiscus flowers. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for about 10-15 minutes.

2. Add sugar to the pot, stirring to dissolve it.

3. Add the red wine to the pot, stirring to combine all the ingredients.

4. Simmer the mixture for another 10-15 minutes, or until the hibiscus flowers have infused the liquid and the flavors have melded together.

5. Remove the pot from the heat and let the mixture cool slightly.

6. Add the sliced peach to the pot and stir to combine.

7. Serve the Hibiscus Sangria chilled, garnished with a slice of peach and a sprig of fresh hibiscus flowers, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Hibiscus Sangria!

f87c45ee62.gt:
Place margarine, marshmallow creme and vanilla in small bowl; beat on medium speed until well blended.
Gradually add sugar, beating after each addition until well blended.
Blend in 1 Tbsp.
of the milk.
Add remaining 1 Tbsp.
milk if necessary for desired spreading consistency.
f87c45ee62.pred:
To recreate the marshmallow creme frosting, follow these steps:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the softened margarine or butter and the vanilla extract.
2. Gradually add the powdered sugar, mixing well to combine.
3. If the frosting is too thick, add a small amount of milk to achieve the desired consistency.
4. Spread the marshmallow creme frosting onto the desired cake or dessert.

Enjoy your marshmallow creme frosting creation!

4a46bab1e9.gt:
Mix all ingredients together, I use my stand mixer with the dough hook.
Let mixer kneed the dough for about 5 minutes.
Dough should be moist and pliable but not sticky, if it is dry add more water, if it is too sticky add a little extra flour.
Coat a bowl with a little oil place dough in the bowl and cover with cling wrap and leave for about 1 hour or till doubled in size.
Once doubled in size dust bench lightly with flour turn out dough and lightly press down to remove a little of the air.
Form into your choice of loaf, I like to use a proofing basket, but you could use a tin or free form.
Let the loaf rise for another 40 min to 1 hour.
Pre heat your oven to super hot 450 F/ 250C.
I use a pizza stone but it can go straight in the oven on a tray if you don't have one.
Leave oven temp on high for 10 min then reduce to 375 F/ 190 C for a further 20 minute.
Enjoy!
4a46bab1e9.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the whole wheat flour, white bread flour, organic honey, and salt.
2. Add the yeast to the mixture and stir to combine.
3. Gradually add the Greek yogurt, stirring until the ingredients are well combined.
4. Gradually add the water, stirring until the dough comes together.
5. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic, about 10 minutes.
6. Place the dough in a large, lightly oiled bowl, cover it with a clean cloth, and let it rise in a warm place until it has doubled in size, about 1-2 hours.
7. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
8. Punch down the dough and transfer it to a lightly floured surface.
9. Divide the dough into 12 equal pieces.
10. Shape each piece into a smooth ball and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
11. Cover the baking sheet with a clean cloth and let the bread rise for 30-45 minutes, or until it has doubled in size.
12. Bake the bread in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until it is golden brown and sounds hollow when tapped.
13. Remove the bread from the oven and let it cool on a wire rack for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your Greek Yogurt Bread!

3182df418c.pred:
To cook the mystery dish, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the ingredients: Wash and chop the watermelon, cucumber, red onions, and cilantro.

2. Combine the ingredients: In a large bowl, mix the chopped watermelon, cucumber, red onions, and cilantro.

3. Add the dressing: Pour the Kraft Zesty Italian Dressing over the ingredients, and mix well.

4. Add the serrano chiles and salt: Add the minced serrano chiles and salt to the bowl, and mix gently.

5. Serve: Serve the Fresh Watermelon Spring Salsa as a refreshing side dish or as a topping for your favorite dishes.

By following these steps, you can create a delicious and healthy Fresh Watermelon Spring Salsa that combines the freshness of watermelon with the zesty flavor of the dressing and the spicy kick of the serrano chiles.

aacb2f290c.gt:
Preheat grill to medium high.
Drizzle oil and lemon juice over romaine and season with salt and pepper.
Place on grill and cook for 1-2 minutes per side.
Place cooked romaine on 2 plates and drizzle with dressing top with anchovies, cheese and or croutons.
Enjoy!
aacb2f290c.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the grill: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
2. Prepare the ingredients: Wash and dry the romaine lettuce hearts, and chop the chicken breast into bite-sized pieces.
3. Prepare the dressing: In a small bowl, mix the olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Set aside.
4. Prepare the croutons: In a small bowl, toss the croutons with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
5. Prepare the Caesar salad: In a large bowl, combine the romaine lettuce hearts, croutons, and prepared dressing. Toss to combine.
6. Grill the chicken: Season the chicken breast with salt and pepper, then place the seasoned chicken on the grill. Cook the chicken until it is fully cooked through and reaches an internal temperature of 165°F (74°C).
7. Assemble the salad: Once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes. Then, toss the grilled chicken with the Caesar salad.
8. Serve: Serve the grilled Caesar salad with the grilled chicken on top. Optionally, add a sprinkle of freshly shaved parmesan cheese for extra flavor.

Enjoy your delicious grilled Caesar salad with grilled chicken!

35f4aac182.gt:
Place rice into the bento, cover the whole surface with bonito flakes, and drizzle with a round of soy sauce.
Top it with shredded nori seaweed and roasted sesame.
The crackly texture and aroma of the baked seaweed is delicious.
Cover with lots of kettle-cooked shirasu.
Shred shiso leaves and scatter.
It smells great.
Top it with ginger to taste .
Grate a daikon radish, lightly squeezing out the excess water, mix with ponzu sauce in a small container to make grated ponzu sauce.
It tastes great to eat this with the grated ponzu sauce from Step 5.
In addition to the bento: Misakiko fried tuna katsu, Kanagawa komatsuna and daikon radish, aburaage stir-fry, Odawara fish paste with shiso leaves and pickled plums, imitation crab meat fried eggs, and tomatoes and shiso leaves.
Try eating the fried tuna katsu with lots of grated daikon and ponzu sauce from Step 5 ..
35f4aac182.pred:
[/SYS]

1. In a large bowl, combine the cooked rice, Bonito flakes, Soy sauce, Roasted sesame, Shredded nori seaweed, and Grated ginger. Mix well.
2. Add the Kettle-cooked shirasu (boiled and dried whitebait) and Shiso leaf (shredded) to the rice mixture.
3. Season with a dash of Ponzu (optional) to taste.
4. Serve the Kettle-cooked Shirasu Rice Bowl Bento in a bowl, garnished with the Grated daikon radish.

Enjoy your delicious Kettle-cooked Shirasu Rice Bowl Bento!

6f3b4ebeac.gt:
Cut the apple/pear and ginger into fine pieces.
Thinly slice the chili.
Mix chili, ginger, syrup, cinnamon, orange juice and zest in a saucepan and heat until it is boiling.
Add the apples/pears and bring to a boil again.
Add walnuts and raisins, and boil for about 5 minutes.
Pour into a glass with a tight fitting lid and cool completely.
(It will thicken up a bit when cooled down.)
Store in the fridge for a few weeks.
Serve with home baked baguettes, artisan bread and lots of wonderful cheeses.
Yum!
Enjoy!
6f3b4ebeac.pred:
To cook the apple chutney with ginger, walnuts, and raisins, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the peeled and cored apples or pears, ginger, red chili, and maple syrup.
3. Add the zest and juice of the orange, cinnamon, and raisins to the bowl.
4. Mix the ingredients well to ensure they are evenly distributed.
5. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
6. Spread the mixture evenly on the prepared baking sheet.
7. Bake the apple chutney in the preheated oven for about 45 minutes, or until the apples are tender and the chutney is slightly caramelized.
8. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the chutney cool for a few minutes.
9. Use a spatula to transfer the chutney to a serving dish.
10. Serve the apple chutney warm or at room temperature, as desired.

Enjoy your delicious apple chutney with ginger, walnuts, and raisins!

4816a33066.gt:
Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat until shimmering.
Add onion and salt and stir until coated with oil.
Reduce heat to medium, cover, and cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is soft, about 10 minutes (if onion begins to burn after 5 minutes, reduce heat to low).
Add garlic and chili powder and cook, uncovered, stirring constantly, until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
Add beef and cook, breaking up meat with wooden spoon, until just pink, about 3 minutes.
Add 1/4 teaspoon pepper, brown sugar, tomato puree, ketchup, water, and hot sauce.
Simmer until Sloppy Joe sauce is slightly thicker than ketchup, 8 to 10 minutes.
Adjust seasonings.
Spoon meat mixture onto hamburger buns and serve.
Make Ahead: If you find yourself with leftover Sloppy Joes or just feel like making a double batch, the meat mixture freezes well for up to one month.
To return the meat mixture to its original consistency, you may need to add a little water when it is reheated.
4816a33066.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece, follow these instructions:
1. In a large skillet, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute.
4. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up as it cooks.
5. Stir in the chili powder, ground black pepper, brown sugar, and hot pepper sauce.
6. Pour in the tomato puree, ketchup, water, and bring the mixture to a simmer.
7. Reduce the heat to low and let the mixture simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
8. Serve the sloppy joes in the hamburger buns.

Enjoy your delicious Sloppy Joes!

27b86a0c47.gt:
Combine Parmesan cheese, lemon juice, anchovy paste, pepper, Worcestershire sauce, egg yolk, and minced garlic in a mini food processor; process 15 seconds.
With the processor on, gradually add olive oil, processing until combined.
Toss with romaine lettuce.
27b86a0c47.pred:
1. In a small bowl, mix the grated Parmesan cheese, lemon juice, anchovy paste, black pepper, and Worcestershire sauce.
2. In a large bowl, whisk the egg yolk until it reaches a pale yellow color.
3. Add the minced garlic to the egg yolk and whisk until combined.
4. Slowly drizzle in the olive oil while continuously whisking the mixture.
5. Add the Parmesan cheese mixture to the egg yolk mixture and whisk until smooth.
6. Toss the romaine lettuce in a large bowl of cold water to remove any dirt or debris.
7. Drain the lettuce and pat it dry with a paper towel.
8. Add the vinaigrette to the lettuce and toss to coat evenly.
9. Serve the Caesar Vinaigrette salad immediately.

[/SYS]

842d3c7eb8.gt:
Combine and mix all of the ingredients together in a bowl.
Mix the egg whites in a cutting motion.
Strain the mixture through a sieve and cook the tamagoyaki in a tamagoyaki pan.
Once cooled, cut into long strips.
842d3c7eb8.pred:
1. In a small bowl, whisk together the eggs, shiro-dashi, water, sugar, sake, and salt until well combined.
2. Heat a non-stick skillet or frying pan over medium heat. Pour the egg mixture into the pan, and let it cook for about 2 minutes or until the edges start to set.
3. Carefully flip the omelette over, and cook for another 30 seconds or until the egg is fully cooked through.
4. Use a spatula to carefully lift the omelette onto a plate, and let it cool for a few minutes.
5. While the omelette is cooling, prepare the sushi rolls by spreading a thin layer of sushi rice on a sheet of nori.
6. Place a piece of tamagoyaki omelette on top of the rice, and roll the sushi up, starting from the bottom.
7. Repeat the process with the remaining omelette and rice, and serve the sushi rolls immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Tamagoyaki Omelette For Sushi Hand Rolls!

131faa12b8.gt:
Stir together 1 cup yogurt, 2 tablespoons oil, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, salt and spices.
Add chicken and turn until well coated.
Marinate at room temperature for 20 minutes.
While the chicken is marinating, preheat grill.
While grill is heating, stir together remaining 1 1/4 cups yogurt and 1 1/2 tablespoons lemon juice and salt to taste.
Reduce grill to moderate heat.
Grill chicken (discard marinade), on lightly oiled grill rack, turning occasionally (closing grill between turns), until cooked through, 10 to 12 minutes total.
Transfer chicken to a platter.
Toss together mint, shallot and remaining oil in a small bowl.
Drizzle chicken with yogurt sauce and top with mint salad.
131faa12b8.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece in the image, follow these instructions:
1. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
2. In a large bowl, mix together the yogurt, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, chili powder, cumin, coriander, black pepper, cinnamon, and minced shallots.
3. Add the chicken breast halves to the bowl and toss to coat them evenly with the marinade. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 1-2 hours or overnight.
4. Remove the chicken from the marinade and shake off any excess.
5. Grill the chicken for 6-8 minutes per side or until it reaches your desired level of doneness.
6. While the chicken is grilling, prepare the mint leaves by washing them thoroughly and chopping them.
7. Once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes.
8. To serve, place the grilled chicken on a plate and garnish with the fresh mint leaves.

Enjoy your delicious grilled chicken breasts in spiced yogurt!

fd5fe058a6.gt:
Heat oil in skillet.
Add garlic and shallots saute until tender.
Add wine and oregano.
Simmer 4 minutes.
Add clams and heat just until they open.
Discard any that do not open.
fd5fe058a6.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and shallot, and cook until softened, about 2 minutes.
3. Add the clams to the skillet, and cook until they open, about 3-4 minutes.
4. Add the oregano, white wine, and lemon wedge to the skillet. Cook until the liquid has reduced by half, about 3-4 minutes.
5. Season the clams with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Transfer the clams to a baking dish, and bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the clams are cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly caramelized.
7. Serve the clams in white wine sauce immediately.

Enjoy your delicious clams in white wine sauce!

0b797c29a0.gt:
Reserve 1 tablespoon of olive oil,now heat the remainder in a medium saucepan
Add the garlic and a pinch.of salt and over low heat.stirring until golden brown.then remove the pan from the heat.do not let the garlic burn as it will taint its flavor.if its burn you will have to start over.
Meanwhile, bring a large saucepan of lightly salted water to a boil.add the spaghetti and remaining olive oil and cook for 10 to 12 minutes, until tender.
Drain the spaghetti thoroughly and return to the pan.
Add the oil and garlic mixture to the spaghetti and toss to coat.season with pepper,add the chopped fresh parsley, and toss to coat.
Put on a plater and serve warm, serve immediately.
0b797c29a0.pred:

[SYS]
1. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
2. Add the minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
3. Add the spaghetti to the skillet and toss to coat with the oil and garlic mixture.
4. Cook the spaghetti until it is al dente, stirring occasionally.
5. Add the chopped parsley and season with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Serve the spaghetti immediately.

[/SYS]

56045e7740.gt:
Heat gas grill on medium or charcoal grill until coals are ash white.
Thread meat, pineapple, red bell pepper and onion alternately onto skewers.
Combine butter, hoisin sauce and orange zest in bowl; stir until well mixed.
Spread about 1/3 mixture onto 1 side of each skewer.
Place skewers onto grill, glaze-side up.
Grill 2-4 minutes or until browned.
Turn skewers; brush grilled side with about 1/3 glaze.
Continue grilling, turning often and brushing with glaze, 8-12 minutes or until meat reaches desired doneness.
56045e7740.pred:
1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
2. In a small bowl, mix the melted butter, hoisin sauce, and orange zest.
3. Season the beef pieces with salt and pepper.
4. Thread the beef pieces onto the skewers, alternating with pineapple and red bell pepper pieces.
5. Brush the beef skewers with the butter mixture.
6. Grill the beef skewers for 10-12 minutes, or until they are cooked through and the pineapple is slightly caramelized.
7. Serve the grilled orange teriyaki beef skewers immediately.

[/SYS]

fda9c36818.gt:
Put all of the ingredients in a jar for the dressing and shake to mix throughly.
That's all.
It keeps up to 1 week.
Thinly cut daikon radish into match sticks.
Add sliced onions.
Wakame seaweed.
Pour the dressing over the salad.
Daikon radish & carrot with crispy boiled and chirimen jako salad.The combination is great.
I found this salad dressing container at a 100 yen shop.
Perfect for storing liquids!
Cheap and convenient!
Just put all the ingredients to shake it up.
fda9c36818.pred:
[/SYS]

1. In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, sesame oil, cider vinegar, ground sesame seeds, and sugar.
2. Slowly drizzle in the mirin, whisking continuously until the sauce reaches the desired consistency.
3. Taste and adjust the seasoning if needed.
4. Pour the sauce over the desired food item, such as sashimi or sushi, and serve immediately.

1d309c893f.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
In a large mixing bowl, combine the chicken, soup, cheese, milk, salt, pepper and butter.
Mix together and pour mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Bake at 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) for 5 to 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and bubbly, and casserole is hot in the center.
1d309c893f.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked and shredded chicken, condensed cream of chicken soup, shredded Cheddar cheese, milk, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
3. Pour the mixture into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
4. Dot the top with the melted butter.
5. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
6. Serve the meal hot.

Enjoy your delicious Simple Chicken Slop!

1e5cac3aa5.gt:
Arrange tomato slices on a serving platter.
Lay 1 avocado slice on top of each tomato, and top with fresh mozzarella.
Drizzle olive oil, then balsamic vinegar over the tops, and season with salt and pepper.
1e5cac3aa5.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, toss the beefsteak tomato slices with a drizzle of olive oil, salt, and pepper.
3. Spread the tomato slices on a baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until they are slightly charred and tender.
4. While the tomatoes are roasting, toss the avocado slices with a drizzle of olive oil, salt, and pepper.
5. Spread the avocado slices on a separate baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until they are slightly charred and tender.
6. In a large bowl, combine the roasted tomato and avocado slices.
7. Add the sliced mozzarella cheese to the bowl and toss to combine.
8. Drizzle the extra virgin olive oil over the salad, and season with a splash of balsamic vinegar.
9. Toss the salad to combine the ingredients and serve immediately.

[/SYS]

3e392f1d33.gt:
Melt chocolate in oil (microwave), and add the rest in the order shown making sure that the eggs don't cook in the warmed oil/chocolate.
Before adding the flour, mix the salt and baking powder into the flour - then mix the flour mixture into the batter.
Pour the completed mixture into a greased and floured 9 inch x 13 inch cake pan.
Sprinkle some chopped nuts on top if desired.
Bake at 350F (180C) for 30 minutes.
Let cool at least 15 minutes.
3e392f1d33.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the chocolate squares, canola oil, sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the flour, baking powder, and salt.
4. Add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, stirring until well combined.
5. Fold in the nuts, if using.
6. Pour the batter into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
8. Allow the brownies to cool in the pan for a few minutes, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/SYS]

0e781ad046.gt:
Roast a whole butternut pumpkin.
When soft, scoop out the flesh and mash or process before adding a teaspoon of ground cumin, crunchy peanut butter and a splash of chilli sauce to taste.
Add a drizzle of olive oil, and stir well.
Serve in a bowl with crackers or pita bread.
0e781ad046.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cut the pumpkin into bite-sized pieces, and remove the seeds and strings.
3. Place the pumpkin pieces on a baking sheet, and drizzle them with olive oil.
4. Season the pumpkin with ground cumin, salt, and pepper.
5. Roast the pumpkin in the preheated oven for about 45-50 minutes, or until it is tender and slightly caramelized.
6. While the pumpkin is roasting, prepare the dip by combining the crunchy peanut butter, chili sauce, and a pinch of salt in a small bowl.
7. Once the pumpkin is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Using a fork, mash the cooked pumpkin into a smooth dip.
9. Serve the roast pumpkin dip with pita chips, crackers, or vegetables for dipping.

Enjoy your delicious roast pumpkin dip!

6970e8f99b.gt:
Preheat oven to 300F and grease an 8x8 baking pan.
Combine unsweetened chocolate and butter in a medium saucepan and melt over medium low heat, stirring constantly until pieces are almost melted.
Remove from the heat and stir until smooth.
In a large bowl using an electric mixer on medium speed, beat eggs until light yellow in color--about 5 minutes.
Add sugar and blend on low until thoroughly combined.
Add vanilla and melted chocolate to the egg sugar mixture.
Blend on low until smooth.
Add the flour and mix thoroughly.
Pour batter into greased pan.
Smooth surface with a spatula, and sprinkle uniformly with chocolate chips.
Bake on center rack of oven for 45-55 minutes.
The batter should be set and a toothpick inserted into the center should come out clean.
Do not overbake.
Cool to room temperature.
Cover and refrigerate for at least one hour.
Cut and serve chilled.
6970e8f99b.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 6 ounces of unsweetened baking chocolate, softened butter, and 2 cups of granulated sugar.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Stir in the vanilla extract.
5. Gradually add the flour, mixing until just combined.
6. Fold in the semi-sweet chocolate chips.
7. Pour the batter into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.
8. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
9. Allow the brownies to cool in the pan for about 10 minutes before cutting into squares.
10. Enjoy your delicious homemade Mrs. Fields Super Fudge Brownies!

[/INST]

65e738299c.gt:
Heat the olive oil over medium heat in a large, heavy pot.
Saute the onion for a couple of minutes until softened but not browned.
Add the rice and saute for a minute or two until it turns slightly translucent.
Add the wine and stir until absorbed.
Next, add the broth one ladle at a time, stirring very frequently.
When the rice begins to dry out, add another ladle.
After about 15 minutes, begin to check the grains.
When the rice begins to break down but is still slightly tough inside, add the vegetables, basil, salt and pepper.
Add the last few ladles of veggie broth and work in the vegetables.
If youve run out of broth, use water and add salt, if needed.
Within 5 to 10 minutes, the rice will become tender and creamy.
Once the mix is thick and starchy, take it off of the heat and stir in the cheese.
Garnish with a bit more basil and more cheese, if desired.
65e738299c.pred:
[/SYS]

1. Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
2. Add the minced onion and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
3. Add the Arborio rice and cook, stirring constantly, until the rice is translucent and slightly golden, about 2-3 minutes.
4. Pour in the dry white wine and cook until it has been absorbed by the rice.
5. Gradually add the mild vegetable broth, 1 cup at a time, stirring constantly to prevent the rice from sticking to the bottom of the pan.
6. Once all the broth has been added, bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 20-25 minutes or until the rice is tender and the liquid has been absorbed.
7. While the rice is cooking, prepare the vegetables.
8. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the diced zucchini and cook until they are tender but still slightly crunchy.
9. Add the chopped mushrooms and cook until they are tender.
10. Add the frozen peas and cook until they are heated through.
11. Add the fresh basil, salt, and pepper to the vegetables.
12. Once the rice is cooked, stir in the vegetables and cook for a few more minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
13. Serve the summer risotto immediately, garnished with grated Parmesan cheese.

[/SYS]

By following these instructions, you will be able to prepare a delicious and appetizing summer risotto using the provided ingredients.

496db791a3.gt:
In a bowl, stir together the strawberries, sugar, orange juice, and Grand Marnier.
Set aside for 30 minutes to macerate.
Position a rack in the upper third of the oven and preheat the oven to 375 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a large bowl, sift together the flour, cocoa, and baking powder.
Whisk in the sugar and salt.
In another bowl, whisk together the egg, cream, butter, and vanilla.
Stir the cream mixture into the flour mixture.
Using a tablespoon, drop 6 to 8 shortcakes onto the prepared baking sheet, spacing the mounds evenly (the shortcakes will expand slightly as they bake).
Bake the shortcakes until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 15 to 18 minutes.
Transfer to a rack and let cool.
To whip the cream: In the bowl of a mixer fitted with the whip attachment, on medium-high speed, beat the cream, sugar, and vanilla to medium-stiff peaks.
Do not overbeat.
To serve, split the shortcakes horizontally.
Top the bottom half with a big spoonful of strawberries (including some of the juices) and a big dollop of whipped cream.
Top with the top layer of shortcake, and spoon some berries over the top.
Top with more whipped cream, drizzle with some of the juices, and serve.

56c2b059eb.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In four small cast iron skillets or one medium skillet, crumble half the cookie dough into small pieces, spreading in an even layer over bottom of skillet(s).
Drizzle hot fudge sauce over cookie dough.
Crumble remaining cookie dough on top of hot fudge, making sure to spread in an even layer.
Bake for 1820 minutes, or until top is golden brown and set.
Remove skillet(s) from oven and allow to cool slightly.
Serve with vanilla ice cream and extra hot fudge sauce, if desired.
Enjoy!
56c2b059eb.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease a 9-inch skillet or a similar-sized baking dish with cooking spray or butter.
3. In a large bowl, combine the refrigerated chocolate chip cookie dough and hot fudge sauce. Mix until well combined.
4. Press the dough mixture evenly into the prepared skillet or baking dish.
5. Bake the cookie dough for 15-20 minutes, or until the edges are set and the center is still slightly gooey.
6. Remove the skillet from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. If desired, add a scoop of vanilla ice cream on top of the cookie dough.
8. Serve the Chocolate Fudge Skillet Cookie immediately.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Chocolate Fudge Skillet Cookie!

e6bf3951b6.gt:
Cook meat and onion and green pepper until meat is browned and vegetables under tender.
Drain.
Stir in remaining ingredients and cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Remove Bay leaf when finished.
e6bf3951b6.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece in the image, follow these instructions:

1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, brown the ground beef over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened.
3. Add the chopped green pepper and cook until both are tender.
4. Add the stewed tomatoes, dark red kidney beans, drained, and the tomato sauce.
5. Stir in the salt, chili powder, and bay leaf.
6. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the chili has thickened and the flavors have melded together.
7. Serve the chili hot, garnished with your choice of toppings, such as shredded cheese, sour cream, or chopped onions.

Enjoy your delicious homemade chili!

e2b5a77d87.gt:
Heat oil in pan on low to medium heat, then throw in onion and sugar.
Cook for a couple of minutes, stirring from time to time.
Throw in mustard, stir to combine, and cook until onion is done to your liking, stirring as necessary.
Combine eggs, salt, pepper and cream cheese - don't worry if the cheese doesn't incorporate, it will once it's heated - and throw into pan, stirring everything together.
If mixture is too thick, add a little milk.
Add tomatoes, stirring and cooking until eggs are almost done, then add grated cheese and stir to melt and heat through.
Add extra salt & pepper if desired.
e2b5a77d87.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat.
3. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
4. Add the grated cheddar cheese and cook until melted and combined.
5. Add the chopped tomatoes and cook until they are softened and the cheese is melted.
6. Crack the eggs into the skillet and stir gently to combine with the cheese mixture.
7. Cook the eggs until they are scrambled and cooked through.
8. Season the dish with salt and pepper to taste.
9. If desired, add a splash of milk to the skillet to create a creamy sauce.
10. Transfer the scrambled eggs to a serving dish and serve immediately.

[/INST]

These are the steps to cook the dish displayed in the photo, which is Tomato & Onion Scrambled Eggs. The ingredients include 2 large free range eggs, 1 very small red onion, chopped, 12 vine-ripened tomatoes, chopped, 2 tablespoons light cream cheese, 3 tablespoons extra-sharp cheddar cheese, grated, 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard, 13 teaspoons sugar, 1 -2 tablespoon milk (optional), vegetable oil, sea salt, and freshly cracked black pepper. Follow these steps and enjoy your delicious Tomato & Onion Scrambled Eggs!

27e3ef474d.gt:
This recipes makes about 1 quart of frozen yogurt.
Place the blackberries in the bowl of a food processor.
Process until smooth.
Strain the blackberries through a fine mesh sieve set over a large mixing bowl.
Using the back of a spoon, press the mixture against the sieve to extract all the juice.
Discard the seeds and any pulp.
Add the yogurt to the blackberry juice and stir to combine.
Add about 3/4 cup of honey and taste for sweetness.
You may need more honey depending on how sweet the blackberries are.
I used just under 1 cup.
Add vanilla if desired and blend until smooth.
Process in an ice cream maker according to manufacturers instructions.
Serve immediately if you prefer a soft serve consistency or put it into a freezer safe container and freeze until firm.
If frozen remove from the freezer about 15 minutes before serving.
Recipe adapted from Southern Living Magazine.
27e3ef474d.pred:
To cook the blackberry frozen yogurt, follow these steps:

1. In a blender, combine 12 ounces of fresh blackberries, 33 ounces of plain Greek yogurt, and 1 cup of honey. Blend the mixture until smooth and creamy.

2. If desired, add a drop of vanilla extract for extra flavor.

3. Pour the mixture into a bowl or a container with a lid.

4. Place the bowl or container in the freezer for at least 2 hours or until the frozen yogurt is firm and set.

5. Once the frozen yogurt is ready, scoop it into your desired serving dish or bowl.

6. Enjoy your homemade blackberry frozen yogurt!

[/INST]

ec1a27fd77.gt:
In a ceramic bowl over boiling water melt the chocolate, water and butter together over a pot of boiling water.
(Bain marie method)
Pour the melted chocolate over the sugar and mix well.
Then separate the egg yolks from the egg whites.
And one by one add the yolks to the mixture mixing after each one.
Beat the egg whites until they are firm.
Then fold the egg whites into the chocolate mixture.
Once its all nicely mixed spoon into invidual ramekins.
Leave in the fridge for two hours to set.
Once set decorate your mousse.
I sprinkled powdered suger over mine just before serving and added a few slices of banana.
ec1a27fd77.pred:
1. In a saucepan, melt the butter over low heat.
2. Add the dark chocolate to the melted butter and stir until smooth.
3. Gradually add the sugar and stir until smooth.
4. Add the eggs one at a time, stirring well after each addition.
5. Add the water and stir until smooth.
6. Pour the mixture into a mixing bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or until firm.
7. Once firm, use a spatula to gently fold in whipped cream.
8. Pour the mixture into a serving dish and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or until firm.
9. Serve the homemade chocolate mousse immediately or refrigerate for a few hours before serving.

[/INST]

[INST] <<SYS>>
The image shows a close-up of a delicious homemade chocolate mousse. The mousse is a smooth and creamy dessert that is perfect for sharing with friends and family.
<</SYS>>

[/INST]

f31dd42e03.gt:
Turn crock pot on high while preparing ingredients.
In crock pot, mix together both packages of bearnaise sauce mix, wine, tarragon, turmeric and garlic powder until well blended.
Add shallots, ham, red pepper, potatoes artichokes and chicken.
Stir gently.
Cover, reduce heat setting to low and cook 6 hours.
f31dd42e03.pred:
[/SYS]

[INST] <<SYS>>
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Add shallots and cook until softened, about 2 minutes.
3. Add garlic powder, ground turmeric, and tarragon, and cook for another minute.
4. Add chicken breast tenders, cook until browned, about 5 minutes.
5. Add red bell pepper and cook for another 2 minutes.
6. Add cooked ham, bearnaise sauce mix, and red potatoes. Cook until the potatoes are tender, about 15 minutes.
7. Add thawed artichoke halves and cook for another 5 minutes.
8. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
9. Transfer the chicken and vegetables to a large baking dish.
10. Pour the wine over the chicken and vegetables, and bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly thickened.
11. Serve the Chicken New Orleans over rice or noodles, and enjoy!

8fe5441410.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.
Bake the yams until they are not quite done.
Remove them from the oven and allow them to cool.
Cut off the ends, peel them and cut them into approximately 1 slices.
Heat a heavy 10 skillet or pot on medium-low and melt the Earth Balance.
Add the honey, maple syrup, and barley malt syrup and stir.
Add the sliced yams to the pan, wedging them all in there.
Lift the pan (wearing pot holders), tilting it so that the sauce covers the yams.
Cook for 10 minutes, lifting and tilting occasionally.
Carefully turn the yams over.
Cook for another 10 minutes, lifting and tilting your pan again so the sauce covers the yams.
8fe5441410.pred:
To cook the Candied Yams, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Wash and peel the yams, then cut them into even-sized pieces.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the Earth Balance Margarine, honey, maple syrup, and barley malt syrup.
4. Add the yams to the bowl and toss them to coat them evenly with the mixture.
5. Transfer the yams to a baking dish, making sure they are evenly distributed.
6. Bake the yams in the preheated oven for about 45-50 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
7. Remove the baking dish from the oven and let the yams cool for a few minutes.
8. Serve the Candied Yams warm, as a side dish or a part of a larger meal.

Enjoy your delicious Candied Yams!

3d9830c9de.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
Combine all the ingredients except for the artichoke bottoms and the beef broth.
Divide and mound the meat mixture on the artichoke bottoms, about 4 tablespoons each.
In a well greased baking pan, place the filled artichokes, filled side up, in one layer.
Pour the broth over the whole thing.
Bake, lightly covered with foil, for 1 1/2 hours.
Uncover and bake another 10-15 minutes, until browned.
Serve hot.
3d9830c9de.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the lean ground beef, mushrooms, onion, eggs, celery, tomato puree, water, salt, pepper, and thyme.
3. Stuff each artichoke bottom with the beef and vegetable mixture, leaving a small opening at the top for steam to escape.
4. Place the stuffed artichokes in a large baking dish and pour the beef broth over them.
5. Cover the dish with aluminum foil and bake for 45-60 minutes, or until the artichokes are tender and the filling is cooked through.
6. Remove the foil and continue baking for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the artichokes are golden brown and the filling is bubbly.
7. Serve the stuffed artichokes hot.

[/INST]

8b0f1ee273.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a large saucepan combine broth, undrained tomatoes and orzo.
Bring to boiling.
Stir in Grilled & Ready Southwestern Chicken Strips.
Transfer mixture to a 2-quart baking dish.
Bake, covered, for 25 to 30 minutes or until pasta is tender.
Uncover and sprinkle with cheese during last 5 minutes of baking.
Let stand, covered, for 10 minutes before serving.
8b0f1ee273.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the chicken, broth, tomatoes, green chile peppers, orzo, and shredded cheese. Season with salt, pepper, and any other desired herbs or spices.
3. Transfer the mixture to a 9x13 inch baking dish.
4. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked through and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
5. Remove the casserole from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Zesty Chicken Orzo Casserole!

96679eee56.gt:
Blend four, 1 cup sugar, 3 tbsp melted butter, and milk until smooth.
Pour into greased 1 1/2 quart baking dish.
Pour fruit on top of batter.
Sprinkle remaining sugar on top.
Dot with remaining butter.
Bake on 375 for 45 min or until golden brown on top.
NOTE: If using fresh fruit, boil fruit with 1/4 cup water and 1 tbsp sugar until water is reduced to a syrup.
96679eee56.pred:
To recreate the Old Fashioned Southern Peach Cobbler, follow these instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 1 cup of self-rising flour, 3 cups of sugar, and the 3 tablespoons of melted butter. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the 12 cups of milk, and mix until smooth.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the 2 tablespoons of unmelted butter with the 12 cups of canned peaches.
5. Pour the batter mixture into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
6. Spread the peach mixture evenly over the batter.
7. Bake the cobbler in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes, or until the cobbler is golden brown and a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
8. Allow the cobbler to cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Old Fashioned Southern Peach Cobbler!

46dc2bc350.gt:
Break noodles
Mix everything together.
Mix flavor packets with 1 cup oil, 1/2 cup sugar, 1/2 cup white vinegar,
Mix with other ingredients and refrigerate over night
Stir next morning allowing noodles to soften
Will ne ready to serve in afternoon or evening
46dc2bc350.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the broccoli slaw mix, green onions, sunflower seeds, and slivered almonds.
2. In a separate bowl, mix the Ramen noodles with a little bit of water to soften them.
3. Add the softened Ramen noodles to the bowl with the other ingredients, and mix everything together until well combined.
4. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
5. Serve the coleslaw as a side dish or a salad, and enjoy!

c99df4226f.gt:
Preheat oven to 425F.
Grease the muffin tins.
Mix, in a medium bowl, cornmeal, flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, and white pepper.
Add cheese and nuts.
In another bowl, whisk the eggs.
Add milk and melted butter.
Mix the dry ingredients into the liquid mixture.
Stir until just combined.
Spoon the batter into prepared muffin tins.
Bake for ten minutes.
Let the muffins sit in the tins for a few minutes before removing.
Let cool on wire racks.
c99df4226f.pred:
To recreate the corn muffins with cheese and nuts, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the yellow cornmeal, flour, sugar, salt, and white pepper.
3. Add the melted butter, eggs, and milk, and mix until the batter is smooth and well combined.
4. Fold in the shredded cheddar cheese and chopped nuts (pecans or walnuts).
5. Pour the batter into a greased muffin tin, filling each cup about 3/4 full.
6. Bake the muffins for 15-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
7. Allow the muffins to cool for a few minutes in the pan, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious corn muffins with cheese and nuts!

1fda5d9400.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Grease one 9x5 inch loaf pan.
Cream butter and sugar together.
Beat in eggs one at a time.
Beat smooth.
Stir in milk, vanilla, and almond flavoring.
In large bowl combine flour, baking powder, and salt.
Stir in fruit, raisins, and nuts.
Add all at once to first bowl.
Stir only to moisten.
Turn into greased 9x5x3 inch loaf pan.
Bake for 1 hour in 350 degree F (175 degree C) oven until it tests done.
Let stand 10 minutes.
Remove from pan.
Cool and wrap.
1fda5d9400.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the margarine and sugar until smooth.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Stir in the milk, vanilla extract, and almond extract.
5. Gradually add the flour, baking powder, and salt, mixing until well combined.
6. Fold in the candied mixed fruit, raisins, and chopped almonds.
7. Pour the batter into a greased loaf pan.
8. Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean.
9. Allow the loaf to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious fruit and nut loaf!

b0d84623b8.gt:
Toss the chicken cubes with taco seasoning.
In a heavy skillet with a tight fitting lid, heat the oil and add the chicken and cook, stirring, until it changes color.
Stir in rice and stir to mix.
Add salsa and water.
Bring to a boil and reduce heat to a simmer.
Cover and allow to cook about 20 minutes.
Remove from heat and allow to stand about 5 minutes before serving.
If you like, you may sprinkle with chopped cilantro.
b0d84623b8.pred:
To recreate the Mexican Chicken and Rice dish, follow these instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet or oven-safe dish, heat the cooking oil over medium heat.
3. Add the chicken cubes to the skillet and cook until they are browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add the taco seasoning and cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly, until fragrant.
6. Add the cooked chicken back to the skillet and stir to combine.
7. Add the uncooked rice to the skillet, stirring to combine with the chicken and taco seasoning.
8. Pour in the salsa and water, stirring to combine.
9. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
10. Cover the skillet with a lid and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the rice is cooked through and the chicken is fully cooked.
11. Remove from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Mexican Chicken and Rice dish!

a89dfedebf.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Lightly grease cookie sheets.
In a large bowl, cream together the margarine, oil, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth.
Beat in the egg substitute, vanilla and water.
Combine the flour, baking soda, cinnamon and nutmeg; stir into the sugar mixture.
Stir in the oats, oat bran, wheat germ, raisins and walnuts.
Drop by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets.
Bake for 18 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the edges are lightly browned.
Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks.
a89dfedebf.pred:
[INSTRUCTIONS]
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the margarine and canola oil together until smooth.
3. Add the brown sugar, white sugar, egg substitute, vanilla extract, and water. Mix until well combined.
4. Gradually add the flour, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, oats, oat bran, wheat germ, and raisins. Mix until the dough comes together.

6. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
7. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown.

[/INSTRUCTIONS]
