feb321aa71.gt:
Rinse lobster shells and body parts with cold water to clean.
Add lobster parts to stock pot.
Add water to cover.
Add lemon juice and garlic salt.
Bring pot to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes.
Use tongs to remove and discard lobster shells and body pieces.
Add vegetables and simmer another 30 minutes.
Use slotted spoon to remove vegetables.
Reserve and serve with cooked rice.
Line a collander with cheescloth and ladel stock to strain through cheescloth into a pot.
Discard solids.
Lobster stock can be refrigerated for 10 days or frozen for 6 months.
Use in sauces, dips, soups and stews.
feb321aa71.pred:
To recreate the lobster stock, follow these instructions:
1. In a large pot, combine the lobster shells, lobster body parts, water, and garlic salt.
2. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to a simmer and let it cook for approximately 1-2 hours, or until the lobster shells are tender and the liquid has become a rich, flavorful stock.
3. Strain the stock through a fine-mesh sieve to remove any remaining shells or debris.
4. Add the sliced carrots, celery, and onion to the stock, and cook for an additional 15-20 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
5. Remove the vegetables from the pot, and discard any remaining shells.
6. Stir in the lemon juice, and season the stock with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Allow the stock to cool slightly, then refrigerate it until it is chilled.

Once the stock has cooled, you can use it as the base for various dishes, such as lobster bisque, lobster risotto, or lobster-infused pasta. Enjoy your culinary masterpiece!

e8b69ecf30.gt:
Combine flour, salt and ricotta; mix thoroughly.
Knead dough on lightly floured board until dough is smooth.
Set dough aside on corned of floured board.
Cut small pieces from dough and quickly roll dough into a "finger thin" roll, and cut into pieces about 1/2 inch long.
Flatten each piece gently with thumb and bring long sides together to form a hollow tube or shell shape.
Arrange the gnocchi on a lightly floured cloth or board, dust them lightly with flour.
After shaping all the dough, gently drop the gnocchi into a large pot of boiling, salted water.
Cook them about 10-12 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking.
When they rise to the surface, remove them from the pot with a strainer.
Place in a heated bowl.
Serve with your favorite pasta sauce and sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese.

10. Serve the Nana's Ricotta Gnocchi hot, with your favorite sauce or topping.

53797b9666.gt:
Mix together the egg, milk, and sugar in a deep bowl or tupperware container.
If you mix up the egg whites to break them up thoroughly, and it'll turn out better.
Cut the frozen bread into 4 pieces.
Use a skewer to poke holes into it.
It's hard for the egg mixture to get absorbed near the crusts, so be sure to poke holes there!
Soak the bread in the egg mixture.
After about two minutes, flip the bread over.
The bread is soft, so if you're worried about breaking it, use a spatula to flip.
Once both sides have completely soaked, fry it up and enjoy!
This is a version made without cutting up the bread.
It might look a bit unappealing with all those holes, but you won't be able to tell at all after it's been fried!
If it's too soft, it can break, but you can use a spatula to safely flip it over.
You can make more french toast with the remaining egg mixture if you like, but I like to pour it over the bread to fill in the holes!
!

a896ff3f80.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir shallot until translucent, about 5 minutes.
Pour balsamic vinegar into skillet and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low and simmer until balsamic vinegar mixture is reduced by half, about 10 minutes.
Stir often.
Cut chicken breasts from one side through the middle horizontally to within one-half inch of the other side.
Open the two sides and spread them out like an open book.
Spread half the goat cheese onto one half of each chicken breast and drizzle 1/3 of the reduced balsamic vinegar mixture over the goat cheese.
Close the chicken breasts over the goat cheese and secure with toothpicks.
Arrange chicken into a baking dish.
Drizzle with remaining 1/3 of the balsamic reduction.
Bake in the preheated oven until the chicken is no longer pink inside, the filling is hot, and the juices run clear, 30 to 35 minutes.
An instant-read meat thermometer inserted into the center of a filled breast should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C).

Press into bottom of a 9-inch pie plate, or a 9-inch glass baking pan.
Bake 375 degrees F for 8-10 minutes; cool then place the empty crust into the freezer until ready to fill.
In a large bowl combine the soft ice cream with peanut butter until well combined, then mix in the frozen chopped peanut butter cups (if using) pour into the frozen pie crust, then sprinkle with chopped peanuts.
Return to the freezer until firm.
When the pie is completely frozen drizzle the magic shell on top.
Return to freezer until ready to use.
cd2f6516bb.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the softened chocolate ice cream and melted butter. Mix until smooth and well combined.
2. Add the chopped and frozen Reese's Peanut Butter cups to the bowl, and mix until they are evenly distributed throughout the ice cream mixture.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the chopped salted peanuts and sugar.
4. Carefully pour the ice cream mixture over the peanut mixture, stirring gently to combine.
5. Pour the mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish or a similar-sized container.
6. In a small bowl, mix the chopped and frozen peanut butter and the Magic Shell ice cream topping. Spread the mixture evenly over the top of the ice cream mixture.
7. Sprinkle the chopped salted peanuts evenly over the top of the ice cream mixture.
8. Refrigerate the dessert for at least 2 hours or overnight before serving.

This dessert is a delicious and visually appealing combination of ice cream, peanut butter, and chocolate cookie crumbs. Enjoy!

f040d5fa02.gt:
For the cookies: Cream butter and sugar.
Add eggs and vanilla and mix well.
Add buttermilk and nutmeg and mix well.
Add dry ingredients and mix until incorporated.
Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet and bake at 350 degrees F for 12-15 minutes.
For the glaze: Combine all glaze ingredients, stirring until smooth.
Drizzle small spoonfuls of glaze over cooled cookies.
Store cookies in an airtight container.
Recipe adapted from Buttermilk Cookies on Gourmet.com
f040d5fa02.pred:
To cook the Nutmeg Buttermilk Cookies, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs and vanilla, and continue to mix until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the nutmeg, flour, salt, baking soda, and buttermilk.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until just combined.
6. Fold in the powdered sugar and additional nutmeg, if desired.
7. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are lightly golden and the cookies are set.
9. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Nutmeg Buttermilk Cookies!

4cdb9f81ba.gt:
Add the creamed corn and water to a pot, and turn on the heat.
When the mixture starts to simmer, add the soy milk.
When the mixture starts to simmer again, add the consomme cube.
Once the consomme is dissolved, add the heavy cream.
Top with corn if you like, and done.
4cdb9f81ba.pred:
1. In a large pot, combine the canned creamed corn, soy milk, heavy cream, and consomme cube. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for about 15-20 minutes.
2. Add the corn water, corn, and any desired toppings to the pot. Stir gently to combine all the ingredients.
3. Cook for an additional 10-15 minutes or until the corn is tender and the soup has reached the desired thickness.
4. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Serve the corn soup hot, and enjoy!

This cooking guide provides a simple and delicious recipe for making corn soup using soy milk, creamed corn, and other ingredients. The soup is a comforting and satisfying dish that can be enjoyed by people of all ages.

e02496cb22.gt:
Combine egg and milk.
Then spread flour, cayenne and cheese on a plate.
Season each fillet with salt and pepper.
Dip fillet in egg mixture, then in flour mixture, then in corn flakes.
Place on a baking sheet lightly sprayed with nonstick cooking spray.
Bake at 450F, 10 minutes per 1 inch fillet or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork.
e02496cb22.pred:
To recreate the spicy fried pollock, follow these instructions:

1. In a large bowl, whisk the egg and milk together.
2. Add the flour, cayenne pepper, and grated parmesan cheese to the bowl, and mix until well combined.
3. Season the pollock fillets with salt and pepper, then coat them in the flour mixture.
4. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Carefully place the pollock fillets in the skillet, and cook for about 3-4 minutes on each side, or until the fish is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
5. Remove the cooked pollock from the skillet, and place it on a plate.
6. In the same skillet, add the crushed corn flakes and cook over medium heat for about 2-3 minutes, stirring constantly. The corn flakes should become crispy and golden brown.
7. Carefully place the cooked pollock on top of the corn flakes, and serve immediately.

Enjoy your spicy fried pollock dish!

2615f04030.gt:
Warm milk, water, honey, and tea in the microwave for 2 minutes.
Enjoy!
2615f04030.pred:
To cook the honey vanilla white tea chai, follow these steps:

1. In a saucepan, bring the 1% low-fat milk to a boil.
2. Remove the saucepan from the heat and steep the tea bag in the milk for 5-10 minutes.
3. Remove the tea bag and discard it.
4. Add the water to the saucepan and stir to combine.
5. Add the honey and stir until it is fully incorporated.
6. Serve the honey vanilla white tea chai in a cup.

Enjoy your delicious and comforting honey vanilla white tea chai!

641af093c6.gt:
In a large bowl, whisk the lime juice, fish sauce, sambal oelek and ginger.
Season with salt and pepper.
Add the watermelon, radishes, scallions and red chiles and toss.
Fold in the mint and basil, season with salt and pepper and serve right away.

0fc7e26c7e.gt:
In bowl, whisk together dressing and sun-dried tomatoes; reserve.
Arrange arugula on platter.
Top with rows of celery and tomatoes on one side and olives and artichoke hearts on the other.
Fold slices of cheese and salami into quarters; arrange in center of salad.
Drizzle salad with dressing.
0fc7e26c7e.pred:
To recreate the antipasto salad, follow these steps:
1. In a large bowl, combine the vinaigrette dressing, sun-dried tomatoes, and chopped celery.
2. Add the baby arugula leaves, plum tomatoes, and black olives to the bowl.
3. Gently toss the ingredients to combine.
4. Add the artichoke hearts and provolone cheese to the bowl.
5. Toss the ingredients again to combine.
6. Serve the antipasto salad immediately or refrigerate until ready to serve.

This antipasto salad is a delicious and visually appealing dish that can be enjoyed as a starter or a light meal. The combination of flavors and textures, along with the vibrant colors of the ingredients, make it an excellent choice for any gathering or event.

592c968c3a.gt:
Flatten chicken thighs.
MAKE PESTO: Microwave oil and garlic together on HIGH 40 seconds; process with basil through pepper in a food processor.
Spread about 1 tsp pesto down center of each thigh, leaving a 1/4-inch border on short ends.
Starting at a short end, roll each thigh up with pesto inside and secure with a toothpick.
Arrange rolls 1/2 inch apart, seam sides down, in a 13 x 9-inch baking dish coated with cooking spray.
Bake at 375 until a cooking thermometer registers 170 (about 30 minutes), turning rolls after 15 minutes.
IMPORTANT: Cool, transfer to a covered container and refrigerate overnight.
Remove toothpicks and cut each roll crosswise into 1/4-inch-thick slices.
592c968c3a.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix together the chicken thighs, nonstick cooking spray, and 2 teaspoons of extra virgin olive oil.
3. Season the chicken with salt and pepper, then transfer the mixture to a baking dish.
4. In a small bowl, mix together the crushed garlic, basil leaves, and parsley.
5. Spread the pesto mixture evenly over the chicken thighs, then sprinkle the herb mixture on top.
6. Pour the chicken broth over the chicken, then bake for 30-35 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
7. Remove the chicken from the oven, let it rest for a few minutes, then slice it into spirals.
8. Serve the pesto chicken spirals over a bed of pasta or rice, and enjoy your delicious meal!

0039c547a7.gt:
Firstly cook some rice.
Dice the onion and garlic into small pieces.
Chop all other vegetables and chicken into about 2cm cubes.
Soak the chopped eggplant in a bowl of water for a while.
Put olive oil into a pot and brown the garlic and onion.
Then add in the chicken and saute until it turns color.
Add other vegetables and saute well.
Put in the curry powder, cinnamon powder, bay leaf and salt once all food has cooked through.
Add one cup of water into the pot and cook for about 10 min on medium heat.
When it starts to boil, turn to low heat and keep cooking for about 15 min with the lid on, stirring occasionally.
Finally, pour in the coconut milk while mixing gently.
Add more seasoning if needed.
Serve the curry on the cooked rice, and add mint leaves for a nice finishing touch.
Enjoy.
0039c547a7.pred:
1. In a large pot or pan, heat oil over medium heat.
2. Add the chicken and cook until browned, then remove from the pot and set aside.
3. Add the eggplant, onion, and carrot to the pot and cook until the vegetables are tender.
4. Add the pumpkin/kabocha squash and cook for a few more minutes.
5. Add the garlic, curry powder, cinnamon powder, bay leaf, and salt to the pot. Stir well.
6. Pour in the coconut milk and bring the mixture to a simmer.
7. Add the cooked chicken back into the pot and let it simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
8. Serve the coconut milk curry over rice or with your preferred side dish.

[/INST]

cab917403f.gt:
Mix all ingredients together and place in a clean jar with a tight lid.
Use 2 T.
per pound of meat.
cab917403f.pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients for the taco seasoning mix. These include 14 cups of instant minced onion, 3 tablespoons of chili powder, 2 tablespoons of cumin, 1 teaspoon of salt, 2 teaspoons of red pepper flakes, 1 tablespoon of cornstarch, and 12 teaspoons of garlic powder.

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine all the ingredients for the taco seasoning mix. Mix well to ensure that all the ingredients are evenly distributed.

3. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

4. Spread the taco seasoning mix evenly over a baking sheet or a large roasting pan. Roast the seasoning mix in the preheated oven for about 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally to ensure even cooking.

5. Once the seasoning mix is fully cooked, remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes. This will help the seasoning to settle and become more evenly distributed.

6. Once the seasoning mix has cooled, store it in an airtight container or a jar with a tight-fitting lid. This will help preserve the seasoning mix for future use.

7. To use the seasoning mix, simply sprinkle it over your desired dish, such as tacos, enchiladas, or other Mexican-inspired meals. The seasoning mix can also be used as a base for other seasoning blends, allowing you to customize the flavor to your taste.

[/INST]

By following these instructions, you will have a delicious and appetizing taco seasoning mix that can be used in various Mexican-inspired dishes.

364e4fdc52.gt:
Melt butter, add flour, salt, and pepper, wisk until smooth.
Add milk slowly, whisking to blend.
Cook until thick and smooth, add cheese and stir until melted.
Cook elbow noodles as directed on package.
Drain and pour into a baking dish.
Pour cheese sauce over cooked elbows.
Bake at 350F for 15 minutes or until lightly browned.
*It's best to use a double boiler or nonstick pan to make your cheese sauce.
364e4fdc52.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:

1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the elbow macaroni and cook until it is tender but still firm to the bite, usually around 8-10 minutes.

2. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the flour and cook for about 1 minute, stirring constantly.

3. Gradually add the milk, stirring constantly to prevent lumps. Cook the mixture until it thickens and bubbles, about 5-7 minutes.

4. Add the cooked macaroni to the skillet, stirring to combine.

5. Add the American cheese, stirring until it is melted and well combined.

6. Season the macaroni and cheese with salt and pepper to taste.

7. Serve the Mom's Macaroni & Cheese hot, garnished with additional cheese if desired.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Mom's Macaroni & Cheese!

fbc4ea771e.gt:
Make Cacik: In a mixing bowl, combine cucumbers and garlic.
Add salt to taste.
Mix in yogurt with wooden spoon.
Transfer to serving bowl.
Garnish with mint and drizzle olive oil on top.
Serve immediately or cover and refrigerate.
Prepare skewers by spraying a light coat of cooking oil to prevent sticking.
Place lamb and vegetables on skewers.
Grill spicy lamb kebabs for about 5-7 minutes on each side or until desired doneness.
Serve with hummus, baba ghannouj, or turkish cacik, a cucumber yogurt sauce for dipping.
fbc4ea771e.pred:
1. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
2. In a large bowl, combine the lamb, green peppers, cherry tomatoes, onions, lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, cumin, turmeric, red pepper, and salt. Mix well to ensure all ingredients are evenly distributed.
3. Thread the lamb and vegetables onto skewers, alternating between lamb and vegetables.
4. Brush the kabobs with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
5. Grill the kabobs for about 10-15 minutes, or until the lamb is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
6. While the kabobs are cooking, prepare the cacik by combining the cucumbers, yogurt, garlic, mint, and salt in a bowl.
7. Once the kabobs are cooked, remove them from the grill and let them rest for a few minutes.
8. Serve the spicy lamb kabobs with a dollop of cacik on the side.

Enjoy your delicious Spicy Lamb Kabobs With Turkish Cacik!

eb0fd599e7.gt:
Mix together all dry ingredients, then add the wet ingredients gradually and stir in until the consistency is like that of smooth thick cream
Heat a lightly oiled frying pan and spoon the batter in ladlefulls
Cook until bubbles form then start to pop then flip over and lightly brown the other side
You can change the vanilla for any other flavouring you like such as strawberry, add some cocoa powder and some orange essence for chocolate orange, add blueberries or chocolate chips to the batter, the possibilities are endless!
eb0fd599e7.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 200°C (400°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, bicarb, cream of tartar, and sugar.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the milk, rice, or almond flour, and potato or corn starch.
4. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
5. Pour the batter onto a greased and floured surface, and spread it evenly to a thickness of about 1/2 inch.
6. Bake the pancakes for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
7. Allow the pancakes to cool for a few minutes, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.
8. Once the pancakes are cool, use a spatula to spread a layer of vanilla icing or glaze on top of each pancake.
9. Serve the pancakes immediately, and enjoy!

[/INST]

b12f641798.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F with rack in middle.
Pat beef dry and season with 2 1/2 teaspoons salt and 1 teaspoon pepper.
Heat oil in pot over medium-high heat until it shimmers, then brown meat, without crowding, in 3 batches, turning, about 8 minutes per batch.
Transfer to a platter.
Reduce heat to medium, then add carrots, celery, onions, and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, until well browned, about 12 minutes.
Push vegetables to one side of pot.
Add tomato paste to cleared area and cook paste, stirring, 2 minutes, then stir into vegetables.
Add vinegar and cook, stirring, 2 minutes.
Stir in wine, bay leaves, and thyme and boil until wine is reduced by about two thirds, 10 to 12 minutes.
Add broth to pot along with water, beef, and any juices from platter and bring to a simmer.
Cover and braise in oven until meat is very tender, about 2 1/2 hours.
Set a large colander in a large bowl.
Pour stew into colander.
Return pieces of meat to pot, then discard remaining solids.
Let cooking liquid stand 10 minutes.
While beef braises, peel potatoes and cut into 1/2-inch-wide wedges.
Slice carrots diagonally (1-inch).
Add potatoes and carrots to stew (make sure they are submerged) and simmer, uncovered, stirring occasionally, until potatoes and carrots are tender, about 40 minutes.
b12f641798.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large, heavy pot or Dutch oven, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the beef and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes. Remove the beef from the pot and set aside.
3. Add the onions, celery, and garlic to the pot and cook until the onions are softened, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the tomato paste, balsamic vinegar, and wine to the pot. Stir to combine and cook until the liquid has evaporated and the mixture is bubbly, about 5 minutes.
5. Return the beef to the pot and add the broth, water, potatoes, carrots, thyme, and bay leaves. Stir to combine and bring the mixture to a boil.
6. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for 1 1/2 to 2 hours, or until the beef is tender and the vegetables are cooked through.
7. Remove the bay leaves and thyme sprigs from the pot. Season the stew with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Serve the beef stew hot, over crusty bread, and enjoy!

[/SYS]

9fd9690bf2.gt:
1.
Mix all ingredients together.
2.
Cook in a greased 9 springform pan at 400 degrees F for 3035 minutes, or until cooked in the center.
3.
Cool and cut into wedges.
9fd9690bf2.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the Jiffy Corn Muffin Mix, Creamed Corn, Milk, and eggs. Mix until well combined.
3. Gradually add the grated Cheddar Cheese to the mixture, stirring until well combined.
4. Grease a muffin tin with cooking spray or butter.
5. Pour the batter into the prepared muffin tin, filling each cup about 3/4 full.
6. Bake the muffins in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
7. Allow the muffins to cool for a few minutes in the pan, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Easy Corn Bread!

db70371f36.gt:
Sprinkle gelatin over juice in a small heatproof cup and let stand 1 minute to soften.
Puree mangoes with sugar in a blender until very smooth and force through a sieve into a large bowl.
Melt softened gelatin in cup in a pan of simmering water or in a microwave and stir into puree.
Beat cream with an electric mixer until it just holds stiff peaks and gently fold into puree.
Chill fool, covered, at least 8 hours.
db70371f36.pred:
1. In a small saucepan, combine the unflavored gelatin and lime juice. Allow the mixture to sit for a few minutes to soften the gelatin.
2. In a blender, combine the mango flesh, sugar, and heavy cream. Blend until smooth and creamy.
3. Stir the softened gelatin mixture into the blender mixture.
4. Pour the mixture into a serving dish or individual bowls.
5. Refrigerate the mixture for at least 2 hours or until set.
6. To make the Chocolate-Anise Straws:
- In a small saucepan, combine the chocolate and anise seeds. Heat over low heat, stirring occasionally, until the chocolate is melted and smooth.
- Allow the chocolate mixture to cool slightly.
- Dip the straws into the chocolate mixture, covering them evenly.
- Place the chocolate-covered straws on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
- Refrigerate the chocolate-covered straws for at least 15 minutes or until set.

7. Serve the Mango Fools with the Chocolate-Anise Straws on the side. Enjoy your delicious and visually appealing meal!

4256f1a9b2.gt:
Preheat oven to 300.
Prepare some boiling water.
In a saucepan over medium heat, combine cream, banana puree and 2 T. sugar.
Cook, stirring occasionally until small bubbles appear around edges of pan.
Set aside.
In a bowl, beat egg yolks and vanilla until smooth and light.
Pour hot cream mixture into egg yolks, a little at a time, beating continuously until well blended.
Strain mixture through a fine sieve into a bowl.
Divide mixture among 4 ramekins.
Arrange ramekins in a baking pan and place on middle shelf of preheated oven.
Fill pan with boiling water to halfway up sides of ramekins.
Cover pan loosely with aluminum foil.
Bake until custard is just set, about 25 minutes.
(this took an additional 9 minutes for mine, as I have deeper ramekins) Chill 2-3 hours.
Slice bananas horizontally into 1/2" slices and arrange on top of chilled creme brulees.
Sprinkle remaining sugar over tops of bananas.
With cooking torch, move flame econtinuously over the surface of the ramekins, in a circular motion until sugar melts and becomes golden brown and bubbly.
(this is where I failed.
I was afraid to add the entire 1/3 cup sugar, so didn't get enough carmelized effect) Serve immediately.
4256f1a9b2.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the heavy cream, bananas, and lemon juice. Whisk until smooth.
2. In a separate bowl, mix the sugar and vanilla extract.
3. Gradually pour the sugar mixture into the cream mixture, whisking constantly.
4. Add the egg yolks one at a time, whisking after each addition.
5. Pour the mixture into a large, greased baking dish.
6. Bake in a preheated oven at 325°F (163°C) for about 45-50 minutes or until the custard is set.
7. Allow the baked custard to cool for a few minutes before placing it in the refrigerator to chill for at least 2 hours or overnight.
8. Once chilled, sprinkle the top with a thin layer of granulated sugar.
9. Place the baking dish under a broiler or use a kitchen torch to caramelize the sugar. This will create a delicious crust on top of the custard.
10. Serve the Banana Creme Brulee immediately.

[/INST]

27d1b89ffe.gt:
For the dressing: In a small bowl, add Greek yogurt, barbecue sauce, ranch seasoning and milk.
Mix until combined; refrigerate until ready to use.
For the salad: Divide romaine lettuce, corn, black beans, tomato, cucumber, avocado and chicken among plates.
Top with barbecue ranch dressing.
27d1b89ffe.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:

1. In a large bowl, combine the Greek yogurt, barbecue sauce, and seasoning packet. Mix well.
2. Add the cooked chicken to the bowl and mix until well combined.
3. Add the shredded romaine lettuce, corn, black beans, tomatoes, cucumber, avocado, and diced chicken to the bowl.
4. If desired, add a splash of milk to the mixture.
5. Toss the salad gently to combine all the ingredients.
6. Serve the BBQ Chicken Salad with BBQ Ranch Dressing on the side.

This meal is a delicious and healthy option, featuring a variety of ingredients such as chicken, vegetables, and beans. The combination of flavors from the barbecue sauce, ranch dressing, and seasoning packet creates a satisfying and well-balanced meal.

daa0bc21ff.gt:
Preheat oven to 350
Mix cake mix as directed on box.grease and flour pan.
Pour batter into pan.13 x 9 " cake pan.
Mix other 3 ing.
Creme well.swirl cheese in cake.
Top with rest of chips
Bake 350 for about 25 to 35 min.
daa0bc21ff.pred:
1. First, preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cake mix, granulated sugar, and chocolate chips. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the creme cheese and egg, and mix until the batter is smooth and well combined.
4. Spread the batter evenly into the prepared baking dish.
5. Bake the brownies for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
6. Allow the brownies to cool completely before cutting and serving.

Enjoy your delicious creme cheese brownies!

3bcbe8be61.gt:
Directions
1.
Clean blueberries and place in a stainless steel pan over medium heat.
2.
Add sugar.
3.
Bring to rolling boil, stirring constantly, and then bring heat down to low.
4.
Cook on low for five minutes or until blueberries are mostly liquid (there will be some remaining chunks of blueberries).
5.
Remove from heat, pour mixture into a bowl and place in fridge until cool (about 1 hour).
6.
Remove blueberry mixture from fridge, mix in creme fraiche.
7.
Pour blueberry creme fraiche mixture into ice cream maker, following machine instructions.
If you dont have an ice cream maker (I borrowed my friend Annes) then follow David Lebovitzs instructions for making ice cream without a machine.
3bcbe8be61.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece, follow these instructions:
1. In a medium saucepan, combine 3 cups of fresh blueberries, 1/2 cup of sugar, and 8 ounces of fluid Creme Fraiche.
2. Cook the mixture over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the sugar has dissolved and the mixture has thickened slightly.
3. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
4. Pour the mixture into an ice cream maker and churn according to the manufacturer's instructions.
5. Once the ice cream is churned, transfer it to an airtight container and place it in the freezer to harden for at least 2 hours.
6. Once the ice cream is hard, scoop it into bowls and enjoy your delicious Blueberry and Creme Fraiche Ice Cream!

[/SYS]

f12ad1f38c.gt:
1.
Preheat oven to 375 degrees.
2.
Make the cheese mixture: mix the cottage cheese, mozzarella, parmesan, basil, oregano, and lemon pepper seasoning together.
3.
Slice the chicken in half lengthwise to create a pocket.
4.
Fill the chicken with the cheese mixture and place into a greased baking dish.
5.
Brush the tops of the chicken breasts with oil and sprinkle with a bit of salt and pepper.
6.
Bake the chicken for 45-55 minutes, or until cooked through and no longer pink.
7.
The cheese mixture will likely have melted a bit from inside the chicken, but just scoop it up and place on a serving plate.
8.
Top the chicken with pasta sauce of your choice.
I usually make my own sauce, but any favorite sauce will work!
f12ad1f38c.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix together the Cottage Cheese, Shredded Mozzarella, Grated Parmesan, Dried Basil, Dried Oregano, and Lemon Pepper Seasoning.
3. Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
4. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breasts and cook until they are browned on both sides and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes per side.
5. Remove the chicken from the skillet and let it rest for a few minutes.
6. Cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces and return it to the skillet. Pour the Pasta Sauce over the chicken and stir to combine.
7. Pour the Cottage Cheese mixture over the chicken and stir to combine.
8. Cover the skillet with a lid and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and hot.
9. Serve the Triple Cheese Stuffed Chicken over a bed of cooked pasta. Enjoy your delicious meal!

2c940899a2.gt:
Mix all the ingredients.
Form into rice balls, wrap in nori and enjoy!
2c940899a2.pred:
[INST]
1. Prepare the rice: Cook the rice according to the package instructions, and let it cool.
2. Prepare the Dashida soup stock: In a small saucepan, heat the Dashida over medium heat until it becomes fragrant.
3. Prepare the sesame oil: Heat the sesame oil in a small saucepan over medium heat until it reaches the desired temperature.
4. Prepare the sesame seeds: Rinse the sesame seeds and let them dry.
5. Prepare the nori seaweed: Rinse the nori seaweed and let it dry.
6. Assemble the onigiri: In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked rice, sesame oil, sesame seeds, and nori seaweed. Mix well to ensure the rice is evenly coated.
7. Fill the onigiri: Using a small spoon, fill the onigiri with the rice mixture.
8. Serve: Serve the onigiri with the fragrant Dashida soup stock as a dipping sauce.

[/INST]

020aa88369.gt:
Halve dough.
Roll out both to 34cm X 30cm.
Leave to rise for 10 minutes.
Carefully spread each one with 1 TBSP of vegemite, coating all the dough.
Sprinkle the grated cheese over the bases, keeping some for sprinkling on the top.
Roll the dough from the 34cm end loosely til you have a sausage.
Slice into 10 pieces and arrange on baking tray, loosening them up a little.
Sprinkle remaining cheese on the scrolls.
Bake at 200.C for about 20 minutes.
I always check after 10 to see how they are going.
Enjoy!
020aa88369.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. Roll out the pizza dough to a thickness of about 1/4 inch.
3. Spread a thin layer of vegemite over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
4. Sprinkle the grated cheese evenly over the vegemite layer.
5. Roll the dough over the cheese, enclosing it, to form a tight roll.
6. Place the roll on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
7. Bake the roll in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Remove the roll from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing it into individual servings.

Enjoy your delicious Ange's Awesome Cheeseymite Scrolls!

064cb6c3cf.gt:
In a large Dutch oven, cook green beans and ham on medium heat with water up just over the beans.
Cook for 20-30 minutes.
Add potatoes and salt, cover and turn heat down to low, cook another 15-20 minutes or until the potatoes are done when pierced with a fork.
Note: Amount of ham and salt can be adjusted to your taste.
064cb6c3cf.pred:
[/SYS]

2. In a large bowl, toss the green beans with the diced bacon, ham, or salt pork.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the 1 tablespoon of salt with the 10 whole medium new potatoes.
4. Spread the green beans and potatoes on a baking sheet.
5. Roast the green beans and potatoes in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly crispy.
6. Serve the roasted green beans and potatoes immediately.

aa904a4678.gt:
Place your jello shot cups on a cookie sheet (that you know will fit in your fridge).
This will make for easy transport.
Place 2 cups VERY hot water (but not boiling) in a pitcher.
Slowly pour in contents of jello packages while stirring constantly.
Stir until completely mixed (about 2 minutes).
Add in the remaining ingredients and stir well.
Pour into plastic jello shot cups or you can use a 9x13 pan if you don't have the cups.
Chill 4 hours or more until set.
If you are using a cake pan, simply cut the set jello into squares and place on individual cupcake cups for serving.
If you want to get silly, top each one with a small dollop of whip cream just before serving!
aa904a4678.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the two boxes of blue Jello gelatin with the very hot water. Stir until the gelatin is fully dissolved.
2. Add the coconut rum and blue schnapps to the mixture, stirring until the alcohol is fully incorporated.
3. Pour the mixture into 12 cup molds or shot glasses, ensuring that the liquid is evenly distributed.
4. Refrigerate the molds or shot glasses for at least 4 hours or overnight.
5. Once the mixture has set, carefully remove the molds or shot glasses from the refrigerator and place them in the freezer for an additional 30 minutes.
6. To serve, carefully remove the molds or shot glasses from the freezer and let them sit at room temperature for a few minutes.
7. Enjoy your Baja Blue Jello Shots!

[/INST]

[/SYS]

112e4c6352.gt:
Slice panettone into 1 inch slices; cut each slice into 4 wedges.
In a small bowl, whisk together the mascarpone, orange preserves, and orange juice.
In a separate large bowl, whisk the eggs, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Dip the panettone into the egg mixture, coating well.
Place into the hot oil; fry until golden brown, about 3 minutes per side.
Serve with the orange mascarpone sauce.
112e4c6352.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, mascarpone cheese, orange juice, orange marmalade, ground cinnamon, and nutmeg until well combined.
3. Dip the slices of panettone into the egg mixture, making sure they are evenly coated.
4. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Cook the panettone slices until golden brown on both sides, flipping them halfway through the cooking process.
5. Transfer the cooked panettone slices to a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for about 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
6. Serve the panettone French toast with the orange mascarpone sauce on the side.

[/INST]

7. To make the orange mascarpone sauce, simply combine the mascarpone cheese, orange juice, orange marmalade, and a pinch of ground cinnamon in a small bowl. Whisk until smooth and creamy.

[/INST]

8. Enjoy your delicious Panettone French Toast with Orange Mascarpone Sauce!

99ac5fb3f6.gt:
Mix first 10 ingredients in a bowl.
Take a wonton wrapper and place 1 heaping teaspoon of filling in center.
Moisten edges with water, fold over and press to seal edges.
Add 3 tablespoons of Peanut Oil to a large skillet and saute until the bottoms are golden brown.
When golden brown, add 1/2 cup chicken broth, cover pan and simmer 8 minutes.
Remove from pan.
Reserve broth in a separate bowl and repeat process until all potstickers are cooked.
Keep warm on a plate covered.
99ac5fb3f6.pred:
To cook the mystery dish, which are Pot Stickers (Chinese Dumplings), follow these steps:

1. In a large bowl, combine the ground pork, chopped green onions, soy sauce, rice wine, sesame oil, minced garlic, beaten egg, cornstarch, salt, and pepper. Mix well.

2. To make the dumpling wrappers, divide the wonton skins into equal portions. Place a small spoonful of the pork mixture onto the center of each wrapper. Fold the wrapper over the filling, pressing the edges together to seal.

3. Heat peanut oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. When the oil is hot, carefully place the dumplings in the pan, being careful not to overcrowd the pan. Cook for about 3-4 minutes, or until the dumplings are golden brown on all sides.

4. Remove the dumplings from the pan and place them on a plate. Pour the chicken broth over the dumplings, dividing the broth evenly.

5. Serve the Pot Stickers with a dipping sauce, such as soy sauce, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Pot Stickers!

c2277ff083.gt:
In a large pot, bring the water and salt to a boil; add the lentils, reduce the heat to medium-low and cook for 30 minutes or until the lentils are tender but not overcooked; drain.
In a colander, rinse the cooked lentils under cold water until slightly cool, then place them in a bowl.
Whisk together the remaining ingredients; pour over the lentils and combine well.
Chill for 1 to 2 hours and serve cold.
c2277ff083.pred:
1. In a large pot, combine the 8 cups of water, 2 tablespoons of salt, and the 1 lb of dried lentils. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for approximately 20-25 minutes, or until the lentils are tender but still have a slight bite.

2. While the lentils are cooking, prepare the vinaigrette by combining the 14 cups of olive oil, 14 cups of white wine vinegar, 12 teaspoons of dried ground cumin, 12 teaspoons of dried ground coriander, 1 teaspoon of cayenne, and 1 teaspoon of salt in a small bowl. Whisk the ingredients together until well combined.

3. Once the lentils are cooked, drain the water and add the chilled lentil salad to the bowl of vinaigrette. Toss the lentils to coat them evenly with the dressing.

4. Serve the chilled lentil salad immediately, or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving to allow the flavors to meld together.

[/INST]

By following these instructions, you will have a delicious and appetizing chilled lentil salad with spicy vinaigrette, ready to enjoy.

e05a7c1c5e.gt:
Preheat oven to 400F.
Stir together salt, allspice, and cayenne.
Pat pork dry and sprinkle spice rub all over pork, pressing to adhere.
Heat oil in a 12-inch heavy skillet over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking, then brown pork, 1 tenderloin at a time, on all sides, about 1 minute each.
Transfer as browned to a large roasting pan and arrange 2 inches apart.
Roast in middle of oven until an instant-read thermometer inserted diagonally 2 inches into center of each tenderloin registers 155F, 20 to 25 minutes.
Let pork stand 5 minutes before slicing.
e05a7c1c5e.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:

1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the pork tenderloins with the coarse salt, ground allspice, and cayenne.
3. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the pork tenderloins and sear for 2-3 minutes on each side to create a nice crust.
4. Transfer the pork to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).
5. While the pork is cooking, prepare the pineapple-avocado salsa.
6. In a small bowl, mix the pineapple, avocado, onion, and lime juice. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Once the pork is cooked, let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into thin pieces.
8. Serve the pork with the pineapple-avocado salsa on the side.

Enjoy your delicious spiced pork tenderloin and avocado salsa meal!

d069fb1925.gt:
Cut off the stem of the shiitake mushrooms and cut into bite size pieces.
Put water and the seasoning ingredients in a pot and let it boil.
Then, add the shiitake mushrooms, cover with a drop lid, and cook it for about 10 minutes on low heat.
Stir the pot sometimes.
Take off the drop lid when the liquid boils down and remove from the heat when the liquid has almost gone.
When it has cooled down a little, it is done.
You can keep it in the fridge for about 3 days so make some and keep it for bento lunch box.
It will be an extra dish for dinner if you keep some in the fridge.
d069fb1925.pred:
1. Prepare the ingredients:
- Wash the shiitake mushrooms thoroughly and remove the stems.
- Rinse the mushrooms under cold water to remove any dirt or grit.
- Cut the mushrooms into bite-sized pieces.
- In a small bowl, mix the soy sauce, mirin, sake, and sugar.

2. Cook the dish:
- In a large skillet or wok, heat some oil over medium heat.
- Add the mushrooms and cook until they are slightly browned and tender.
- Pour the soy sauce mixture over the mushrooms and stir to combine.
- Cook for a few more minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauce has thickened and the mushrooms are coated evenly.

3. Serve the dish:
- Serve the cooked mushrooms over rice or noodles, and enjoy your delicious meal.

[/INST]

7a20842b45.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a large bowl using an electric mixer or stand mixer, beat butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, one at a time.
Add vanilla.
In another bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder and salt.
Add the flour mixture and bananas to the butter mixture in the mixer, alternating between the two.
Line each muffin cup with a paper liner.
Fill each muffin cups about 2/3 full with batter and bake for 17-20 minutes until a tester inserted into a cupcake comes out clean.
Remove from the oven and let cool on a wire rack.
Let cupcakes cool completely before frosting.
For the frosting, using an electric mixer or stand mixer, cream butter until light and fluffy.
Add confectioners sugar 1/2 cup at a time, beating well after each addition.
Add vanilla and milk and beat until frosting is well combined.
Add in strawberry preserves 1 tablespoon at a time until frosting is creamy.
Frost cooled cupcakes and store in the refrigerator.
7a20842b45.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Line a muffin tin with cupcake liners.
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Stir in the vanilla extract and mashed bananas.
5. Gradually add the flour, baking powder, and salt, mixing until just combined.
6. Divide the batter evenly among the prepared muffin cups.
7. Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a cupcake comes out clean.
8. Allow the cupcakes to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
9. To make the frosting, beat the softened butter and confectioners sugar together until smooth and creamy.
10. Add the vanilla extract and milk, mixing until combined.
11. If the frosting is too thick, you can add a bit more milk to achieve the desired consistency.
12. Once the cupcakes are cooled, spread the frosting evenly over the top of each cupcake.
13. Drizzle the strawberry preserves over the frosting, creating a swirly pattern if desired.
14. Serve the Banana Cupcakes with Strawberry Frosting immediately, or store them in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 2 days.

[/INST]

415a9b7161.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350F and line a 6-cup muffin pan.
Place the butter in a small saucepan over medium heat and cook until the aroma is nutty and the milk solids start to turn brown on the bottom of the pan, about 5 minutes.
With a spatula, transfer the browned butter into a large mixing bowl.
Add the brown and white sugars, eggs and vanilla to the bowl and mix until combined.
Whisk together the flour, ground hazelnuts, baking powder and salt.
Pour the dry ingredients into the browned butter mixture and mix until fully incorporated.
Gently fold in the raspberries.
Spoon the muffin batter into the paper cups.
Scatter the tops with a few of the cracked hazelnuts, while gently pressing them securely into place.
Bake for 15-18 minutes, until a cake tester inserted in the center comes out clean.
Let the muffins cool briefly in the pan, and then place them on a wire rack to cool.
415a9b7161.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the browned butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Gradually add the flour, ground hazelnuts, baking powder, and salt, mixing until just combined.
5. Fold in the raspberries.
6. Fill muffin cups with the batter, about 3/4 full.
7. Garnish the tops of the muffins with lightly cracked hazelnuts.
8. Bake the muffins for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
9. Allow the muffins to cool for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Hazelnut-Brown Butter Muffins with Raspberries!

615e73ba74.gt:
The best way to capture the elusive flavor of summertime.
Ben and Jerry prefer small peaches because they have more flavor and less water than the larger ones.
Combine the peaches, 1/2 cup of the sugar, and the lemon juice in a bowl.
Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours, stirring the mixture every 30 minutes.
Remove the peaches from the refrigerator and drain the juice into another bowl.
Return the peaches to the refrigerator.
Whisk the eggs in a mixing bowl until light and fluffy, 1 to 2 minutes.
Whisk in the remaining 3/4 cup sugar, a little at a time, then continue whisking until completely blended, about 1 minute more.
Pour in the cream and milk and whisk to blend.
Add the peach juice and blend.
Transfer the mixture to an ice cream maker and freeze following manufacturer's instructions.
After the ice cream stiffens (about 2 minutes before if is done) add the peaches, then continue freezing until the ice cream is ready.
Makes 1 generous quart.
615e73ba74.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the peaches, sugar, lemon juice, and eggs. Mix until well combined.
3. Gradually add the heavy whipping cream and milk, mixing until smooth.
4. Pour the mixture into a 9x9 inch baking dish.
5. Bake for 35-40 minutes, or until the edges are set and the center is slightly wobbly.
6. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares.
7. Serve the cake with a scoop of Ben and Jerry's Fresh Georgia Peach Ice Cream.

Enjoy your delicious dessert!

0a605c19e8.gt:
Add everything but the shrimp to a gallon-sized freezer bag.
Seal the bag and shake well to combine.
Taste test for spiciness; add sriracha for more heat, and tomato paste and olive oil for less heat.
When youre happy with it, add the shrimp and marinate in the fridge for 45 minutes.
Dump the entire bag, marinade included, into a pre-heated frying pan.
Fry the shrimp until theyre curled up and no longer translucent, a couple of minutes on each side.
You can also skewer and grill the shrimp.
Serve over rice, pasta, udon, in lettuce wraps with carrot and sprouts, as an appetizer ...
0a605c19e8.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. In a large skillet or frying pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
2. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, until fragrant.
3. Add the chopped parsley and cook for another minute, until it becomes slightly wilted.
4. Squeeze the juiced lemon over the garlic and parsley mixture, and stir to combine.
5. Add the sriracha sauce to the pan, and stir to combine.
6. Add the tomato paste to the pan, and stir to combine.
7. Add the dry oregano to the pan, and stir to combine.
8. Season the shrimp with salt and pepper, and add them to the pan. Cook the shrimp until they are cooked through, about 2-3 minutes per side.
9. Serve the Sriracha Fried Shrimp over a bed of rice or noodles, and enjoy your delicious meal!

[/INST]

2893fcfb35.gt:
Heat a medium skillet over medium-high heat.
Spray with nonstick cooking spray.
Add the diced onion and saute until tender, about 5 minutes.
Add the diced apple and saute until tender, about 3 minutes.
Then remove from heat and set aside for the moment.
In a medium sized mixing bowl, melt the butter (you can do this in the microwave, heating for 30 seconds, stirring, then heating for additional 30 second increments if needed).
Then add the bread crumbs to the melted butter and toss to coat.
Into the bread crumb mixture, mix in the onion and apple.
Add the shredded cheese and mix to thoroughly combine.
Slice the pork chops lengthwise leaving about 1/2 an inch on one side still intact (you are basically making a pocket for the filling mixture).
Stuff pork chops with bread crumb mixture.
Secure the pork chops closed using toothpicks.
Spray each side of the pork chops with nonstick cooking spray and season with salt and pepper.
Grill the pork chops (or cook on a skillet) over medium to medium high heat until the juices run clear, about 20-25 minutes.
Remove from the grill and let rest about 5 minutes.
Remove toothpicks.
Serve and enjoy!
!
2893fcfb35.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix together the diced onion, diced apple, melted butter, bread crumbs, and shredded cheese.
3. Season the pork chops with salt and pepper, or to taste.
4. Dip each pork chop in the bread crumb mixture, ensuring that it is evenly coated.
5. Place the breaded pork chops on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the pork is cooked through and the bread crumbs are golden brown.
6. Remove the pork chops from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Sweet Apple and Onion Stuffed Pork Chops!

0ede22d38c.gt:
Chop onion and celery.
Saute celery and onion in vegetable oil in a 2-quart saucepan over medium heat until tender.
Add chicken stock and frozen vegetables.
Cover and cook until vegetables are cooked, about 10 minutes.
If vegetables are too large, you may wish to cut them into smaller pieces.
Stir in cream of chicken soup, chicken and milk and heat through, stirring occasionally.
Cut cheese into chunks and add to soup, stirring until melted.
Taste and season if needed.
(It shouldnt need much if any salt.)
Serve immediately with crackers.
0ede22d38c.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the onion and celery, and cook until they are softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the chicken stock, cauliflower, and broccoli to the pot. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the cauliflower and broccoli are tender.
4. Add the cream of chicken soup, shredded chicken, and milk to the pot. Stir until the ingredients are well combined.
5. Season the soup with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
6. Transfer the soup to a large oven-safe casserole dish.
7. Bake the soup in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the soup is hot and bubbly, and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Serve the meal with crackers on the side.

Enjoy your delicious, comforting Chunky Chowder!

dd8991d2f0.gt:
Bring water for noodles to boil in a large pot.
Cook noodles according to instructions on package, then drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil, and then add onion.
Saute onions for 10-15 minutes, over medium-low heat until lightly browned.
Add broccoli and 1/4 cup water.
Cover pan and saute 5 minutes or so until broccoli turns bright green and begins to soften.
Stir in garlic and salt.
Then stir in sesame oil, agave and ume vinegar.
In a small bowl, combine arrowroot and 1 tablespoon water, stirring vigorously to make a paste without any lumps.
Pour the paste over the broccoli and mix quickly and vigorously to loosen any of the mixture that sticks to the bottom of the pan.
Place noodles on individual plates, then top with broccoli mixture.
Garnish with scallions, cilantro and peanuts.
dd8991d2f0.pred:
1. Prepare the ingredients:
- Rinse the mung bean noodles and set aside.
- Chop the onion and broccoli into small pieces.
- Rinse the scallions and cilantro and set aside.
- Roast the peanuts.

2. Prepare the sauce:
- In a small bowl, mix the olive oil, sesame oil, agave nectar, ume vinegar, and arrowroot.

3. Cook the noodles:
- In a large pot, bring the water to a boil. Add the mung bean noodles and cook until they are tender but still firm.

4. Cook the vegetables:
- In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until it is softened.
- Add the broccoli and cook until it is tender.

5. Combine the ingredients:
- In a large bowl, combine the cooked noodles, vegetables, sauce, and peanuts.

6. Serve:
- Serve the vegetarian Pad Thai over a bed of rice or noodles.

[/INST]

6902fabddb.gt: Stir salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, and cayenne pepper in an airtight container, seal, and shake to combine.
6902fabddb.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece, follow these instructions:
1. In a small bowl, mix the kosher salt, ground black pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, and ground red pepper.
2. Spread the seasoned salt mixture evenly over the desired food item, such as a steak, chicken, or fish.
3. Allow the seasoned salt to sit on the food for at least 30 minutes before cooking.
4. Cook the food according to the desired method, such as grilling, baking, or pan-searing.
5. Serve the seasoned salt-covered food immediately after cooking.

By following these instructions, you can recreate the delicious homemade seasoned salt and enjoy the flavorful dish.

e766664a53.gt:
Heat the oven to 450 degrees F with a rack in the middle position.
Take a small slice off of the bottom of each potato so that they will sit flat, and then a small slice (about 1/4) from each end.
Make slices crosswise down the potato at 1/4 intervals, leaving 1/4 at the bottom.
Make sure you do not cut all the way through.
Rinse the sliced potatoes under cold running water, making sure water gets between each slice to wash away excess starch.
Place the potatoes on a plate, bottom side up, and microwave for 5 minutes (do not cover).
Flip the potatoes over, then microwave for another 5 minutes.
While the potatoes are in the microwave, make the topping.
Pulse the bread in a food processor until you have coarsely ground crumbs.
In a medium bowl, use a fork to mix the crumbs with the melted butter, cheddar cheese, Parmesan cheese, paprika, garlic powder, oregano, minced garlic, salt, and pepper until it forms a chunky paste.
Set aside.
When the potatoes are finished in the microwave, place them on a rimmed baking sheet.
Drizzle slowly with olive oil, so that it can run into the slices.
Fan the slices slightly, then dash each one with paprika, garlic powder, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Bake for 30 minutes, until the potatoes are cooked through and the edges are just starting to brown.
Remove from the oven and turn the broiler on.
Press the topping onto the top of the cooked potatoes, pressing into any slices that you easily can, but being careful not to rip the potatoes.
Place under the broiler for a couple of minutes, until the topping is bubbly and starting to brown.
e766664a53.pred:
To recreate the flavor packed potato fans in the image, follow these instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Wash and scrub the potatoes thoroughly.
3. Cut the potatoes into 1/4-inch (0.6 cm) thick slices.
4. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sliced potatoes, olive oil, paprika, garlic powder, oregano, salt, pepper, and minced garlic. Toss the potatoes to coat them evenly with the seasonings.
5. Spread the potato slices out on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Bake the potato slices in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and crispy on the edges.
7. While the potatoes are baking, melt the butter in a small saucepan.
8. Once the potatoes are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
9. In a small bowl, mix the melted butter, shredded cheese, and grated Parmesan cheese.
10. Carefully, place the cooked potato slices on top of the cheese mixture, and press them down gently to help the cheese melt and adhere to the potatoes.
11. Season the potato fans with salt and pepper to taste.

Enjoy your delicious, homemade flavor packed potato fans!

84dcc3c2e0.gt:
Combine all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes and shake vigorously.
Pour into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a wedge of lime.
84dcc3c2e0.pred:
1. Prepare the ingredients:
- In a shaker, combine the Vanilla Vodka, Rum, Midori, and Lime Juice.
- Add the Simple Syrup and shake well.
- Fill the shaker with ice and shake again.

2. Strain the mixture into a martini glass.
3. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry.

4. Enjoy your Key Lime Martini!

[/INST]

b240a9e8bb.gt:
Heat oven to 250F degrees.
Mix together cornmeal, flour, sugar, and baking powder.
Combine egg whites, milk and margarine, mix well.
Pour milk mixture into the dry ingredients, stir until just smooth (do not over mix).
In a large non stick skillet heat the 2 tbsp oil, heat until quite hot but not smoking.
Drop in a 1/4 cup of batter for each fritter.
Cook approx 4-6 minutes on each side.
Keep warm in the oven covered with foil until you have cooked all the fritters.
Serve with Blueberries or other fruit.
b240a9e8bb.pred:
To cook the mystery dish, pan fried blueberry corn fritters, follow these steps:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cornmeal, flour, light brown sugar, baking powder, and egg whites.
2. Gradually add the skim milk, melted margarine, and vegetable oil, mixing until smooth.
3. Fold in the canned or fresh blueberries.
4. Preheat a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat.
5. Pour the batter onto the skillet, creating small pancakes or fritters. Cook until the edges are golden brown and the fritters are cooked through, flipping them once.
6. Serve the pan fried blueberry corn fritters warm, garnished with powdered sugar or a drizzle of syrup, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious pan fried blueberry corn fritters!

704ac085bf.gt:
Get the 2 slices of bread and the peanut butter and banana.
Spread the peanut butter on one of the slices of bread.
Slice up as much banna as the bread can fit on it.
Place the two slices of bread together.
And now it is ready to eat.
704ac085bf.pred:
[INST] <<SYS>>
To make a delicious Peanut Butter and Banana Sandwich, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cut the bananas into slices and spread peanut butter on each slice.
3. Place the banana slices on one slice of bread, and the other slice of bread on top.
4. Place the sandwich in a baking dish and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and the peanut butter is melted and bubbly.
5. Remove the sandwich from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before cutting it into halves or quarters.
6. Serve the Peanut Butter and Banana Sandwich warm and enjoy!

[/INST]

1090169845.gt:
Preheat the over to 400F.
Divide the fish into 2 portions placing each in the center of a piece of foil (spraying the foil with some cooking oil is a good idea).
Salt and pepper to taste.
To each portion add pieces of pinched-off-the-stem fresh dill, a splash of lemon juice (or a slice of lemon) and half a pat of butter (optional).
Fold the foil into a packet by folding the edges up until they meet over the center and folding over to seal.
Put the packets in an oven dish and bake for 15 minutes.
Remove and serve.
1090169845.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the fish fillet with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
3. Place the fish fillet on a baking sheet or a foil-lined baking sheet.
4. Drizzle the fish fillet with lemon juice or use lemon slices to ensure even coverage.
5. If using butter, place it on top of the fish fillet.
6. Bake the fish for 12-15 minutes or until it is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
7. Remove the fish from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious New Zealand orange roughy fish dish!

b5d5eda997.gt:
Preheat oven to 325F
mix cake in bowl...following the directions on the box.
add jell-o pudding
add strawberry extract
add 1\2 can of strawberry frosting
pour mixture in a floured cake pan.
I used a bundt pan
bake for 35 to 40 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean.
once cake has cooled, take the un-used portion of the frosting and microwave for 10 seconds.
stir and drizzle with spoon over cake
b5d5eda997.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease and flour a 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the strawberry extract, strawberry jell-o instant pudding, and cake mix.
4. Add the eggs, oil, and water, mixing until well combined.
5. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan.
6. Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
8. Once the cake is cooled, use a sharp knife to cut it into slices.
9. To make the frosting, mix the canned frosting with a small amount of water, if needed, to achieve the desired consistency.
10. Spread the frosting on the cooled cake slices.
11. Enjoy your delicious Easy Strawberry Cake!

[/INST]

820cb37cdd.gt:
1.
Brown the onion in the olive oil until turning translucent.
Add the garlic.
2.
Add both sausage and beef, break into very small pieces and cook through.
3.
Add spices and seasonings, remove from heat.
Drain and cool.
In a food processor, add ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, egg, and the sausage/ground beef mixture.
Process together until it reaches an almost paste-like consistency.
Refrigerate until ready to use.
Can also be frozen.
820cb37cdd.pred:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
2. Add the onion and sauté until it is soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the minced garlic and continue to cook for an additional 2 minutes.
4. Add the Italian sausage and ground sirloin to the skillet, breaking them up with a spoon. Cook until the meat is browned and cooked through.
5. Add the paprika, Italian seasoning, ground fennel, red pepper flakes, and sauté for an additional 2 minutes.
6. Add the ricotta cheese and Parmesan cheese to the skillet, stirring to combine.
7. Add the egg to the skillet and stir until the egg is cooked through.
8. Season the filling with salt and pepper to taste.

9. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
10. Place the ravioli pasta sheets on a lightly floured surface.
11. Place a spoonful of the filling in the center of each ravioli sheet.
12. Fold the pasta sheets over the filling, pressing the edges to seal the ravioli.
13. Place the ravioli on a baking sheet and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the pasta is cooked through and the filling is hot and bubbly.
14. Serve the sausage and beef ravioli hot.

b9b1d42894.gt:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Pour mixture over chicken in slow cooker.
Cook 3-4 hours on low.
Serve with no-yolk egg noodles.
Number of Servings: 4.
b9b1d42894.pred:
[/SYS]

1. Preheat your slow cooker on low heat.
2. In a large bowl, combine the chopped garlic, ranch dressing mix, and cream of chicken soup. Mix well.
3. Add the skim milk and reduced-fat sour cream to the bowl, stirring to combine.
4. Place the chicken breasts in the slow cooker, and pour the mixture over the chicken.
5. Cook the chicken in the slow cooker for 4-6 hours, or until the chicken is fully cooked and the sauce is thick and creamy.
6. Serve the chicken with the sauce over the top, and enjoy your delicious Bacon Ranch Slow Cooker Chicken.

[/SYS]

[/SYS]

1c2ae05e91.gt:
Cook/steam sliced carrots until fork-tender; drain and keep warm.
Preheat oven to 375.
Lightly grease/spray a 2 1/2 qt casserole dish; set aside.
In a mixing bowl, combine the melted butter, onion, cheese soup, milk, egg, cheese, crushed crackers, salt, pepper, tarragon and nutmeg; mix well.
Gently fold in the hot cooked carrots to the mixture.
Turn mixture into prepared casserole dish.
Bake, uncovered at 375 for 25-30 minutes.
1c2ae05e91.pred:
To recreate the Cheddar Carrot Bake, follow these instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sliced carrots, melted butter, minced onion, cheddar cheese soup, low-fat milk, beaten egg, shredded cheddar cheese, salt, pepper, and tarragon. Mix well.
3. Add the crushed cracker to the mixture, stirring to combine.
4. Pour the mixture into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
5. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
6. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Cheddar Carrot Bake!

8dfa9a04cc.gt:
In shallow bowl, mix flour, egg, vanilla, milk, and lemon jce.
Dip rings to cover.
In deep skillet heat oil to about 375*.
Fry rings, in batches of 3 or 4 for 2 1/2 minutes or until golden brown.
Place on paper towels and dust with sugar on both sides.
8dfa9a04cc.pred:
To cook the apple rings, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the flour, egg, vanilla, and lemon juice. Mix well.
3. Add the milk to the mixture and stir until smooth.
4. Dip each apple ring into the batter, ensuring it's evenly coated.
5. Heat oil in a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat.
6. Carefully place the battered apple rings into the hot oil. Cook for about 3-4 minutes, or until they are golden brown on both sides.
7. Remove the apple rings from the oil using a slotted spoon or tongs, and place them on a wire rack or paper towels to drain excess oil.
8. Once the apple rings are cooled, dust them with confectioners' sugar.

Enjoy your delicious apple rings!

8c25573d0e.gt:
In a mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar until fluffy.
Beat in flour.
Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Roll out onto a well-floured surface to 1/4-in.
thickness.
Brush lightly with egg.
Sprinkle with almonds and sugar if desired.
Using a fluted pastry cutter or knife, cut into 2-in.
x 1-in.
strips.
Place 1 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 10-12 minute or until lightly browned.
Cool on wire racks.
8c25573d0e.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the egg and beat until well combined.
4. Gradually add the flour, mixing until a smooth dough forms.
5. If desired, add a small amount of colored crystal sugar to the dough for color.
6. Roll the dough out on a floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
7. Cut the dough into desired shapes using cookie cutters or a sharp knife.
8. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are lightly golden brown around the edges.
10. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Finnish Christmas cookies!

87f97ac544.gt:
Preheat oven to 350A.
Slice ham in half.
If using slices of cheese, cut in quarters.
Roll desired amount of ham and cheese up in each biscuit.
Use toothpick to hold in place.
Bake 15 minutes or until golden brown.
Feel free to stuff these with almost anything!
Little smokies sausages with cheese and a tsp of chili; slices of pepperoni with mozzarella and a tsp of pizza sauce or marinara, etc.
87f97ac544.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Open the can of biscuits and carefully remove the biscuits, leaving the biscuit can in place.
3. Cut the biscuits into quarters.
4. Place the biscuit quarters on a baking sheet or a lined baking sheet.
5. Spread a thin layer of butter on each biscuit quarter.
6. Place the thin slices of ham on top of the biscuit quarters, covering them evenly.
7. Place the cheese slices on top of the ham slices.
8. Bake the biscuit roll ups in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
9. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the biscuit roll ups cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious ham and cheese biscuit roll ups!

b188749dcd.gt:
Combine fennel seeds, cumin seeds, caraway seeds, cracked wheat, butter or margarine, molasses or barley malt, and orange zest in 1 1/3 cup of boiling water.
Soak for 1 hour.
(This pre-soaks the cracked wheat and pre-releases the other flavors.)
Add seed mixture along with baking soda, whole wheat or rye flour, high-gluten bread flour, dry yeast, gluten, and buttermilk powder into the pan of a bread machine in the order suggested by the manufacturer.
Select the cycle for White Bread and the Light Crust setting.
Start.
b188749dcd.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the boiling water, fennel seed, cumin seeds, caraway seed, cracked wheat, and butter. Allow the mixture to cool for a few minutes.
3. Add the molasses, orange zest, baking soda, rye flour, bread flour, active dry yeast, and gluten flour to the bowl. Mix the ingredients until well combined.
4. Gradually add the powdered buttermilk, stirring until the dough comes together. If the dough is too dry, you can add a bit more water. If it's too sticky, you can add a bit more flour.
5. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic.
6. Place the dough in a lightly oiled bowl, cover it with a damp cloth or plastic wrap, and allow it to rise in a warm place for about 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.
7. Punch down the dough, and then shape it into a loaf on a floured surface.
8. Place the loaf in a greased loaf pan, and cover it with a damp cloth or plastic wrap. Allow it to rise for another 30-60 minutes, or until it has doubled in size again.
9. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
10. Bake the loaf for about 30-40 minutes, or until it's golden brown and sounds hollow when tapped.
11. Remove the loaf from the oven, and let it cool on a wire rack for about 10-15 minutes.
12. Slice the loaf and serve it warm, with a side of your favorite condiments or spreads.

Enjoy your delicious Limpa Bread!

adf0775fd4.gt:
Bring a large saucepan of salted water to a boil.
Fill a large bowl with ice water.
In another large bowl, whisk the shallot, vinegar and sour cream together.
Whisk in the olive oil until emulsified.
Season with salt and pepper.
Add the sugar snap peas to the boiling water and blanch for 20 seconds.
Add the snow peas and cook for 20 seconds.
Add the frozen baby peas and cook for 20 seconds longer, until the sugar snaps and snow peas are crisp-tender and the baby peas are heated through.
Drain and immediately transfer the colander to the ice water to stop the cooking.
Drain again and pat the peas dry.
Add the peas to the dressing, season with salt and pepper and toss to coat.
Serve.
adf0775fd4.pred:
To recreate the three-pea salad, follow these instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the minced shallot, sherry vinegar, sour cream or creme fraiche, and olive oil. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
2. Add the sugar snap peas and snow peas, halved crosswise, to the bowl.
3. Toss the ingredients together until the peas are evenly coated with the dressing.
4. Add the frozen baby peas to the bowl and toss again.
5. Serve the three-pea salad immediately or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving to allow the flavors to meld.

This three-pea salad is a delicious and healthy side dish that can be enjoyed on its own or paired with a main course.

1296229d55.gt:
Pick your favorite way of preparing meat.
I sliced a thick steak and put this in a foil pouch.
This would work well in a pressure cooker, too.
Place meat, sauces, seasoning and sugar together.
Adjust the amounts to your preferences.
The sugar makes the meat more tender and is perfect for tough cuts.
Cook until meat is done.
Add feta cheese and cover to let cheese melt.
Serve with pasta, rice or potatoes and don't plan on leftovers!
1296229d55.pred:
[/SYS]

[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the beef, steak sauce, Worcestershire sauce, steak seasoning, sugar, and feta cheese until well combined.
3. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
4. Heat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
5. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
6. Remove the beef mixture from the refrigerator and shape it into patties. Place the patties on the prepared baking sheet.
7. Bake the patties for 12-15 minutes, or until they reach your desired level of doneness.
8. Serve the amazing marinated beef on a bun or with your favorite side dish.

[/SYS]

[/INST]

4f880f7c86.gt:
Add the kinako and sugar to a bowl and combine well.
Then add the soy milk (or milk) to the bowl as well and cream everything together with a rubber spatula.
If the mixture is too dry, try adding some more milk.
Once mixed, wrap it in some cling film and squeeze and shape the mixture together with your hands so that the mixture forms a ball.
Once the mixture has reached a consistency where it can be shaped into a ball with your bare hands, shape the mixture into whatever shapes you like I usually roll mine out with a rolling pan over the cling film then slice it into pieces.
You can replace the sugar with brown sugar if you like.
Feel free to sprinkle the kinako truffles with kinako powder, cinnamon, or anything that comes to mind at the end as well.
4f880f7c86.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece, follow these steps:
1. In a small bowl, mix 50 grams of kinako (roasted soybean flour) with 15 grams of sugar (or brown sugar).
2. In a separate small bowl, mix 5 tbsp of soy milk (or milk) with 1 tbsp of water.
3. Combine the kinako mixture and the soy milk mixture, stirring until smooth and well-blended.
4. Spread the mixture onto a piece of parchment paper or a silicone mat.
5. Place the mixture in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours or until it hardens.
6. Once hardened, use a spatula to scrape the mixture onto a cutting board.
7. Cut the mixture into small, evenly-sized pieces.
8. Enjoy your homemade kinako truffles!

[/INST]

68d4e3063b.gt:
Preheat oven to 400F
Clean wing sections, salt and pepper, I stay light on the salt because the sauce adds some also.
Spread wings out on baking sheet, place in preheated oven for about 45 minutes.
About 5 minutes before the wings are done, in a small container (I use a coffee mug) mix the sauce ingredients.
I put a little sauce in a big enough bowl to hold the wings and mix them.
Add about 1/3 wings, about 1/3 sauce, same thing twice more.
I find that just makes it easier to evenly coat the wings.
If you want to add a little chart to the coating, you can broil the wings for a minute per side, keep an eye on them do you don't over do it.
My daughter does not like it that way, so we skip this step when she is home.
Serve immediately.
68d4e3063b.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the ground black pepper, salt, and sesame oil.
3. In a large bowl, toss the wing sections in the pepper and salt mixture until coated.
4. Heat the oven to 450°F (232°C).
5. In a separate bowl, mix the ranch dressing, BBQ sauce, and soy sauce.
6. Place the wing sections on a baking sheet and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the wings are cooked through and the meat is no longer pink.
7. Remove the wings from the oven and toss them in the sauce mixture.
8. Return the wings to the oven and bake for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the sauce is bubbly and the wings are fully coated.
9. Serve the Asian BBQ Ranch Wings hot.

[/INST]

c813791325.gt:
In a food processor, combine the garlic and cucumber and process until finely minced.
Add the yogurt, sour cream, lemon juice, dill and salt and pepper to taste.
Process until well blended, then transfer to a bowl.
Taste to adjust the seasonings if needed.
Cover and refrigerate until needed (recipe yields 1 cup).
c813791325.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the crushed garlic, sliced cucumber, vegan yogurt, sour cream, lemon juice, dill, mint, salt, and pepper.
3. Spread the mixture evenly over the sliced eggplant, and then sprinkle the flour, salt, and pepper over the top.
4. Drizzle the almond milk or other non-dairy milk over the eggplant, and then sprinkle the ground flaxseed mixture over the top.
5. Bake the eggplant for 30-40 minutes, or until it is tender and golden brown.
6. Remove the eggplant from the oven, and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Drain the excess liquid from the eggplant, and then use a fork to mash the eggplant into a crumbly texture.
8. Transfer the eggplant to a large bowl, and then add the bread crumbs, nutritional yeast, oregano, basil, smoked paprika, and tzatziki sauce. Mix well.
9. Serve the baked eggplant fries as a snack or appetizer.

[/INST]
