b067e71075.gt:
Heat the oven to 450 degrees F and arrange a rack in the middle.
Place a baking sheet upside down in the oven while its heating.
Remove chorizo from its casing and place in a medium frying pan over medium-high heat.
Cook, stirring occasionally, until browned, about 7 minutes.
Remove to a plate and set aside.
Add 2 tablespoons of the olive oil to the pan.
Add mushrooms and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Cook, stirring rarely, until beginning to brown, about 10 minutes.
Roll out pizza dough to a 10-inch round, remove the hot baking sheet from the oven, drizzle with remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil, and carefully place dough on the upside-down baking sheet.
Scatter chorizo, mushrooms, Jack cheese, and Parmesan cheese on top.
Drizzle with olive oil and bake until cheese is melted and crust is crisp and browned, about 15 minutes.
b067e71075.pred:

2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the Mexican chorizo and cook until browned, breaking it up into smaller pieces as it cooks.
3. Add the cremini mushrooms to the skillet and cook until they are tender and slightly caramelized, about 5-7 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
4. While the mushrooms are cooking, prepare the pizza dough by rolling it out on a floured surface to your desired thickness. Transfer the dough to a pizza stone or a baking sheet.
5. Spread a thin layer of shredded Jack cheese over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
6. Add the cooked chorizo and mushroom mixture on top of the cheese.
7. Sprinkle the grated Parmesan cheese over the top of the pizza.
8. Drizzle a little more olive oil over the pizza, if desired.
9. Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is bubbly and melted.
10. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
The instructions provided above are for preparing a delicious Mushroom and Chorizo Pizza Recipe using the ingredients shown in the photo. Follow these steps to create a mouthwatering meal that everyone will enjoy.

3427daffb8.gt:
Mix the oils and teriyaki sauce in a skillet, and warm over medium heat.
Baste eggs in skillet, turning constantly, until eggs turn dark brown (5 minutes).
Remove eggs from pan.
Mix garlic salt and pepper into oils in skillet.
Stirfry broccoli until tender crisp (3 minutes), then melt cheese on top.
Serve eggs with broccoli.

2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the shelled hard-boiled eggs and cook until they are slightly browned and cooked through.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the teriyaki sauce, garlic salt, and pepper.
4. Add the broccoli to the skillet, stirring to combine with the eggs. Pour the teriyaki sauce mixture over the broccoli and eggs, stirring to coat evenly.
5. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the broccoli is tender and slightly browned.
6. If desired, sprinkle the shredded Swiss cheese on top of the dish and return it to the oven for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Remove the dish from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

08e438e0f5.gt:
If you happen to use larger potatoes for the double batch, halve the large potatoes because the small ones for the regualr batch can be left whole.
Place all the potatoes in a deep pot and cover with water.
Place a lid on the potatoes and bring it to a boil.
Once it starts to boil, uncover and cook until tender (about twelve to fifteen minutes).
Then drain potatoes and put them back into the hot pot.
Add the butter, the seasoning package, milk and cheese.
It really depends on how creamy and cheesy you like your potatoes when deciding how much you want to add of the milk and cheese.
Smash the potatoes until they are the desired texture.
Add the amount of salt and pepper to taste you like and enjoy.
08e438e0f5.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Wash and peel the small red potatoes. Cut them into evenly sized pieces.
3. In a large pot, bring the potatoes and water to a boil. Reduce the heat and let the potatoes simmer until they are tender, about 20-25 minutes.
4. Drain the potatoes and return them to the pot. Mash the potatoes with a fork or a potato masher until smooth.
5. In a small bowl, mix the Italian salad dressing mix with the milk. Add salt and pepper to taste.
6. Add the mashed potatoes to the bowl with the dressing mixture and stir to combine.
7. Transfer the potato mixture to a large baking dish.
8. Add the large red potatoes to the baking dish. Drizzle the remaining butter over the potatoes.
9. Bake the potatoes in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender and the topping is golden brown.
10. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
11. Serve the Italian Mashed Potatoes hot.

934deaadde.gt:
Boil chicken, salt& poultry in approximately 2 quarts of water.
Remove chicken and set aside.
Add 3 cups milk (more for a richer flavor), bouillon cubes, and butter to broth.
Bring to almost a boil.
Add water to the flour to make a thin solution and pour in broth.
Stir well, reduce heat, and let simmer to thicken.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Pinch each biscuit to small pieces and put in broth.
Stir often so dumplings won't stick together.
When dumplings begin to sink, they are almost ready.
Pick chicken to small pieces and add to broth.
When dumplings are not gummy to taste, it is ready to eat.
934deaadde.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece, follow these instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the chicken breasts with salt and poultry seasoning.
3. In a large pot, bring the chicken bouillon cubes and water to a boil. Add the chicken breasts and cook for about 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked through.
4. Remove the chicken from the pot and set aside to cool.
5. In a large mixing bowl, combine the chicken, milk, and butter.
6. Add the biscuits to the chicken mixture and mix until the biscuits are fully incorporated.
7. Pour the mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish.
8. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until the dumplings are cooked through and the top is golden brown.
9. Serve the dish hot and enjoy your delicious chicken and dumplings!

1f141c8991.gt:
Heat oven to 375 degrees F. In bowl, mix together tomatoes, onion and cilantro.
Squeeze lime into the tomato mixture and toss until blended.
Arrange a single layer of chips on heatproof platter or baking sheet.
Top with spoonfuls of chili, tomato mixture, olives and cheese.
Add jalapeno slices, if desired.
Repeat layers until all the ingredients are used.
Bake 15 minutes or until cheese is completely melted.
Serve nachos hot.

c799c55881.gt:
Combine the sun-dried tomatoes, parsley, butter, and Tabasco in a medium bowl and mix into a uniform paste.
Taste and season with salt and pepper as needed.
Place 8 slices of the toasted bread on a work surface.
Spread an even amount of the tomato butter on each slice, using it all up.
Set the remaining 4 unbuttered bread slices aside.
Place 2 pieces of bacon each on the buttered sides of 4 of the bread slices.
Top the bacon with 1/4 cup of the arugula per sandwich.
Top the arugula with a slice of the unbuttered bread.
Place a quarter of the sardines on top of each unbuttered piece of bread and season with pepper.
Top the sardines with another 1/4 cup of the arugula per sandwich, and finish with a slice of buttered bread, buttered-side down.
Slice each sandwich in half and serve.
c799c55881.pred:
To cook the Sardine, Sun-Dried Tomato, and Bacon Club Sandwich, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Spread the sun-dried tomato slices in a single layer on a baking sheet. Drizzle them with the remaining oil and season with salt and pepper. Roast the tomatoes in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until they are golden and slightly crispy.
3. While the tomatoes are roasting, prepare the sandwich bread. Spread the butter on one side of each slice of bread.
4. In a small bowl, mix the chopped parsley, salt, and pepper.
5. Toast the sandwich bread slices.
6. In a small bowl, mix the Tabasco Sauce, salt, and pepper.
7. Assemble the sandwiches by placing a slice of toasted bread with the buttered side facing outward. Add a layer of sardines, a layer of sun-dried tomatoes, a layer of bacon, and a layer of arugula.
8. Spread the Tabasco mixture on the top slice of bread.
9. Place the other slice of bread on top, with the buttered side facing inward.
10. Cut the sandwiches in half or in diagonal slices, if desired.
11. Serve the Sardine, Sun-Dried Tomato, and Bacon Club Sandwich warm.

Enjoy your delicious and flavorful Sardine, Sun-Dried Tomato, and Bacon Club Sandwich!

79b26bed8a.gt:
Spray 8 x 8-inch casserole dish with vegetable cooking spray or grease with olive oil.
In a skillet, saute onion and garlic until soft in a little olive oil.
Toss with the cooked pasta.
Add and toss with the herbs, salt, pepper, a little (about 2 tsp.)
of the Parmesan cheese, all the ricotta, and beaten egg.
Toss well together.
Spread and press down half of the mixture in the prepared casserole dish.
Layer with half the tomato slices and zucchini.
Sprinkle with half of the Parmesan and mozzarella.
Repeat the process again.
Cover dish with foil and bake in a preheated 350F (180C) oven for 35 minutes.
Uncover and bake another 5 to 10 minutes, until cheese in oozy and light golden brown.
Let cool for 5 to 10 minutes before cutting into squares like lasagna.

5. Sprinkle the shredded mozzarella cheese on top of the vegetables.
6. Dot the top with grated parmesan cheese.
7. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly, and the pasta is cooked through.
8. Remove the dish from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

[/SYS]

d859113e86.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.
Grease and flour a loaf pan and set aside.
Combine the eggs, oil, pumpkin and water in a large bowl.
Sift the dry ingredients together and stir into the pumpkin mixture.
Stir in walnuts.
Pour into the prepared loaf pan and bake for one hour or until a tester inserted near the center comes out clean.

Wash, scrape and slice carrots into 1/4 inch thick rounds.
Bring water to a boil in a heavy saucepan.
Add carrots and garlic, cover, and cook about 15 minutes, or until tender (but still firm).
Drain carrots and place in serving bowl.
Mix remaining ingredients and pour over the carrots.

1.
Cook pasta according to package directions, omitting salt and fat.
Drain.

a22e0c83cf.pred:

Use both hands to massage the Honey Vinegar Miso Chicken Breasts to soften the muscle fibers.
Break it up into large pieces.

Combine all ingredients in a mixing bowl.

Brown hamburger and onions in the oil.
Combine all other ingredients in the crockpot (Except for the cheese)

[/INST]

30325f1814.gt:
Beans: trim and remove strings if you choose, then wash them.
Cook beans until they are crisp-tender.
Drain and set aside.
Cook bacon and reserve fat.
In a deep pan or pot, add olive oil.
Once hot, add the onion and saute for a little bit.
Now add garlic and simmer until the onions are clear.
Add the mushrooms, red bell pepper and parsley.
After 5 minutes of simmering, add cooking wine, chicken broth and some of the reserved bacon fat.
Cook until desired taste or when some of the liquid steams away.
Add salt to taste.
Remove liquid mixture from the stove, add the string beans, almonds and crumbled bacon.
Mix well and put in a serving dish.
Enjoy!
30325f1814.pred:
[/SYS]

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the reserved bacon fat over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 3 minutes.
3. Add the garlic and cook for another minute, until fragrant.
4. Add the mushrooms and cook until they release their liquid and become tender, about 5 minutes.
5. Add the green beans, red bell pepper, and cook until the vegetables are tender but still crisp, about 5 minutes.
6. Stir in the white cooking wine, chicken broth, and slivered almonds. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Transfer the mixture to a large baking dish.
8. Bake the Green Bean Almondine in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the sauce is bubbly and slightly thickened.
9. Serve the Green Bean Almondine hot, garnished with additional chopped parsley if desired.

[/SYS]

[/SYS]

5a55d2d191.gt:
Preheat oven to 200 degrees F (95 degrees C).
Line a baking sheet with paper towels.
Fill a bowl with lightly-salted water.
Rinse the grated sweet potato in the water, and drain into a sieve.
Pat the grated sweet potato dry with a cloth or paper towels, then place into a bowl.
Squeeze excess moisture from the grated onion, and place into the bowl with the sweet potato.
Stir the eggs and pepper into the mixture until well combined.
Heat the olive oil in a nonstick skillet over medium heat until it shimmers, and spoon about 1 heaping tablespoon of the potato mixture per patty into the hot oil.
Flatten the patties with a fork, and fry until golden brown and crisp on the bottom, 5 to 8 minutes.
Flip and cook on the other side, sprinkle with salt, then set the cooked patties aside on the prepared baking sheet in the preheated oven while you finish cooking the latkes.
Stir the potato mixture before cooking each batch of patties.
Serve hot with applesauce and yogurt.
5a55d2d191.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the grated sweet potato, onion, eggs, black pepper, olive oil, and salt. Mix well.
3. Add the applesauce and nonfat yogurt to the mixture, and stir to combine.
4. Heat a non-stick frying pan or griddle over medium heat.
5. Using a spoon, scoop out small portions of the mixture and shape them into small patties.
6. Place the patties on the hot frying pan or griddle, and cook for about 3-4 minutes on each side, or until golden brown.
7. Transfer the cooked latkes to a baking sheet, and place in the preheated oven. Bake for about 15-20 minutes, or until cooked through and crispy on the outside.
8. Serve the sweet potato latkes with a dollop of applesauce and a spoonful of nonfat yogurt.

Enjoy your delicious and healthy sweet potato latkes!

df8f764b0d.gt:
Sprinkle the patties with salt and pepper and grill the hamburgers; Transfer the patties to a warmed platter and start the eggs.
Heat 4 teaspoons of butter in a skillet and carefully break the eggs and cook them sunny side up until the whites are firm.
Remove from the skillet and place one egg on each pattie.
Sprinkle the eggs with salt and pepper;.
Arrange the anchovies (if desired) on top of the eggs.
Heat 4 tablespoons in a skillet; When it gets foamy, add the capers and parsley.
When the butter just starts to brown, pour equal amounts of the sauce over each egg/pattie and serve hot.
df8f764b0d.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the ground sirloin, eggs, capers, parsley, salt, and pepper. Shape the mixture into 4 patties.
3. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium-high heat. Add the butter and let it melt. Place the patties on the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until they are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).
4. Place the cooked patties on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 5-7 minutes, or until the patties are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 160°F (71°C).
5. While the patties are cooking, heat a small skillet or frying pan over medium heat. Add the butter and let it melt. Crack the eggs into the pan and cook until the whites are set and the yolks are still runny. Season with salt and pepper.
6. Place the cooked patties on the baking sheet and top each one with a fried egg.
7. Return the baking sheet to the oven and bake for 2-3 minutes, or until the eggs are cooked to your desired level of doneness.
8. Serve the Steak Hache Avec Oeufs a Cheval immediately.

[/INST]

c7e9cae7ae.gt:
In a large saucepan with boiling salted water, cook pasta 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente.
Drain and put back in the saucepan.
Meanwhile, in another saucepan, bring to boil heavy cream and dry onion flakes.
Add asparagus and smoked salmon, cook at low heat until warm.
Remove from the heat, add 1/2 cup of parmigiano reggiano and stir.
Add salt and pepper.
Add sauce to the pasta and stir to coat well.
Sprinkle each serving with remaining parmigiano reggiano.
c7e9cae7ae.pred:
To cook the Linguine With Smoked Salmon Creamy Sauce, follow these steps:

1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the linguine and cook according to the package instructions until al dente.
2. In a small saucepan, heat the heavy cream over medium heat until it starts to bubble. Add the dry onion flakes and cook for a few more minutes, stirring occasionally.
3. Add the asparagus to the saucepan and cook until it is tender but still crisp.
4. Remove the asparagus from the saucepan and set aside.
5. In the same saucepan, add the smoked salmon flakes or slivered salmon. Cook for a few minutes, stirring occasionally, until the salmon is heated through.
6. Add the cooked asparagus back to the saucepan and stir to combine.
7. Gradually add the grated parmigiano-reggiano cheese to the saucepan, stirring constantly to prevent lumps.
8. Season the sauce with salt and pepper to taste.
9. Drain the cooked linguine and return it to the pot. Pour the smoked salmon creamy sauce over the linguine and toss to combine.
10. Serve the Linguine With Smoked Salmon Creamy Sauce immediately, garnished with fresh parsley if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Linguine With Smoked Salmon Creamy Sauce!

dafbe725ac.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).
Mix ingredients well in the order given.
Drop by teaspoon on cookie sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.
Under bake for a chewy cookie.
dafbe725ac.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until smooth.
3. Add the flour, baking soda, and salt, and mix until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs, baking powder, and vanilla extract.
5. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, mixing until just combined.
6. Fold in the raisins, coconut, and whole wheat flake cereal.
7. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown.
9. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Sun Up Cookies!

1ebd581dca.gt:
In a large mixing bowl combine rhubarb, strawberries, sugar, lemon juice, cornstarch and the pinch of salt, stirring together well.
Spoon mixture into an 8x8 in (20x20 cm) glass baking dish.
In a second bowl, combine brown sugar, oats, cinnamon, nutmeg and butter, and stir with a fork until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Sprinkle this mixture over the fruit mixture.
If using oven, place in a 325F preheated oven, and bake uncovered for 20-25 minutes until golden brown on top and fruit is tender.
If using an outdoor grill, position the pan on a cool side of the grill (that means for a gas grill no heat directly underneath).
Maintain the heat to a medium-low temperature (around 300F).
Close lid of grill and cook 25-30 minutes.
Make sure to rotate the baking dish on the grill about every 8 minutes for even cooking.
Either way, the fruit should be tender and the juices bubbling when finished cooking.
I love serving with a scoop of vanilla ice cream or frozen yogurt.
1ebd581dca.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the sliced rhubarb, halved strawberries, sugar, lemon juice, cornstarch, and salt. Mix well.
3. Spread the mixture evenly in a baking dish.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the rolled oats, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
5. Cut the cold butter into small cubes and mix it with the oat mixture.
6. Sprinkle the oat mixture evenly over the fruit mixture in the baking dish.
7. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 35-40 minutes or until the fruit is bubbly and the crisp is golden brown.
8. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Rhubarb & Strawberry Crisp!

540bbf9ab0.gt:
For the muffins: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Grease 2 muffin tins.
In the bowl of a stand mixer, add butter and 1 cup sugar.
Cream for 3-5 minutes or until fluffy and pale in color.
Add the vanilla.
Add the eggs one a time, mixing after each addition.
In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, baking powder, cream of tartar, and nutmeg.
Add the flour mixture and sour cream alternately to the butter mixture, starting and ending with the flour.
Scrape down the bowl as needed.
Fold in the cinnamon chips.
In a small bowl, whisk together remaining 1 cup of sugar and tablespoons of cinnamon.
Using an ice cream scoop, scoop the batter into the cinnamon-sugar mixture and roll around to coat completely, making sure not to press your fingers into the batter while you roll.
Place the coated muffins into the prepared tins.
Bake for 20-22 minutes, or until golden brown and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Remove from the oven and let cool in the pans for 5 minutes before removing them to a wire rack to cool completely.
For the glaze: In a small bowl, whisk together powdered sugar, vanilla and milk until smooth.
Drizzle the glaze over the warm muffins with a spoon or a fork.
540bbf9ab0.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, cream of tartar, nutmeg, cinnamon, and salt. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with the sour cream, and mix until just combined.
4. Fold in the cinnamon chips and powdered sugar.
5. Divide the batter evenly among the muffin cups in a muffin tin.
6. Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
7. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Glazed Snickerdoodle Muffins!

f89bbed17a.gt:
Bring sweet potatoes and beets to a boil.
Slice sweet peppers lengthways.
Finely chop parsley.
Grate carrots and put aside in a bowl.
Cut beets into squares of medium to small sizes but not large.
Crush sweet potatoes and place both in a large bowl.
Chop up kale as finely as you can.
Ensure not to add the stalk.
Mix all dry ingredients in a bowl adding the salt and black pepper to taste.
Add sweet corn and cream style corn to bowl and mix.
In greased dish add approximately half of mixture.
Then add a layer of cheddar cheese and add all of the feta cheese.
Add remainder of mixture and layer top with cheddar cheese.
Bake at 190C for 30-45minutes.
Enjoy!
:)
f89bbed17a.pred:
To recreate the corn pie a la carte, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the beets, sweet potatoes, sweet peppers, parsley, carrots, kale, salt, pepper, and a can of sweet corn.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the cream style corn, evaporated milk, soft table margarine/butter, and crumbled feta cheese.
4. Add the corn mixture to the vegetable mixture, stirring to combine.
5. Gradually add the grated cheddar cheese to the mixture, stirring until well combined.
6. Pour the mixture into a greased 9-inch (23cm) pie dish.
7. Bake the pie in the preheated oven for 45-50 minutes, or until the filling is set and the crust is golden brown.
8. Remove the pie from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before cutting it into slices and serving.

Enjoy your delicious corn pie a la carte!

abf7924ee4.gt:
Start by heating olive oil in a skillet over high heat.
When the pan is pretty hot, add the garlic and cook for 1 minute literally.
You dont want the garlic to burn.
We used 3 cloves of garlic, but we probably should have used 4.
I love that stuff!
Add the butter and stir to melt.
Then add the heavy cream.
Stir well and heat for 5 minutes.
Add the flour.
This will help thicken the sauce.
Although corn starch could be used instead, I tend to stay away from that unless I absolutely need to use it.
Bring to a boil and then reduce the heat to simmer for 15-20 minutes.
Then add the salt and pepper.
We used more pepper than salt, but thats entirely up to you.
Add the ground nutmeg, and stir.
At the end of the process, add the grated cheese, stir and then add in the parsley, which will add some green and liven up the dish.
Serve with pasta (we used tortellini) and enjoy!
abf7924ee4.pred:
1. Heat the olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat.
2. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
3. Add the butter and cook for another minute, stirring constantly.
4. Add the heavy cream and stir until the sauce thickens.
5. Gradually add the flour, stirring constantly to avoid lumps.
6. Season the sauce with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Add the nutmeg and grated Parmesan cheese.
8. Cook for another minute, stirring constantly.
9. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the chopped parsley.
10. Serve the Once-Every-Two-Months Garlic Cream Sauce over your choice of pasta or rice.

[/SYS]

c33ce732c6.gt:
Add a pinch of salt to a pot of boiling water.
Cut the broccoli into small florets and boil for 40 seconds to a minute!
* Do not over boil and drain in a sieve.
Finely chop the bacon and garlic.
Pour a generous amount of oil into a pan and fry the bacon until it is brown and crispy.
Add the garlic.
When the garlic is fragrant, add the broccoli.
Sprinkle salt and pepper to taste.
Allow the flavours to blend and it's done!
c33ce732c6.pred:
To recreate the broccoli and garlic stir fry, follow these steps:

1. Wash and trim the broccoli florets, leaving the stems intact.
2. Cut the bacon into thin strips.
3. Chop the garlic clove into small pieces.
4. Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
5. Add the olive oil (or vegetable oil) to the skillet and let it heat for a few seconds.
6. Add the broccoli florets to the skillet and stir-fry for about 3-4 minutes, or until they are tender but still crisp.
7. Add the chopped garlic to the skillet and stir-fry for an additional 1-2 minutes, or until fragrant.
8. Remove the broccoli and garlic from the skillet and set aside.
9. In the same skillet, cook the bacon until it is crispy.
10. Add the cooked broccoli and garlic back to the skillet and stir to combine.
11. Season the stir-fry with salt and pepper to taste.
12. Serve the broccoli and garlic stir fry immediately.

Enjoy your delicious broccoli and garlic stir fry!

6d750b6d49.gt:
Heat pan, brown ground meat of choice
Finely chop peppers and onions.
Heat seperate pan with olive oil and saute peppers and onions with salt and pepper to taste.
Peel and dice Avocados.
Set aside.
Once peppers and onions are finished, combine meat, peppers, and avocados together.
Add 1 3/4 cups of Balsamic Vinaigrette to mixture and cook on low.
Add salt, black pepper, and garlic to taste.
Slice limes into wedges and set aside.
Finely dice Cilantro and set aside.
Cut heads off of Romaine lettuce and set aside.
Since we are using the lettuce as the wrap, the outer leaves typically work better.
Take two leaves of Romaine lettuce and spread hummus on the inside.
Add meat, pepper, onion, avocado, balsamic mix to wrap.
Finish off with Cilantro and Lime!
There are many things you can add to this such as rice, cheese, etc.
This is a healthier option we chose.
Enjoy!
6d750b6d49.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:

1. Wash and chop the vegetables: Wash the green, red, and yellow bell peppers, and the onion. Chop them into bite-sized pieces.
2. Prepare the ground meat: Grind the ground meat of your choice in a food processor or blender until it reaches the desired consistency.
3. Prepare the rice (optional): Cook the rice according to the package instructions.
4. Prepare the Cilantro Lime Vinaigrette: In a small bowl, mix the balsamic vinaigrette, lime juice, and chopped cilantro. Set aside.
5. Assemble the wraps: Spread a layer of hummus on each head of romaine lettuce. Add a layer of ground meat, sliced red and yellow bell peppers, and any additional desired ingredients such as shredded cheese (optional). Roll up the lettuce to enclose the filling.
6. Serve: Cut the rolled wraps into bite-sized pieces and serve with the prepared Cilantro Lime Vinaigrette on the side.

Enjoy your delicious Trav's Cilantro Lime Lettuce Wraps!

102b043149.gt:
1.
Make the seasoned rice vinegar (sushi-su): Combine the vinegar, sugar, salt, and kombu (if you are using it) in a small saucepan.
Place the saucepan over medium-high heat and cook, stirring until the sugar and salt dissolve.
When the mixture is clear, remove the saucepan from the heat and set it aside to cool.
Discard the piece of kombu.
The vinegar can be stored in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 month.
2.
Make the sushi rice: Cook rice according to package directions.
Transfer freshly cooked hot rice to a wide shallow bowl.
Pour a small amount of the seasoned vinegar evenly over the rice.
Toss the rice by gently cutting into it vertically with your rice paddle (or spatula), and then lifting the rice and turning it over.
As you do this, fan the rice with a hand fan or piece of cardboard (or get someone to help you).
Add more of the seasoned vinegar and continue the cutting, folding, and fanning process.
Fanning the rice facilitates quick cooling, which gelatinizes the surface of the rice and gives a glossy finish to it.
Towards the end, taste the rice occasionally to decide how much of you seasoned vinegar you want to add.
3.
Cover the seasoned rice with a moist cloth or plastic wrap until ready to use.
102b043149.pred:
1. In a medium saucepan, combine the cooked rice, rice vinegar, granulated sugar, and salt. Mix well.
2. Add the dried seaweed, and mix until well combined.
3. If desired, adjust the seasoning with additional salt or sugar to taste.
4. Serve the sushi rice immediately, or refrigerate until ready to serve.

[/INST]

This recipe is for cooking sushi rice, which is a staple ingredient in traditional sushi dishes. The cooked rice is combined with rice vinegar, granulated sugar, and salt, along with a piece of dried seaweed (kombu) to enhance the flavor. The sushi rice can be served immediately or refrigerated until ready to serve. This versatile dish can be enjoyed as a side dish or as part of a larger sushi meal.

8872296451.gt:
Mix all ingredients and blend well.
Pour into a greased 2 1/2 quart casserole baking dish.
Bake at 350 degrees for 45 to 50 minutes or until light brown on top.
Note: 1/2 cup of shredded cheddar cheese may be sprinkled on top during last 10 minutes of baking (optional).
8872296451.pred:
To recreate Emily's Cheesy Corn Casserole, follow these instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cornbread mix, sweet creamed corn, and sweet whole kernel corn.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and sour cream until well combined.
4. Pour the egg mixture over the corn mixture, and stir until well combined.
5. Melt the butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
6. Add the melted butter to the corn mixture, and stir until well combined.
7. Stir in the cheddar cheese until melted and well combined.
8. Pour the mixture into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
9. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the casserole is set and the edges are slightly golden brown.
10. Allow the casserole to cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Emily's Cheesy Corn Casserole!

3fe0a3e464.gt:
1.
Bring a large saucepan of water to a boil.
Add soba; cook 3 minutes.
Add broccoli to pan; cook 3 minutes or until soba and broccoli are done.
Drain.2.
Heat a grill pan over medium-high heat.
Coat pan with cooking spray.
Sprinkle chicken evenly with salt and pepper.
Add chicken to pan; grill 6 minutes on each side or until done.
Remove chicken from pan.
Cut into 1-inch pieces.3.
Combine vinegar, sesame oil, soy sauce, peanut butter, 1 teaspoon sesame seeds, sugar, crushed red pepper, and garlic in a large bowl, stirring with a whisk.
Stir in noodle mixture and chicken.
Sprinkle with remaining 1 teaspoon sesame seeds and green onions.
3fe0a3e464.pred:
To recreate the sweet sesame noodles with chicken and broccoli in the image, follow these instructions:

1. Cook the noodles according to the package instructions, usually by boiling them in a pot of salted water until they are cooked through.
2. While the noodles are cooking, prepare the chicken by seasoning it with salt and pepper. Heat a skillet or wok over medium-high heat, and cook the chicken until it is fully cooked through, flipping it halfway through the cooking process.
3. In a small bowl, mix the creamy peanut butter with a tablespoon of water to create a smooth sauce.
4. In a separate small bowl, mix the toasted sesame seeds, brown sugar, and crushed red pepper.
5. When the noodles are cooked, drain them and rinse them with cold water to stop the cooking process.
6. In a large bowl, combine the cooked noodles, chicken, and the sauce made from the peanut butter and water mixture.
7. Toss the noodles, chicken, and sauce together until everything is well combined.
8. Add the broccoli florets to the bowl, and toss everything together until the broccoli is coated with the sauce.
9. Serve the sweet sesame noodles with chicken and broccoli immediately, and enjoy your culinary masterpiece!

d070cb5476.gt:
In a small bowl, mix together rosemary, thyme, marjoram, salt, and pepper.
Rub herb mixture over tenderloin.
Place in a container, and pour hard cider over roast.
Add water until pork is completely submerged.
Cover, and refrigerate 6 to 8 hours, or overnight.
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Place roast in a roasting pan, elevated from the bottom, and pour marinade around the meat.
Bake for 1 hour in preheated oven.
In a large bowl, mix apples and onion.
Put mixture around and on top of roast.
Spoon brown sugar over entire pan evenly.
Place roast back into oven, and continue to cook for 1 hour more, or until meat reaches 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).
Transfer roast, apples, and onion to a serving platter.
For the gravy, brown flour in a skillet.
Pour the marinade/drippings mixture into the skillet.
Stir in syrup.
Cook and stir over high heat until liquid has thickened to desired consistency.
Slice roast, and serve with gravy.
d070cb5476.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. Season the pork tenderloin with salt and pepper to taste.
3. In a small bowl, mix the dried rosemary, dried thyme, dried marjoram, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
4. Drizzle the pork tenderloin with olive oil, then rub the herb mixture all over the pork.
5. Place the pork tenderloin in a baking dish, and pour the hard apple cider over it.
6. Add water to the baking dish, making sure the pork is covered by the liquid.
7. Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil, and bake for 1 1/2 to 2 hours, or until the pork is cooked through and reaches an internal temperature of 145°F (63°C).
8. Remove the pork from the oven, and let it rest for 10 minutes before slicing it into thin pieces.
9. In a large skillet, heat the brown sugar, maple syrup, and the apple pieces over medium heat. Cook until the apples are tender and slightly caramelized.
10. Serve the apple rosemary pork tenderloin with the apple and onion mixture on the side.

[/INST]

4edb974667.gt:
Pre-heat broiler.
Prepare pan with non stick spray.
in a small bowl combine chili powder, paprika, cumin, pepper, & cinnamon.
Place steak on wax paper, sprinkle cinnamon mixture over both side of steak.
Let stand for 15 minutes.
Broil steal 5" from heat for approx 6 minutes on each side.
Slice steak against grain.
4oz per serving.
4edb974667.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Season the London Broil with the chili powder, paprika, black pepper, ground cinnamon, and cumin.
3. Place the London Broil on a baking tray or a roasting pan.
4. Roast the London Broil in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes or until it reaches your desired level of doneness (rare, medium, or well done).

[/SYS]

fdb9200291.gt:
start by heating a large skillet with butter, garlic & olive oil cook on med heat about 1 minute add in diced serrano chili cook another minute.
add in shrimp & chopped lobster and all seasonings along with chili paste.
Cook 6-7 minutes till shrimp are nice & pink.
This is a spicy dish Enjoy!

2. In a small bowl, mix the chili paste, hot shot seasoning, black pepper, garlic salt, and serrano chili.
3. In a large bowl, toss the lobster tail with the olive oil and melted butter.
4. Add the spice mixture to the lobster, tossing to coat evenly.

6. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.

[/INST]

fc990de78b.gt:
Cut leeks diagonally into thirds and then diagonally in half to form 6 triangular pieces from each leek.
Rinse under cold water; drain.
Melt margarine in a heavy skillet; add leeks.
Cook until lightly browned, stirring gently, approx 15 minutes.
Stir in the broth cover and simmer for 30 minutes or until golden and the broth has mostly evaporated.
fc990de78b.pred:
To recreate the Poireaux Braises (Braised Leeks) in the image, follow these instructions:

1. Wash the leeks thoroughly and remove the roots, outer leaves, and tops.
2. Cut the leeks into 6-inch pieces.
3. In a large pot, combine the leeks, chicken broth, and salt.

6. Remove the leeks from the pot and let them cool slightly.
7. Serve the Poireaux Braises as a side dish or a main course, garnished with fresh parsley if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Poireaux Braises (Braised Leeks)!

7106d13160.gt:
preheat oven to 350
cream together brown sugar, butter, milk and eggs
mix in bisquick
in pieces add bananas 1 at a time until incorporated
pour batter into greased bread pan or baking dish of choice (i use an 8x10 casserole because i dont have a bread pan)
bake at 350 for 45-55 minutes
remove from oven, cool for 5 minutes for easier removal from pan

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the melted butter, brown sugar, and milk.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Stir in the bananas and bisquick until well combined.
